contentJson: [{"text":"Blessed is the man","poem":1},{"text":"who does not walk in the counsel of the wicked,","poem":2},{"text":"or set foot on the path of sinners,","poem":1},{"text":"or sit in the seat of mockers.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Blessed is the man who does not walk in the counsel of the wicked, or set foot on the path of sinners, or sit in the seat of mockers.

contentJson: [{"text":"But his delight is in the Law of the LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"and on His law he meditates day and night.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But his delight is in the Law of the LORD, and on His law he meditates day and night.

contentJson: [{"text":"He is like a tree planted by streams of water,","poem":1},{"text":"yielding its fruit in season,","poem":2},{"text":"whose leaf does not wither,","poem":1},{"text":"and who prospers in all he does.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He is like a tree planted by streams of water, yielding its fruit in season, whose leaf does not wither, and who prospers in all he does.

contentJson: [{"text":"Not so the wicked!","poem":1},{"text":"For they are like chaff driven off by the wind.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Not so the wicked! For they are like chaff driven off by the wind.

contentJson: [{"text":"Therefore the wicked will not stand in the judgment,","poem":1},{"text":"nor sinners in the assembly of the righteous.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Therefore the wicked will not stand in the judgment, nor sinners in the assembly of the righteous.

contentJson: [{"text":"For the LORD guards the path of the righteous,","poem":1},{"text":"but the way of the wicked will perish.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For the LORD guards the path of the righteous, but the way of the wicked will perish.

contentJson: [{"text":"Why do the nations rage","poem":1},{"noteId":0},{"text":"and the peoples plot in vain?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Why do the nations rage and the peoples plot in vain?

contentJson: [{"text":"The kings of the earth take their stand","poem":1},{"text":"and the rulers gather together,","poem":2},{"text":"against the LORD","poem":1},{"text":"and against His Anointed One:","poem":2},{"noteId":1}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The kings of the earth take their stand and the rulers gather together, against the LORD and against His Anointed One:

contentJson: [{"text":"“Let us break Their chains","poem":1},{"text":"and cast away Their cords.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: “Let us break Their chains and cast away Their cords.”

contentJson: [{"text":"The One enthroned in heaven laughs;","poem":1},{"text":"the Lord taunts them.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The One enthroned in heaven laughs; the Lord taunts them.

contentJson: [{"text":"Then He rebukes them in His anger,","poem":1},{"text":"and terrifies them in His fury:","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Then He rebukes them in His anger, and terrifies them in His fury:

contentJson: [{"text":"“I have installed My King on Zion,","poem":1},{"text":"upon My holy mountain.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: “I have installed My King on Zion, upon My holy mountain.”

contentJson: [{"text":"I will proclaim the decree","poem":1},{"text":"spoken to Me by the LORD:","poem":2},{"text":"“You are My Son;","poem":1},{"text":"today I have become Your Father.","poem":2},{"noteId":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I will proclaim the decree spoken to Me by the LORD: “You are My Son; today I have become Your Father.

contentJson: [{"text":"Ask Me, and I will make the nations Your inheritance,","poem":1},{"text":"the ends of the earth Your possession.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Ask Me, and I will make the nations Your inheritance, the ends of the earth Your possession.

contentJson: [{"text":"You will break them","poem":1},{"noteId":3},{"text":"with an iron scepter;","poem":1},{"text":"You will shatter them like pottery.","poem":2},{"noteId":4},{"text":"”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You will break them with an iron scepter; You will shatter them like pottery. ”

contentJson: [{"text":"Therefore be wise, O kings;","poem":1},{"text":"be admonished, O judges of the earth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Therefore be wise, O kings; be admonished, O judges of the earth.

contentJson: [{"text":"Serve the LORD with fear,","poem":1},{"text":"and rejoice with trembling.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Serve the LORD with fear, and rejoice with trembling.

contentJson: [{"text":"Kiss the Son, lest He be angry","poem":1},{"text":"and you perish in your rebellion,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"when His wrath ignites in an instant.","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"Blessed are all who take refuge in Him.","poem":1}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Kiss the Son, lest He be angry and you perish in your rebellion, 
when His wrath ignites in an instant. 
Blessed are all who take refuge in Him.

contentJson: [{"text":"O LORD, how my foes have increased!","poem":1},{"text":"How many rise up against me!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: O LORD, how my foes have increased! How many rise up against me!

contentJson: [{"text":"Many say of me,","poem":1},{"text":"“God will not deliver him.”","poem":2},"Selah",{"noteId":5}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Many say of me, “God will not deliver him.” Selah

contentJson: [{"text":"But You, O LORD, are a shield around me,","poem":1},{"text":"my glory, and the One who lifts my head.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But You, O LORD, are a shield around me, my glory, and the One who lifts my head.

contentJson: [{"text":"To the LORD I cry aloud,","poem":1},{"text":"and He answers me from His holy mountain.","poem":2},"Selah"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: To the LORD I cry aloud, and He answers me from His holy mountain. Selah

contentJson: [{"text":"I lie down and sleep;","poem":1},{"text":"I wake again, for the LORD sustains me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I lie down and sleep; I wake again, for the LORD sustains me.

contentJson: [{"text":"I will not fear the myriads","poem":1},{"text":"set against me on every side.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I will not fear the myriads set against me on every side.

contentJson: [{"text":"Arise, O LORD!","poem":1},{"text":"Save me, O my God!","poem":2},{"text":"Strike all my enemies on the jaw;","poem":1},{"text":"break the teeth of the wicked.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Arise, O LORD! Save me, O my God! Strike all my enemies on the jaw; break the teeth of the wicked.

contentJson: [{"text":"Salvation belongs to the LORD;","poem":1},{"text":"may Your blessing be on Your people.","poem":2},"Selah"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Salvation belongs to the LORD; may Your blessing be on Your people. Selah

contentJson: [{"text":"Answer me when I call,","poem":1},{"text":"O God of my righteousness!","poem":2},{"text":"You have relieved my distress;","poem":1},{"text":"show me grace and hear my prayer.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Answer me when I call, O God of my righteousness! You have relieved my distress; show me grace and hear my prayer.

contentJson: [{"text":"How long, O men, will my honor be maligned?","poem":1},{"text":"How long will you love vanity and seek after lies","poem":2},{"noteId":6},{"text":"?","poem":2},"Selah"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: How long, O men, will my honor be maligned? How long will you love vanity and seek after lies ? Selah

contentJson: [{"text":"Know that the LORD has set apart the godly for Himself;","poem":1},{"text":"the LORD hears when I call to Him.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Know that the LORD has set apart the godly for Himself; the LORD hears when I call to Him.

contentJson: [{"text":"Be angry, yet do not sin;","poem":1},{"noteId":7},{"text":"on your bed, search your heart and be still.","poem":2},"Selah"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Be angry, yet do not sin; on your bed, search your heart and be still. Selah

contentJson: [{"text":"Offer the sacrifices of the righteous","poem":1},{"text":"and trust in the LORD.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Offer the sacrifices of the righteous and trust in the LORD.

contentJson: [{"text":"Many ask, “Who can show us the good?”","poem":1},{"text":"Shine the light of Your face upon us, O LORD.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Many ask, “Who can show us the good?” Shine the light of Your face upon us, O LORD.

contentJson: [{"text":"You have filled my heart with more joy","poem":1},{"text":"than when grain and new wine abound.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You have filled my heart with more joy than when grain and new wine abound.

contentJson: [{"text":"I will lie down and sleep in peace,","poem":1},{"text":"for You alone, O LORD, make me dwell in safety.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I will lie down and sleep in peace, for You alone, O LORD, make me dwell in safety.

contentJson: [{"text":"Give ear to my words, O LORD;","poem":1},{"text":"consider my groaning.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Give ear to my words, O LORD; consider my groaning.

contentJson: [{"text":"Attend to the sound of my cry,","poem":1},{"text":"my King and my God,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"for to You I pray.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Attend to the sound of my cry, my King and my God, 
for to You I pray.

contentJson: [{"text":"In the morning, O LORD, You hear my voice;","poem":1},{"text":"at daybreak I lay my plea before You","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"and wait in expectation.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
In the morning, O LORD, You hear my voice; at daybreak I lay my plea before You 
and wait in expectation.

contentJson: [{"text":"For You are not a God who delights in wickedness;","poem":1},{"text":"no evil can dwell with You.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For You are not a God who delights in wickedness; no evil can dwell with You.

contentJson: [{"text":"The boastful cannot stand in Your presence;","poem":1},{"text":"You hate all workers of iniquity.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The boastful cannot stand in Your presence; You hate all workers of iniquity.

contentJson: [{"text":"You destroy those who tell lies;","poem":1},{"text":"the LORD abhors the man of bloodshed and deceit.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You destroy those who tell lies; the LORD abhors the man of bloodshed and deceit.

contentJson: [{"text":"But I will enter Your house","poem":1},{"text":"by the abundance of Your loving devotion;","poem":2},{"noteId":8},{"text":"in reverence I will bow down","poem":1},{"text":"toward Your holy temple.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But I will enter Your house by the abundance of Your loving devotion; in reverence I will bow down toward Your holy temple.

contentJson: [{"text":"Lead me, O LORD, in Your righteousness","poem":1},{"text":"because of my enemies;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"make straight Your way before me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Lead me, O LORD, in Your righteousness because of my enemies; 
make straight Your way before me.

contentJson: [{"text":"For not a word they speak can be trusted;","poem":1},{"text":"destruction lies within them.","poem":2},{"text":"Their throats are open graves;","poem":1},{"text":"their tongues practice deceit.","poem":2},{"noteId":9}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For not a word they speak can be trusted; destruction lies within them. Their throats are open graves; their tongues practice deceit.

contentJson: [{"text":"Declare them guilty, O God;","poem":1},{"text":"let them fall by their own devices.","poem":2},{"text":"Drive them out for their many transgressions,","poem":1},{"text":"for they have rebelled against You.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Declare them guilty, O God; let them fall by their own devices. Drive them out for their many transgressions, for they have rebelled against You.

contentJson: [{"text":"But let all who take refuge in You rejoice;","poem":1},{"text":"let them ever shout for joy.","poem":2},{"text":"May You shelter them,","poem":1},{"text":"that those who love Your name may rejoice in You.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But let all who take refuge in You rejoice; let them ever shout for joy. May You shelter them, that those who love Your name may rejoice in You.

contentJson: [{"text":"For surely You, O LORD, bless the righteous;","poem":1},{"text":"You surround them with the shield of Your favor.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For surely You, O LORD, bless the righteous; You surround them with the shield of Your favor.

contentJson: [{"text":"O LORD, do not rebuke me in Your anger","poem":1},{"text":"or discipline me in Your wrath.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: O LORD, do not rebuke me in Your anger or discipline me in Your wrath.

contentJson: [{"text":"Be merciful to me, O LORD, for I am frail;","poem":1},{"text":"heal me, O LORD, for my bones are in agony.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Be merciful to me, O LORD, for I am frail; heal me, O LORD, for my bones are in agony.

contentJson: [{"text":"My soul is deeply distressed.","poem":1},{"text":"How long, O LORD, how long?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: My soul is deeply distressed. How long, O LORD, how long?

contentJson: [{"text":"Turn, O LORD, and deliver my soul;","poem":1},{"text":"save me because of Your loving devotion.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Turn, O LORD, and deliver my soul; save me because of Your loving devotion.

contentJson: [{"text":"For there is no mention of You in death;","poem":1},{"text":"who can praise You from Sheol?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For there is no mention of You in death; who can praise You from Sheol?

contentJson: [{"text":"I am weary from groaning;","poem":1},{"text":"all night I flood my bed with weeping","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"and drench my couch with tears.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
I am weary from groaning; all night I flood my bed with weeping 
and drench my couch with tears.

contentJson: [{"text":"My eyes fail from grief;","poem":1},{"text":"they grow dim because of all my foes.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: My eyes fail from grief; they grow dim because of all my foes.

contentJson: [{"text":"Depart from me, all you workers of iniquity,","poem":1},{"text":"for the LORD has heard my weeping.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Depart from me, all you workers of iniquity, for the LORD has heard my weeping.

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD has heard my cry for mercy;","poem":1},{"text":"the LORD accepts my prayer.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The LORD has heard my cry for mercy; the LORD accepts my prayer.

contentJson: [{"text":"All my enemies will be ashamed and dismayed;","poem":1},{"text":"they will turn back in sudden disgrace.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: All my enemies will be ashamed and dismayed; they will turn back in sudden disgrace.

contentJson: [{"text":"O LORD my God, I take refuge in You;","poem":1},{"text":"save me and deliver me from all my pursuers,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: O LORD my God, I take refuge in You; save me and deliver me from all my pursuers,

contentJson: [{"text":"or they will shred my soul like a lion","poem":1},{"text":"and tear me to pieces with no one to rescue me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: or they will shred my soul like a lion and tear me to pieces with no one to rescue me.

contentJson: [{"text":"O LORD my God, if I have done this,","poem":1},{"text":"if injustice is on my hands,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: O LORD my God, if I have done this, if injustice is on my hands,

contentJson: [{"text":"if I have rewarded my ally","poem":1},{"noteId":12},{"text":"with evil,","poem":1},{"text":"if I have plundered my foe without cause,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: if I have rewarded my ally with evil, if I have plundered my foe without cause,

contentJson: [{"text":"then may my enemy pursue me and overtake me;","poem":1},{"text":"may he trample me to the ground","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"and leave my honor in the dust.","poem":2},"Selah"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
then may my enemy pursue me and overtake me; may he trample me to the ground 
and leave my honor in the dust. Selah

contentJson: [{"text":"Arise, O LORD, in Your anger;","poem":1},{"text":"rise up against the fury of my enemies.","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"Awake, my God, and ordain judgment.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Arise, O LORD, in Your anger; rise up against the fury of my enemies. 
Awake, my God, and ordain judgment.

contentJson: [{"text":"Let the assembled peoples gather around You;","poem":1},{"text":"take Your seat over them on high.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Let the assembled peoples gather around You; take Your seat over them on high.

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD judges the peoples;","poem":1},{"text":"vindicate me, O LORD,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"according to my righteousness and integrity.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
The LORD judges the peoples; vindicate me, O LORD, 
according to my righteousness and integrity.

contentJson: [{"text":"Put an end to the evil of the wicked,","poem":1},{"text":"but establish the righteous,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"O righteous God who searches hearts and minds.","poem":2},{"noteId":13}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Put an end to the evil of the wicked, but establish the righteous, 
O righteous God who searches hearts and minds.

contentJson: [{"text":"My shield is with God,","poem":1},{"text":"who saves the upright in heart.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: My shield is with God, who saves the upright in heart.

contentJson: [{"text":"God is a righteous judge","poem":1},{"text":"and a God who feels indignation each day.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: God is a righteous judge and a God who feels indignation each day.

contentJson: [{"text":"If one does not repent,","poem":1},{"text":"God will sharpen His sword;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"He has bent and strung His bow.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
If one does not repent, God will sharpen His sword; 
He has bent and strung His bow.

contentJson: [{"text":"He has prepared His deadly weapons;","poem":1},{"text":"He ordains His arrows with fire.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He has prepared His deadly weapons; He ordains His arrows with fire.

contentJson: [{"text":"Behold, the wicked man travails with evil;","poem":1},{"text":"he conceives trouble and births falsehood.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Behold, the wicked man travails with evil; he conceives trouble and births falsehood.

contentJson: [{"text":"He has dug a hole and hollowed it out;","poem":1},{"text":"he has fallen into a pit of his own making.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He has dug a hole and hollowed it out; he has fallen into a pit of his own making.

contentJson: [{"text":"His trouble recoils on himself,","poem":1},{"text":"and his violence falls on his own head.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: His trouble recoils on himself, and his violence falls on his own head.

contentJson: [{"text":"I will thank the LORD for His righteousness","poem":1},{"text":"and sing praise to the name of the LORD Most High.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I will thank the LORD for His righteousness and sing praise to the name of the LORD Most High.

contentJson: [{"text":"O LORD, our Lord,","poem":1},{"text":"how majestic is Your name in all the earth!","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"You have set Your glory","poem":1},{"text":"above the heavens.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
O LORD, our Lord, how majestic is Your name in all the earth! 
You have set Your glory above the heavens.

contentJson: [{"text":"From the mouths of children and infants","poem":1},{"text":"You have ordained praise","poem":2},{"noteId":15},{"text":"on account of Your adversaries,","poem":1},{"text":"to silence the enemy and avenger.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: From the mouths of children and infants You have ordained praise on account of Your adversaries, to silence the enemy and avenger.

contentJson: [{"text":"When I behold Your heavens,","poem":1},{"text":"the work of Your fingers,","poem":2},{"text":"the moon and the stars,","poem":1},{"text":"which You have set in place—","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: When I behold Your heavens, the work of Your fingers, the moon and the stars, which You have set in place—

contentJson: [{"text":"what is man that You are mindful of him,","poem":1},{"text":"or the son of man that You care for him?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: what is man that You are mindful of him, or the son of man that You care for him?

contentJson: [{"text":"You made him a little lower than the angels;","poem":1},{"noteId":16},{"text":"You crowned him with glory and honor.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You made him a little lower than the angels; You crowned him with glory and honor.

contentJson: [{"text":"You made him ruler of the works of Your hands;","poem":1},{"text":"You have placed everything under his feet:","poem":2},{"noteId":17}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You made him ruler of the works of Your hands; You have placed everything under his feet:

contentJson: [{"text":"all sheep and oxen,","poem":1},{"text":"and even the beasts of the field,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: all sheep and oxen, and even the beasts of the field,

contentJson: [{"text":"the birds of the air and the fish of the sea,","poem":1},{"text":"all that swim the paths of the seas.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: the birds of the air and the fish of the sea, all that swim the paths of the seas.

contentJson: [{"text":"O LORD, our Lord,","poem":1},{"text":"how majestic is Your name in all the earth!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: O LORD, our Lord, how majestic is Your name in all the earth!

contentJson: [{"text":"I will give thanks to the LORD with all my heart;","poem":1},{"text":"I will recount all Your wonders.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I will give thanks to the LORD with all my heart; I will recount all Your wonders.

contentJson: [{"text":"I will be glad and rejoice in You;","poem":1},{"text":"I will sing praise to Your name, O Most High.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I will be glad and rejoice in You; I will sing praise to Your name, O Most High.

contentJson: [{"text":"When my enemies retreat,","poem":1},{"text":"they stumble and perish before You.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: When my enemies retreat, they stumble and perish before You.

contentJson: [{"text":"For You have upheld my just cause;","poem":1},{"text":"You sit on Your throne judging righteously.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For You have upheld my just cause; You sit on Your throne judging righteously.

contentJson: [{"text":"You have rebuked the nations;","poem":1},{"text":"You have destroyed the wicked;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"You have erased their name forever and ever.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
You have rebuked the nations; You have destroyed the wicked; 
You have erased their name forever and ever.

contentJson: [{"text":"The enemy has come to eternal ruin,","poem":1},{"text":"and You have uprooted their cities;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"the very memory of them has vanished.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
The enemy has come to eternal ruin, and You have uprooted their cities; 
the very memory of them has vanished.

contentJson: [{"text":"But the LORD abides forever;","poem":1},{"text":"He has established His throne for judgment.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But the LORD abides forever; He has established His throne for judgment.

contentJson: [{"text":"He judges the world with justice;","poem":1},{"text":"He governs the people with equity.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He judges the world with justice; He governs the people with equity.

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD is a refuge for the oppressed,","poem":1},{"text":"a stronghold in times of trouble.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The LORD is a refuge for the oppressed, a stronghold in times of trouble.

contentJson: [{"text":"Those who know Your name trust in You,","poem":1},{"text":"for You, O LORD, have not forsaken those who seek You.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Those who know Your name trust in You, for You, O LORD, have not forsaken those who seek You.

contentJson: [{"text":"Sing praises to the LORD, who dwells in Zion;","poem":1},{"text":"proclaim His deeds among the nations.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Sing praises to the LORD, who dwells in Zion; proclaim His deeds among the nations.

contentJson: [{"text":"For the Avenger of bloodshed remembers;","poem":1},{"text":"He does not ignore the cry of the afflicted.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For the Avenger of bloodshed remembers; He does not ignore the cry of the afflicted.

contentJson: [{"text":"Be merciful to me, O LORD;","poem":1},{"text":"see how my enemies afflict me!","poem":2},{"text":"Lift me up from the gates of death,","poem":1}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Be merciful to me, O LORD; see how my enemies afflict me! Lift me up from the gates of death,

contentJson: [{"text":"that I may declare all Your praises—","poem":2},{"text":"that within the gates of Daughter Zion","poem":1},{"text":"I may rejoice in Your salvation.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: that I may declare all Your praises— that within the gates of Daughter Zion I may rejoice in Your salvation.

contentJson: [{"text":"The nations have fallen into a pit of their making;","poem":1},{"text":"their feet are caught in the net they have hidden.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The nations have fallen into a pit of their making; their feet are caught in the net they have hidden.

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD is known by the justice He brings;","poem":1},{"text":"the wicked are ensnared by the work of their hands.","poem":2},"Higgaion Selah",{"noteId":19}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The LORD is known by the justice He brings; the wicked are ensnared by the work of their hands. Higgaion Selah

contentJson: [{"text":"The wicked will return to Sheol—","poem":1},{"text":"all the nations who forget God.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The wicked will return to Sheol— all the nations who forget God.

contentJson: [{"text":"For the needy will not always be forgotten;","poem":1},{"text":"nor the hope of the oppressed forever dashed.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For the needy will not always be forgotten; nor the hope of the oppressed forever dashed.

contentJson: [{"text":"Rise up, O LORD, do not let man prevail;","poem":1},{"text":"let the nations be judged in Your presence.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Rise up, O LORD, do not let man prevail; let the nations be judged in Your presence.

contentJson: [{"text":"Lay terror upon them, O LORD;","poem":1},{"text":"let the nations know they are but men.","poem":2},"Selah"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Lay terror upon them, O LORD; let the nations know they are but men. Selah

contentJson: [{"text":"Why, O LORD, do You stand far off?","poem":1},{"text":"Why do You hide in times of trouble?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Why, O LORD, do You stand far off? Why do You hide in times of trouble?

contentJson: [{"text":"In pride the wicked pursue the needy;","poem":1},{"text":"let them be caught in the schemes they devise.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: In pride the wicked pursue the needy; let them be caught in the schemes they devise.

contentJson: [{"text":"For the wicked man boasts in the cravings of his heart;","poem":1},{"text":"he blesses the greedy and reviles the LORD.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For the wicked man boasts in the cravings of his heart; he blesses the greedy and reviles the LORD.

contentJson: [{"text":"In his pride the wicked man does not seek Him;","poem":1},{"text":"in all his schemes there is no God.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: In his pride the wicked man does not seek Him; in all his schemes there is no God.

contentJson: [{"text":"He is secure in his ways at all times;","poem":1},{"text":"Your lofty judgments are far from him;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"he sneers at all his foes.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
He is secure in his ways at all times; Your lofty judgments are far from him; 
he sneers at all his foes.

contentJson: [{"text":"He says to himself, “I will not be moved;","poem":1},{"text":"from age to age I am free of distress.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He says to himself, “I will not be moved; from age to age I am free of distress.”

contentJson: [{"text":"His mouth is full of cursing, deceit,","poem":1},{"noteId":20},{"text":"and violence;","poem":1},{"text":"trouble and malice are under his tongue.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: His mouth is full of cursing, deceit, and violence; trouble and malice are under his tongue.

contentJson: [{"text":"He lies in wait near the villages;","poem":1},{"text":"in ambush he slays the innocent;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"his eyes watch in stealth for the helpless.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
He lies in wait near the villages; in ambush he slays the innocent; 
his eyes watch in stealth for the helpless.

contentJson: [{"text":"He lies in wait like a lion in a thicket;","poem":1},{"text":"he lurks to seize the oppressed;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"he catches the lowly in his net.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
He lies in wait like a lion in a thicket; he lurks to seize the oppressed; 
he catches the lowly in his net.

contentJson: [{"text":"They are crushed and beaten down;","poem":1},{"noteId":21},{"text":"the hapless fall prey to his strength.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They are crushed and beaten down; the hapless fall prey to his strength.

contentJson: [{"text":"He says to himself, “God has forgotten;","poem":1},{"text":"He hides His face and never sees.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He says to himself, “God has forgotten; He hides His face and never sees.”

contentJson: [{"text":"Arise, O LORD! Lift up Your hand, O God!","poem":1},{"text":"Do not forget the helpless.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Arise, O LORD! Lift up Your hand, O God! Do not forget the helpless.

contentJson: [{"text":"Why has the wicked man renounced God?","poem":1},{"text":"He says to himself, “You will never call me to account.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Why has the wicked man renounced God? He says to himself, “You will never call me to account.”

contentJson: [{"text":"But You have regarded trouble and grief;","poem":1},{"text":"You see to repay it by Your hand.","poem":2},{"text":"The victim entrusts himself to You;","poem":1},{"text":"You are the helper of the fatherless.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But You have regarded trouble and grief; You see to repay it by Your hand. The victim entrusts himself to You; You are the helper of the fatherless.

contentJson: [{"text":"Break the arm of the wicked and evildoer;","poem":1},{"text":"call him to account for his wickedness","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"until none is left to be found.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Break the arm of the wicked and evildoer; call him to account for his wickedness 
until none is left to be found.

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD is King forever and ever;","poem":1},{"text":"the nations perish from His land.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The LORD is King forever and ever; the nations perish from His land.

contentJson: [{"text":"You have heard, O LORD, the desire of the humble;","poem":1},{"text":"You will strengthen their hearts.","poem":2},{"text":"You will incline Your ear,","poem":1}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You have heard, O LORD, the desire of the humble; You will strengthen their hearts. You will incline Your ear,

contentJson: [{"text":"to vindicate the fatherless and oppressed,","poem":2},{"text":"that the men of the earth","poem":1},{"text":"may strike terror no more.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: to vindicate the fatherless and oppressed, that the men of the earth may strike terror no more.

contentJson: [{"text":"In the LORD I take refuge.","poem":1},{"text":"How then can you say to me:","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"“Flee like a bird to your mountain!","poem":1}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
In the LORD I take refuge. How then can you say to me: 
“Flee like a bird to your mountain!

contentJson: [{"text":"For behold, the wicked bend their bows.","poem":2},{"text":"They set their arrow on the string","poem":1},{"text":"to shoot from the shadows at the upright in heart.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For behold, the wicked bend their bows. They set their arrow on the string to shoot from the shadows at the upright in heart.

contentJson: [{"text":"If the foundations are destroyed,","poem":1},{"text":"what can the righteous do?”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: If the foundations are destroyed, what can the righteous do?”

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD is in His holy temple;","poem":1},{"text":"the LORD is on His heavenly throne.","poem":2},{"text":"His eyes are watching closely;","poem":1},{"text":"they examine the sons of men.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The LORD is in His holy temple; the LORD is on His heavenly throne. His eyes are watching closely; they examine the sons of men.

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD tests the righteous and the wicked;","poem":1},{"text":"His soul hates the lover of violence.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The LORD tests the righteous and the wicked; His soul hates the lover of violence.

contentJson: [{"text":"On the wicked He will rain down fiery coals and sulfur;","poem":1},{"text":"a scorching wind will be their portion.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: On the wicked He will rain down fiery coals and sulfur; a scorching wind will be their portion.

contentJson: [{"text":"For the LORD is righteous; He loves justice.","poem":1},{"text":"The upright will see His face.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For the LORD is righteous; He loves justice. The upright will see His face.

contentJson: [{"text":"Help, O LORD, for the godly are no more;","poem":1},{"text":"the faithful have vanished from among men.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Help, O LORD, for the godly are no more; the faithful have vanished from among men.

contentJson: [{"text":"They lie to one another;","poem":1},{"text":"they speak with flattering lips and a double heart.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They lie to one another; they speak with flattering lips and a double heart.

contentJson: [{"text":"May the LORD cut off all flattering lips","poem":1},{"text":"and every boastful tongue.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May the LORD cut off all flattering lips and every boastful tongue.

contentJson: [{"text":"They say, “With our tongues we will prevail.","poem":1},{"text":"We own our lips—who can be our master?”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They say, “With our tongues we will prevail. We own our lips—who can be our master?”

contentJson: [{"text":"“For the cause of the oppressed","poem":1},{"text":"and for the groaning of the needy,","poem":2},{"text":"I will now arise,” says the LORD.","poem":1},{"text":"“I will bring safety to him who yearns.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: “For the cause of the oppressed and for the groaning of the needy, I will now arise,” says the LORD. “I will bring safety to him who yearns.”

contentJson: [{"text":"The words of the LORD are flawless,","poem":1},{"text":"like silver refined in a furnace,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"like gold purified sevenfold.","poem":2},{"noteId":23}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
The words of the LORD are flawless, like silver refined in a furnace, 
like gold purified sevenfold.

contentJson: [{"text":"You, O LORD, will keep us;","poem":1},{"text":"You will forever guard us from this generation.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You, O LORD, will keep us; You will forever guard us from this generation.

contentJson: [{"text":"The wicked wander freely,","poem":1},{"text":"and vileness is exalted among men.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The wicked wander freely, and vileness is exalted among men.

contentJson: [{"text":"How long, O LORD?","poem":1},{"text":"Will You forget me forever?","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"How long will You hide Your face from me?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
How long, O LORD? Will You forget me forever? 
How long will You hide Your face from me?

contentJson: [{"text":"How long must I wrestle in my soul,","poem":1},{"text":"with sorrow in my heart each day?","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"How long will my enemy dominate me?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
How long must I wrestle in my soul, with sorrow in my heart each day? 
How long will my enemy dominate me?

contentJson: [{"text":"Consider me and respond, O LORD my God.","poem":1},{"text":"Give light to my eyes, lest I sleep in death,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Consider me and respond, O LORD my God. Give light to my eyes, lest I sleep in death,

contentJson: [{"text":"lest my enemy say, “I have overcome him,”","poem":1},{"text":"and my foes rejoice when I fall.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: lest my enemy say, “I have overcome him,” and my foes rejoice when I fall.

contentJson: [{"text":"But I have trusted in Your loving devotion;","poem":1},{"text":"my heart will rejoice in Your salvation.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But I have trusted in Your loving devotion; my heart will rejoice in Your salvation.

contentJson: [{"text":"I will sing to the LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"for He has been good to me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I will sing to the LORD, for He has been good to me.

contentJson: [{"text":"The fool","poem":1},{"noteId":24},{"text":"says in his heart,","poem":1},{"text":"“There is no God.”","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"They are corrupt; their acts are vile.","poem":1},{"text":"There is no one who does good.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
The fool says in his heart, “There is no God.” 
They are corrupt; their acts are vile. There is no one who does good.

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD looks down from heaven","poem":1},{"text":"upon the sons of men","poem":2},{"text":"to see if any understand,","poem":1},{"text":"if any seek God.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The LORD looks down from heaven upon the sons of men to see if any understand, if any seek God.

contentJson: [{"text":"All have turned away,","poem":1},{"text":"they have together become corrupt;","poem":2},{"noteId":25},{"text":"there is no one who does good,","poem":1},{"text":"not even one.","poem":2},{"noteId":26}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: All have turned away, they have together become corrupt; there is no one who does good, not even one.

contentJson: [{"text":"Will the workers of iniquity never learn?","poem":1},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"They devour my people like bread;","poem":1},{"text":"they refuse to call upon the LORD.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Will the workers of iniquity never learn? 
They devour my people like bread; they refuse to call upon the LORD.

contentJson: [{"text":"There they are, overwhelmed with dread,","poem":1},{"text":"for God is in the company of the righteous.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: There they are, overwhelmed with dread, for God is in the company of the righteous.

contentJson: [{"text":"You sinners frustrate the plans of the oppressed,","poem":1},{"text":"yet the LORD is their shelter.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You sinners frustrate the plans of the oppressed, yet the LORD is their shelter.

contentJson: [{"text":"Oh, that the salvation of Israel would come from Zion!","poem":1},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"When the LORD restores His captive people,","poem":1},{"text":"let Jacob rejoice, let Israel be glad!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Oh, that the salvation of Israel would come from Zion! 
When the LORD restores His captive people, let Jacob rejoice, let Israel be glad!

contentJson: [{"text":"O LORD, who may abide in Your tent?","poem":1},{"text":"Who may dwell on Your holy mountain?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: O LORD, who may abide in Your tent? Who may dwell on Your holy mountain?

contentJson: [{"text":"He who walks with integrity","poem":1},{"text":"and practices righteousness,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"who speaks the truth from his heart,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
He who walks with integrity and practices righteousness, 
who speaks the truth from his heart,

contentJson: [{"text":"who has no slander on his tongue,","poem":1},{"text":"who does no harm to his neighbor,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"who casts no scorn on his friend,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
who has no slander on his tongue, who does no harm to his neighbor, 
who casts no scorn on his friend,

contentJson: [{"text":"who despises the vile","poem":1},{"text":"but honors those who fear the LORD,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"who does not revise a costly oath,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
who despises the vile but honors those who fear the LORD, 
who does not revise a costly oath,

contentJson: [{"text":"who lends his money without interest","poem":1},{"text":"and refuses a bribe against the innocent.","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"He who does these things","poem":1},{"text":"will never be shaken.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
who lends his money without interest and refuses a bribe against the innocent. 
He who does these things will never be shaken.

contentJson: [{"text":"Preserve me, O God,","poem":1},{"text":"for in You I take refuge.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Preserve me, O God, for in You I take refuge.

contentJson: [{"text":"I said to the LORD, “You are my Lord;","poem":1},{"text":"apart from You I have no good thing.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I said to the LORD, “You are my Lord; apart from You I have no good thing.”

contentJson: [{"text":"As for the saints in the land,","poem":1},{"text":"they are the excellence","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"in whom all my delight resides.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
As for the saints in the land, they are the excellence 
in whom all my delight resides.

contentJson: [{"text":"Sorrows will multiply","poem":1},{"text":"to those who chase other gods.","poem":2},{"text":"I will not pour out their libations of blood,","poem":1},{"text":"or speak their names with my lips.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Sorrows will multiply to those who chase other gods. I will not pour out their libations of blood, or speak their names with my lips.

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD is my chosen portion and my cup;","poem":1},{"text":"You have made my lot secure.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The LORD is my chosen portion and my cup; You have made my lot secure.

contentJson: [{"text":"The lines of my boundary have fallen in pleasant places;","poem":1},{"text":"surely my inheritance is delightful.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The lines of my boundary have fallen in pleasant places; surely my inheritance is delightful.

contentJson: [{"text":"I will bless the LORD who counsels me;","poem":1},{"text":"even at night my conscience instructs me.","poem":2},{"noteId":28}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I will bless the LORD who counsels me; even at night my conscience instructs me.

contentJson: [{"text":"I have set","poem":1},{"noteId":29},{"text":"the LORD always before me.","poem":1},{"text":"Because He is at my right hand, I will not be shaken.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I have set the LORD always before me. Because He is at my right hand, I will not be shaken.

contentJson: [{"text":"Therefore my heart is glad and my tongue rejoices;","poem":1},{"text":"my body also will dwell securely.","poem":2},{"noteId":30}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Therefore my heart is glad and my tongue rejoices; my body also will dwell securely.

contentJson: [{"text":"For You will not abandon my soul to Sheol,","poem":1},{"text":"nor will You let Your Holy One see decay.","poem":2},{"noteId":31}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For You will not abandon my soul to Sheol, nor will You let Your Holy One see decay.

contentJson: [{"text":"You have made known to me the path of life;","poem":1},{"text":"You will fill me with joy in Your presence,","poem":2},{"noteId":32},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"with eternal pleasures at Your right hand.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
You have made known to me the path of life; You will fill me with joy in Your presence, 
with eternal pleasures at Your right hand.

contentJson: [{"text":"Hear, O LORD, my righteous plea;","poem":1},{"text":"listen to my cry.","poem":2},{"text":"Give ear to my prayer—","poem":1},{"text":"it comes from lips free of deceit.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Hear, O LORD, my righteous plea; listen to my cry. Give ear to my prayer— it comes from lips free of deceit.

contentJson: [{"text":"May my vindication come from Your presence;","poem":1},{"text":"may Your eyes see what is right.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May my vindication come from Your presence; may Your eyes see what is right.

contentJson: [{"text":"You have tried my heart;","poem":1},{"text":"You have visited me in the night.","poem":2},{"text":"You have tested me and found no evil;","poem":1},{"text":"I have resolved not to sin with my mouth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You have tried my heart; You have visited me in the night. You have tested me and found no evil; I have resolved not to sin with my mouth.

contentJson: [{"text":"As for the deeds of men—","poem":1},{"text":"by the word of Your lips","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"I have avoided the ways of the violent.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
As for the deeds of men— by the word of Your lips 
I have avoided the ways of the violent.

contentJson: [{"text":"My steps have held to Your paths;","poem":1},{"text":"my feet have not slipped.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: My steps have held to Your paths; my feet have not slipped.

contentJson: [{"text":"I call on You, O God,","poem":1},{"text":"for You will answer me.","poem":2},{"text":"Incline Your ear to me;","poem":1},{"text":"hear my words.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I call on You, O God, for You will answer me. Incline Your ear to me; hear my words.

contentJson: [{"text":"Show the wonders of Your loving devotion,","poem":1},{"text":"You who save by Your right hand","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"those who seek refuge from their foes.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Show the wonders of Your loving devotion, You who save by Your right hand 
those who seek refuge from their foes.

contentJson: [{"text":"Keep me as the apple of","poem":1},{"noteId":33},{"text":"Your eye;","poem":1},{"text":"hide me in the shadow of Your wings","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Keep me as the apple of Your eye; hide me in the shadow of Your wings

contentJson: [{"text":"from the wicked who assail me,","poem":1},{"text":"from my mortal enemies who surround me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: from the wicked who assail me, from my mortal enemies who surround me.

contentJson: [{"text":"They have closed their callous hearts;","poem":1},{"text":"their mouths speak with arrogance.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They have closed their callous hearts; their mouths speak with arrogance.

contentJson: [{"text":"They have tracked us down, and now surround us;","poem":1},{"text":"their eyes are set to cast us to the ground,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They have tracked us down, and now surround us; their eyes are set to cast us to the ground,

contentJson: [{"text":"like a lion greedy for prey,","poem":1},{"text":"like a young lion lurking in ambush.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: like a lion greedy for prey, like a young lion lurking in ambush.

contentJson: [{"text":"Arise, O LORD, confront them!","poem":1},{"text":"Bring them to their knees;","poem":2},{"text":"deliver me from the wicked by Your sword,","poem":1}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Arise, O LORD, confront them! Bring them to their knees; deliver me from the wicked by Your sword,

contentJson: [{"text":"from such men, O LORD, by Your hand—","poem":2},{"text":"from men of the world","poem":1},{"text":"whose portion is in this life.","poem":2},{"text":"May You fill the bellies of Your treasured ones","poem":1},{"noteId":34},{"text":"and satisfy their sons,","poem":1},{"text":"so they leave their abundance to their children.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: from such men, O LORD, by Your hand— from men of the world whose portion is in this life. May You fill the bellies of Your treasured ones and satisfy their sons, so they leave their abundance to their children.

contentJson: [{"text":"As for me, I will behold Your face in righteousness;","poem":1},{"text":"when I awake, I will be satisfied in Your presence.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: As for me, I will behold Your face in righteousness; when I awake, I will be satisfied in Your presence.

contentJson: [{"text":"I love You, O LORD, my strength.","poem":1}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I love You, O LORD, my strength.

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD is my rock, my fortress, and my deliverer.","poem":1},{"text":"My God is my rock, in whom I take refuge,","poem":2},{"text":"my shield, and the horn of my salvation,","poem":1},{"text":"my stronghold.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The LORD is my rock, my fortress, and my deliverer. My God is my rock, in whom I take refuge, my shield, and the horn of my salvation, my stronghold.

contentJson: [{"text":"I will call upon the LORD, who is worthy to be praised;","poem":1},{"text":"so shall I be saved from my enemies.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I will call upon the LORD, who is worthy to be praised; so shall I be saved from my enemies.

contentJson: [{"text":"The cords of death encompassed me;","poem":1},{"text":"the torrents of chaos overwhelmed me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The cords of death encompassed me; the torrents of chaos overwhelmed me.

contentJson: [{"text":"The cords of Sheol entangled me;","poem":1},{"text":"the snares of death confronted me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The cords of Sheol entangled me; the snares of death confronted me.

contentJson: [{"text":"In my distress I called upon the LORD;","poem":1},{"text":"I cried to my God for help.","poem":2},{"text":"From His temple He heard my voice,","poem":1},{"text":"and my cry for His help reached His ears.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: In my distress I called upon the LORD; I cried to my God for help. From His temple He heard my voice, and my cry for His help reached His ears.

contentJson: [{"text":"Then the earth shook and quaked,","poem":1},{"text":"and the foundations of the mountains trembled;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"they were shaken because He burned with anger.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Then the earth shook and quaked, and the foundations of the mountains trembled; 
they were shaken because He burned with anger.

contentJson: [{"text":"Smoke rose from His nostrils,","poem":1},{"text":"and consuming fire came from His mouth;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"glowing coals blazed forth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Smoke rose from His nostrils, and consuming fire came from His mouth; 
glowing coals blazed forth.

contentJson: [{"text":"He parted the heavens and came down","poem":1},{"text":"with dark clouds beneath His feet.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He parted the heavens and came down with dark clouds beneath His feet.

contentJson: [{"text":"He mounted a cherub and flew;","poem":1},{"text":"He soared on the wings of the wind.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He mounted a cherub and flew; He soared on the wings of the wind.

contentJson: [{"text":"He made darkness His hiding place,","poem":1},{"text":"and storm clouds a canopy around Him.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He made darkness His hiding place, and storm clouds a canopy around Him.

contentJson: [{"text":"From the brightness of His presence","poem":1},{"text":"His clouds advanced—","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"hailstones and coals of fire.","poem":2},{"noteId":35}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
From the brightness of His presence His clouds advanced— 
hailstones and coals of fire.

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD thundered from heaven;","poem":1},{"text":"the voice of the Most High resounded—","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"hailstones and coals of fire.","poem":2},{"noteId":36}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
The LORD thundered from heaven; the voice of the Most High resounded— 
hailstones and coals of fire.

contentJson: [{"text":"He shot His arrows and scattered the foes;","poem":1},{"text":"He hurled lightning and routed them.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He shot His arrows and scattered the foes; He hurled lightning and routed them.

contentJson: [{"text":"The channels of the sea appeared,","poem":1},{"text":"and the foundations of the world were exposed,","poem":2},{"text":"at Your rebuke, O LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"at the blast of the breath of Your nostrils.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The channels of the sea appeared, and the foundations of the world were exposed, at Your rebuke, O LORD, at the blast of the breath of Your nostrils.

contentJson: [{"text":"He reached down from on high and took hold of me;","poem":1},{"text":"He drew me out of deep waters.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He reached down from on high and took hold of me; He drew me out of deep waters.

contentJson: [{"text":"He rescued me from my powerful enemy,","poem":1},{"text":"from foes too mighty for me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He rescued me from my powerful enemy, from foes too mighty for me.

contentJson: [{"text":"They confronted me in my day of calamity,","poem":1},{"text":"but the LORD was my support.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They confronted me in my day of calamity, but the LORD was my support.

contentJson: [{"text":"He brought me out into the open;","poem":1},{"text":"He rescued me because He delighted in me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He brought me out into the open; He rescued me because He delighted in me.

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD has rewarded me according to my righteousness;","poem":1},{"text":"He has repaid me according to the cleanness of my hands.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The LORD has rewarded me according to my righteousness; He has repaid me according to the cleanness of my hands.

contentJson: [{"text":"For I have kept the ways of the LORD","poem":1},{"text":"and have not wickedly departed from my God.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For I have kept the ways of the LORD and have not wickedly departed from my God.

contentJson: [{"text":"For all His ordinances are before me;","poem":1},{"text":"I have not disregarded His statutes.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For all His ordinances are before me; I have not disregarded His statutes.

contentJson: [{"text":"And I have been blameless before Him","poem":1},{"text":"and kept myself from iniquity.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: And I have been blameless before Him and kept myself from iniquity.

contentJson: [{"text":"So the LORD has repaid me according to my righteousness,","poem":1},{"text":"according to the cleanness of my hands in His sight.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: So the LORD has repaid me according to my righteousness, according to the cleanness of my hands in His sight.

contentJson: [{"text":"To the faithful You show Yourself faithful,","poem":1},{"text":"to the blameless You show Yourself blameless;","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: To the faithful You show Yourself faithful, to the blameless You show Yourself blameless;

contentJson: [{"text":"to the pure You show Yourself pure,","poem":1},{"text":"but to the crooked You show Yourself shrewd.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: to the pure You show Yourself pure, but to the crooked You show Yourself shrewd.

contentJson: [{"text":"For You save an afflicted people,","poem":1},{"text":"but You humble those with haughty eyes.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For You save an afflicted people, but You humble those with haughty eyes.

contentJson: [{"text":"For You, O LORD, light my lamp;","poem":1},{"text":"my God lights up my darkness.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For You, O LORD, light my lamp; my God lights up my darkness.

contentJson: [{"text":"For in You I can charge an army,","poem":1},{"text":"and with my God I can scale a wall.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For in You I can charge an army, and with my God I can scale a wall.

contentJson: [{"text":"As for God, His way is perfect;","poem":1},{"text":"the word of the LORD is flawless.","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"He is a shield to all who take refuge in Him.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
As for God, His way is perfect; the word of the LORD is flawless. 
He is a shield to all who take refuge in Him.

contentJson: [{"text":"For who is God besides the LORD?","poem":1},{"text":"And who is the Rock except our God?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For who is God besides the LORD? And who is the Rock except our God?

contentJson: [{"text":"It is God who arms me with strength","poem":1},{"text":"and makes my way clear.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: It is God who arms me with strength and makes my way clear.

contentJson: [{"text":"He makes my feet like those of a deer","poem":1},{"text":"and stations me upon the heights.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He makes my feet like those of a deer and stations me upon the heights.

contentJson: [{"text":"He trains my hands for battle;","poem":1},{"text":"my arms can bend a bow of bronze.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He trains my hands for battle; my arms can bend a bow of bronze.

contentJson: [{"text":"You have given me Your shield of salvation;","poem":1},{"text":"Your right hand upholds me,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"and Your gentleness exalts me.","poem":2},{"noteId":37}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
You have given me Your shield of salvation; Your right hand upholds me, 
and Your gentleness exalts me.

contentJson: [{"text":"You broaden the path beneath me","poem":1},{"text":"so that my ankles do not give way.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You broaden the path beneath me so that my ankles do not give way.

contentJson: [{"text":"I pursued my enemies and overtook them;","poem":1},{"text":"I did not turn back until they were consumed.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I pursued my enemies and overtook them; I did not turn back until they were consumed.

contentJson: [{"text":"I crushed them so they could not rise;","poem":1},{"text":"they have fallen under my feet.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I crushed them so they could not rise; they have fallen under my feet.

contentJson: [{"text":"You have armed me with strength for battle;","poem":1},{"text":"You have subdued my foes beneath me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You have armed me with strength for battle; You have subdued my foes beneath me.

contentJson: [{"text":"You have made my enemies retreat before me;","poem":1},{"text":"I put an end to those who hated me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You have made my enemies retreat before me; I put an end to those who hated me.

contentJson: [{"text":"They cried for help, but there was no one to save them—","poem":1},{"text":"to the LORD, but He did not answer.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They cried for help, but there was no one to save them— to the LORD, but He did not answer.

contentJson: [{"text":"I ground them as dust in the face of the wind;","poem":1},{"text":"I trampled them","poem":2},{"noteId":38},{"text":"like mud in the streets.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I ground them as dust in the face of the wind; I trampled them like mud in the streets.

contentJson: [{"text":"You have delivered me from the strife of the people;","poem":1},{"text":"You have made me the head of nations;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"a people I had not known shall serve me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
You have delivered me from the strife of the people; You have made me the head of nations; 
a people I had not known shall serve me.

contentJson: [{"text":"When they hear me, they obey me;","poem":1},{"text":"foreigners cower before me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: When they hear me, they obey me; foreigners cower before me.

contentJson: [{"text":"Foreigners lose heart","poem":1},{"text":"and come trembling from their strongholds.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Foreigners lose heart and come trembling from their strongholds.

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD lives, and blessed be my Rock!","poem":1},{"text":"And may the God of my salvation be exalted—","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The LORD lives, and blessed be my Rock! And may the God of my salvation be exalted—

contentJson: [{"text":"the God who avenges me","poem":1},{"text":"and subdues nations beneath me,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: the God who avenges me and subdues nations beneath me,

contentJson: [{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"who delivers me from my enemies.","poem":2},{"text":"You exalt me above my foes;","poem":1},{"text":"You rescue me from violent men.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: who delivers me from my enemies. You exalt me above my foes; You rescue me from violent men.

contentJson: [{"text":"Therefore I will praise You, O LORD, among the nations;","poem":1},{"text":"I will sing praises to Your name.","poem":2},{"noteId":39}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Therefore I will praise You, O LORD, among the nations; I will sing praises to Your name.

contentJson: [{"text":"Great salvation He brings to His king.","poem":1},{"text":"He shows loving devotion to His anointed,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"to David and his descendants forever.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Great salvation He brings to His king. He shows loving devotion to His anointed, 
to David and his descendants forever.

contentJson: [{"text":"The heavens declare the glory of God;","poem":1},{"text":"the skies proclaim the work of His hands.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The heavens declare the glory of God; the skies proclaim the work of His hands.

contentJson: [{"text":"Day after day they pour forth speech;","poem":1},{"text":"night after night they reveal knowledge.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Day after day they pour forth speech; night after night they reveal knowledge.

contentJson: [{"text":"Without speech or language,","poem":1},{"text":"without a sound to be heard,","poem":2},{"noteId":40}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Without speech or language, without a sound to be heard,

contentJson: [{"text":"their voice","poem":1},{"noteId":41},{"text":"has gone out into all the earth,","poem":1},{"text":"their words to the ends of the world.","poem":2},{"noteId":42},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"In the heavens He has pitched","poem":1},{"text":"a tent for the sun.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
their voice has gone out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. 
In the heavens He has pitched a tent for the sun.

contentJson: [{"text":"Like a bridegroom emerging from his chamber,","poem":1},{"text":"like a champion rejoicing to run his course,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Like a bridegroom emerging from his chamber, like a champion rejoicing to run his course,

contentJson: [{"text":"it rises at one end of the heavens","poem":1},{"text":"and runs its circuit to the other;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"nothing is deprived of its warmth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
it rises at one end of the heavens and runs its circuit to the other; 
nothing is deprived of its warmth.

contentJson: [{"text":"The Law of the LORD is perfect,","poem":1},{"text":"reviving the soul;","poem":2},{"text":"the testimony of the LORD is trustworthy,","poem":1},{"text":"making wise the simple.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The Law of the LORD is perfect, reviving the soul; the testimony of the LORD is trustworthy, making wise the simple.

contentJson: [{"text":"The precepts of the LORD are right,","poem":1},{"text":"bringing joy to the heart;","poem":2},{"text":"the commandments of the LORD are radiant,","poem":1},{"text":"giving light to the eyes.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The precepts of the LORD are right, bringing joy to the heart; the commandments of the LORD are radiant, giving light to the eyes.

contentJson: [{"text":"The fear of the LORD is pure,","poem":1},{"text":"enduring forever;","poem":2},{"text":"the judgments of the LORD are true,","poem":1},{"text":"being altogether righteous.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The fear of the LORD is pure, enduring forever; the judgments of the LORD are true, being altogether righteous.

contentJson: [{"text":"They are more precious than gold,","poem":1},{"text":"than much pure gold;","poem":2},{"text":"they are sweeter than honey,","poem":1},{"text":"than honey from the comb.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They are more precious than gold, than much pure gold; they are sweeter than honey, than honey from the comb.

contentJson: [{"text":"By them indeed Your servant is warned;","poem":1},{"text":"in keeping them is great reward.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: By them indeed Your servant is warned; in keeping them is great reward.

contentJson: [{"text":"Who can discern his own errors?","poem":1},{"text":"Cleanse me from my hidden faults.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Who can discern his own errors? Cleanse me from my hidden faults.

contentJson: [{"text":"Keep Your servant also from willful sins;","poem":1},{"text":"may they not rule over me.","poem":2},{"text":"Then I will be blameless","poem":1},{"text":"and cleansed of great transgression.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Keep Your servant also from willful sins; may they not rule over me. Then I will be blameless and cleansed of great transgression.

contentJson: [{"text":"May the words of my mouth","poem":1},{"text":"and the meditation of my heart","poem":2},{"text":"be pleasing in Your sight,","poem":1},{"text":"O LORD, my Rock and my Redeemer.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May the words of my mouth and the meditation of my heart be pleasing in Your sight, O LORD, my Rock and my Redeemer.

contentJson: [{"text":"May the LORD answer you in the day of trouble;","poem":1},{"text":"may the name of the God of Jacob protect you.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May the LORD answer you in the day of trouble; may the name of the God of Jacob protect you.

contentJson: [{"text":"May He send you help from the sanctuary","poem":1},{"text":"and sustain you from Zion.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May He send you help from the sanctuary and sustain you from Zion.

contentJson: [{"text":"May He remember all your gifts","poem":1},{"text":"and look favorably on your burnt offerings.","poem":2},"Selah"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May He remember all your gifts and look favorably on your burnt offerings. Selah

contentJson: [{"text":"May He give you the desires of your heart","poem":1},{"text":"and make all your plans succeed.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May He give you the desires of your heart and make all your plans succeed.

contentJson: [{"text":"May we shout for joy at your victory","poem":1},{"text":"and raise a banner in the name of our God.","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"May the LORD grant all your petitions.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
May we shout for joy at your victory and raise a banner in the name of our God. 
May the LORD grant all your petitions.

contentJson: [{"text":"Now I know that the LORD saves His anointed;","poem":1},{"text":"He answers him from His holy heaven","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"with the saving power of His right hand.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Now I know that the LORD saves His anointed; He answers him from His holy heaven 
with the saving power of His right hand.

contentJson: [{"text":"Some trust in chariots and others in horses,","poem":1},{"text":"but we trust in the name of the LORD our God.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Some trust in chariots and others in horses, but we trust in the name of the LORD our God.

contentJson: [{"text":"They collapse and fall,","poem":1},{"text":"but we rise up and stand firm.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They collapse and fall, but we rise up and stand firm.

contentJson: [{"text":"O LORD, save","poem":1},{"noteId":43},{"text":"the king.","poem":1},{"text":"Answer us on the day we call.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: O LORD, save the king. Answer us on the day we call.

contentJson: [{"text":"O LORD, the king rejoices in Your strength.","poem":1},{"text":"How greatly he exults in Your salvation!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: O LORD, the king rejoices in Your strength. How greatly he exults in Your salvation!

contentJson: [{"text":"You have granted his heart’s desire","poem":1},{"text":"and have not withheld the request of his lips.","poem":2},"Selah"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You have granted his heart’s desire and have not withheld the request of his lips. Selah

contentJson: [{"text":"For You welcomed him with rich blessings;","poem":1},{"text":"You placed on his head a crown of pure gold.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For You welcomed him with rich blessings; You placed on his head a crown of pure gold.

contentJson: [{"text":"He asked You for life, and You granted it—","poem":1},{"text":"length of days, forever and ever.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He asked You for life, and You granted it— length of days, forever and ever.

contentJson: [{"text":"Great is his glory in Your salvation;","poem":1},{"text":"You bestow on him splendor and majesty.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Great is his glory in Your salvation; You bestow on him splendor and majesty.

contentJson: [{"text":"For You grant him blessings forever;","poem":1},{"text":"You cheer him with joy in Your presence.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For You grant him blessings forever; You cheer him with joy in Your presence.

contentJson: [{"text":"For the king trusts in the LORD;","poem":1},{"text":"through the loving devotion of the Most High,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"he will not be shaken.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
For the king trusts in the LORD; through the loving devotion of the Most High, 
he will not be shaken.

contentJson: [{"text":"Your hand will apprehend all Your enemies;","poem":1},{"text":"Your right hand will seize those who hate You.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Your hand will apprehend all Your enemies; Your right hand will seize those who hate You.

contentJson: [{"text":"You will place them in a fiery furnace","poem":1},{"text":"at the time of Your appearing.","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"In His wrath the LORD will engulf them,","poem":1},{"text":"and the fire will consume them.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
You will place them in a fiery furnace at the time of Your appearing. 
In His wrath the LORD will engulf them, and the fire will consume them.

contentJson: [{"text":"You will wipe their descendants from the earth,","poem":1},{"text":"and their offspring from the sons of men.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You will wipe their descendants from the earth, and their offspring from the sons of men.

contentJson: [{"text":"Though they intend You harm,","poem":1},{"text":"the schemes they devise will not prevail.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Though they intend You harm, the schemes they devise will not prevail.

contentJson: [{"text":"For You will put them to flight","poem":1},{"text":"when Your bow is trained upon them.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For You will put them to flight when Your bow is trained upon them.

contentJson: [{"text":"Be exalted, O LORD, in Your strength;","poem":1},{"text":"we will sing and praise Your power.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Be exalted, O LORD, in Your strength; we will sing and praise Your power.

contentJson: [{"text":"My God, my God,","poem":1},{"text":"why have You forsaken me?","poem":2},{"noteId":44},{"text":"Why are You so far from saving me,","poem":1},{"text":"so far from my words of groaning?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: My God, my God, why have You forsaken me? Why are You so far from saving me, so far from my words of groaning?

contentJson: [{"text":"I cry out by day, O my God,","poem":1},{"text":"but You do not answer,","poem":2},{"text":"and by night,","poem":1},{"text":"but I have no rest.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I cry out by day, O my God, but You do not answer, and by night, but I have no rest.

contentJson: [{"text":"Yet You are holy,","poem":1},{"text":"enthroned on the praises of Israel.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Yet You are holy, enthroned on the praises of Israel.

contentJson: [{"text":"In You our fathers trusted;","poem":1},{"text":"they trusted and You delivered them.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: In You our fathers trusted; they trusted and You delivered them.

contentJson: [{"text":"They cried out to You and were set free;","poem":1},{"text":"they trusted in You and were not disappointed.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They cried out to You and were set free; they trusted in You and were not disappointed.

contentJson: [{"text":"But I am a worm and not a man,","poem":1},{"text":"scorned by men and despised by the people.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But I am a worm and not a man, scorned by men and despised by the people.

contentJson: [{"text":"All who see me mock me;","poem":1},{"text":"they sneer and shake their heads:","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: All who see me mock me; they sneer and shake their heads:

contentJson: [{"text":"“He trusts in the LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"let the LORD deliver him;","poem":2},{"text":"let the LORD rescue him,","poem":1},{"text":"since He delights in him.”","poem":2},{"noteId":45}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: “He trusts in the LORD, let the LORD deliver him; let the LORD rescue him, since He delights in him.”

contentJson: [{"text":"Yet You brought me forth from the womb;","poem":1},{"text":"You made me secure at my mother’s breast.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Yet You brought me forth from the womb; You made me secure at my mother’s breast.

contentJson: [{"text":"From birth I was cast upon You;","poem":1},{"text":"from my mother’s womb You have been my God.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: From birth I was cast upon You; from my mother’s womb You have been my God.

contentJson: [{"text":"Be not far from me,","poem":1},{"text":"for trouble is near","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"and there is no one to help.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Be not far from me, for trouble is near 
and there is no one to help.

contentJson: [{"text":"Many bulls surround me;","poem":1},{"text":"strong bulls of Bashan encircle me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Many bulls surround me; strong bulls of Bashan encircle me.

contentJson: [{"text":"They open their jaws against me","poem":1},{"text":"like lions that roar and maul.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They open their jaws against me like lions that roar and maul.

contentJson: [{"text":"I am poured out like water,","poem":1},{"text":"and all my bones are disjointed.","poem":2},{"text":"My heart is like wax;","poem":1},{"text":"it melts away within me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I am poured out like water, and all my bones are disjointed. My heart is like wax; it melts away within me.

contentJson: [{"text":"My strength","poem":1},{"noteId":46},{"text":"is dried up like a potsherd,","poem":1},{"text":"and my tongue sticks to the roof of my mouth.","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"You lay me in the dust of death.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
My strength is dried up like a potsherd, and my tongue sticks to the roof of my mouth. 
You lay me in the dust of death.

contentJson: [{"text":"For dogs surround me;","poem":1},{"text":"a band of evil men encircles me;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"they have pierced my hands and feet.","poem":2},{"noteId":47}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
For dogs surround me; a band of evil men encircles me; 
they have pierced my hands and feet.

contentJson: [{"text":"I can count all my bones;","poem":1},{"text":"they stare and gloat over me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I can count all my bones; they stare and gloat over me.

contentJson: [{"text":"They divide my garments among them","poem":1},{"text":"and cast lots for my clothing.","poem":2},{"noteId":48}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They divide my garments among them and cast lots for my clothing.

contentJson: [{"text":"But You, O LORD, be not far off;","poem":1},{"text":"O my Strength, come quickly to help me.","poem":2}]
