name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But You, O LORD, be not far off; O my Strength, come quickly to help me.

contentJson: [{"text":"Deliver my soul from the sword,","poem":1},{"text":"my precious life from the power of wild dogs.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Deliver my soul from the sword, my precious life from the power of wild dogs.

contentJson: [{"text":"Save me from the mouth of the lion;","poem":1},{"text":"at the horns of the wild oxen You have answered me!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Save me from the mouth of the lion; at the horns of the wild oxen You have answered me!

contentJson: [{"text":"I will proclaim Your name to my brothers;","poem":1},{"text":"I will praise You in the assembly.","poem":2},{"noteId":49}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I will proclaim Your name to my brothers; I will praise You in the assembly.

contentJson: [{"text":"You who fear the LORD, praise Him!","poem":1},{"text":"All descendants of Jacob, honor Him!","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"All offspring of Israel, revere Him!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
You who fear the LORD, praise Him! All descendants of Jacob, honor Him! 
All offspring of Israel, revere Him!

contentJson: [{"text":"For He has not despised or detested","poem":1},{"text":"the torment of the afflicted.","poem":2},{"text":"He has not hidden His face from him,","poem":1},{"text":"but has attended to his cry for help.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For He has not despised or detested the torment of the afflicted. He has not hidden His face from him, but has attended to his cry for help.

contentJson: [{"text":"My praise for You resounds in the great assembly;","poem":1},{"text":"I will fulfill my vows before those who fear You.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: My praise for You resounds in the great assembly; I will fulfill my vows before those who fear You.

contentJson: [{"text":"The poor will eat and be satisfied;","poem":1},{"text":"those who seek the LORD will praise Him.","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"May your hearts live forever!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
The poor will eat and be satisfied; those who seek the LORD will praise Him. 
May your hearts live forever!

contentJson: [{"text":"All the ends of the earth","poem":1},{"text":"will remember and turn to the LORD.","poem":2},{"text":"All the families of the nations","poem":1},{"text":"will bow down before Him.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: All the ends of the earth will remember and turn to the LORD. All the families of the nations will bow down before Him.

contentJson: [{"text":"For dominion belongs to the LORD","poem":1},{"text":"and He rules over the nations.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For dominion belongs to the LORD and He rules over the nations.

contentJson: [{"text":"All the rich of the earth will feast and worship;","poem":1},{"text":"all who go down to the dust will kneel before Him—","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"even those unable to preserve their lives.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
All the rich of the earth will feast and worship; all who go down to the dust will kneel before Him— 
even those unable to preserve their lives.

contentJson: [{"text":"Posterity will serve Him;","poem":1},{"text":"they will declare the Lord to a new generation.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Posterity will serve Him; they will declare the Lord to a new generation.

contentJson: [{"text":"They will come and proclaim His righteousness","poem":1},{"text":"to a people yet unborn—","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"all that He has done.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
They will come and proclaim His righteousness to a people yet unborn— 
all that He has done.

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD is my shepherd;","poem":1},{"noteId":50},{"text":"I shall not want.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The LORD is my shepherd; I shall not want.

contentJson: [{"text":"He makes me lie down in green pastures;","poem":1},{"text":"He leads me beside quiet waters.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He makes me lie down in green pastures; He leads me beside quiet waters.

contentJson: [{"text":"He restores my soul;","poem":1},{"text":"He guides me in the paths of righteousness","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"for the sake of His name.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
He restores my soul; He guides me in the paths of righteousness 
for the sake of His name.

contentJson: [{"text":"Even though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death,","poem":1},{"noteId":51},{"text":"I will fear no evil,","poem":2},{"text":"for You are with me;","poem":1},{"text":"Your rod and Your staff, they comfort me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Even though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death, I will fear no evil, for You are with me; Your rod and Your staff, they comfort me.

contentJson: [{"text":"You prepare a table before me","poem":1},{"text":"in the presence of my enemies.","poem":2},{"text":"You anoint my head with oil;","poem":1},{"text":"my cup overflows.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You prepare a table before me in the presence of my enemies. You anoint my head with oil; my cup overflows.

contentJson: [{"text":"Surely goodness and mercy will follow me","poem":1},{"text":"all the days of my life,","poem":2},{"text":"and I will dwell in the house of the LORD","poem":1},{"text":"forever.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Surely goodness and mercy will follow me all the days of my life, and I will dwell in the house of the LORD forever.

contentJson: [{"text":"The earth is the LORD’s, and the fullness thereof,","poem":1},{"noteId":52},{"text":"the world and all who dwell therein.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The earth is the LORD’s, and the fullness thereof, the world and all who dwell therein.

contentJson: [{"text":"For He has founded it upon the seas","poem":1},{"text":"and established it upon the waters.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For He has founded it upon the seas and established it upon the waters.

contentJson: [{"text":"Who may ascend the hill of the LORD?","poem":1},{"text":"Who may stand in His holy place?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Who may ascend the hill of the LORD? Who may stand in His holy place?

contentJson: [{"text":"He who has clean hands and a pure heart,","poem":1},{"text":"who does not lift up his soul to an idol","poem":2},{"noteId":53},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"or swear deceitfully.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
He who has clean hands and a pure heart, who does not lift up his soul to an idol 
or swear deceitfully.

contentJson: [{"text":"He will receive blessing from the LORD","poem":1},{"text":"and vindication from the God of his salvation.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He will receive blessing from the LORD and vindication from the God of his salvation.

contentJson: [{"text":"Such is the generation of those who seek Him,","poem":1},{"text":"who seek Your face, O God of Jacob.","poem":2},{"noteId":54},"Selah"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Such is the generation of those who seek Him, who seek Your face, O God of Jacob. Selah

contentJson: [{"text":"Lift up your heads, O gates!","poem":1},{"text":"Be lifted up, O ancient doors,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"that the King of Glory may enter!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Lift up your heads, O gates! Be lifted up, O ancient doors, 
that the King of Glory may enter!

contentJson: [{"text":"Who is this King of Glory?","poem":1},{"text":"The LORD strong and mighty,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"the LORD mighty in battle.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Who is this King of Glory? The LORD strong and mighty, 
the LORD mighty in battle.

contentJson: [{"text":"Lift up your heads, O gates!","poem":1},{"text":"Be lifted up, O ancient doors,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"that the King of Glory may enter!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Lift up your heads, O gates! Be lifted up, O ancient doors, 
that the King of Glory may enter!

contentJson: [{"text":"Who is He, this King of Glory?","poem":1},{"text":"The LORD of Hosts—","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"He is the King of Glory.","poem":2},"Selah"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Who is He, this King of Glory? The LORD of Hosts— 
He is the King of Glory. Selah

contentJson: [{"text":"To You, O LORD, I lift up my soul;","poem":1}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: To You, O LORD, I lift up my soul;

contentJson: [{"text":"in You, my God, I trust.","poem":2},{"text":"Do not let me be put to shame;","poem":1},{"text":"do not let my enemies exult over me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: in You, my God, I trust. Do not let me be put to shame; do not let my enemies exult over me.

contentJson: [{"text":"Surely none who wait for You will be put to shame;","poem":1},{"text":"but those who are faithless without cause will be disgraced.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Surely none who wait for You will be put to shame; but those who are faithless without cause will be disgraced.

contentJson: [{"text":"Show me Your ways, O LORD;","poem":1},{"text":"teach me Your paths.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Show me Your ways, O LORD; teach me Your paths.

contentJson: [{"text":"Guide me in Your truth and teach me,","poem":1},{"text":"for You are the God of my salvation;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"all day long I wait for You.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Guide me in Your truth and teach me, for You are the God of my salvation; 
all day long I wait for You.

contentJson: [{"text":"Remember, O LORD, Your compassion and loving devotion,","poem":1},{"text":"for they are from age to age.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Remember, O LORD, Your compassion and loving devotion, for they are from age to age.

contentJson: [{"text":"Remember not the sins of my youth,","poem":1},{"text":"nor my rebellious acts;","poem":2},{"text":"remember me according to Your loving devotion,","poem":1},{"text":"because of Your goodness, O LORD.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Remember not the sins of my youth, nor my rebellious acts; remember me according to Your loving devotion, because of Your goodness, O LORD.

contentJson: [{"text":"Good and upright is the LORD;","poem":1},{"text":"therefore He shows sinners the way.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Good and upright is the LORD; therefore He shows sinners the way.

contentJson: [{"text":"He guides the humble in what is right","poem":1},{"text":"and teaches them His way.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He guides the humble in what is right and teaches them His way.

contentJson: [{"text":"All the LORD’s ways are loving and faithful","poem":1},{"text":"to those who keep His covenant and His decrees.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: All the LORD’s ways are loving and faithful to those who keep His covenant and His decrees.

contentJson: [{"text":"For the sake of Your name, O LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"forgive my iniquity, for it is great.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For the sake of Your name, O LORD, forgive my iniquity, for it is great.

contentJson: [{"text":"Who is the man who fears the LORD?","poem":1},{"text":"He will instruct him in the path chosen for him.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Who is the man who fears the LORD? He will instruct him in the path chosen for him.

contentJson: [{"text":"His soul will dwell in prosperity,","poem":1},{"text":"and his descendants will inherit the land.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: His soul will dwell in prosperity, and his descendants will inherit the land.

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD confides in those who fear Him,","poem":1},{"text":"and reveals His covenant to them.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The LORD confides in those who fear Him, and reveals His covenant to them.

contentJson: [{"text":"My eyes are always on the LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"for He will free my feet from the mesh.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: My eyes are always on the LORD, for He will free my feet from the mesh.

contentJson: [{"text":"Turn to me and be gracious,","poem":1},{"text":"for I am lonely and afflicted.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Turn to me and be gracious, for I am lonely and afflicted.

contentJson: [{"text":"The troubles of my heart increase;","poem":1},{"text":"free me from my distress.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The troubles of my heart increase; free me from my distress.

contentJson: [{"text":"Consider my affliction and trouble,","poem":1},{"text":"and take away all my sins.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Consider my affliction and trouble, and take away all my sins.

contentJson: [{"text":"Consider my enemies, for they are many,","poem":1},{"text":"and they hate me with vicious hatred.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Consider my enemies, for they are many, and they hate me with vicious hatred.

contentJson: [{"text":"Guard my soul and deliver me;","poem":1},{"text":"let me not be put to shame,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"for I take refuge in You.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Guard my soul and deliver me; let me not be put to shame, 
for I take refuge in You.

contentJson: [{"text":"May integrity and uprightness preserve me,","poem":1},{"text":"because I wait for You.","poem":2},{"noteId":56}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May integrity and uprightness preserve me, because I wait for You.

contentJson: [{"text":"Redeem Israel, O God,","poem":1},{"text":"from all its distress.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Redeem Israel, O God, from all its distress.

contentJson: [{"text":"Vindicate me, O LORD!","poem":1},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"For I have walked with integrity;","poem":1},{"text":"I have trusted in the LORD without wavering.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Vindicate me, O LORD! 
For I have walked with integrity; I have trusted in the LORD without wavering.

contentJson: [{"text":"Test me, O LORD, and try me;","poem":1},{"text":"examine my heart","poem":2},{"noteId":57},{"text":"and mind.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Test me, O LORD, and try me; examine my heart and mind.

contentJson: [{"text":"For Your loving devotion is before my eyes,","poem":1},{"text":"and I have walked in Your truth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For Your loving devotion is before my eyes, and I have walked in Your truth.

contentJson: [{"text":"I do not sit with deceitful men,","poem":1},{"text":"nor keep company with hypocrites.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I do not sit with deceitful men, nor keep company with hypocrites.

contentJson: [{"text":"I hate the mob of evildoers,","poem":1},{"text":"and refuse to sit with the wicked.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I hate the mob of evildoers, and refuse to sit with the wicked.

contentJson: [{"text":"I wash my hands in innocence","poem":1},{"text":"that I may go about Your altar, O LORD,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I wash my hands in innocence that I may go about Your altar, O LORD,

contentJson: [{"text":"to raise my voice in thanksgiving","poem":1},{"text":"and declare all Your wonderful works.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: to raise my voice in thanksgiving and declare all Your wonderful works.

contentJson: [{"text":"O LORD, I love the house where You dwell,","poem":1},{"text":"the place where Your glory resides.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: O LORD, I love the house where You dwell, the place where Your glory resides.

contentJson: [{"text":"Do not take my soul away with sinners,","poem":1},{"text":"or my life with men of bloodshed,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Do not take my soul away with sinners, or my life with men of bloodshed,

contentJson: [{"text":"in whose hands are wicked schemes,","poem":1},{"text":"whose right hands are full of bribes.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: in whose hands are wicked schemes, whose right hands are full of bribes.

contentJson: [{"text":"But I will walk with integrity;","poem":1},{"text":"redeem me and be merciful to me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But I will walk with integrity; redeem me and be merciful to me.

contentJson: [{"text":"My feet stand on level ground;","poem":1},{"text":"in the congregations I will bless the LORD.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: My feet stand on level ground; in the congregations I will bless the LORD.

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD is my light and my salvation—","poem":1},{"text":"whom shall I fear?","poem":2},{"text":"The LORD is the stronghold of my life—","poem":1},{"text":"whom shall I dread?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The LORD is my light and my salvation— whom shall I fear? The LORD is the stronghold of my life— whom shall I dread?

contentJson: [{"text":"When the wicked came upon me to devour my flesh,","poem":1},{"text":"my enemies and foes stumbled and fell.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: When the wicked came upon me to devour my flesh, my enemies and foes stumbled and fell.

contentJson: [{"text":"Though an army encamps around me,","poem":1},{"text":"my heart will not fear;","poem":2},{"text":"though a war breaks out against me,","poem":1},{"text":"I will keep my trust.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Though an army encamps around me, my heart will not fear; though a war breaks out against me, I will keep my trust.

contentJson: [{"text":"One thing I have asked of the LORD;","poem":1},{"text":"this is what I desire:","poem":2},{"text":"to dwell in the house of the LORD","poem":1},{"text":"all the days of my life,","poem":2},{"text":"to gaze on the beauty of the LORD","poem":1},{"text":"and seek Him in His temple.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: One thing I have asked of the LORD; this is what I desire: to dwell in the house of the LORD all the days of my life, to gaze on the beauty of the LORD and seek Him in His temple.

contentJson: [{"text":"For in the day of trouble","poem":1},{"text":"He will hide me in His shelter;","poem":2},{"text":"He will conceal me under the cover of His tent;","poem":1},{"text":"He will set me high upon a rock.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For in the day of trouble He will hide me in His shelter; He will conceal me under the cover of His tent; He will set me high upon a rock.

contentJson: [{"text":"Then my head will be held high","poem":1},{"text":"above my enemies around me.","poem":2},{"text":"At His tabernacle I will offer sacrifices with shouts of joy;","poem":1},{"text":"I will sing and make music to the LORD.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Then my head will be held high above my enemies around me. At His tabernacle I will offer sacrifices with shouts of joy; I will sing and make music to the LORD.

contentJson: [{"text":"Hear, O LORD, my voice when I call;","poem":1},{"text":"be merciful and answer me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Hear, O LORD, my voice when I call; be merciful and answer me.

contentJson: [{"text":"My heart said, “Seek His face.”","poem":1},{"text":"Your face, O LORD, I will seek.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: My heart said, “Seek His face.” Your face, O LORD, I will seek.

contentJson: [{"text":"Hide not Your face from me,","poem":1},{"text":"nor turn away Your servant in anger.","poem":2},{"text":"You have been my helper;","poem":1},{"text":"do not leave me or forsake me,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"O God of my salvation.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Hide not Your face from me, nor turn away Your servant in anger. You have been my helper; do not leave me or forsake me, 
O God of my salvation.

contentJson: [{"text":"Though my father and mother forsake me,","poem":1},{"text":"the LORD will receive me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Though my father and mother forsake me, the LORD will receive me.

contentJson: [{"text":"Teach me Your way, O LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"and lead me on a level path,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"because of my oppressors.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Teach me Your way, O LORD, and lead me on a level path, 
because of my oppressors.

contentJson: [{"text":"Do not hand me over to the will of my foes,","poem":1},{"text":"for false witnesses rise up against me,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"breathing out violence.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Do not hand me over to the will of my foes, for false witnesses rise up against me, 
breathing out violence.

contentJson: [{"text":"Still I am certain to see","poem":1},{"text":"the goodness of the LORD","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"in the land of the living.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Still I am certain to see the goodness of the LORD 
in the land of the living.

contentJson: [{"text":"Wait patiently for the LORD;","poem":1},{"text":"be strong and courageous.","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"Wait patiently for the LORD!","poem":1}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Wait patiently for the LORD; be strong and courageous. 
Wait patiently for the LORD!

contentJson: [{"text":"To You, O LORD, I call;","poem":1},{"text":"be not deaf to me, O my Rock.","poem":2},{"text":"For if You remain silent,","poem":1},{"text":"I will be like those descending to the Pit.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: To You, O LORD, I call; be not deaf to me, O my Rock. For if You remain silent, I will be like those descending to the Pit.

contentJson: [{"text":"Hear my cry for mercy","poem":1},{"text":"when I call to You for help,","poem":2},{"text":"when I lift up my hands","poem":1},{"text":"toward Your holy sanctuary.","poem":2},{"noteId":58}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Hear my cry for mercy when I call to You for help, when I lift up my hands toward Your holy sanctuary.

contentJson: [{"text":"Do not drag me away with the wicked,","poem":1},{"text":"and with the workers of iniquity,","poem":2},{"text":"who speak peace to their neighbors","poem":1},{"text":"while malice is in their hearts.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Do not drag me away with the wicked, and with the workers of iniquity, who speak peace to their neighbors while malice is in their hearts.

contentJson: [{"text":"Repay them according to their deeds","poem":1},{"text":"and for their works of evil.","poem":2},{"text":"Repay them for what their hands have done;","poem":1},{"text":"bring back on them what they deserve.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Repay them according to their deeds and for their works of evil. Repay them for what their hands have done; bring back on them what they deserve.

contentJson: [{"text":"Since they show no regard for the works of the LORD","poem":1},{"text":"or what His hands have done,","poem":2},{"text":"He will tear them down","poem":1},{"text":"and never rebuild them.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Since they show no regard for the works of the LORD or what His hands have done, He will tear them down and never rebuild them.

contentJson: [{"text":"Blessed be the LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"for He has heard my cry for mercy.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Blessed be the LORD, for He has heard my cry for mercy.

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD is my strength and my shield;","poem":1},{"text":"my heart trusts in Him, and I am helped.","poem":2},{"text":"Therefore my heart rejoices,","poem":1},{"text":"and I give thanks to Him with my song.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The LORD is my strength and my shield; my heart trusts in Him, and I am helped. Therefore my heart rejoices, and I give thanks to Him with my song.

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD is the strength of His people,","poem":1},{"text":"a stronghold of salvation for His anointed.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The LORD is the strength of His people, a stronghold of salvation for His anointed.

contentJson: [{"text":"Save Your people and bless Your inheritance;","poem":1},{"text":"shepherd them and carry them forever.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Save Your people and bless Your inheritance; shepherd them and carry them forever.

contentJson: [{"text":"Ascribe to the LORD, O heavenly beings,","poem":1},{"noteId":59},{"text":"ascribe to the LORD glory and strength.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Ascribe to the LORD, O heavenly beings, ascribe to the LORD glory and strength.

contentJson: [{"text":"Ascribe to the LORD the glory due His name;","poem":1},{"text":"worship the LORD in the splendor of His holiness.","poem":2},{"noteId":60}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Ascribe to the LORD the glory due His name; worship the LORD in the splendor of His holiness.

contentJson: [{"text":"The voice of the LORD is over the waters;","poem":1},{"text":"the God of glory thunders;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"the LORD is heard over many waters.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
The voice of the LORD is over the waters; the God of glory thunders; 
the LORD is heard over many waters.

contentJson: [{"text":"The voice of the LORD is powerful;","poem":1},{"text":"the voice of the LORD is majestic.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The voice of the LORD is powerful; the voice of the LORD is majestic.

contentJson: [{"text":"The voice of the LORD breaks the cedars;","poem":1},{"text":"the LORD shatters the cedars of Lebanon.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The voice of the LORD breaks the cedars; the LORD shatters the cedars of Lebanon.

contentJson: [{"text":"He makes Lebanon skip like a calf,","poem":1},{"text":"and Sirion","poem":2},{"noteId":61},{"text":"like a young wild ox.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He makes Lebanon skip like a calf, and Sirion like a young wild ox.

contentJson: [{"text":"The voice of the LORD","poem":1},{"text":"strikes with flames of fire.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The voice of the LORD strikes with flames of fire.

contentJson: [{"text":"The voice of the LORD shakes the wilderness;","poem":1},{"text":"the LORD shakes the Wilderness of Kadesh.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The voice of the LORD shakes the wilderness; the LORD shakes the Wilderness of Kadesh.

contentJson: [{"text":"The voice of the LORD twists the oaks","poem":1},{"noteId":62},{"text":"and strips the forests bare.","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"And in His temple all cry, “Glory!”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
The voice of the LORD twists the oaks and strips the forests bare. 
And in His temple all cry, “Glory!”

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD sits enthroned over the flood;","poem":1},{"text":"the LORD is enthroned as King forever.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The LORD sits enthroned over the flood; the LORD is enthroned as King forever.

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD gives His people strength;","poem":1},{"text":"the LORD blesses His people with peace.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The LORD gives His people strength; the LORD blesses His people with peace.

contentJson: [{"text":"I will exalt You, O LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"for You have lifted me up","poem":2},{"text":"and have not allowed my foes","poem":1},{"text":"to rejoice over me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I will exalt You, O LORD, for You have lifted me up and have not allowed my foes to rejoice over me.

contentJson: [{"text":"O LORD my God, I cried to You for help,","poem":1},{"text":"and You healed me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: O LORD my God, I cried to You for help, and You healed me.

contentJson: [{"text":"O LORD, You pulled me up from Sheol;","poem":1},{"text":"You spared me from descending into the Pit.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: O LORD, You pulled me up from Sheol; You spared me from descending into the Pit.

contentJson: [{"text":"Sing to the LORD, O you His saints,","poem":1},{"text":"and praise His holy name.","poem":2},{"noteId":63}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Sing to the LORD, O you His saints, and praise His holy name.

contentJson: [{"text":"For His anger is fleeting,","poem":1},{"text":"but His favor lasts a lifetime.","poem":2},{"text":"Weeping may stay the night,","poem":1},{"text":"but joy comes in the morning.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For His anger is fleeting, but His favor lasts a lifetime. Weeping may stay the night, but joy comes in the morning.

contentJson: [{"text":"In prosperity I said,","poem":1},{"text":"“I will never be shaken.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: In prosperity I said, “I will never be shaken.”

contentJson: [{"text":"O LORD, You favored me;","poem":1},{"text":"You made my mountain stand strong.","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"When You hid Your face,","poem":1},{"text":"I was dismayed.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
O LORD, You favored me; You made my mountain stand strong. 
When You hid Your face, I was dismayed.

contentJson: [{"text":"To You, O LORD, I called,","poem":1},{"text":"and I begged my Lord for mercy:","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: To You, O LORD, I called, and I begged my Lord for mercy:

contentJson: [{"text":"“What gain is there in my bloodshed,","poem":1},{"noteId":64},{"text":"in my descent to the Pit?","poem":2},{"noteId":65},{"text":"Will the dust praise You?","poem":1},{"text":"Will it proclaim Your faithfulness?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: “What gain is there in my bloodshed, in my descent to the Pit? Will the dust praise You? Will it proclaim Your faithfulness?

contentJson: [{"text":"Hear me, O LORD, and have mercy;","poem":1},{"text":"O LORD, be my helper.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Hear me, O LORD, and have mercy; O LORD, be my helper.”

contentJson: [{"text":"You turned my mourning into dancing;","poem":1},{"text":"You peeled off my sackcloth and clothed me with joy,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You turned my mourning into dancing; You peeled off my sackcloth and clothed me with joy,

contentJson: [{"text":"that my heart may sing Your praises and not be silent.","poem":1},{"text":"O LORD my God, I will give thanks forever.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: that my heart may sing Your praises and not be silent. O LORD my God, I will give thanks forever.

contentJson: [{"text":"In You, O LORD, I have taken refuge;","poem":1},{"text":"let me never be put to shame;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"save me by Your righteousness.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
In You, O LORD, I have taken refuge; let me never be put to shame; 
save me by Your righteousness.

contentJson: [{"text":"Incline Your ear to me;","poem":1},{"text":"come quickly to my rescue.","poem":2},{"text":"Be my rock of refuge,","poem":1},{"text":"the stronghold of my deliverance.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Incline Your ear to me; come quickly to my rescue. Be my rock of refuge, the stronghold of my deliverance.

contentJson: [{"text":"For You are my rock and my fortress;","poem":1},{"text":"lead me and guide me for the sake of Your name.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For You are my rock and my fortress; lead me and guide me for the sake of Your name.

contentJson: [{"text":"You free me from the net laid out for me,","poem":1},{"text":"for You are my refuge.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You free me from the net laid out for me, for You are my refuge.

contentJson: [{"text":"Into Your hands I commit my spirit;","poem":1},{"noteId":66},{"text":"You have redeemed me, O LORD, God of truth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Into Your hands I commit my spirit; You have redeemed me, O LORD, God of truth.

contentJson: [{"text":"I hate","poem":1},{"noteId":67},{"text":"those who cling to worthless idols,","poem":1},{"text":"but in the LORD I trust.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I hate those who cling to worthless idols, but in the LORD I trust.

contentJson: [{"text":"I will be glad and rejoice in Your loving devotion,","poem":1},{"text":"for You have seen my affliction;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"You have known the anguish of my soul.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
I will be glad and rejoice in Your loving devotion, for You have seen my affliction; 
You have known the anguish of my soul.

contentJson: [{"text":"You have not delivered me to the enemy;","poem":1},{"text":"You have set my feet in the open.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You have not delivered me to the enemy; You have set my feet in the open.

contentJson: [{"text":"Be merciful to me, O LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"for I am in distress;","poem":2},{"text":"my eyes fail from sorrow,","poem":1},{"text":"my soul and body as well.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Be merciful to me, O LORD, for I am in distress; my eyes fail from sorrow, my soul and body as well.

contentJson: [{"text":"For my life is consumed with grief","poem":1},{"text":"and my years with groaning;","poem":2},{"text":"my iniquity has drained my strength,","poem":1},{"text":"and my bones are wasting away.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For my life is consumed with grief and my years with groaning; my iniquity has drained my strength, and my bones are wasting away.

contentJson: [{"text":"Among all my enemies I am a disgrace,","poem":1},{"text":"and among my neighbors even more.","poem":2},{"text":"I am dreaded by my friends—","poem":1},{"text":"they flee when they see me on the street.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Among all my enemies I am a disgrace, and among my neighbors even more. I am dreaded by my friends— they flee when they see me on the street.

contentJson: [{"text":"I am forgotten like a dead man, out of mind.","poem":1},{"text":"I am like a broken vessel.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I am forgotten like a dead man, out of mind. I am like a broken vessel.

contentJson: [{"text":"For I hear the slander of many;","poem":1},{"text":"there is terror on every side.","poem":2},{"text":"They conspire against me","poem":1},{"text":"and plot to take my life.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For I hear the slander of many; there is terror on every side. They conspire against me and plot to take my life.

contentJson: [{"text":"But I trust in You, O LORD;","poem":1},{"text":"I say, “You are my God.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But I trust in You, O LORD; I say, “You are my God.”

contentJson: [{"text":"My times are in Your hands;","poem":1},{"text":"deliver me from my enemies","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"and from those who pursue me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
My times are in Your hands; deliver me from my enemies 
and from those who pursue me.

contentJson: [{"text":"Make Your face shine on Your servant;","poem":1},{"text":"save me by Your loving devotion.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Make Your face shine on Your servant; save me by Your loving devotion.

contentJson: [{"text":"O LORD, let me not be ashamed,","poem":1},{"text":"for I have called on You.","poem":2},{"text":"Let the wicked be put to shame;","poem":1},{"text":"let them lie silent in Sheol.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: O LORD, let me not be ashamed, for I have called on You. Let the wicked be put to shame; let them lie silent in Sheol.

contentJson: [{"text":"May lying lips be silenced—","poem":1},{"text":"lips that speak with arrogance against the righteous,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"full of pride and contempt.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
May lying lips be silenced— lips that speak with arrogance against the righteous, 
full of pride and contempt.

contentJson: [{"text":"How great is Your goodness","poem":1},{"text":"which You have laid up for those who fear You,","poem":2},{"text":"which You have bestowed before the sons of men","poem":1},{"text":"on those who take refuge in You!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: How great is Your goodness which You have laid up for those who fear You, which You have bestowed before the sons of men on those who take refuge in You!

contentJson: [{"text":"You hide them in the secret place of Your presence","poem":1},{"text":"from the schemes of men.","poem":2},{"text":"You conceal them in Your shelter","poem":1},{"text":"from accusing tongues.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You hide them in the secret place of Your presence from the schemes of men. You conceal them in Your shelter from accusing tongues.

contentJson: [{"text":"Blessed be the LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"for He has shown me His loving devotion","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"in a city under siege.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Blessed be the LORD, for He has shown me His loving devotion 
in a city under siege.

contentJson: [{"text":"In my alarm I said,","poem":1},{"text":"“I am cut off from Your sight!”","poem":2},{"text":"But You heard my plea for mercy","poem":1},{"text":"when I called to You for help.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: In my alarm I said, “I am cut off from Your sight!” But You heard my plea for mercy when I called to You for help.

contentJson: [{"text":"Love the LORD, all His saints.","poem":1},{"text":"The LORD preserves the faithful,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"but fully repays the arrogant.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Love the LORD, all His saints. The LORD preserves the faithful, 
but fully repays the arrogant.

contentJson: [{"text":"Be strong and courageous,","poem":1},{"text":"all you who hope in the LORD.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Be strong and courageous, all you who hope in the LORD.

contentJson: [{"text":"Blessed is he whose transgressions are forgiven,","poem":1},{"text":"whose sins are covered.","poem":2},{"noteId":69}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Blessed is he whose transgressions are forgiven, whose sins are covered.

contentJson: [{"text":"Blessed is the man","poem":1},{"text":"whose iniquity the LORD does not count against him,","poem":2},{"noteId":70},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"in whose spirit there is no deceit.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Blessed is the man whose iniquity the LORD does not count against him, 
in whose spirit there is no deceit.

contentJson: [{"text":"When I kept silent, my bones became brittle","poem":1},{"text":"from my groaning all day long.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: When I kept silent, my bones became brittle from my groaning all day long.

contentJson: [{"text":"For day and night","poem":1},{"text":"Your hand was heavy upon me;","poem":2},{"text":"my strength was drained","poem":1},{"noteId":71},{"text":"as in the summer heat.","poem":2},"Selah"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For day and night Your hand was heavy upon me; my strength was drained as in the summer heat. Selah

contentJson: [{"text":"Then I acknowledged my sin to You","poem":1},{"text":"and did not hide my iniquity.","poem":2},{"text":"I said, “I will confess my transgressions to the LORD,”","poem":1},{"text":"and You forgave the guilt of my sin.","poem":2},"Selah"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Then I acknowledged my sin to You and did not hide my iniquity. I said, “I will confess my transgressions to the LORD,” and You forgave the guilt of my sin. Selah

contentJson: [{"text":"Therefore let all the godly pray to You","poem":1},{"text":"while You may be found.","poem":2},{"text":"Surely when great waters rise,","poem":1},{"text":"they will not come near.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Therefore let all the godly pray to You while You may be found. Surely when great waters rise, they will not come near.

contentJson: [{"text":"You are my hiding place.","poem":1},{"text":"You protect me from trouble;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"You surround me with songs of deliverance.","poem":2},"Selah"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
You are my hiding place. You protect me from trouble; 
You surround me with songs of deliverance. Selah

contentJson: [{"text":"I will instruct you and teach you the way you should go;","poem":1},{"text":"I will give you counsel and watch over you.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I will instruct you and teach you the way you should go; I will give you counsel and watch over you.

contentJson: [{"text":"Do not be like the horse or mule,","poem":1},{"text":"which have no understanding;","poem":2},{"text":"they must be controlled with bit and bridle","poem":1},{"text":"to make them come to you.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Do not be like the horse or mule, which have no understanding; they must be controlled with bit and bridle to make them come to you.

contentJson: [{"text":"Many are the sorrows of the wicked,","poem":1},{"text":"but loving devotion surrounds him who trusts in the LORD.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Many are the sorrows of the wicked, but loving devotion surrounds him who trusts in the LORD.

contentJson: [{"text":"Be glad in the LORD and rejoice, O righteous ones;","poem":1},{"text":"shout for joy, all you upright in heart.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Be glad in the LORD and rejoice, O righteous ones; shout for joy, all you upright in heart.

contentJson: [{"text":"Rejoice in the LORD, O righteous ones;","poem":1},{"text":"it is fitting for the upright to praise Him.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Rejoice in the LORD, O righteous ones; it is fitting for the upright to praise Him.

contentJson: [{"text":"Praise the LORD with the harp;","poem":1},{"text":"make music to Him with ten strings.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Praise the LORD with the harp; make music to Him with ten strings.

contentJson: [{"text":"Sing to Him a new song;","poem":1},{"text":"play skillfully with a shout of joy.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Sing to Him a new song; play skillfully with a shout of joy.

contentJson: [{"text":"For the word of the LORD is upright,","poem":1},{"text":"and all His work is trustworthy.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For the word of the LORD is upright, and all His work is trustworthy.

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD loves righteousness and justice;","poem":1},{"text":"the earth is full of His loving devotion.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The LORD loves righteousness and justice; the earth is full of His loving devotion.

contentJson: [{"text":"By the word of the LORD the heavens were made,","poem":1},{"text":"and all the stars by the breath of His mouth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: By the word of the LORD the heavens were made, and all the stars by the breath of His mouth.

contentJson: [{"text":"He piles up the waters of the sea;","poem":1},{"text":"He puts the depths into storehouses.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He piles up the waters of the sea; He puts the depths into storehouses.

contentJson: [{"text":"Let all the earth fear the LORD;","poem":1},{"text":"let all the people of the world revere Him.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Let all the earth fear the LORD; let all the people of the world revere Him.

contentJson: [{"text":"For He spoke, and it came to be;","poem":1},{"text":"He commanded, and it stood firm.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For He spoke, and it came to be; He commanded, and it stood firm.

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD frustrates the plans of the nations;","poem":1},{"text":"He thwarts the devices of the peoples.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The LORD frustrates the plans of the nations; He thwarts the devices of the peoples.

contentJson: [{"text":"The counsel of the LORD stands forever,","poem":1},{"text":"the purposes of His heart to all generations.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The counsel of the LORD stands forever, the purposes of His heart to all generations.

contentJson: [{"text":"Blessed is the nation whose God is the LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"the people He has chosen as His inheritance!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Blessed is the nation whose God is the LORD, the people He has chosen as His inheritance!

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD looks down from heaven;","poem":1},{"text":"He sees all the sons of men.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The LORD looks down from heaven; He sees all the sons of men.

contentJson: [{"text":"From His dwelling place He gazes","poem":1},{"text":"on all who inhabit the earth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: From His dwelling place He gazes on all who inhabit the earth.

contentJson: [{"text":"He shapes the hearts of each;","poem":1},{"text":"He considers all their works.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He shapes the hearts of each; He considers all their works.

contentJson: [{"text":"No king is saved by his vast army;","poem":1},{"text":"no warrior is delivered by his great strength.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: No king is saved by his vast army; no warrior is delivered by his great strength.

contentJson: [{"text":"A horse is a vain hope for salvation;","poem":1},{"text":"even its great strength cannot save.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A horse is a vain hope for salvation; even its great strength cannot save.

contentJson: [{"text":"Surely the eyes of the LORD are on those who fear Him,","poem":1},{"text":"on those whose hope is in His loving devotion","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Surely the eyes of the LORD are on those who fear Him, on those whose hope is in His loving devotion

contentJson: [{"text":"to deliver them from death","poem":1},{"text":"and keep them alive in famine.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: to deliver them from death and keep them alive in famine.

contentJson: [{"text":"Our soul waits for the LORD;","poem":1},{"text":"He is our help and our shield.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Our soul waits for the LORD; He is our help and our shield.

contentJson: [{"text":"For our hearts rejoice in Him,","poem":1},{"text":"since we trust in His holy name.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For our hearts rejoice in Him, since we trust in His holy name.

contentJson: [{"text":"May Your loving devotion rest on us, O LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"as we put our hope in You.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May Your loving devotion rest on us, O LORD, as we put our hope in You.

contentJson: [{"text":"I will bless the LORD at all times;","poem":1},{"text":"His praise will always be on my lips.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I will bless the LORD at all times; His praise will always be on my lips.

contentJson: [{"text":"My soul boasts in the LORD;","poem":1},{"text":"let the oppressed hear and rejoice.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: My soul boasts in the LORD; let the oppressed hear and rejoice.

contentJson: [{"text":"Magnify the LORD with me;","poem":1},{"text":"let us exalt His name together.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Magnify the LORD with me; let us exalt His name together.

contentJson: [{"text":"I sought the LORD, and He answered me;","poem":1},{"text":"He delivered me from all my fears.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I sought the LORD, and He answered me; He delivered me from all my fears.

contentJson: [{"text":"Those who look to Him are radiant with joy;","poem":1},{"text":"their faces shall never be ashamed.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Those who look to Him are radiant with joy; their faces shall never be ashamed.

contentJson: [{"text":"This poor man called out, and the LORD heard him;","poem":1},{"text":"He saved him from all his troubles.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: This poor man called out, and the LORD heard him; He saved him from all his troubles.

contentJson: [{"text":"The angel of the LORD encamps around those who fear Him,","poem":1},{"text":"and he delivers them.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The angel of the LORD encamps around those who fear Him, and he delivers them.

contentJson: [{"text":"Taste and see that the LORD is good;","poem":1},{"text":"blessed is the man who takes refuge in Him!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Taste and see that the LORD is good; blessed is the man who takes refuge in Him!

contentJson: [{"text":"Fear the LORD, you His saints,","poem":1},{"text":"for those who fear Him lack nothing.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Fear the LORD, you His saints, for those who fear Him lack nothing.

contentJson: [{"text":"Young lions go lacking and hungry,","poem":1},{"text":"but those who seek the LORD lack no good thing.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Young lions go lacking and hungry, but those who seek the LORD lack no good thing.

contentJson: [{"text":"Come, children, listen to me;","poem":1},{"text":"I will teach you the fear of the LORD.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Come, children, listen to me; I will teach you the fear of the LORD.

contentJson: [{"text":"Who is the man who delights in life,","poem":1},{"text":"who desires to see good days?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Who is the man who delights in life, who desires to see good days?

contentJson: [{"text":"Keep your tongue from evil","poem":1},{"text":"and your lips from deceitful speech.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Keep your tongue from evil and your lips from deceitful speech.

contentJson: [{"text":"Turn away from evil and do good;","poem":1},{"text":"seek peace and pursue it.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Turn away from evil and do good; seek peace and pursue it.

contentJson: [{"text":"The eyes of the LORD are on the righteous,","poem":1},{"text":"and His ears are inclined to their cry.","poem":2},{"noteId":74}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The eyes of the LORD are on the righteous, and His ears are inclined to their cry.

contentJson: [{"text":"But the face of the LORD is against those who do evil,","poem":1},{"noteId":75},{"text":"to wipe out all memory of them from the earth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But the face of the LORD is against those who do evil, to wipe out all memory of them from the earth.

contentJson: [{"text":"The righteous cry out, and the LORD hears;","poem":1},{"text":"He delivers them from all their troubles.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The righteous cry out, and the LORD hears; He delivers them from all their troubles.

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD is near to the brokenhearted;","poem":1},{"text":"He saves the contrite in spirit.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The LORD is near to the brokenhearted; He saves the contrite in spirit.

contentJson: [{"text":"Many are the afflictions of the righteous,","poem":1},{"text":"but the LORD delivers him from them all.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Many are the afflictions of the righteous, but the LORD delivers him from them all.

contentJson: [{"text":"He protects all his bones;","poem":1},{"text":"not one of them will be broken.","poem":2},{"noteId":76}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He protects all his bones; not one of them will be broken.

contentJson: [{"text":"Evil will slay the wicked,","poem":1},{"text":"and the haters of the righteous will be condemned.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Evil will slay the wicked, and the haters of the righteous will be condemned.

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD redeems His servants,","poem":1},{"text":"and none who take refuge in Him will be condemned.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The LORD redeems His servants, and none who take refuge in Him will be condemned.

contentJson: [{"text":"Contend with my opponents, O LORD;","poem":1},{"text":"fight against those who fight against me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Contend with my opponents, O LORD; fight against those who fight against me.

contentJson: [{"text":"Take up Your shield and buckler;","poem":1},{"text":"arise and come to my aid.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Take up Your shield and buckler; arise and come to my aid.

contentJson: [{"text":"Draw the spear and javelin","poem":1},{"noteId":77},{"text":"against my pursuers;","poem":1},{"text":"say to my soul: “I am your salvation.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Draw the spear and javelin against my pursuers; say to my soul: “I am your salvation.”

contentJson: [{"text":"May those who seek my life","poem":1},{"text":"be disgraced and put to shame;","poem":2},{"text":"may those who plan to harm me","poem":1},{"text":"be driven back and confounded.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May those who seek my life be disgraced and put to shame; may those who plan to harm me be driven back and confounded.

contentJson: [{"text":"May they be like chaff in the wind,","poem":1},{"text":"as the angel of the LORD drives them away.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May they be like chaff in the wind, as the angel of the LORD drives them away.

contentJson: [{"text":"May their path be dark and slick,","poem":1},{"text":"as the angel of the LORD pursues.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May their path be dark and slick, as the angel of the LORD pursues.

contentJson: [{"text":"For without cause they laid their net for me;","poem":1},{"text":"without reason they dug a pit for my soul.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For without cause they laid their net for me; without reason they dug a pit for my soul.

contentJson: [{"text":"May ruin befall them by surprise;","poem":1},{"text":"may the net they hid ensnare them;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"may they fall into the hazard they created.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
May ruin befall them by surprise; may the net they hid ensnare them; 
may they fall into the hazard they created.

contentJson: [{"text":"Then my soul will rejoice in the LORD","poem":1},{"text":"and exult in His salvation.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Then my soul will rejoice in the LORD and exult in His salvation.

contentJson: [{"text":"All my bones will exclaim,","poem":1},{"text":"“Who is like You, O LORD,","poem":2},{"text":"who delivers the afflicted from the aggressor,","poem":1},{"text":"the poor and needy from the robber?”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: All my bones will exclaim, “Who is like You, O LORD, who delivers the afflicted from the aggressor, the poor and needy from the robber?”

contentJson: [{"text":"Hostile witnesses come forward;","poem":1},{"text":"they make charges I know nothing about.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Hostile witnesses come forward; they make charges I know nothing about.

contentJson: [{"text":"They repay me evil for good,","poem":1},{"text":"to the bereavement of my soul.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They repay me evil for good, to the bereavement of my soul.

contentJson: [{"text":"Yet when they were ill,","poem":1},{"text":"I put on sackcloth;","poem":2},{"text":"I humbled myself with fasting,","poem":1},{"text":"but my prayers returned unanswered.","poem":2},{"noteId":78}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Yet when they were ill, I put on sackcloth; I humbled myself with fasting, but my prayers returned unanswered.

contentJson: [{"text":"I paced about","poem":1},{"text":"as for my friend or brother;","poem":2},{"text":"I was bowed down with grief,","poem":1},{"text":"like one mourning for his mother.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I paced about as for my friend or brother; I was bowed down with grief, like one mourning for his mother.

contentJson: [{"text":"But when I stumbled, they assembled in glee;","poem":1},{"text":"they gathered together against me.","poem":2},{"text":"Assailants I did not know","poem":1},{"text":"slandered me without ceasing.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But when I stumbled, they assembled in glee; they gathered together against me. Assailants I did not know slandered me without ceasing.

contentJson: [{"text":"Like godless jesters at a feast,","poem":1},{"noteId":79},{"text":"they gnashed their teeth at me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Like godless jesters at a feast, they gnashed their teeth at me.

contentJson: [{"text":"How long, O Lord, will You look on?","poem":1},{"text":"Rescue my soul from their ravages,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"my precious life from these lions.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
How long, O Lord, will You look on? Rescue my soul from their ravages, 
my precious life from these lions.

contentJson: [{"text":"Then I will give You thanks in the great assembly;","poem":1},{"text":"I will praise You among many people.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Then I will give You thanks in the great assembly; I will praise You among many people.

contentJson: [{"text":"Let not my enemies gloat over me without cause,","poem":1},{"text":"nor those who hate me without reason wink in malice.","poem":2},{"noteId":80}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Let not my enemies gloat over me without cause, nor those who hate me without reason wink in malice.

contentJson: [{"text":"For they do not speak peace,","poem":1},{"text":"but they devise deceitful schemes","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"against those who live quietly in the land.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
For they do not speak peace, but they devise deceitful schemes 
against those who live quietly in the land.

contentJson: [{"text":"They gape at me and say,","poem":1},{"text":"“Aha, aha! Our eyes have seen!”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They gape at me and say, “Aha, aha! Our eyes have seen!”

contentJson: [{"text":"O LORD, You have seen it; be not silent.","poem":1},{"text":"O Lord, be not far from me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: O LORD, You have seen it; be not silent. O Lord, be not far from me.

contentJson: [{"text":"Awake and rise to my defense,","poem":1},{"text":"to my cause, my God and my Lord!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Awake and rise to my defense, to my cause, my God and my Lord!

contentJson: [{"text":"Vindicate me by Your righteousness, O LORD my God,","poem":1},{"text":"and do not let them gloat over me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Vindicate me by Your righteousness, O LORD my God, and do not let them gloat over me.

contentJson: [{"text":"Let them not say in their hearts,","poem":1},{"text":"“Aha, just what we wanted!”","poem":2},{"text":"Let them not say,","poem":1},{"text":"“We have swallowed him up!”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Let them not say in their hearts, “Aha, just what we wanted!” Let them not say, “We have swallowed him up!”

contentJson: [{"text":"May those who gloat in my distress","poem":1},{"text":"be ashamed and confounded;","poem":2},{"text":"may those who exalt themselves over me","poem":1},{"text":"be clothed in shame and reproach.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May those who gloat in my distress be ashamed and confounded; may those who exalt themselves over me be clothed in shame and reproach.

contentJson: [{"text":"May those who favor my vindication","poem":1},{"text":"shout for joy and gladness;","poem":2},{"text":"may they always say, “Exalted be the LORD","poem":1},{"text":"who delights in His servant’s well-being.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May those who favor my vindication shout for joy and gladness; may they always say, “Exalted be the LORD who delights in His servant’s well-being.”

contentJson: [{"text":"Then my tongue will proclaim Your righteousness","poem":1},{"text":"and Your praises all day long.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Then my tongue will proclaim Your righteousness and Your praises all day long.

contentJson: [{"text":"An oracle is in my heart","poem":1},{"text":"regarding the transgression of the wicked man:","poem":2},{"text":"There is no fear of God","poem":1},{"text":"before his eyes.","poem":2},{"noteId":81}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: An oracle is in my heart regarding the transgression of the wicked man: There is no fear of God before his eyes.

contentJson: [{"text":"For his eyes are too full of conceit","poem":1},{"text":"to detect or hate his own sin.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For his eyes are too full of conceit to detect or hate his own sin.

contentJson: [{"text":"The words of his mouth are wicked and deceitful;","poem":1},{"text":"he has ceased to be wise and well-doing.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The words of his mouth are wicked and deceitful; he has ceased to be wise and well-doing.

contentJson: [{"text":"Even on his bed he plots wickedness;","poem":1},{"text":"he sets himself on a path that is not good;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"he fails to reject evil.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Even on his bed he plots wickedness; he sets himself on a path that is not good; 
he fails to reject evil.

contentJson: [{"text":"Your loving devotion, O LORD, reaches to the heavens,","poem":1},{"text":"Your faithfulness to the clouds.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Your loving devotion, O LORD, reaches to the heavens, Your faithfulness to the clouds.

contentJson: [{"text":"Your righteousness is like the highest mountains;","poem":1},{"text":"Your judgments are like the deepest sea.","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"O LORD, You preserve man and beast.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Your righteousness is like the highest mountains; Your judgments are like the deepest sea. 
O LORD, You preserve man and beast.

contentJson: [{"text":"How precious is Your loving devotion, O God,","poem":1},{"text":"that the children of men take refuge","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"in the shadow of Your wings!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
How precious is Your loving devotion, O God, that the children of men take refuge 
in the shadow of Your wings!

contentJson: [{"text":"They feast on the abundance of Your house,","poem":1},{"text":"and You give them drink from Your river of delights.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They feast on the abundance of Your house, and You give them drink from Your river of delights.

contentJson: [{"text":"For with You is the fountain of life;","poem":1},{"text":"in Your light we see light.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For with You is the fountain of life; in Your light we see light.

contentJson: [{"text":"Extend Your loving devotion to those who know You,","poem":1},{"text":"and Your righteousness to the upright in heart.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Extend Your loving devotion to those who know You, and Your righteousness to the upright in heart.

contentJson: [{"text":"Let not the foot of the proud come against me,","poem":1},{"text":"nor the hand of the wicked drive me away.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Let not the foot of the proud come against me, nor the hand of the wicked drive me away.

contentJson: [{"text":"There the evildoers lie fallen,","poem":1},{"text":"thrown down and unable to rise.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: There the evildoers lie fallen, thrown down and unable to rise.

contentJson: [{"text":"Do not fret over those who do evil;","poem":1},{"text":"do not envy those who do wrong.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Do not fret over those who do evil; do not envy those who do wrong.

contentJson: [{"text":"For they wither quickly like grass","poem":1},{"text":"and wilt like tender plants.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For they wither quickly like grass and wilt like tender plants.

contentJson: [{"text":"Trust in the LORD and do good;","poem":1},{"text":"dwell in the land and cultivate faithfulness.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Trust in the LORD and do good; dwell in the land and cultivate faithfulness.

contentJson: [{"text":"Delight yourself in the LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"and He will give you the desires of your heart.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Delight yourself in the LORD, and He will give you the desires of your heart.

contentJson: [{"text":"Commit your way to the LORD;","poem":1},{"text":"trust in Him, and He will do it.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Commit your way to the LORD; trust in Him, and He will do it.

contentJson: [{"text":"He will bring forth your righteousness like the dawn,","poem":1},{"text":"your justice like the noonday sun.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He will bring forth your righteousness like the dawn, your justice like the noonday sun.

contentJson: [{"text":"Be still before the LORD","poem":1},{"text":"and wait patiently for Him;","poem":2},{"text":"do not fret when men prosper in their ways,","poem":1},{"text":"when they carry out wicked schemes.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Be still before the LORD and wait patiently for Him; do not fret when men prosper in their ways, when they carry out wicked schemes.

contentJson: [{"text":"Refrain from anger and abandon wrath;","poem":1},{"text":"do not fret—it can only bring harm.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Refrain from anger and abandon wrath; do not fret—it can only bring harm.

contentJson: [{"text":"For the evildoers will be cut off,","poem":1},{"text":"but those who hope in the LORD will inherit the land.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For the evildoers will be cut off, but those who hope in the LORD will inherit the land.

contentJson: [{"text":"Yet a little while, and the wicked will be no more;","poem":1},{"text":"though you look for them, they will not be found.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Yet a little while, and the wicked will be no more; though you look for them, they will not be found.

contentJson: [{"text":"But the meek will inherit the land","poem":1},{"noteId":83},{"text":"and delight in abundant prosperity.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But the meek will inherit the land and delight in abundant prosperity.

contentJson: [{"text":"The wicked scheme against the righteous","poem":1},{"text":"and gnash their teeth at them,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The wicked scheme against the righteous and gnash their teeth at them,

contentJson: [{"text":"but the Lord laughs,","poem":1},{"text":"seeing that their day is coming.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: but the Lord laughs, seeing that their day is coming.

contentJson: [{"text":"The wicked have drawn the sword","poem":1},{"text":"and bent the bow","poem":2},{"text":"to bring down the poor and needy,","poem":1},{"text":"to slay those whose ways are upright.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The wicked have drawn the sword and bent the bow to bring down the poor and needy, to slay those whose ways are upright.

contentJson: [{"text":"But their swords will pierce their own hearts,","poem":1},{"text":"and their bows will be broken.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But their swords will pierce their own hearts, and their bows will be broken.

contentJson: [{"text":"Better is the little of the righteous","poem":1},{"text":"than the abundance of many who are wicked.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Better is the little of the righteous than the abundance of many who are wicked.

contentJson: [{"text":"For the arms of the wicked will be broken,","poem":1},{"text":"but the LORD upholds the righteous.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For the arms of the wicked will be broken, but the LORD upholds the righteous.

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD knows the days of the blameless,","poem":1},{"text":"and their inheritance will last forever.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The LORD knows the days of the blameless, and their inheritance will last forever.

contentJson: [{"text":"In the time of evil they will not be ashamed,","poem":1},{"text":"and in the days of famine they will be satisfied.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: In the time of evil they will not be ashamed, and in the days of famine they will be satisfied.

contentJson: [{"text":"But the wicked and enemies of the LORD","poem":1},{"text":"will perish like the glory of the fields.","poem":2},{"text":"They will vanish;","poem":1},{"text":"like smoke they will fade away.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But the wicked and enemies of the LORD will perish like the glory of the fields. They will vanish; like smoke they will fade away.

contentJson: [{"text":"The wicked borrow and do not repay,","poem":1},{"text":"but the righteous are gracious and giving.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The wicked borrow and do not repay, but the righteous are gracious and giving.

contentJson: [{"text":"Surely those He blesses will inherit the land,","poem":1},{"text":"but the cursed will be destroyed.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Surely those He blesses will inherit the land, but the cursed will be destroyed.

contentJson: [{"text":"The steps of a man are ordered by the LORD","poem":1},{"text":"who takes delight in his journey.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The steps of a man are ordered by the LORD who takes delight in his journey.

contentJson: [{"text":"Though he falls, he will not be overwhelmed,","poem":1},{"text":"for the LORD is holding his hand.","poem":2},{"noteId":84}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Though he falls, he will not be overwhelmed, for the LORD is holding his hand.

contentJson: [{"text":"I once was young and now am old,","poem":1},{"text":"yet never have I seen the righteous abandoned","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"or their children begging for bread.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
I once was young and now am old, yet never have I seen the righteous abandoned 
or their children begging for bread.

contentJson: [{"text":"They are ever generous and quick to lend,","poem":1},{"text":"and their children are a blessing.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They are ever generous and quick to lend, and their children are a blessing.

contentJson: [{"text":"Turn away from evil and do good,","poem":1},{"text":"so that you will abide forever.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Turn away from evil and do good, so that you will abide forever.

contentJson: [{"text":"For the LORD loves justice","poem":1},{"text":"and will not forsake His saints.","poem":2},{"text":"They are preserved forever,","poem":1},{"text":"but the offspring of the wicked will be cut off.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For the LORD loves justice and will not forsake His saints. They are preserved forever, but the offspring of the wicked will be cut off.

contentJson: [{"text":"The righteous will inherit the land","poem":1},{"text":"and dwell in it forever.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The righteous will inherit the land and dwell in it forever.

contentJson: [{"text":"The mouth of the righteous man utters wisdom,","poem":1},{"text":"and his tongue speaks justice.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The mouth of the righteous man utters wisdom, and his tongue speaks justice.

contentJson: [{"text":"The law of his God is in his heart;","poem":1},{"text":"his steps do not falter.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The law of his God is in his heart; his steps do not falter.

contentJson: [{"text":"Though the wicked lie in wait for the righteous,","poem":1},{"text":"and seek to slay them,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Though the wicked lie in wait for the righteous, and seek to slay them,

contentJson: [{"text":"the LORD will not leave them in their power","poem":1},{"text":"or let them be condemned under judgment.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: the LORD will not leave them in their power or let them be condemned under judgment.

contentJson: [{"text":"Wait for the LORD and keep His way,","poem":1},{"text":"and He will raise you up to inherit the land.","poem":2},{"text":"When the wicked are cut off,","poem":1},{"text":"you will see it.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Wait for the LORD and keep His way, and He will raise you up to inherit the land. When the wicked are cut off, you will see it.

contentJson: [{"text":"I have seen a wicked, ruthless man","poem":1},{"text":"flourishing like a well-rooted native tree,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I have seen a wicked, ruthless man flourishing like a well-rooted native tree,

contentJson: [{"text":"yet he passed away and was no more;","poem":1},{"text":"though I searched, he could not be found.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: yet he passed away and was no more; though I searched, he could not be found.

contentJson: [{"text":"Consider the blameless and observe the upright,","poem":1},{"text":"for posterity awaits the man of peace.","poem":2},{"noteId":85}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Consider the blameless and observe the upright, for posterity awaits the man of peace.

contentJson: [{"text":"But the transgressors will all be destroyed;","poem":1},{"text":"the future of the wicked will be cut off.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But the transgressors will all be destroyed; the future of the wicked will be cut off.

contentJson: [{"text":"The salvation of the righteous is from the LORD;","poem":1},{"text":"He is their stronghold in time of trouble.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The salvation of the righteous is from the LORD; He is their stronghold in time of trouble.

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD helps and delivers them;","poem":1},{"text":"He rescues and saves them from the wicked,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"because they take refuge in Him.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
The LORD helps and delivers them; He rescues and saves them from the wicked, 
because they take refuge in Him.

contentJson: [{"text":"O LORD, do not rebuke me in Your anger","poem":1},{"text":"or discipline me in Your wrath.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: O LORD, do not rebuke me in Your anger or discipline me in Your wrath.

contentJson: [{"text":"For Your arrows have pierced me deeply,","poem":1},{"text":"and Your hand has pressed down on me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For Your arrows have pierced me deeply, and Your hand has pressed down on me.

contentJson: [{"text":"There is no soundness in my body","poem":1},{"text":"because of Your anger;","poem":2},{"text":"there is no rest in my bones","poem":1},{"text":"because of my sin.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: There is no soundness in my body because of Your anger; there is no rest in my bones because of my sin.

contentJson: [{"text":"For my iniquities have overwhelmed me;","poem":1},{"text":"they are a burden too heavy to bear.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For my iniquities have overwhelmed me; they are a burden too heavy to bear.

contentJson: [{"text":"My wounds are foul and festering","poem":1},{"text":"because of my sinful folly.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: My wounds are foul and festering because of my sinful folly.

contentJson: [{"text":"I am bent and brought low;","poem":1},{"text":"all day long I go about mourning.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I am bent and brought low; all day long I go about mourning.

contentJson: [{"text":"For my loins are full of burning pain,","poem":1},{"text":"and no soundness remains in my body.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For my loins are full of burning pain, and no soundness remains in my body.

contentJson: [{"text":"I am numb and badly crushed;","poem":1},{"text":"I groan in anguish of heart.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I am numb and badly crushed; I groan in anguish of heart.

contentJson: [{"text":"O Lord, my every desire is before You;","poem":1},{"text":"my groaning is not hidden from You.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: O Lord, my every desire is before You; my groaning is not hidden from You.

contentJson: [{"text":"My heart pounds, my strength fails,","poem":1},{"text":"and even the light of my eyes has faded.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: My heart pounds, my strength fails, and even the light of my eyes has faded.

contentJson: [{"text":"My beloved and friends shun my disease,","poem":1},{"text":"and my kinsmen stand at a distance.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: My beloved and friends shun my disease, and my kinsmen stand at a distance.

contentJson: [{"text":"Those who seek my life lay snares;","poem":1},{"text":"those who wish me harm speak destruction,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"plotting deceit all day long.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Those who seek my life lay snares; those who wish me harm speak destruction, 
plotting deceit all day long.

contentJson: [{"text":"But like a deaf man, I do not hear;","poem":1},{"text":"and like a mute man, I do not open my mouth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But like a deaf man, I do not hear; and like a mute man, I do not open my mouth.

contentJson: [{"text":"I am like a man who cannot hear,","poem":1},{"text":"whose mouth offers no reply.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I am like a man who cannot hear, whose mouth offers no reply.

contentJson: [{"text":"I wait for You, O LORD;","poem":1},{"text":"You will answer, O Lord my God.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I wait for You, O LORD; You will answer, O Lord my God.

contentJson: [{"text":"For I said, “Let them not gloat over me—","poem":1},{"text":"those who taunt me when my foot slips.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For I said, “Let them not gloat over me— those who taunt me when my foot slips.”

contentJson: [{"text":"For I am ready to fall,","poem":1},{"text":"and my pain is ever with me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For I am ready to fall, and my pain is ever with me.

contentJson: [{"text":"Yes, I confess my iniquity;","poem":1},{"text":"I am troubled by my sin.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Yes, I confess my iniquity; I am troubled by my sin.

contentJson: [{"text":"Many are my enemies without cause,","poem":1},{"noteId":86},{"text":"and many hate me without reason.","poem":2},{"noteId":87}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Many are my enemies without cause, and many hate me without reason.

contentJson: [{"text":"Those who repay my good with evil","poem":1},{"text":"attack me for pursuing the good.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Those who repay my good with evil attack me for pursuing the good.
