contentJson: [{"text":"Do not forsake me, O LORD;","poem":1},{"text":"be not far from me, O my God.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Do not forsake me, O LORD; be not far from me, O my God.

contentJson: [{"text":"Come quickly to help me,","poem":1},{"text":"O Lord my Savior.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Come quickly to help me, O Lord my Savior.

contentJson: [{"text":"I said, “I will watch my ways","poem":1},{"text":"so that I will not sin with my tongue;","poem":2},{"text":"I will guard my mouth with a muzzle","poem":1},{"text":"as long as the wicked are present.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I said, “I will watch my ways so that I will not sin with my tongue; I will guard my mouth with a muzzle as long as the wicked are present.”

contentJson: [{"text":"I was speechless and still;","poem":1},{"text":"I remained silent, even from speaking good,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"and my sorrow was stirred.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
I was speechless and still; I remained silent, even from speaking good, 
and my sorrow was stirred.

contentJson: [{"text":"My heart grew hot within me;","poem":1},{"text":"as I mused, the fire burned.","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"Then I spoke with my tongue:","poem":1}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
My heart grew hot within me; as I mused, the fire burned. 
Then I spoke with my tongue:

contentJson: [{"text":"“Show me, O LORD, my end","poem":1},{"text":"and the measure of my days.","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"Let me know how fleeting my life is.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
“Show me, O LORD, my end and the measure of my days. 
Let me know how fleeting my life is.

contentJson: [{"text":"You, indeed, have made my days as handbreadths,","poem":1},{"text":"and my lifetime as nothing before You.","poem":2},{"text":"Truly each man at his best","poem":1},{"text":"exists as but a breath.","poem":2},"Selah"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You, indeed, have made my days as handbreadths, and my lifetime as nothing before You. Truly each man at his best exists as but a breath. Selah

contentJson: [{"text":"Surely every man goes about like a phantom;","poem":1},{"text":"surely he bustles in vain;","poem":2},{"text":"he heaps up riches","poem":1},{"text":"not knowing who will haul them away.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Surely every man goes about like a phantom; surely he bustles in vain; he heaps up riches not knowing who will haul them away.

contentJson: [{"text":"And now, O Lord, for what do I wait?","poem":1},{"text":"My hope is in You.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: And now, O Lord, for what do I wait? My hope is in You.

contentJson: [{"text":"Deliver me from all my transgressions;","poem":1},{"text":"do not make me the reproach of fools.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Deliver me from all my transgressions; do not make me the reproach of fools.

contentJson: [{"text":"I have become mute;","poem":1},{"text":"I do not open my mouth","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"because of what You have done.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
I have become mute; I do not open my mouth 
because of what You have done.

contentJson: [{"text":"Remove Your scourge from me;","poem":1},{"text":"I am perishing by the force of Your hand.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Remove Your scourge from me; I am perishing by the force of Your hand.

contentJson: [{"text":"You discipline and correct a man for his iniquity,","poem":1},{"text":"consuming like a moth what he holds dear;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"surely each man is but a vapor.","poem":2},"Selah"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
You discipline and correct a man for his iniquity, consuming like a moth what he holds dear; 
surely each man is but a vapor. Selah

contentJson: [{"text":"Hear my prayer, O LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"and give ear to my cry for help;","poem":2},{"text":"do not be deaf to my weeping.","poem":1},{"text":"For I am a foreigner dwelling with You,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"a stranger like all my fathers.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Hear my prayer, O LORD, and give ear to my cry for help; do not be deaf to my weeping. For I am a foreigner dwelling with You, 
a stranger like all my fathers.

contentJson: [{"text":"Turn Your gaze away from me,","poem":1},{"text":"that I may again be cheered","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"before I depart and am no more.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Turn Your gaze away from me, that I may again be cheered 
before I depart and am no more.”

contentJson: [{"text":"I waited patiently for the LORD;","poem":1},{"text":"He inclined to me and heard my cry.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I waited patiently for the LORD; He inclined to me and heard my cry.

contentJson: [{"text":"He lifted me up from the pit of despair,","poem":1},{"text":"out of the miry clay;","poem":2},{"text":"He set my feet upon a rock,","poem":1},{"text":"and made my footsteps firm.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He lifted me up from the pit of despair, out of the miry clay; He set my feet upon a rock, and made my footsteps firm.

contentJson: [{"text":"He put a new song in my mouth,","poem":1},{"text":"a hymn of praise to our God.","poem":2},{"text":"Many will see and fear","poem":1},{"text":"and put their trust in the LORD.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He put a new song in my mouth, a hymn of praise to our God. Many will see and fear and put their trust in the LORD.

contentJson: [{"text":"Blessed is the man","poem":1},{"text":"who has made the LORD his trust,","poem":2},{"text":"who has not turned to the proud,","poem":1},{"text":"nor to those who lapse into falsehood.","poem":2},{"noteId":88}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Blessed is the man who has made the LORD his trust, who has not turned to the proud, nor to those who lapse into falsehood.

contentJson: [{"text":"Many, O LORD my God,","poem":1},{"text":"are the wonders You have done,","poem":2},{"text":"and the plans You have for us—","poem":1},{"text":"none can compare to You—","poem":2},{"text":"if I proclaim and declare them,","poem":1},{"text":"they are more than I can count.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Many, O LORD my God, are the wonders You have done, and the plans You have for us— none can compare to You— if I proclaim and declare them, they are more than I can count.

contentJson: [{"text":"Sacrifice and offering You did not desire,","poem":1},{"text":"but my ears You have opened.","poem":2},{"noteId":89},{"text":"Burnt offerings and sin offerings","poem":1},{"text":"You did not require.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Sacrifice and offering You did not desire, but my ears You have opened. Burnt offerings and sin offerings You did not require.

contentJson: [{"text":"Then I said, “Here I am, I have come—","poem":1},{"text":"it is written about me in the scroll:","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Then I said, “Here I am, I have come— it is written about me in the scroll:

contentJson: [{"text":"I delight to do Your will, O my God;","poem":1},{"noteId":90},{"text":"Your law is within my heart.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I delight to do Your will, O my God; Your law is within my heart.”

contentJson: [{"text":"I proclaim righteousness in the great assembly;","poem":1},{"text":"behold, I do not seal my lips,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"as You, O LORD, do know.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
I proclaim righteousness in the great assembly; behold, I do not seal my lips, 
as You, O LORD, do know.

contentJson: [{"text":"I have not covered up Your righteousness in my heart;","poem":1},{"text":"I have declared Your faithfulness and salvation;","poem":2},{"text":"I have not concealed Your loving devotion and faithfulness","poem":1},{"text":"from the great assembly.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I have not covered up Your righteousness in my heart; I have declared Your faithfulness and salvation; I have not concealed Your loving devotion and faithfulness from the great assembly.

contentJson: [{"text":"O LORD, do not withhold Your mercy from me;","poem":1},{"text":"Your loving devotion and faithfulness will always guard me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: O LORD, do not withhold Your mercy from me; Your loving devotion and faithfulness will always guard me.

contentJson: [{"text":"For evils without number surround me;","poem":1},{"text":"my sins have overtaken me, so that I cannot see.","poem":2},{"text":"They are more than the hairs of my head,","poem":1},{"text":"and my heart has failed within me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For evils without number surround me; my sins have overtaken me, so that I cannot see. They are more than the hairs of my head, and my heart has failed within me.

contentJson: [{"text":"Be pleased, O LORD, to deliver me;","poem":1},{"text":"hurry, O LORD, to help me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Be pleased, O LORD, to deliver me; hurry, O LORD, to help me.

contentJson: [{"text":"May those who seek my life","poem":1},{"text":"be ashamed and confounded;","poem":2},{"text":"may those who wish me harm","poem":1},{"text":"be repelled and humiliated.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May those who seek my life be ashamed and confounded; may those who wish me harm be repelled and humiliated.

contentJson: [{"text":"May those who say to me, “Aha, aha!”","poem":1},{"text":"be appalled at their own shame.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May those who say to me, “Aha, aha!” be appalled at their own shame.

contentJson: [{"text":"May all who seek You","poem":1},{"text":"rejoice and be glad in You;","poem":2},{"text":"may those who love Your salvation","poem":1},{"text":"always say, “The LORD be magnified!”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May all who seek You rejoice and be glad in You; may those who love Your salvation always say, “The LORD be magnified!”

contentJson: [{"text":"But I am poor and needy;","poem":1},{"text":"may the Lord think of me.","poem":2},{"text":"You are my helper and deliverer;","poem":1},{"text":"O my God, do not delay.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But I am poor and needy; may the Lord think of me. You are my helper and deliverer; O my God, do not delay.

contentJson: [{"text":"Blessed is the one who cares for the poor;","poem":1},{"text":"the LORD will deliver him in the day of trouble.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Blessed is the one who cares for the poor; the LORD will deliver him in the day of trouble.

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD will protect and preserve him;","poem":1},{"text":"He will bless him in the land","poem":2},{"text":"and refuse to surrender him","poem":1},{"text":"to the will of his foes.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The LORD will protect and preserve him; He will bless him in the land and refuse to surrender him to the will of his foes.

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD will sustain him on his bed of illness","poem":1},{"text":"and restore him from his bed of sickness.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The LORD will sustain him on his bed of illness and restore him from his bed of sickness.

contentJson: [{"text":"I said, “O LORD, be gracious to me;","poem":1},{"text":"heal me, for I have sinned against You.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I said, “O LORD, be gracious to me; heal me, for I have sinned against You.”

contentJson: [{"text":"My enemies say with malice:","poem":1},{"text":"“When will he die and be forgotten?”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: My enemies say with malice: “When will he die and be forgotten?”

contentJson: [{"text":"My visitor speaks falsehood;","poem":1},{"text":"he gathers slander in his heart;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"he goes out and spreads it abroad.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
My visitor speaks falsehood; he gathers slander in his heart; 
he goes out and spreads it abroad.

contentJson: [{"text":"All who hate me whisper against me;","poem":1},{"text":"they imagine the worst for me:","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: All who hate me whisper against me; they imagine the worst for me:

contentJson: [{"text":"“A vile disease has been poured into him;","poem":1},{"text":"he will never get up from where he lies!”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: “A vile disease has been poured into him; he will never get up from where he lies!”

contentJson: [{"text":"Even my close friend whom I trusted,","poem":1},{"text":"the one who shared my bread,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"has lifted up his heel against me.","poem":2},{"noteId":91}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Even my close friend whom I trusted, the one who shared my bread, 
has lifted up his heel against me.

contentJson: [{"text":"But You, O LORD, be gracious to me and raise me up,","poem":1},{"text":"that I may repay them.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But You, O LORD, be gracious to me and raise me up, that I may repay them.

contentJson: [{"text":"By this I know that You delight in me,","poem":1},{"text":"for my enemy does not triumph over me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: By this I know that You delight in me, for my enemy does not triumph over me.

contentJson: [{"text":"In my integrity You uphold me","poem":1},{"text":"and set me in Your presence forever.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: In my integrity You uphold me and set me in Your presence forever.

contentJson: [{"text":"Blessed be the LORD, the God of Israel,","poem":1},{"text":"from everlasting to everlasting.","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"Amen and Amen.","poem":1}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Blessed be the LORD, the God of Israel, from everlasting to everlasting. 
Amen and Amen.

contentJson: [{"text":"As the deer pants for streams of water,","poem":1},{"text":"so my soul longs after You, O God.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: As the deer pants for streams of water, so my soul longs after You, O God.

contentJson: [{"text":"My soul thirsts for God, the living God.","poem":1},{"text":"When shall I come and appear in God’s presence?","poem":2},{"noteId":93}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: My soul thirsts for God, the living God. When shall I come and appear in God’s presence?

contentJson: [{"text":"My tears have been my food","poem":1},{"text":"both day and night,","poem":2},{"text":"while men ask me all day long,","poem":1},{"text":"“Where is your God?”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: My tears have been my food both day and night, while men ask me all day long, “Where is your God?”

contentJson: [{"text":"These things come to mind as I pour out my soul:","poem":1},{"text":"how I walked with the multitude,","poem":2},{"text":"leading the procession to the house of God","poem":1},{"text":"with shouts of joy and praise.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: These things come to mind as I pour out my soul: how I walked with the multitude, leading the procession to the house of God with shouts of joy and praise.

contentJson: [{"text":"Why are you downcast, O my soul?","poem":1},{"text":"Why the unease within me?","poem":2},{"text":"Put your hope in God, for I will yet praise Him","poem":1},{"text":"for the salvation of His presence.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Why are you downcast, O my soul? Why the unease within me? Put your hope in God, for I will yet praise Him for the salvation of His presence.

contentJson: [{"text":"O my God, my soul despairs within me.","poem":1},{"text":"Therefore I remember You","poem":2},{"text":"from the land of Jordan and the peaks of Hermon—","poem":1},{"text":"even from Mount Mizar.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: O my God, my soul despairs within me. Therefore I remember You from the land of Jordan and the peaks of Hermon— even from Mount Mizar.

contentJson: [{"text":"Deep calls to deep","poem":1},{"text":"in the roar of Your waterfalls;","poem":2},{"text":"all Your breakers and waves","poem":1},{"text":"have rolled over me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Deep calls to deep in the roar of Your waterfalls; all Your breakers and waves have rolled over me.

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD decrees His loving devotion by day,","poem":1},{"text":"and at night His song is with me","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"as a prayer to the God of my life.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
The LORD decrees His loving devotion by day, and at night His song is with me 
as a prayer to the God of my life.

contentJson: [{"text":"I say to God my Rock,","poem":1},{"text":"“Why have You forgotten me?","poem":2},{"text":"Why must I walk in sorrow","poem":1},{"text":"because of the enemy’s oppression?”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I say to God my Rock, “Why have You forgotten me? Why must I walk in sorrow because of the enemy’s oppression?”

contentJson: [{"text":"Like the crushing of my bones,","poem":1},{"text":"my enemies taunt me,","poem":2},{"text":"while they say to me all day long,","poem":1},{"text":"“Where is your God?”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Like the crushing of my bones, my enemies taunt me, while they say to me all day long, “Where is your God?”

contentJson: [{"text":"Why are you downcast, O my soul?","poem":1},{"text":"Why the unease within me?","poem":2},{"text":"Put your hope in God, for I will yet praise Him,","poem":1},{"text":"my Savior and my God.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Why are you downcast, O my soul? Why the unease within me? Put your hope in God, for I will yet praise Him, my Savior and my God.

contentJson: [{"text":"Vindicate me, O God, and plead my case","poem":1},{"text":"against an ungodly nation;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"deliver me from deceitful and unjust men.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Vindicate me, O God, and plead my case against an ungodly nation; 
deliver me from deceitful and unjust men.

contentJson: [{"text":"For You are the God of my refuge.","poem":1},{"text":"Why have You rejected me?","poem":2},{"text":"Why must I walk in sorrow","poem":1},{"text":"because of the enemy’s oppression?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For You are the God of my refuge. Why have You rejected me? Why must I walk in sorrow because of the enemy’s oppression?

contentJson: [{"text":"Send out Your light and Your truth;","poem":1},{"text":"let them lead me.","poem":2},{"text":"Let them bring me to Your holy mountain,","poem":1},{"text":"and to the place where You dwell.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Send out Your light and Your truth; let them lead me. Let them bring me to Your holy mountain, and to the place where You dwell.

contentJson: [{"text":"Then I will go to the altar of God,","poem":1},{"text":"to God, my greatest joy.","poem":2},{"text":"I will praise You with the harp,","poem":1},{"text":"O God, my God.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Then I will go to the altar of God, to God, my greatest joy. I will praise You with the harp, O God, my God.

contentJson: [{"text":"Why are you downcast, O my soul?","poem":1},{"text":"Why the unease within me?","poem":2},{"text":"Put your hope in God, for I will yet praise Him,","poem":1},{"text":"my Savior and my God.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Why are you downcast, O my soul? Why the unease within me? Put your hope in God, for I will yet praise Him, my Savior and my God.

contentJson: [{"text":"We have heard with our ears, O God;","poem":1},{"text":"our fathers have told us","poem":2},{"text":"the work You did in their days,","poem":1},{"text":"in the days of old.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: We have heard with our ears, O God; our fathers have told us the work You did in their days, in the days of old.

contentJson: [{"text":"With Your hand You drove out the nations","poem":1},{"text":"and planted our fathers there;","poem":2},{"text":"You crushed the peoples","poem":1},{"text":"and cast them out.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: With Your hand You drove out the nations and planted our fathers there; You crushed the peoples and cast them out.

contentJson: [{"text":"For it was not by their sword that they took the land;","poem":1},{"text":"their arm did not bring them victory.","poem":2},{"text":"It was by Your right hand,","poem":1},{"text":"Your arm, and the light of Your face,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"because You favored them.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
For it was not by their sword that they took the land; their arm did not bring them victory. It was by Your right hand, Your arm, and the light of Your face, 
because You favored them.

contentJson: [{"text":"You are my King, O God,","poem":1},{"text":"who ordains victories for Jacob.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You are my King, O God, who ordains victories for Jacob.

contentJson: [{"text":"Through You we repel our foes;","poem":1},{"text":"through Your name we trample our enemies.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Through You we repel our foes; through Your name we trample our enemies.

contentJson: [{"text":"For I do not trust in my bow,","poem":1},{"text":"nor does my sword save me.","poem":2},{"noteId":95}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For I do not trust in my bow, nor does my sword save me.

contentJson: [{"text":"For You save us from our enemies;","poem":1},{"text":"You put those who hate us to shame.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For You save us from our enemies; You put those who hate us to shame.

contentJson: [{"text":"In God we have boasted all day long,","poem":1},{"text":"and Your name we will praise forever.","poem":2},"Selah"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: In God we have boasted all day long, and Your name we will praise forever. Selah

contentJson: [{"text":"But You have rejected and humbled us;","poem":1},{"text":"You no longer go forth with our armies.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But You have rejected and humbled us; You no longer go forth with our armies.

contentJson: [{"text":"You have made us retreat from the foe,","poem":1},{"text":"and those who hate us have plundered us.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You have made us retreat from the foe, and those who hate us have plundered us.

contentJson: [{"text":"You have given us up as sheep to be devoured;","poem":1},{"text":"You have scattered us among the nations.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You have given us up as sheep to be devoured; You have scattered us among the nations.

contentJson: [{"text":"You sell Your people for nothing;","poem":1},{"text":"no profit do You gain from their sale.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You sell Your people for nothing; no profit do You gain from their sale.

contentJson: [{"text":"You have made us a reproach to our neighbors,","poem":1},{"text":"a mockery and derision to those around us.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You have made us a reproach to our neighbors, a mockery and derision to those around us.

contentJson: [{"text":"You have made us a byword among the nations,","poem":1},{"text":"a laughingstock","poem":2},{"noteId":96},{"text":"among the peoples.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You have made us a byword among the nations, a laughingstock among the peoples.

contentJson: [{"text":"All day long my disgrace is before me,","poem":1},{"text":"and shame has covered my face,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: All day long my disgrace is before me, and shame has covered my face,

contentJson: [{"text":"at the voice of the scorner and reviler,","poem":1},{"text":"because of the enemy, bent on revenge.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: at the voice of the scorner and reviler, because of the enemy, bent on revenge.

contentJson: [{"text":"All this has come upon us,","poem":1},{"text":"though we have not forgotten You","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"or betrayed Your covenant.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
All this has come upon us, though we have not forgotten You 
or betrayed Your covenant.

contentJson: [{"text":"Our hearts have not turned back;","poem":1},{"text":"our steps have not strayed from Your path.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Our hearts have not turned back; our steps have not strayed from Your path.

contentJson: [{"text":"But You have crushed us in the lair of jackals;","poem":1},{"noteId":97},{"text":"You have covered us with deepest darkness.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But You have crushed us in the lair of jackals; You have covered us with deepest darkness.

contentJson: [{"text":"If we had forgotten the name of our God","poem":1},{"text":"or spread out our hands to a foreign god,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: If we had forgotten the name of our God or spread out our hands to a foreign god,

contentJson: [{"text":"would not God have discovered,","poem":1},{"text":"since He knows the secrets of the heart?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: would not God have discovered, since He knows the secrets of the heart?

contentJson: [{"text":"Yet for Your sake we face death all day long;","poem":1},{"text":"we are considered as sheep to be slaughtered.","poem":2},{"noteId":98}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Yet for Your sake we face death all day long; we are considered as sheep to be slaughtered.

contentJson: [{"text":"Wake up, O Lord! Why are You sleeping?","poem":1},{"text":"Arise! Do not reject us forever.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Wake up, O Lord! Why are You sleeping? Arise! Do not reject us forever.

contentJson: [{"text":"Why do You hide Your face","poem":1},{"text":"and forget our affliction and oppression?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Why do You hide Your face and forget our affliction and oppression?

contentJson: [{"text":"For our soul has sunk to the dust;","poem":1},{"text":"our bodies cling to the earth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For our soul has sunk to the dust; our bodies cling to the earth.

contentJson: [{"text":"Rise up; be our help!","poem":1},{"text":"Redeem us on account of Your loving devotion.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Rise up; be our help! Redeem us on account of Your loving devotion.

contentJson: [{"text":"My heart is stirred by a noble theme","poem":1},{"text":"as I recite my verses to the king;","poem":2},{"noteId":100},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"my tongue is the pen of a skillful writer.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
My heart is stirred by a noble theme as I recite my verses to the king; 
my tongue is the pen of a skillful writer.

contentJson: [{"text":"You are the most handsome of men;","poem":1},{"text":"grace has anointed your lips,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"since God has blessed you forever.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
You are the most handsome of men; grace has anointed your lips, 
since God has blessed you forever.

contentJson: [{"text":"Strap your sword at your side, O mighty warrior;","poem":1},{"text":"appear in your majesty and splendor.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Strap your sword at your side, O mighty warrior; appear in your majesty and splendor.

contentJson: [{"text":"In your splendor ride forth in victory","poem":1},{"text":"on behalf of truth and humility and justice;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"may your right hand show your awesome deeds.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
In your splendor ride forth in victory on behalf of truth and humility and justice; 
may your right hand show your awesome deeds.

contentJson: [{"text":"Your arrows pierce the hearts of the king’s foes;","poem":1},{"text":"the nations fall beneath your feet.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Your arrows pierce the hearts of the king’s foes; the nations fall beneath your feet.

contentJson: [{"text":"Your throne, O God, endures forever and ever,","poem":1},{"text":"and justice is the scepter of Your kingdom.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Your throne, O God, endures forever and ever, and justice is the scepter of Your kingdom.

contentJson: [{"text":"You have loved righteousness","poem":1},{"text":"and hated wickedness;","poem":2},{"text":"therefore God, your God, has anointed you","poem":1},{"text":"above your companions with the oil of joy.","poem":2},{"noteId":101}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You have loved righteousness and hated wickedness; therefore God, your God, has anointed you above your companions with the oil of joy.

contentJson: [{"text":"All your garments are fragrant","poem":1},{"text":"with myrrh and aloes and cassia;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"from palaces of ivory the harps make you glad.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
All your garments are fragrant with myrrh and aloes and cassia; 
from palaces of ivory the harps make you glad.

contentJson: [{"text":"The daughters of kings are among your honored women;","poem":1},{"text":"the queen stands at your right hand,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"adorned with the gold of Ophir.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
The daughters of kings are among your honored women; the queen stands at your right hand, 
adorned with the gold of Ophir.

contentJson: [{"text":"Listen, O daughter! Consider and incline your ear:","poem":1},{"text":"Forget your people and your father’s house,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Listen, O daughter! Consider and incline your ear: Forget your people and your father’s house,

contentJson: [{"text":"and the king will desire your beauty;","poem":1},{"text":"bow to him, for he is your lord.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: and the king will desire your beauty; bow to him, for he is your lord.

contentJson: [{"text":"The Daughter of Tyre will come with a gift;","poem":1},{"text":"men of wealth will seek your favor.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The Daughter of Tyre will come with a gift; men of wealth will seek your favor.

contentJson: [{"text":"All glorious is the princess in her chamber;","poem":1},{"text":"her gown is embroidered with gold.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: All glorious is the princess in her chamber; her gown is embroidered with gold.

contentJson: [{"text":"In colorful garments she is led to the king;","poem":1},{"text":"her virgin companions are brought before you.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: In colorful garments she is led to the king; her virgin companions are brought before you.

contentJson: [{"text":"They are led in with joy and gladness;","poem":1},{"text":"they enter the palace of the king.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They are led in with joy and gladness; they enter the palace of the king.

contentJson: [{"text":"Your sons will succeed your fathers;","poem":1},{"text":"you will make them princes throughout the land.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Your sons will succeed your fathers; you will make them princes throughout the land.

contentJson: [{"text":"I will commemorate your name through all generations;","poem":1},{"text":"therefore the nations will praise you forever and ever.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I will commemorate your name through all generations; therefore the nations will praise you forever and ever.

contentJson: [{"text":"God is our refuge and strength,","poem":1},{"text":"an ever-present help in times of trouble.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in times of trouble.

contentJson: [{"text":"Therefore we will not fear,","poem":1},{"text":"though the earth is transformed","poem":2},{"text":"and the mountains are toppled","poem":1},{"text":"into the depths of the seas,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Therefore we will not fear, though the earth is transformed and the mountains are toppled into the depths of the seas,

contentJson: [{"text":"though their waters roar and foam","poem":1},{"text":"and the mountains quake in the surge.","poem":2},"Selah"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: though their waters roar and foam and the mountains quake in the surge. Selah

contentJson: [{"text":"There is a river whose streams delight the city of God,","poem":1},{"text":"the holy place where the Most High dwells.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: There is a river whose streams delight the city of God, the holy place where the Most High dwells.

contentJson: [{"text":"God is within her; she will not be moved.","poem":1},{"text":"God will help her when morning dawns.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: God is within her; she will not be moved. God will help her when morning dawns.

contentJson: [{"text":"Nations rage, kingdoms crumble;","poem":1},{"text":"the earth melts when He lifts His voice.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Nations rage, kingdoms crumble; the earth melts when He lifts His voice.

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD of Hosts is with us;","poem":1},{"text":"the God of Jacob is our fortress.","poem":2},"Selah"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The LORD of Hosts is with us; the God of Jacob is our fortress. Selah

contentJson: [{"text":"Come, see the works of the LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"who brings devastation upon the earth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Come, see the works of the LORD, who brings devastation upon the earth.

contentJson: [{"text":"He makes wars to cease throughout the earth;","poem":1},{"text":"He breaks the bow and shatters the spear;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"He burns the shields","poem":2},{"noteId":103},{"text":"in the fire.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
He makes wars to cease throughout the earth; He breaks the bow and shatters the spear; 
He burns the shields in the fire.

contentJson: [{"text":"“Be still and know that I am God;","poem":1},{"text":"I will be exalted among the nations,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"I will be exalted over the earth.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
“Be still and know that I am God; I will be exalted among the nations, 
I will be exalted over the earth.”

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD of Hosts is with us;","poem":1},{"text":"the God of Jacob is our fortress.","poem":2},"Selah"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The LORD of Hosts is with us; the God of Jacob is our fortress. Selah

contentJson: [{"text":"Clap your hands, all you peoples;","poem":1},{"text":"shout unto God with a voice of triumph.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Clap your hands, all you peoples; shout unto God with a voice of triumph.

contentJson: [{"text":"How awesome is the LORD Most High,","poem":1},{"text":"the great King over all the earth!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: How awesome is the LORD Most High, the great King over all the earth!

contentJson: [{"text":"He subdues nations beneath us,","poem":1},{"text":"and peoples under our feet.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He subdues nations beneath us, and peoples under our feet.

contentJson: [{"text":"He chooses our inheritance for us,","poem":1},{"text":"the pride of Jacob, whom He loves.","poem":2},"Selah"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He chooses our inheritance for us, the pride of Jacob, whom He loves. Selah

contentJson: [{"text":"God has ascended amid shouts of joy,","poem":1},{"text":"the LORD with the sound of the horn.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: God has ascended amid shouts of joy, the LORD with the sound of the horn.

contentJson: [{"text":"Sing praises to God, sing praises;","poem":1},{"text":"sing praises to our King, sing praises!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Sing praises to God, sing praises; sing praises to our King, sing praises!

contentJson: [{"text":"For God is King of all the earth;","poem":1},{"text":"sing profound praises to Him.","poem":2},{"noteId":104}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For God is King of all the earth; sing profound praises to Him.

contentJson: [{"text":"God reigns over the nations;","poem":1},{"text":"God is seated on His holy throne.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: God reigns over the nations; God is seated on His holy throne.

contentJson: [{"text":"The nobles of the nations have assembled","poem":1},{"text":"as the people of the God of Abraham;","poem":2},{"text":"for the shields of the earth belong to God;","poem":1},{"text":"He is highly exalted.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The nobles of the nations have assembled as the people of the God of Abraham; for the shields of the earth belong to God; He is highly exalted.

contentJson: [{"text":"Great is the LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"and greatly to be praised","poem":2},{"text":"in the city of our God,","poem":1},{"text":"His holy mountain.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Great is the LORD, and greatly to be praised in the city of our God, His holy mountain.

contentJson: [{"text":"Beautiful in loftiness,","poem":1},{"text":"the joy of all the earth,","poem":2},{"text":"like the peaks of Zaphon","poem":1},{"noteId":105},{"text":"is Mount Zion,","poem":1},{"text":"the city of the great King.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Beautiful in loftiness, the joy of all the earth, like the peaks of Zaphon is Mount Zion, the city of the great King.

contentJson: [{"text":"God is in her citadels;","poem":1},{"text":"He has shown Himself to be a fortress.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: God is in her citadels; He has shown Himself to be a fortress.

contentJson: [{"text":"For behold, the kings assembled;","poem":1},{"text":"they all advanced together.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For behold, the kings assembled; they all advanced together.

contentJson: [{"text":"They saw and were astounded;","poem":1},{"text":"they fled in terror.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They saw and were astounded; they fled in terror.

contentJson: [{"text":"Trembling seized them there,","poem":1},{"text":"anguish like a woman in labor.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Trembling seized them there, anguish like a woman in labor.

contentJson: [{"text":"With a wind from the east","poem":1},{"text":"You wrecked the ships of Tarshish.","poem":2},{"noteId":106}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: With a wind from the east You wrecked the ships of Tarshish.

contentJson: [{"text":"As we have heard, so we have seen","poem":1},{"text":"in the city of the LORD of Hosts,","poem":2},{"text":"in the city of our God:","poem":1},{"text":"God will establish her forever.","poem":2},"Selah"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: As we have heard, so we have seen in the city of the LORD of Hosts, in the city of our God: God will establish her forever. Selah

contentJson: [{"text":"Within Your temple, O God,","poem":1},{"text":"we contemplate Your loving devotion.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Within Your temple, O God, we contemplate Your loving devotion.

contentJson: [{"text":"Your name, O God, like Your praise,","poem":1},{"text":"reaches to the ends of the earth;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"Your right hand is full of righteousness.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Your name, O God, like Your praise, reaches to the ends of the earth; 
Your right hand is full of righteousness.

contentJson: [{"text":"Mount Zion is glad,","poem":1},{"text":"the daughters","poem":2},{"noteId":107},{"text":"of Judah rejoice,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"on account of Your judgments.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Mount Zion is glad, the daughters of Judah rejoice, 
on account of Your judgments.

contentJson: [{"text":"March around Zion, encircle her,","poem":1},{"text":"count her towers,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: March around Zion, encircle her, count her towers,

contentJson: [{"text":"consider her ramparts, tour her citadels,","poem":1},{"text":"that you may tell the next generation.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: consider her ramparts, tour her citadels, that you may tell the next generation.

contentJson: [{"text":"For this God is our God forever and ever;","poem":1},{"text":"He will be our guide even till death.","poem":2},{"noteId":108}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For this God is our God forever and ever; He will be our guide even till death.

contentJson: [{"text":"Hear this, all you peoples;","poem":1},{"text":"listen, all inhabitants of the world,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Hear this, all you peoples; listen, all inhabitants of the world,

contentJson: [{"text":"both low and high,","poem":1},{"text":"rich and poor alike.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: both low and high, rich and poor alike.

contentJson: [{"text":"My mouth will impart wisdom,","poem":1},{"text":"and the meditation of my heart will bring understanding.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: My mouth will impart wisdom, and the meditation of my heart will bring understanding.

contentJson: [{"text":"I will incline my ear to a proverb;","poem":1},{"text":"I will express my riddle with the harp:","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I will incline my ear to a proverb; I will express my riddle with the harp:

contentJson: [{"text":"Why should I fear in times of trouble,","poem":1},{"text":"when wicked usurpers surround me?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Why should I fear in times of trouble, when wicked usurpers surround me?

contentJson: [{"text":"They trust in their wealth","poem":1},{"text":"and boast in their great riches.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They trust in their wealth and boast in their great riches.

contentJson: [{"text":"No man can possibly redeem his brother","poem":1},{"noteId":109},{"text":"or pay his ransom to God.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: No man can possibly redeem his brother or pay his ransom to God.

contentJson: [{"text":"For the redemption of his soul is costly,","poem":1},{"text":"and never can payment suffice,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For the redemption of his soul is costly, and never can payment suffice,

contentJson: [{"text":"that he should live on forever","poem":1},{"text":"and not see decay.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: that he should live on forever and not see decay.

contentJson: [{"text":"For it is clear that wise men die,","poem":1},{"text":"and the foolish and the senseless both perish","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"and leave their wealth to others.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
For it is clear that wise men die, and the foolish and the senseless both perish 
and leave their wealth to others.

contentJson: [{"text":"Their graves","poem":1},{"noteId":110},{"text":"are their eternal homes—","poem":1},{"text":"their dwellings for endless generations—","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"even though their lands were their namesakes.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Their graves are their eternal homes— their dwellings for endless generations— 
even though their lands were their namesakes.

contentJson: [{"text":"But a man, despite his wealth, cannot endure;","poem":1},{"text":"he is like the beasts that perish.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But a man, despite his wealth, cannot endure; he is like the beasts that perish.

contentJson: [{"text":"This is the fate of the self-confident","poem":1},{"noteId":111},{"text":"and their followers who endorse their sayings.","poem":2},"Selah"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: This is the fate of the self-confident and their followers who endorse their sayings. Selah

contentJson: [{"text":"Like sheep they are destined for Sheol.","poem":1},{"text":"Death will be their shepherd.","poem":2},{"text":"The upright will rule them in the morning,","poem":1},{"text":"and their form will decay in Sheol,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"far from their lofty abode.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Like sheep they are destined for Sheol. Death will be their shepherd. The upright will rule them in the morning, and their form will decay in Sheol, 
far from their lofty abode.

contentJson: [{"text":"But God will redeem my life from Sheol,","poem":1},{"text":"for He will surely take me to Himself.","poem":2},"Selah"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But God will redeem my life from Sheol, for He will surely take me to Himself. Selah

contentJson: [{"text":"Do not be amazed when a man grows rich,","poem":1},{"text":"when the splendor of his house increases.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Do not be amazed when a man grows rich, when the splendor of his house increases.

contentJson: [{"text":"For when he dies, he will carry nothing away;","poem":1},{"text":"his abundance will not follow him down.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For when he dies, he will carry nothing away; his abundance will not follow him down.

contentJson: [{"text":"Though in his lifetime he blesses his soul—","poem":1},{"text":"and men praise you when you prosper—","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Though in his lifetime he blesses his soul— and men praise you when you prosper—

contentJson: [{"text":"he will join the generation of his fathers,","poem":1},{"text":"who will never see the light of day.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: he will join the generation of his fathers, who will never see the light of day.

contentJson: [{"text":"A man who has riches without understanding","poem":1},{"text":"is like the beasts that perish.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A man who has riches without understanding is like the beasts that perish.

contentJson: [{"text":"The Mighty One, God the LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"speaks and summons the earth","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"from where the sun rises to where it sets.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
The Mighty One, God the LORD, speaks and summons the earth 
from where the sun rises to where it sets.

contentJson: [{"text":"From Zion, perfect in beauty,","poem":1},{"text":"God shines forth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: From Zion, perfect in beauty, God shines forth.

contentJson: [{"text":"Our God approaches and will not be silent!","poem":1},{"text":"Consuming fire precedes Him,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"and a tempest rages around Him.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Our God approaches and will not be silent! Consuming fire precedes Him, 
and a tempest rages around Him.

contentJson: [{"text":"He summons the heavens above,","poem":1},{"text":"and the earth, that He may judge His people:","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He summons the heavens above, and the earth, that He may judge His people:

contentJson: [{"text":"“Gather to Me My saints,","poem":1},{"text":"who made a covenant with Me by sacrifice.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: “Gather to Me My saints, who made a covenant with Me by sacrifice.”

contentJson: [{"text":"And the heavens proclaim His righteousness,","poem":1},{"text":"for God Himself is Judge.","poem":2},{"noteId":112},"Selah"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: And the heavens proclaim His righteousness, for God Himself is Judge. Selah

contentJson: [{"text":"“Hear, O My people, and I will speak,","poem":1},{"text":"O Israel, and I will testify against you:","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"I am God, your God.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
“Hear, O My people, and I will speak, O Israel, and I will testify against you: 
I am God, your God.

contentJson: [{"text":"I do not rebuke you for your sacrifices,","poem":1},{"text":"and your burnt offerings are ever before Me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I do not rebuke you for your sacrifices, and your burnt offerings are ever before Me.

contentJson: [{"text":"I have no need for a bull from your stall","poem":1},{"text":"or goats from your pens,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I have no need for a bull from your stall or goats from your pens,

contentJson: [{"text":"for every beast of the forest is Mine—","poem":1},{"text":"the cattle on a thousand hills.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: for every beast of the forest is Mine— the cattle on a thousand hills.

contentJson: [{"text":"I know every bird in the mountains,","poem":1},{"text":"and the creatures of the field are Mine.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I know every bird in the mountains, and the creatures of the field are Mine.

contentJson: [{"text":"If I were hungry, I would not tell you,","poem":1},{"text":"for the world is Mine, and the fullness thereof.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: If I were hungry, I would not tell you, for the world is Mine, and the fullness thereof.

contentJson: [{"text":"Do I eat the flesh of bulls,","poem":1},{"text":"or drink the blood of goats?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Do I eat the flesh of bulls, or drink the blood of goats?

contentJson: [{"text":"Sacrifice a thank offering to God,","poem":1},{"text":"and fulfill your vows to the Most High.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Sacrifice a thank offering to God, and fulfill your vows to the Most High.

contentJson: [{"text":"Call upon Me in the day of trouble;","poem":1},{"text":"I will deliver you, and you will honor Me.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Call upon Me in the day of trouble; I will deliver you, and you will honor Me.”

contentJson: [{"text":"To the wicked, however, God says,","poem":1},{"text":"“What right have you to recite My statutes","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"and to bear My covenant on your lips?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
To the wicked, however, God says, “What right have you to recite My statutes 
and to bear My covenant on your lips?

contentJson: [{"text":"For you hate My instruction","poem":1},{"text":"and cast My words behind you.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For you hate My instruction and cast My words behind you.

contentJson: [{"text":"When you see a thief, you befriend him,","poem":1},{"text":"and throw in your lot with adulterers.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: When you see a thief, you befriend him, and throw in your lot with adulterers.

contentJson: [{"text":"You unleash your mouth for evil","poem":1},{"text":"and unharness your tongue for deceit.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You unleash your mouth for evil and unharness your tongue for deceit.

contentJson: [{"text":"You sit and malign your brother;","poem":1},{"text":"you slander your own mother’s son.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You sit and malign your brother; you slander your own mother’s son.

contentJson: [{"text":"You have done these things, and I kept silent;","poem":1},{"text":"you thought I was","poem":2},{"noteId":113},{"text":"just like you.","poem":2},{"text":"But now I rebuke you","poem":1},{"text":"and accuse you to your face.","poem":2},{"noteId":114}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You have done these things, and I kept silent; you thought I was just like you. But now I rebuke you and accuse you to your face.

contentJson: [{"text":"Now consider this, you who forget God,","poem":1},{"text":"lest I tear you to pieces,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"with no one to rescue you:","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Now consider this, you who forget God, lest I tear you to pieces, 
with no one to rescue you:

contentJson: [{"text":"He who sacrifices a thank offering honors Me,","poem":1},{"text":"and to him who rights his way,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"I will show the salvation of God.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
He who sacrifices a thank offering honors Me, and to him who rights his way, 
I will show the salvation of God.”

contentJson: [{"text":"Have mercy on me,","poem":1},{"noteId":115},{"text":"O God,","poem":1},{"text":"according to Your loving devotion;","poem":2},{"text":"according to Your great compassion,","poem":1},{"text":"blot out my transgressions.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Have mercy on me, O God, according to Your loving devotion; according to Your great compassion, blot out my transgressions.

contentJson: [{"text":"Wash me clean of my iniquity","poem":1},{"text":"and cleanse me from my sin.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Wash me clean of my iniquity and cleanse me from my sin.

contentJson: [{"text":"For I know my transgressions,","poem":1},{"text":"and my sin is always before me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For I know my transgressions, and my sin is always before me.

contentJson: [{"text":"Against You, You only, have I sinned","poem":1},{"text":"and done what is evil in Your sight,","poem":2},{"text":"so that You may be proved right when You speak","poem":1},{"text":"and blameless when You judge.","poem":2},{"noteId":116}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Against You, You only, have I sinned and done what is evil in Your sight, so that You may be proved right when You speak and blameless when You judge.

contentJson: [{"text":"Surely I was brought forth in iniquity;","poem":1},{"text":"I was sinful when my mother conceived me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Surely I was brought forth in iniquity; I was sinful when my mother conceived me.

contentJson: [{"text":"Surely You desire truth in the inmost being;","poem":1},{"text":"You teach me wisdom in the inmost place.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Surely You desire truth in the inmost being; You teach me wisdom in the inmost place.

contentJson: [{"text":"Purify me with hyssop, and I will be clean;","poem":1},{"text":"wash me, and I will be whiter than snow.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Purify me with hyssop, and I will be clean; wash me, and I will be whiter than snow.

contentJson: [{"text":"Let me hear joy and gladness;","poem":1},{"text":"let the bones You have crushed rejoice.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Let me hear joy and gladness; let the bones You have crushed rejoice.

contentJson: [{"text":"Hide Your face from my sins","poem":1},{"text":"and blot out all my iniquities.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Hide Your face from my sins and blot out all my iniquities.

contentJson: [{"text":"Create in me a clean heart, O God,","poem":1},{"text":"and renew a right spirit within me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Create in me a clean heart, O God, and renew a right spirit within me.

contentJson: [{"text":"Cast me not away from Your presence;","poem":1},{"text":"take not Your Holy Spirit from me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Cast me not away from Your presence; take not Your Holy Spirit from me.

contentJson: [{"text":"Restore to me the joy of Your salvation,","poem":1},{"text":"and sustain me with a willing spirit.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Restore to me the joy of Your salvation, and sustain me with a willing spirit.

contentJson: [{"text":"Then I will teach transgressors Your ways,","poem":1},{"text":"and sinners will return to You.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Then I will teach transgressors Your ways, and sinners will return to You.

contentJson: [{"text":"Deliver me from bloodguilt, O God,","poem":1},{"text":"the God of my salvation,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"and my tongue will sing of Your righteousness.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Deliver me from bloodguilt, O God, the God of my salvation, 
and my tongue will sing of Your righteousness.

contentJson: [{"text":"O Lord, open my lips,","poem":1},{"text":"and my mouth will declare Your praise.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: O Lord, open my lips, and my mouth will declare Your praise.

contentJson: [{"text":"For You do not delight in sacrifice, or I would bring it;","poem":1},{"text":"You take no pleasure in burnt offerings.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For You do not delight in sacrifice, or I would bring it; You take no pleasure in burnt offerings.

contentJson: [{"text":"The sacrifices of God are a broken spirit;","poem":1},{"text":"a broken and a contrite heart,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"O God, You will not despise.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
The sacrifices of God are a broken spirit; a broken and a contrite heart, 
O God, You will not despise.

contentJson: [{"text":"In Your good pleasure, cause Zion to prosper;","poem":1},{"text":"build up the walls of Jerusalem.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: In Your good pleasure, cause Zion to prosper; build up the walls of Jerusalem.

contentJson: [{"text":"Then You will delight in righteous sacrifices,","poem":1},{"text":"in whole burnt offerings;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"then bulls will be offered on Your altar.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Then You will delight in righteous sacrifices, in whole burnt offerings; 
then bulls will be offered on Your altar.

contentJson: [{"text":"Why do you boast of evil, O mighty man?","poem":1},{"text":"The loving devotion of God endures all day long.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Why do you boast of evil, O mighty man? The loving devotion of God endures all day long.

contentJson: [{"text":"Your tongue devises destruction","poem":1},{"text":"like a sharpened razor,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"O worker of deceit.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Your tongue devises destruction like a sharpened razor, 
O worker of deceit.

contentJson: [{"text":"You love evil more than good,","poem":1},{"text":"falsehood more than speaking truth.","poem":2},"Selah"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You love evil more than good, falsehood more than speaking truth. Selah

contentJson: [{"text":"You love every word that devours,","poem":1},{"text":"O deceitful tongue.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You love every word that devours, O deceitful tongue.

contentJson: [{"text":"Surely God will bring you down to everlasting ruin;","poem":1},{"text":"He will snatch you up and tear you away from your tent;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"He will uproot you from the land of the living.","poem":2},"Selah"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Surely God will bring you down to everlasting ruin; He will snatch you up and tear you away from your tent; 
He will uproot you from the land of the living. Selah

contentJson: [{"text":"The righteous will see and fear;","poem":1},{"text":"they will mock the evildoer, saying,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The righteous will see and fear; they will mock the evildoer, saying,

contentJson: [{"text":"“Look at the man","poem":1},{"text":"who did not make God his refuge,","poem":2},{"text":"but trusted in the abundance of his wealth","poem":1},{"text":"and strengthened himself by destruction.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: “Look at the man who did not make God his refuge, but trusted in the abundance of his wealth and strengthened himself by destruction.”

contentJson: [{"text":"But I am like an olive tree","poem":1},{"text":"flourishing in the house of God;","poem":2},{"text":"I trust in the loving devotion of God","poem":1},{"text":"forever and ever.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But I am like an olive tree flourishing in the house of God; I trust in the loving devotion of God forever and ever.

contentJson: [{"text":"I will praise You forever,","poem":1},{"text":"because You have done it.","poem":2},{"text":"I will wait on Your name—","poem":1},{"text":"for it is good—","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"in the presence of Your saints.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
I will praise You forever, because You have done it. I will wait on Your name— for it is good— 
in the presence of Your saints.

contentJson: [{"text":"The fool says in his heart,","poem":1},{"text":"“There is no God.”","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"They are corrupt; their ways are vile.","poem":1},{"text":"There is no one who does good.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
The fool says in his heart, “There is no God.” 
They are corrupt; their ways are vile. There is no one who does good.

contentJson: [{"text":"God looks down from heaven","poem":1},{"text":"upon the sons of men","poem":2},{"text":"to see if any understand,","poem":1},{"text":"if any seek God.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: God looks down from heaven upon the sons of men to see if any understand, if any seek God.

contentJson: [{"text":"All have turned away,","poem":1},{"text":"they have together become corrupt;","poem":2},{"noteId":120},{"text":"there is no one who does good,","poem":1},{"text":"not even one.","poem":2},{"noteId":121}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: All have turned away, they have together become corrupt; there is no one who does good, not even one.

contentJson: [{"text":"Will the workers of iniquity never learn?","poem":1},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"They devour my people like bread;","poem":1},{"text":"they refuse to call upon God.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Will the workers of iniquity never learn? 
They devour my people like bread; they refuse to call upon God.

contentJson: [{"text":"There they are, overwhelmed with dread,","poem":1},{"text":"where there was nothing to fear.","poem":2},{"text":"For God has scattered the bones","poem":1},{"text":"of those who besieged you.","poem":2},{"text":"You put them to shame,","poem":1},{"text":"for God has despised them.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: There they are, overwhelmed with dread, where there was nothing to fear. For God has scattered the bones of those who besieged you. You put them to shame, for God has despised them.

contentJson: [{"text":"Oh, that the salvation of Israel would come from Zion!","poem":1},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"When God restores His captive people,","poem":1},{"noteId":122},{"text":"let Jacob rejoice, let Israel be glad!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Oh, that the salvation of Israel would come from Zion! 
When God restores His captive people, let Jacob rejoice, let Israel be glad!

contentJson: [{"text":"Save me, O God, by Your name,","poem":1},{"text":"and vindicate me by Your might!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Save me, O God, by Your name, and vindicate me by Your might!

contentJson: [{"text":"Hear my prayer, O God;","poem":1},{"text":"listen to the words of my mouth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Hear my prayer, O God; listen to the words of my mouth.

contentJson: [{"text":"For strangers rise up against me,","poem":1},{"text":"and ruthless men seek my life—","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"men with no regard for God.","poem":2},"Selah"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
For strangers rise up against me, and ruthless men seek my life— 
men with no regard for God. Selah

contentJson: [{"text":"Surely God is my helper;","poem":1},{"text":"the Lord is the sustainer of my soul.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Surely God is my helper; the Lord is the sustainer of my soul.

contentJson: [{"text":"He will reward my enemies with evil.","poem":1},{"text":"In Your faithfulness, destroy them.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He will reward my enemies with evil. In Your faithfulness, destroy them.

contentJson: [{"text":"Freely I will sacrifice to You;","poem":1},{"text":"I will praise Your name, O LORD, for it is good.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Freely I will sacrifice to You; I will praise Your name, O LORD, for it is good.

contentJson: [{"text":"For He has delivered me from every trouble,","poem":1},{"text":"and my eyes have stared down my foes.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For He has delivered me from every trouble, and my eyes have stared down my foes.

contentJson: [{"text":"Listen to my prayer, O God,","poem":1},{"text":"and do not ignore my plea.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Listen to my prayer, O God, and do not ignore my plea.

contentJson: [{"text":"Attend to me and answer me.","poem":1},{"text":"I am restless in my complaint,","poem":2},{"text":"and distraught","poem":1}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Attend to me and answer me. I am restless in my complaint, and distraught

contentJson: [{"text":"at the voice of the enemy,","poem":1},{"text":"at the pressure of the wicked.","poem":2},{"text":"For they release disaster upon me","poem":1},{"text":"and revile me in their anger.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: at the voice of the enemy, at the pressure of the wicked. For they release disaster upon me and revile me in their anger.

contentJson: [{"text":"My heart murmurs within me,","poem":1},{"text":"and the terrors of death assail me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: My heart murmurs within me, and the terrors of death assail me.

contentJson: [{"text":"Fear and trembling grip me,","poem":1},{"text":"and horror has overwhelmed me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Fear and trembling grip me, and horror has overwhelmed me.

contentJson: [{"text":"I said, “Oh, that I had wings like a dove!","poem":1},{"text":"I would fly away and find rest.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I said, “Oh, that I had wings like a dove! I would fly away and find rest.

contentJson: [{"text":"How far away I would flee!","poem":1},{"text":"In the wilderness I would remain.","poem":2},"Selah"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: How far away I would flee! In the wilderness I would remain. Selah

contentJson: [{"text":"I would hurry to my shelter,","poem":1},{"text":"far from this raging tempest.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I would hurry to my shelter, far from this raging tempest.”

contentJson: [{"text":"O Lord, confuse and confound their speech,","poem":1},{"text":"for I see violence and strife in the city.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: O Lord, confuse and confound their speech, for I see violence and strife in the city.

contentJson: [{"text":"Day and night they encircle the walls,","poem":1},{"text":"while malice and trouble lie within.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Day and night they encircle the walls, while malice and trouble lie within.

contentJson: [{"text":"Destruction is within;","poem":1},{"text":"oppression and deceit never leave the streets.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Destruction is within; oppression and deceit never leave the streets.

contentJson: [{"text":"For it is not an enemy who insults me;","poem":1},{"text":"that I could endure.","poem":2},{"text":"It is not a foe who rises against me;","poem":1},{"text":"from him I could hide.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For it is not an enemy who insults me; that I could endure. It is not a foe who rises against me; from him I could hide.

contentJson: [{"text":"But it is you, a man like myself,","poem":1},{"text":"my companion and close friend.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But it is you, a man like myself, my companion and close friend.

contentJson: [{"text":"We shared sweet fellowship together;","poem":1},{"text":"we walked with the crowd into the house of God.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: We shared sweet fellowship together; we walked with the crowd into the house of God.

contentJson: [{"text":"Let death seize them by surprise;","poem":1},{"text":"let them go down to Sheol alive,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"for evil is with them in their homes.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Let death seize them by surprise; let them go down to Sheol alive, 
for evil is with them in their homes.

contentJson: [{"text":"But I call to God,","poem":1},{"text":"and the LORD saves me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But I call to God, and the LORD saves me.

contentJson: [{"text":"Morning, noon, and night, I cry out in distress,","poem":1},{"text":"and He hears my voice.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Morning, noon, and night, I cry out in distress, and He hears my voice.

contentJson: [{"text":"He redeems my soul in peace","poem":1},{"text":"from the battle waged against me,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"even though many oppose me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
He redeems my soul in peace from the battle waged against me, 
even though many oppose me.

contentJson: [{"text":"God will hear and humiliate them—","poem":1},{"text":"the One enthroned for the ages—","poem":2},"Selah",{"text":"because they do not change","poem":1},{"text":"and they have no fear of God.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: God will hear and humiliate them— the One enthroned for the ages— Selah because they do not change and they have no fear of God.

contentJson: [{"text":"My companion attacks his friends;","poem":1},{"text":"he violates his covenant.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: My companion attacks his friends; he violates his covenant.

contentJson: [{"text":"His speech is smooth as butter,","poem":1},{"text":"but war is in his heart.","poem":2},{"text":"His words are softer than oil,","poem":1},{"text":"yet they are swords unsheathed.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: His speech is smooth as butter, but war is in his heart. His words are softer than oil, yet they are swords unsheathed.

contentJson: [{"text":"Cast your burden upon the LORD","poem":1},{"text":"and He will sustain you;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"He will never let the righteous be shaken.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Cast your burden upon the LORD and He will sustain you; 
He will never let the righteous be shaken.

contentJson: [{"text":"But You, O God, will bring them down","poem":1},{"text":"to the Pit of destruction;","poem":2},{"text":"men of bloodshed and deceit","poem":1},{"text":"will not live out half their days.","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"But I will trust in You.","poem":1}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
But You, O God, will bring them down to the Pit of destruction; men of bloodshed and deceit will not live out half their days. 
But I will trust in You.

contentJson: [{"text":"Be merciful to me, O God,","poem":1},{"text":"for men are hounding me;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"all day they press their attack.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Be merciful to me, O God, for men are hounding me; 
all day they press their attack.

contentJson: [{"text":"My enemies pursue me all day long,","poem":1},{"text":"for many proudly assail me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: My enemies pursue me all day long, for many proudly assail me.

contentJson: [{"text":"When I am afraid,","poem":1},{"text":"I put my trust in You.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: When I am afraid, I put my trust in You.

contentJson: [{"text":"In God, whose word I praise—","poem":1},{"text":"in God I trust.","poem":2},{"text":"I will not be afraid.","poem":1},{"text":"What can man do to me?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: In God, whose word I praise— in God I trust. I will not be afraid. What can man do to me?

contentJson: [{"text":"All day long they twist my words;","poem":1},{"text":"all their thoughts are on my demise.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: All day long they twist my words; all their thoughts are on my demise.

contentJson: [{"text":"They conspire, they lurk,","poem":1},{"text":"they watch my steps","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"while they wait to take my life.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
They conspire, they lurk, they watch my steps 
while they wait to take my life.

contentJson: [{"text":"In spite of such sin, will they escape?","poem":1},{"noteId":126},{"text":"In Your anger, O God, cast down the nations.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: In spite of such sin, will they escape? In Your anger, O God, cast down the nations.

contentJson: [{"text":"You have taken account of my wanderings.","poem":1},{"noteId":127},{"text":"Put my tears in Your bottle—","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"are they not in Your book?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
You have taken account of my wanderings. Put my tears in Your bottle— 
are they not in Your book?

contentJson: [{"text":"Then my enemies will retreat","poem":1},{"text":"on the day I cry for help.","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"By this I will know that God is on my side.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Then my enemies will retreat on the day I cry for help. 
By this I will know that God is on my side.

contentJson: [{"text":"In God, whose word I praise,","poem":1},{"text":"in the LORD, whose word I praise,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: In God, whose word I praise, in the LORD, whose word I praise,

contentJson: [{"text":"in God I trust; I will not be afraid.","poem":1},{"text":"What can man do to me?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: in God I trust; I will not be afraid. What can man do to me?

contentJson: [{"text":"Your vows are upon me, O God;","poem":1},{"text":"I will render thank offerings to You.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Your vows are upon me, O God; I will render thank offerings to You.

contentJson: [{"text":"For You have delivered my soul from death,","poem":1},{"text":"and my feet from stumbling,","poem":2},{"text":"that I may walk before God","poem":1},{"text":"in the light of life.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For You have delivered my soul from death, and my feet from stumbling, that I may walk before God in the light of life.

contentJson: [{"text":"Have mercy on me, O God, have mercy,","poem":1},{"text":"for in You my soul takes refuge.","poem":2},{"text":"In the shadow of Your wings I will take shelter","poem":1},{"text":"until the danger has passed.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Have mercy on me, O God, have mercy, for in You my soul takes refuge. In the shadow of Your wings I will take shelter until the danger has passed.

contentJson: [{"text":"I cry out to God Most High,","poem":1},{"noteId":129},{"text":"to God who fulfills His purpose for me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I cry out to God Most High, to God who fulfills His purpose for me.

contentJson: [{"text":"He reaches down from heaven and saves me;","poem":1},{"text":"He rebukes those who trample me.","poem":2},"Selah",{"text":"God sends forth","poem":1},{"text":"His loving devotion and His truth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He reaches down from heaven and saves me; He rebukes those who trample me. Selah God sends forth His loving devotion and His truth.

contentJson: [{"text":"My soul is among the lions;","poem":1},{"text":"I lie down with ravenous beasts—","poem":2},{"text":"with men whose teeth are spears and arrows,","poem":1},{"text":"whose tongues are sharp swords.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: My soul is among the lions; I lie down with ravenous beasts— with men whose teeth are spears and arrows, whose tongues are sharp swords.

contentJson: [{"text":"Be exalted, O God, above the heavens;","poem":1},{"text":"may Your glory cover all the earth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Be exalted, O God, above the heavens; may Your glory cover all the earth.

contentJson: [{"text":"They spread a net for my feet;","poem":1},{"text":"my soul was despondent.","poem":2},{"text":"They dug a pit before me,","poem":1},{"text":"but they themselves have fallen into it!","poem":2},"Selah"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They spread a net for my feet; my soul was despondent. They dug a pit before me, but they themselves have fallen into it! Selah

contentJson: [{"text":"My heart is steadfast, O God, my heart is steadfast.","poem":1},{"text":"I will sing and make music.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: My heart is steadfast, O God, my heart is steadfast. I will sing and make music.

contentJson: [{"text":"Awake, my glory!","poem":1},{"noteId":130},{"text":"Awake, O harp and lyre!","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"I will awaken the dawn.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Awake, my glory! Awake, O harp and lyre! 
I will awaken the dawn.

contentJson: [{"text":"I will praise You, O Lord, among the nations;","poem":1},{"text":"I will sing Your praises among the peoples.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I will praise You, O Lord, among the nations; I will sing Your praises among the peoples.

contentJson: [{"text":"For Your loving devotion reaches to the heavens,","poem":1},{"text":"and Your faithfulness to the clouds.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For Your loving devotion reaches to the heavens, and Your faithfulness to the clouds.

contentJson: [{"text":"Be exalted, O God, above the heavens;","poem":1},{"text":"may Your glory cover all the earth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Be exalted, O God, above the heavens; may Your glory cover all the earth.

contentJson: [{"text":"Do you indeed speak justly, O rulers?","poem":1},{"text":"Do you judge uprightly, O sons of men?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Do you indeed speak justly, O rulers? Do you judge uprightly, O sons of men?

contentJson: [{"text":"No, in your hearts you devise injustice;","poem":1},{"text":"with your hands you mete out violence on the earth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: No, in your hearts you devise injustice; with your hands you mete out violence on the earth.

contentJson: [{"text":"The wicked are estranged from the womb;","poem":1},{"text":"the liars go astray from birth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The wicked are estranged from the womb; the liars go astray from birth.

contentJson: [{"text":"Their venom is like the venom of a snake,","poem":1},{"text":"like a cobra that shuts its ears,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Their venom is like the venom of a snake, like a cobra that shuts its ears,

contentJson: [{"text":"refusing to hear the tune of the charmer","poem":1},{"text":"who skillfully weaves his spell.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: refusing to hear the tune of the charmer who skillfully weaves his spell.

contentJson: [{"text":"O God, shatter their teeth in their mouths;","poem":1},{"text":"O LORD, tear out the fangs of the lions.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: O God, shatter their teeth in their mouths; O LORD, tear out the fangs of the lions.

contentJson: [{"text":"May they vanish","poem":1},{"text":"like water that runs off;","poem":2},{"text":"when they draw the bow,","poem":1},{"text":"may their arrows be blunted.","poem":2},{"noteId":132}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May they vanish like water that runs off; when they draw the bow, may their arrows be blunted.

contentJson: [{"text":"Like a slug that dissolves in its slime,","poem":1},{"text":"like a woman’s stillborn child,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"may they never see the sun.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
