Like a slug that dissolves in its slime, like a woman’s stillborn child, 
may they never see the sun.

contentJson: [{"text":"Before your pots can feel the burning thorns—","poem":1},{"text":"whether green or dry—","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"He will sweep them away.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Before your pots can feel the burning thorns— whether green or dry— 
He will sweep them away.

contentJson: [{"text":"The righteous will rejoice","poem":1},{"text":"when they see they are avenged;","poem":2},{"text":"they will wash their feet","poem":1},{"text":"in the blood of the wicked.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The righteous will rejoice when they see they are avenged; they will wash their feet in the blood of the wicked.

contentJson: [{"text":"Then men will say,","poem":1},{"text":"“There is surely a reward for the righteous!","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"There is surely a God who judges the earth!”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Then men will say, “There is surely a reward for the righteous! 
There is surely a God who judges the earth!”

contentJson: [{"text":"Deliver me from my enemies, O my God;","poem":1},{"text":"protect me from those who rise against me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Deliver me from my enemies, O my God; protect me from those who rise against me.

contentJson: [{"text":"Deliver me from workers of iniquity,","poem":1},{"text":"and save me from men of bloodshed.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Deliver me from workers of iniquity, and save me from men of bloodshed.

contentJson: [{"text":"See how they lie in wait for me.","poem":1},{"text":"Fierce men conspire against me","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"for no transgression or sin of my own, O LORD.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
See how they lie in wait for me. Fierce men conspire against me 
for no transgression or sin of my own, O LORD.

contentJson: [{"text":"For no fault of my own,","poem":1},{"text":"they move swiftly to attack me.","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"Arise to help me, and take notice.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
For no fault of my own, they move swiftly to attack me. 
Arise to help me, and take notice.

contentJson: [{"text":"O LORD God of Hosts, the God of Israel,","poem":1},{"text":"rouse Yourself to punish all the nations;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"show no mercy to the wicked traitors.","poem":2},"Selah"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
O LORD God of Hosts, the God of Israel, rouse Yourself to punish all the nations; 
show no mercy to the wicked traitors. Selah

contentJson: [{"text":"They return in the evening, snarling like dogs","poem":1},{"text":"and prowling around the city.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They return in the evening, snarling like dogs and prowling around the city.

contentJson: [{"text":"See what they spew from their mouths—","poem":1},{"text":"sharp words from their lips:","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"“For who can hear us?”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
See what they spew from their mouths— sharp words from their lips: 
“For who can hear us?”

contentJson: [{"text":"But You, O LORD, laugh at them;","poem":1},{"text":"You scoff at all the nations.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But You, O LORD, laugh at them; You scoff at all the nations.

contentJson: [{"text":"I will keep watch for You, O my strength,","poem":1},{"text":"because You, O God, are my fortress.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I will keep watch for You, O my strength, because You, O God, are my fortress.

contentJson: [{"text":"My God of loving devotion will come to meet me;","poem":1},{"text":"God will let me stare down my foes.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: My God of loving devotion will come to meet me; God will let me stare down my foes.

contentJson: [{"text":"Do not kill them,","poem":1},{"text":"or my people will forget.","poem":2},{"text":"Scatter them by Your power,","poem":1},{"text":"and bring them down,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"O Lord, our shield.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Do not kill them, or my people will forget. Scatter them by Your power, and bring them down, 
O Lord, our shield.

contentJson: [{"text":"By the sins of their mouths","poem":1},{"text":"and the words of their lips,","poem":2},{"text":"let them be trapped in their pride,","poem":1},{"text":"in the curses and lies they utter.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: By the sins of their mouths and the words of their lips, let them be trapped in their pride, in the curses and lies they utter.

contentJson: [{"text":"Consume them in wrath;","poem":1},{"text":"consume them till they are no more,","poem":2},{"text":"so it may be known to the ends of the earth","poem":1},{"text":"that God rules over Jacob.","poem":2},"Selah"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Consume them in wrath; consume them till they are no more, so it may be known to the ends of the earth that God rules over Jacob. Selah

contentJson: [{"text":"They return in the evening,","poem":1},{"text":"snarling like dogs","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"and prowling around the city.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
They return in the evening, snarling like dogs 
and prowling around the city.

contentJson: [{"text":"They scavenge for food,","poem":1},{"text":"and growl if they are not satisfied.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They scavenge for food, and growl if they are not satisfied.

contentJson: [{"text":"But I will sing of Your strength","poem":1},{"text":"and proclaim Your loving devotion in the morning.","poem":2},{"text":"For You are my fortress,","poem":1},{"text":"my refuge in times of trouble.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But I will sing of Your strength and proclaim Your loving devotion in the morning. For You are my fortress, my refuge in times of trouble.

contentJson: [{"text":"To You, O my strength, I sing praises,","poem":1},{"text":"for You, O God, are my fortress,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"my God of loving devotion.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
To You, O my strength, I sing praises, for You, O God, are my fortress, 
my God of loving devotion.

contentJson: [{"text":"You have rejected us, O God;","poem":1},{"text":"You have broken us;","poem":2},{"text":"You have been angry;","poem":1},{"text":"restore us!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You have rejected us, O God; You have broken us; You have been angry; restore us!

contentJson: [{"text":"You have shaken the land","poem":1},{"text":"and torn it open.","poem":2},{"text":"Heal its fractures,","poem":1},{"text":"for it is quaking.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You have shaken the land and torn it open. Heal its fractures, for it is quaking.

contentJson: [{"text":"You have shown Your people hardship;","poem":1},{"text":"we are staggered from the wine You made us drink.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You have shown Your people hardship; we are staggered from the wine You made us drink.

contentJson: [{"text":"You have raised a banner for those who fear You,","poem":1},{"text":"that they may flee the bow.","poem":2},{"noteId":137},"Selah"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You have raised a banner for those who fear You, that they may flee the bow. Selah

contentJson: [{"text":"Respond and save us with Your right hand,","poem":1},{"text":"that Your beloved may be delivered.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Respond and save us with Your right hand, that Your beloved may be delivered.

contentJson: [{"text":"God has spoken from His sanctuary:","poem":1},{"noteId":138},{"text":"“I will triumph!","poem":2},{"text":"I will parcel out Shechem","poem":1},{"text":"and apportion the Valley of Succoth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: God has spoken from His sanctuary: “I will triumph! I will parcel out Shechem and apportion the Valley of Succoth.

contentJson: [{"text":"Gilead is Mine, and Manasseh is Mine;","poem":1},{"text":"Ephraim is My helmet, Judah is My scepter.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Gilead is Mine, and Manasseh is Mine; Ephraim is My helmet, Judah is My scepter.

contentJson: [{"text":"Moab is My washbasin;","poem":1},{"text":"upon Edom I toss My sandal;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"over Philistia I shout in triumph.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Moab is My washbasin; upon Edom I toss My sandal; 
over Philistia I shout in triumph.”

contentJson: [{"text":"Who will bring me to the fortified city?","poem":1},{"text":"Who will lead me to Edom?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Who will bring me to the fortified city? Who will lead me to Edom?

contentJson: [{"text":"Have You not rejected us, O God?","poem":1},{"text":"Will You no longer march out, O God, with our armies?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Have You not rejected us, O God? Will You no longer march out, O God, with our armies?

contentJson: [{"text":"Give us aid against the enemy,","poem":1},{"text":"for the help of man is worthless.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Give us aid against the enemy, for the help of man is worthless.

contentJson: [{"text":"With God we will perform with valor,","poem":1},{"text":"and He will trample our enemies.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: With God we will perform with valor, and He will trample our enemies.

contentJson: [{"text":"Hear my cry, O God;","poem":1},{"text":"attend to my prayer.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Hear my cry, O God; attend to my prayer.

contentJson: [{"text":"From the ends of the earth I call out to You","poem":1},{"text":"whenever my heart is faint.","poem":2},{"text":"Lead me to the rock","poem":1},{"text":"that is higher than I.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: From the ends of the earth I call out to You whenever my heart is faint. Lead me to the rock that is higher than I.

contentJson: [{"text":"For You have been my refuge,","poem":1},{"text":"a tower of strength against the enemy.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For You have been my refuge, a tower of strength against the enemy.

contentJson: [{"text":"Let me dwell in Your tent forever","poem":1},{"text":"and take refuge in the shelter of Your wings.","poem":2},"Selah"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Let me dwell in Your tent forever and take refuge in the shelter of Your wings. Selah

contentJson: [{"text":"For You have heard my vows, O God;","poem":1},{"text":"You have given me the inheritance","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"reserved for those who fear Your name.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
For You have heard my vows, O God; You have given me the inheritance 
reserved for those who fear Your name.

contentJson: [{"text":"Increase the days of the king’s life;","poem":1},{"text":"may his years span many generations.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Increase the days of the king’s life; may his years span many generations.

contentJson: [{"text":"May he sit enthroned in God’s presence forever;","poem":1},{"text":"appoint Your loving devotion","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"and Your faithfulness to guard him.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
May he sit enthroned in God’s presence forever; appoint Your loving devotion 
and Your faithfulness to guard him.

contentJson: [{"text":"Then I will ever sing praise to Your name","poem":1},{"text":"and fulfill my vows day by day.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Then I will ever sing praise to Your name and fulfill my vows day by day.

contentJson: [{"text":"In God alone my soul finds rest;","poem":1},{"text":"my salvation comes from Him.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: In God alone my soul finds rest; my salvation comes from Him.

contentJson: [{"text":"He alone is my rock and my salvation.","poem":1},{"text":"He is my fortress;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"I will never be shaken.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
He alone is my rock and my salvation. He is my fortress; 
I will never be shaken.

contentJson: [{"text":"How long will you threaten a man?","poem":1},{"text":"Will all of you throw him down","poem":2},{"text":"like a leaning wall","poem":1},{"text":"or a tottering fence?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: How long will you threaten a man? Will all of you throw him down like a leaning wall or a tottering fence?

contentJson: [{"text":"They fully intend to cast him down from his lofty perch;","poem":1},{"text":"they delight in lies;","poem":2},{"text":"with their mouths they bless,","poem":1},{"text":"but inwardly they curse.","poem":2},"Selah"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They fully intend to cast him down from his lofty perch; they delight in lies; with their mouths they bless, but inwardly they curse. Selah

contentJson: [{"text":"Rest in God alone, O my soul,","poem":1},{"text":"for my hope comes from Him.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Rest in God alone, O my soul, for my hope comes from Him.

contentJson: [{"text":"He alone is my rock and my salvation;","poem":1},{"text":"He is my fortress; I will not be shaken.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He alone is my rock and my salvation; He is my fortress; I will not be shaken.

contentJson: [{"text":"My salvation and my honor rest on God, my strong rock;","poem":1},{"text":"my refuge is in God.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: My salvation and my honor rest on God, my strong rock; my refuge is in God.

contentJson: [{"text":"Trust in Him at all times, O people;","poem":1},{"text":"pour out your hearts before Him.","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"God is our refuge.","poem":2},"Selah"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Trust in Him at all times, O people; pour out your hearts before Him. 
God is our refuge. Selah

contentJson: [{"text":"Lowborn men are but a vapor,","poem":1},{"text":"the exalted but a lie.","poem":2},{"text":"Weighed on the scale, they go up;","poem":1},{"text":"together they are but a vapor.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Lowborn men are but a vapor, the exalted but a lie. Weighed on the scale, they go up; together they are but a vapor.

contentJson: [{"text":"Place no trust in extortion,","poem":1},{"text":"or false hope in stolen goods.","poem":2},{"text":"If your riches increase,","poem":1},{"text":"do not set your heart upon them.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Place no trust in extortion, or false hope in stolen goods. If your riches increase, do not set your heart upon them.

contentJson: [{"text":"God has spoken once;","poem":1},{"text":"I have heard this twice:","poem":2},{"text":"that power belongs to God,","poem":1}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: God has spoken once; I have heard this twice: that power belongs to God,

contentJson: [{"text":"and loving devotion to You, O Lord.","poem":2},{"text":"For You will repay each man","poem":1},{"text":"according to his deeds.","poem":2},{"noteId":139}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: and loving devotion to You, O Lord. For You will repay each man according to his deeds.

contentJson: [{"text":"O God, You are my God.","poem":1},{"text":"Earnestly I seek You;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"my soul thirsts for You.","poem":2},{"text":"My body yearns for You","poem":1},{"text":"in a dry and weary land without water.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
O God, You are my God. Earnestly I seek You; 
my soul thirsts for You. My body yearns for You in a dry and weary land without water.

contentJson: [{"text":"So I have seen You in the sanctuary","poem":1},{"text":"and beheld Your power and glory.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: So I have seen You in the sanctuary and beheld Your power and glory.

contentJson: [{"text":"Because Your loving devotion is better than life,","poem":1},{"text":"my lips will glorify You.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Because Your loving devotion is better than life, my lips will glorify You.

contentJson: [{"text":"So I will bless You as long as I live;","poem":1},{"text":"in Your name I will lift my hands.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: So I will bless You as long as I live; in Your name I will lift my hands.

contentJson: [{"text":"My soul is satisfied as with the richest of foods;","poem":1},{"text":"with joyful lips my mouth will praise You.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: My soul is satisfied as with the richest of foods; with joyful lips my mouth will praise You.

contentJson: [{"text":"When I remember You on my bed,","poem":1},{"text":"I think of You through the watches of the night.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: When I remember You on my bed, I think of You through the watches of the night.

contentJson: [{"text":"For You are my help;","poem":1},{"text":"I will sing for joy in the shadow of Your wings.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For You are my help; I will sing for joy in the shadow of Your wings.

contentJson: [{"text":"My soul clings to You;","poem":1},{"text":"Your right hand upholds me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: My soul clings to You; Your right hand upholds me.

contentJson: [{"text":"But those who seek my life to destroy it","poem":1},{"text":"will go into the depths of the earth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But those who seek my life to destroy it will go into the depths of the earth.

contentJson: [{"text":"They will fall to the power of the sword;","poem":1},{"text":"they will become a portion for foxes.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They will fall to the power of the sword; they will become a portion for foxes.

contentJson: [{"text":"But the king will rejoice in God;","poem":1},{"text":"all who swear by Him will exult,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"for the mouths of liars will be shut.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
But the king will rejoice in God; all who swear by Him will exult, 
for the mouths of liars will be shut.

contentJson: [{"text":"Hear, O God, my voice of complaint;","poem":1},{"text":"preserve my life from dread of the enemy.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Hear, O God, my voice of complaint; preserve my life from dread of the enemy.

contentJson: [{"text":"Hide me from the scheming of the wicked,","poem":1},{"text":"from the mob of workers of iniquity,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Hide me from the scheming of the wicked, from the mob of workers of iniquity,

contentJson: [{"text":"who sharpen their tongues like swords","poem":1},{"text":"and aim their bitter words like arrows,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: who sharpen their tongues like swords and aim their bitter words like arrows,

contentJson: [{"text":"ambushing the innocent in seclusion,","poem":1},{"text":"shooting suddenly, without fear.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: ambushing the innocent in seclusion, shooting suddenly, without fear.

contentJson: [{"text":"They hold fast to their evil purpose;","poem":1},{"text":"they speak of hiding their snares.","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"“Who will see them?” they say.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
They hold fast to their evil purpose; they speak of hiding their snares. 
“Who will see them?” they say.

contentJson: [{"text":"They devise injustice and say,","poem":1},{"text":"“We have perfected a secret plan.”","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"For the inner man and the heart are mysterious.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
They devise injustice and say, “We have perfected a secret plan.” 
For the inner man and the heart are mysterious.

contentJson: [{"text":"But God will shoot them with arrows;","poem":1},{"text":"suddenly they will be wounded.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But God will shoot them with arrows; suddenly they will be wounded.

contentJson: [{"text":"They will be made to stumble,","poem":1},{"text":"their own tongues turned against them.","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"All who see will shake their heads.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
They will be made to stumble, their own tongues turned against them. 
All who see will shake their heads.

contentJson: [{"text":"Then all mankind will fear","poem":1},{"text":"and proclaim the work of God;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"so they will ponder what He has done.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Then all mankind will fear and proclaim the work of God; 
so they will ponder what He has done.

contentJson: [{"text":"Let the righteous rejoice in the LORD","poem":1},{"text":"and take refuge in Him;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"let all the upright in heart exult.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Let the righteous rejoice in the LORD and take refuge in Him; 
let all the upright in heart exult.

contentJson: [{"text":"Praise awaits You, O God, in Zion;","poem":1},{"text":"to You our vows will be fulfilled.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Praise awaits You, O God, in Zion; to You our vows will be fulfilled.

contentJson: [{"text":"O You who listen to prayer,","poem":1},{"text":"all people will come to You.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: O You who listen to prayer, all people will come to You.

contentJson: [{"text":"When iniquities prevail against me,","poem":1},{"text":"You atone for our transgressions.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: When iniquities prevail against me, You atone for our transgressions.

contentJson: [{"text":"Blessed is the one You choose","poem":1},{"text":"and bring near to dwell in Your courts!","poem":2},{"text":"We are filled with the goodness of Your house,","poem":1},{"text":"the holiness of Your temple.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Blessed is the one You choose and bring near to dwell in Your courts! We are filled with the goodness of Your house, the holiness of Your temple.

contentJson: [{"text":"With awesome deeds of righteousness You answer us,","poem":1},{"text":"O God of our salvation,","poem":2},{"text":"the hope of all the ends of the earth","poem":1},{"text":"and of the farthest seas.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: With awesome deeds of righteousness You answer us, O God of our salvation, the hope of all the ends of the earth and of the farthest seas.

contentJson: [{"text":"You formed the mountains by Your power,","poem":1},{"text":"having girded Yourself with might.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You formed the mountains by Your power, having girded Yourself with might.

contentJson: [{"text":"You stilled the roaring of the seas,","poem":1},{"text":"the pounding of their waves,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"and the tumult of the nations.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
You stilled the roaring of the seas, the pounding of their waves, 
and the tumult of the nations.

contentJson: [{"text":"Those who live far away fear Your wonders;","poem":1},{"text":"You make the dawn and sunset shout for joy.","poem":2},{"noteId":140}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Those who live far away fear Your wonders; You make the dawn and sunset shout for joy.

contentJson: [{"text":"You attend to the earth and water it;","poem":1},{"noteId":141},{"text":"with abundance You enrich it.","poem":2},{"text":"The streams of God are full of water,","poem":1},{"text":"for You prepare our grain","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"by providing for the earth.","poem":2},{"noteId":142}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
You attend to the earth and water it; with abundance You enrich it. The streams of God are full of water, for You prepare our grain 
by providing for the earth.

contentJson: [{"text":"You soak its furrows and level its ridges;","poem":1},{"text":"You soften it with showers and bless its growth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You soak its furrows and level its ridges; You soften it with showers and bless its growth.

contentJson: [{"text":"You crown the year with Your bounty,","poem":1},{"text":"and Your paths overflow with plenty.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You crown the year with Your bounty, and Your paths overflow with plenty.

contentJson: [{"text":"The pastures of the wilderness overflow;","poem":1},{"text":"the hills are robed with joy.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The pastures of the wilderness overflow; the hills are robed with joy.

contentJson: [{"text":"The pastures are clothed with flocks,","poem":1},{"text":"and the valleys are decked with grain.","poem":2},{"text":"They shout in triumph;","poem":1},{"text":"indeed, they sing.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The pastures are clothed with flocks, and the valleys are decked with grain. They shout in triumph; indeed, they sing.

contentJson: [{"text":"Make a joyful noise to God,","poem":1},{"text":"all the earth!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Make a joyful noise to God, all the earth!

contentJson: [{"text":"Sing the glory of His name;","poem":1},{"text":"make His praise glorious.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Sing the glory of His name; make His praise glorious.

contentJson: [{"text":"Say to God, “How awesome are Your deeds!","poem":1},{"text":"So great is Your power","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"that Your enemies cower before You.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Say to God, “How awesome are Your deeds! So great is Your power 
that Your enemies cower before You.

contentJson: [{"text":"All the earth bows down to You;","poem":1},{"text":"they sing praise to You;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"they sing praise to Your name.”","poem":2},"Selah"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
All the earth bows down to You; they sing praise to You; 
they sing praise to Your name.” Selah

contentJson: [{"text":"Come and see the works of God;","poem":1},{"text":"how awesome are His deeds toward mankind.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Come and see the works of God; how awesome are His deeds toward mankind.

contentJson: [{"text":"He turned the sea into dry land;","poem":1},{"text":"they passed through the waters on foot;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"there we rejoiced in Him.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
He turned the sea into dry land; they passed through the waters on foot; 
there we rejoiced in Him.

contentJson: [{"text":"He rules forever by His power;","poem":1},{"text":"His eyes watch the nations.","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"Do not let the rebellious exalt themselves.","poem":2},"Selah"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
He rules forever by His power; His eyes watch the nations. 
Do not let the rebellious exalt themselves. Selah

contentJson: [{"text":"Bless our God, O peoples;","poem":1},{"text":"let the sound of His praise be heard.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Bless our God, O peoples; let the sound of His praise be heard.

contentJson: [{"text":"He preserves our lives","poem":1},{"text":"and keeps our feet from slipping.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He preserves our lives and keeps our feet from slipping.

contentJson: [{"text":"For You, O God, have tested us;","poem":1},{"text":"You have refined us like silver.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For You, O God, have tested us; You have refined us like silver.

contentJson: [{"text":"You led us into the net;","poem":1},{"text":"You laid burdens on our backs.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You led us into the net; You laid burdens on our backs.

contentJson: [{"text":"You let men ride over our heads;","poem":1},{"text":"we went through fire and water,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"but You brought us into abundance.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
You let men ride over our heads; we went through fire and water, 
but You brought us into abundance.

contentJson: [{"text":"I will enter Your house with burnt offerings;","poem":1},{"text":"I will fulfill my vows to You—","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I will enter Your house with burnt offerings; I will fulfill my vows to You—

contentJson: [{"text":"the vows that my lips promised","poem":1},{"text":"and my mouth spoke in my distress.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: the vows that my lips promised and my mouth spoke in my distress.

contentJson: [{"text":"I will offer You fatlings as burnt offerings,","poem":1},{"text":"with the fragrant smoke of rams;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"I will offer bulls and goats.","poem":2},"Selah"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
I will offer You fatlings as burnt offerings, with the fragrant smoke of rams; 
I will offer bulls and goats. Selah

contentJson: [{"text":"Come and listen, all you who fear God,","poem":1},{"text":"and I will declare what He has done for me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Come and listen, all you who fear God, and I will declare what He has done for me.

contentJson: [{"text":"I cried out to Him with my mouth","poem":1},{"text":"and praised Him with my tongue.","poem":2},{"noteId":143}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I cried out to Him with my mouth and praised Him with my tongue.

contentJson: [{"text":"If I had cherished iniquity in my heart,","poem":1},{"text":"the Lord would not have listened.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: If I had cherished iniquity in my heart, the Lord would not have listened.

contentJson: [{"text":"But God has surely heard;","poem":1},{"text":"He has attended to the sound of my prayer.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But God has surely heard; He has attended to the sound of my prayer.

contentJson: [{"text":"Blessed be God, who has not rejected my prayer","poem":1},{"text":"or withheld from me His loving devotion!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Blessed be God, who has not rejected my prayer or withheld from me His loving devotion!

contentJson: [{"text":"May God be gracious to us and bless us,","poem":1},{"text":"and cause His face to shine upon us,","poem":2},"Selah"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May God be gracious to us and bless us, and cause His face to shine upon us, Selah

contentJson: [{"text":"that Your ways may be known on earth,","poem":1},{"text":"Your salvation among all nations.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: that Your ways may be known on earth, Your salvation among all nations.

contentJson: [{"text":"Let the peoples praise You, O God;","poem":1},{"text":"let all the peoples praise You.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Let the peoples praise You, O God; let all the peoples praise You.

contentJson: [{"text":"Let the nations be glad and sing for joy,","poem":1},{"text":"for You judge the peoples justly","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"and lead the nations of the earth.","poem":2},"Selah"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Let the nations be glad and sing for joy, for You judge the peoples justly 
and lead the nations of the earth. Selah

contentJson: [{"text":"Let the peoples praise You, O God;","poem":1},{"text":"let all the peoples praise You.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Let the peoples praise You, O God; let all the peoples praise You.

contentJson: [{"text":"The earth has yielded its harvest;","poem":1},{"text":"God, our God, blesses us.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The earth has yielded its harvest; God, our God, blesses us.

contentJson: [{"text":"God blesses us,","poem":1},{"text":"that all the ends of the earth shall fear Him.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: God blesses us, that all the ends of the earth shall fear Him.

contentJson: [{"text":"God arises. His enemies are scattered,","poem":1},{"text":"and those who hate Him flee His presence.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: God arises. His enemies are scattered, and those who hate Him flee His presence.

contentJson: [{"text":"As smoke is blown away,","poem":1},{"text":"You will drive them out;","poem":2},{"text":"as wax melts before the fire,","poem":1},{"text":"the wicked will perish in the presence of God.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: As smoke is blown away, You will drive them out; as wax melts before the fire, the wicked will perish in the presence of God.

contentJson: [{"text":"But the righteous will be glad","poem":1},{"text":"and rejoice before God;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"they will celebrate with joy.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
But the righteous will be glad and rejoice before God; 
they will celebrate with joy.

contentJson: [{"text":"Sing to God!","poem":1},{"text":"Sing praises to His name.","poem":2},{"text":"Exalt Him who rides on the clouds","poem":1},{"noteId":144},{"text":"—","poem":1},{"text":"His name is the LORD—","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"and rejoice before Him.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Sing to God! Sing praises to His name. Exalt Him who rides on the clouds — His name is the LORD— 
and rejoice before Him.

contentJson: [{"text":"A father of the fatherless,","poem":1},{"text":"and a defender of the widows,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"is God in His holy habitation.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
A father of the fatherless, and a defender of the widows, 
is God in His holy habitation.

contentJson: [{"text":"God settles the lonely in families;","poem":1},{"text":"He leads the prisoners out to prosperity,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
God settles the lonely in families; He leads the prisoners out to prosperity, 
but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

contentJson: [{"text":"O God, when You went out before Your people,","poem":1},{"text":"when You marched through the wasteland,","poem":2},"Selah"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: O God, when You went out before Your people, when You marched through the wasteland, Selah

contentJson: [{"text":"the earth shook and the heavens poured down rain","poem":1},{"text":"before God, the One on Sinai,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"before God, the God of Israel.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
the earth shook and the heavens poured down rain before God, the One on Sinai, 
before God, the God of Israel.

contentJson: [{"text":"You sent abundant rain, O God;","poem":1},{"text":"You refreshed Your weary inheritance.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You sent abundant rain, O God; You refreshed Your weary inheritance.

contentJson: [{"text":"Your flock settled therein;","poem":1},{"text":"O God, from Your bounty You provided for the poor.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Your flock settled therein; O God, from Your bounty You provided for the poor.

contentJson: [{"text":"The Lord gives the command;","poem":1},{"text":"a great company of women proclaim it:","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The Lord gives the command; a great company of women proclaim it:

contentJson: [{"text":"“Kings and their armies flee in haste;","poem":1},{"text":"she who waits at home divides the plunder.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: “Kings and their armies flee in haste; she who waits at home divides the plunder.

contentJson: [{"text":"Though you lie down among the sheepfolds,","poem":1},{"text":"the wings of the dove are covered with silver,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"and her feathers with shimmering gold.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Though you lie down among the sheepfolds, the wings of the dove are covered with silver, 
and her feathers with shimmering gold.”

contentJson: [{"text":"When the Almighty","poem":1},{"noteId":145},{"text":"scattered the kings in the land,","poem":1},{"text":"it was like the snow falling on Zalmon.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: When the Almighty scattered the kings in the land, it was like the snow falling on Zalmon.

contentJson: [{"text":"A mountain of God is Mount Bashan;","poem":1},{"text":"a mountain of many peaks is Mount Bashan.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A mountain of God is Mount Bashan; a mountain of many peaks is Mount Bashan.

contentJson: [{"text":"Why do you gaze in envy, O mountains of many peaks?","poem":1},{"text":"This is the mountain God chose for His dwelling,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"where the LORD will surely dwell forever.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Why do you gaze in envy, O mountains of many peaks? This is the mountain God chose for His dwelling, 
where the LORD will surely dwell forever.

contentJson: [{"text":"The chariots of God are tens of thousands—","poem":1},{"text":"thousands of thousands are they;","poem":2},{"text":"the Lord is in His sanctuary","poem":1},{"text":"as He was at Sinai.","poem":2},{"noteId":146}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The chariots of God are tens of thousands— thousands of thousands are they; the Lord is in His sanctuary as He was at Sinai.

contentJson: [{"text":"You have ascended on high;","poem":1},{"text":"You have led captives away.","poem":2},{"text":"You have received gifts from men,","poem":1},{"noteId":147},{"text":"even from the rebellious,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"that the LORD God may dwell there.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
You have ascended on high; You have led captives away. You have received gifts from men, even from the rebellious, 
that the LORD God may dwell there.

contentJson: [{"text":"Blessed be the Lord,","poem":1},{"text":"who daily bears our burden,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"the God of our salvation.","poem":2},"Selah"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Blessed be the Lord, who daily bears our burden, 
the God of our salvation. Selah

contentJson: [{"text":"Our God is a God of deliverance;","poem":1},{"text":"the Lord GOD is our rescuer from death.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Our God is a God of deliverance; the Lord GOD is our rescuer from death.

contentJson: [{"text":"Surely God will crush the heads of His enemies,","poem":1},{"text":"the hairy crowns of those who persist in guilty ways.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Surely God will crush the heads of His enemies, the hairy crowns of those who persist in guilty ways.

contentJson: [{"text":"The Lord said, “I will retrieve them from Bashan,","poem":1},{"text":"I will bring them up from the depths of the sea,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The Lord said, “I will retrieve them from Bashan, I will bring them up from the depths of the sea,

contentJson: [{"text":"that your foot may be dipped","poem":1},{"text":"in the blood of your foes—","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"the tongues of your dogs in the same.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
that your foot may be dipped in the blood of your foes— 
the tongues of your dogs in the same.”

contentJson: [{"text":"They have seen Your procession, O God—","poem":1},{"text":"the march of my God and King into the sanctuary.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They have seen Your procession, O God— the march of my God and King into the sanctuary.

contentJson: [{"text":"The singers lead the way,","poem":1},{"text":"the musicians follow after,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"among the maidens playing tambourines.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
The singers lead the way, the musicians follow after, 
among the maidens playing tambourines.

contentJson: [{"text":"Bless God in the great congregation;","poem":1},{"text":"bless the LORD from the fountain of Israel.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Bless God in the great congregation; bless the LORD from the fountain of Israel.

contentJson: [{"text":"There is Benjamin, the youngest, ruling them,","poem":1},{"text":"the princes of Judah in their company,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"the princes of Zebulun and of Naphtali.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
There is Benjamin, the youngest, ruling them, the princes of Judah in their company, 
the princes of Zebulun and of Naphtali.

contentJson: [{"text":"Summon Your power, O God;","poem":1},{"noteId":148},{"text":"show Your strength, O God,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"which You have exerted on our behalf.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Summon Your power, O God; show Your strength, O God, 
which You have exerted on our behalf.

contentJson: [{"text":"Because of Your temple at Jerusalem","poem":1},{"text":"kings will bring You gifts.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Because of Your temple at Jerusalem kings will bring You gifts.

contentJson: [{"text":"Rebuke the beast in the reeds,","poem":1},{"text":"the herd of bulls among the calves of the nations,","poem":2},{"text":"until it submits, bringing bars of silver.","poem":1},{"text":"Scatter the nations who delight in war.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Rebuke the beast in the reeds, the herd of bulls among the calves of the nations, until it submits, bringing bars of silver. Scatter the nations who delight in war.

contentJson: [{"text":"Envoys will arrive from Egypt;","poem":1},{"text":"Cush","poem":2},{"noteId":149},{"text":"will stretch out her hands to God.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Envoys will arrive from Egypt; Cush will stretch out her hands to God.

contentJson: [{"text":"Sing to God, O kingdoms of the earth;","poem":1},{"text":"sing praises to the Lord—","poem":2},"Selah"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Sing to God, O kingdoms of the earth; sing praises to the Lord— Selah

contentJson: [{"text":"to Him who rides upon the highest heavens of old;","poem":1},{"text":"behold, His mighty voice resounds.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: to Him who rides upon the highest heavens of old; behold, His mighty voice resounds.

contentJson: [{"text":"Ascribe the power to God,","poem":1},{"text":"whose majesty is over Israel,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"whose strength is in the skies.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Ascribe the power to God, whose majesty is over Israel, 
whose strength is in the skies.

contentJson: [{"text":"O God, You are awesome in Your sanctuary;","poem":1},{"text":"the God of Israel Himself","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"gives strength and power to His people.","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"Blessed be God!","poem":1}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
O God, You are awesome in Your sanctuary; the God of Israel Himself 
gives strength and power to His people. 
Blessed be God!

contentJson: [{"text":"Save me, O God,","poem":1},{"text":"for the waters are up to my neck.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Save me, O God, for the waters are up to my neck.

contentJson: [{"text":"I have sunk into the miry depths,","poem":1},{"text":"where there is no footing;","poem":2},{"text":"I have drifted into deep waters,","poem":1},{"text":"where the flood engulfs me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I have sunk into the miry depths, where there is no footing; I have drifted into deep waters, where the flood engulfs me.

contentJson: [{"text":"I am weary from my crying;","poem":1},{"text":"my throat is parched.","poem":2},{"text":"My eyes fail,","poem":1},{"text":"looking for my God.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I am weary from my crying; my throat is parched. My eyes fail, looking for my God.

contentJson: [{"text":"Those who hate me without cause","poem":1},{"text":"outnumber the hairs of my head;","poem":2},{"text":"many are those who would destroy me—","poem":1},{"text":"my enemies for no reason.","poem":2},{"noteId":150},{"text":"Though I did not steal,","poem":1},{"text":"I must repay.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Those who hate me without cause outnumber the hairs of my head; many are those who would destroy me— my enemies for no reason. Though I did not steal, I must repay.

contentJson: [{"text":"You know my folly, O God,","poem":1},{"text":"and my guilt is not hidden from You.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You know my folly, O God, and my guilt is not hidden from You.

contentJson: [{"text":"May those who hope in You not be ashamed through me,","poem":1},{"text":"O Lord GOD of Hosts;","poem":2},{"text":"may those who seek You not be dishonored through me,","poem":1},{"text":"O God of Israel.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May those who hope in You not be ashamed through me, O Lord GOD of Hosts; may those who seek You not be dishonored through me, O God of Israel.

contentJson: [{"text":"For I have endured scorn for Your sake,","poem":1},{"text":"and shame has covered my face.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For I have endured scorn for Your sake, and shame has covered my face.

contentJson: [{"text":"I have become a stranger to my brothers","poem":1},{"text":"and a foreigner to my mother’s sons,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I have become a stranger to my brothers and a foreigner to my mother’s sons,

contentJson: [{"text":"because zeal for Your house has consumed me,","poem":1},{"noteId":151},{"text":"and the insults of those who insult You have fallen on me.","poem":2},{"noteId":152}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: because zeal for Your house has consumed me, and the insults of those who insult You have fallen on me.

contentJson: [{"text":"I wept and fasted,","poem":1},{"text":"but it brought me reproach.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I wept and fasted, but it brought me reproach.

contentJson: [{"text":"I made sackcloth my clothing,","poem":1},{"text":"and I was sport to them.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I made sackcloth my clothing, and I was sport to them.

contentJson: [{"text":"Those who sit at the gate mock me,","poem":1},{"text":"and I am the song of drunkards.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Those who sit at the gate mock me, and I am the song of drunkards.

contentJson: [{"text":"But my prayer to You, O LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"is for a time of favor.","poem":2},{"text":"In Your abundant loving devotion, O God,","poem":1},{"text":"answer me with Your sure salvation.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But my prayer to You, O LORD, is for a time of favor. In Your abundant loving devotion, O God, answer me with Your sure salvation.

contentJson: [{"text":"Rescue me from the mire","poem":1},{"text":"and do not let me sink;","poem":2},{"text":"deliver me from my foes","poem":1},{"text":"and out of the deep waters.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Rescue me from the mire and do not let me sink; deliver me from my foes and out of the deep waters.

contentJson: [{"text":"Do not let the floods engulf me","poem":1},{"text":"or the depths swallow me up;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"let not the Pit close its mouth over me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Do not let the floods engulf me or the depths swallow me up; 
let not the Pit close its mouth over me.

contentJson: [{"text":"Answer me, O LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"for Your loving devotion is good;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"turn to me in keeping with Your great compassion.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Answer me, O LORD, for Your loving devotion is good; 
turn to me in keeping with Your great compassion.

contentJson: [{"text":"Hide not Your face from Your servant,","poem":1},{"text":"for I am in distress.","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"Answer me quickly!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Hide not Your face from Your servant, for I am in distress. 
Answer me quickly!

contentJson: [{"text":"Draw near to my soul and redeem me;","poem":1},{"text":"ransom me because of my foes.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Draw near to my soul and redeem me; ransom me because of my foes.

contentJson: [{"text":"You know my reproach, my shame and disgrace.","poem":1},{"text":"All my adversaries are before You.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You know my reproach, my shame and disgrace. All my adversaries are before You.

contentJson: [{"text":"Insults have broken my heart,","poem":1},{"text":"and I am in despair.","poem":2},{"text":"I looked for sympathy, but there was none,","poem":1},{"text":"for comforters, but I found no one.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Insults have broken my heart, and I am in despair. I looked for sympathy, but there was none, for comforters, but I found no one.

contentJson: [{"text":"They poisoned my food with gall","poem":1},{"text":"and gave me vinegar to quench my thirst.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They poisoned my food with gall and gave me vinegar to quench my thirst.

contentJson: [{"text":"May their table become a snare;","poem":1},{"text":"may it be a retribution and a trap.","poem":2},{"noteId":153}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May their table become a snare; may it be a retribution and a trap.

contentJson: [{"text":"May their eyes be darkened so they cannot see,","poem":1},{"text":"and their backs be bent forever.","poem":2},{"noteId":154}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May their eyes be darkened so they cannot see, and their backs be bent forever.

contentJson: [{"text":"Pour out Your wrath upon them,","poem":1},{"text":"and let Your burning anger overtake them.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Pour out Your wrath upon them, and let Your burning anger overtake them.

contentJson: [{"text":"May their place be deserted;","poem":1},{"text":"let there be no one to dwell in their tents.","poem":2},{"noteId":155}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May their place be deserted; let there be no one to dwell in their tents.

contentJson: [{"text":"For they persecute the one You struck","poem":1},{"text":"and recount the pain of those You wounded.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For they persecute the one You struck and recount the pain of those You wounded.

contentJson: [{"text":"Add iniquity to their iniquity;","poem":1},{"text":"let them not share in Your righteousness.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Add iniquity to their iniquity; let them not share in Your righteousness.

contentJson: [{"text":"May they be blotted out of the Book of Life","poem":1},{"text":"and not listed with the righteous.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May they be blotted out of the Book of Life and not listed with the righteous.

contentJson: [{"text":"But I am in pain and distress;","poem":1},{"text":"let Your salvation protect me, O God.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But I am in pain and distress; let Your salvation protect me, O God.

contentJson: [{"text":"I will praise God’s name in song","poem":1},{"text":"and exalt Him with thanksgiving.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I will praise God’s name in song and exalt Him with thanksgiving.

contentJson: [{"text":"And this will please the LORD more than an ox,","poem":1},{"text":"more than a bull with horns and hooves.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: And this will please the LORD more than an ox, more than a bull with horns and hooves.

contentJson: [{"text":"The humble will see and rejoice.","poem":1},{"text":"You who seek God, let your hearts be revived!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The humble will see and rejoice. You who seek God, let your hearts be revived!

contentJson: [{"text":"For the LORD listens to the needy","poem":1},{"text":"and does not despise His captive people.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For the LORD listens to the needy and does not despise His captive people.

contentJson: [{"text":"Let heaven and earth praise Him,","poem":1},{"text":"the seas and everything that moves in them.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Let heaven and earth praise Him, the seas and everything that moves in them.

contentJson: [{"text":"For God will save Zion","poem":1},{"text":"and rebuild the cities of Judah,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"that they may dwell there and possess it.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
For God will save Zion and rebuild the cities of Judah, 
that they may dwell there and possess it.

contentJson: [{"text":"The descendants of His servants will inherit it,","poem":1},{"text":"and those who love His name will settle in it.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The descendants of His servants will inherit it, and those who love His name will settle in it.

contentJson: [{"text":"Make haste, O God, to deliver me!","poem":1},{"text":"Hurry, O LORD, to help me!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Make haste, O God, to deliver me! Hurry, O LORD, to help me!

contentJson: [{"text":"May those who seek my life","poem":1},{"text":"be ashamed and confounded;","poem":2},{"text":"may those who wish me harm","poem":1},{"text":"be repelled and humiliated.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May those who seek my life be ashamed and confounded; may those who wish me harm be repelled and humiliated.

contentJson: [{"text":"May those who say, “Aha, aha!”","poem":1},{"text":"retreat because of their shame.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May those who say, “Aha, aha!” retreat because of their shame.

contentJson: [{"text":"May all who seek You","poem":1},{"text":"rejoice and be glad in You;","poem":2},{"text":"may those who love Your salvation always say,","poem":1},{"text":"“Let God be magnified!”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May all who seek You rejoice and be glad in You; may those who love Your salvation always say, “Let God be magnified!”

contentJson: [{"text":"But I am poor and needy;","poem":1},{"text":"hurry to me, O God.","poem":2},{"text":"You are my help and my deliverer;","poem":1},{"text":"O LORD, do not delay.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But I am poor and needy; hurry to me, O God. You are my help and my deliverer; O LORD, do not delay.

contentJson: [{"text":"In You, O LORD, I have taken refuge;","poem":1},{"text":"let me never be put to shame.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: In You, O LORD, I have taken refuge; let me never be put to shame.

contentJson: [{"text":"In Your justice, rescue and deliver me;","poem":1},{"text":"incline Your ear and save me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: In Your justice, rescue and deliver me; incline Your ear and save me.

contentJson: [{"text":"Be my rock of refuge,","poem":1},{"text":"where I can always go.","poem":2},{"text":"Give the command to save me,","poem":1},{"text":"for You are my rock and my fortress.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Be my rock of refuge, where I can always go. Give the command to save me, for You are my rock and my fortress.

contentJson: [{"text":"Deliver me, O my God, from the hand of the wicked,","poem":1},{"text":"from the grasp of the unjust and ruthless.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Deliver me, O my God, from the hand of the wicked, from the grasp of the unjust and ruthless.

contentJson: [{"text":"For You are my hope, O Lord GOD,","poem":1},{"text":"my confidence from my youth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For You are my hope, O Lord GOD, my confidence from my youth.

contentJson: [{"text":"I have leaned on You since birth;","poem":1},{"text":"You pulled me from my mother’s womb.","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"My praise is always for You.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
I have leaned on You since birth; You pulled me from my mother’s womb. 
My praise is always for You.

contentJson: [{"text":"I have become a portent to many,","poem":1},{"text":"but You are my strong refuge.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I have become a portent to many, but You are my strong refuge.

contentJson: [{"text":"My mouth is filled with Your praise","poem":1},{"text":"and with Your splendor all day long.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: My mouth is filled with Your praise and with Your splendor all day long.

contentJson: [{"text":"Do not discard me in my old age;","poem":1},{"text":"do not forsake me when my strength fails.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Do not discard me in my old age; do not forsake me when my strength fails.

contentJson: [{"text":"For my enemies speak against me,","poem":1},{"text":"and those who lie in wait for my life conspire,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For my enemies speak against me, and those who lie in wait for my life conspire,

contentJson: [{"text":"saying, “God has forsaken him;","poem":1},{"text":"pursue him and seize him,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"for there is no one to rescue him.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
saying, “God has forsaken him; pursue him and seize him, 
for there is no one to rescue him.”

contentJson: [{"text":"Be not far from me, O God.","poem":1},{"text":"Hurry, O my God, to help me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Be not far from me, O God. Hurry, O my God, to help me.

contentJson: [{"text":"May the accusers of my soul","poem":1},{"text":"be ashamed and consumed;","poem":2},{"text":"may those who seek my harm","poem":1},{"text":"be covered with scorn and disgrace.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May the accusers of my soul be ashamed and consumed; may those who seek my harm be covered with scorn and disgrace.

contentJson: [{"text":"But I will always hope","poem":1},{"text":"and will praise You more and more.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But I will always hope and will praise You more and more.

contentJson: [{"text":"My mouth will declare Your righteousness","poem":1},{"text":"and Your salvation all day long,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"though I cannot know their full measure.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
My mouth will declare Your righteousness and Your salvation all day long, 
though I cannot know their full measure.

contentJson: [{"text":"I will enter in the strength of the Lord GOD;","poem":1},{"text":"I will proclaim Your righteousness—Yours alone.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I will enter in the strength of the Lord GOD; I will proclaim Your righteousness—Yours alone.

contentJson: [{"text":"O God, You have taught me from my youth,","poem":1},{"text":"and to this day I proclaim Your marvelous deeds.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: O God, You have taught me from my youth, and to this day I proclaim Your marvelous deeds.

contentJson: [{"text":"Even when I am old and gray,","poem":1},{"text":"do not forsake me, O God,","poem":2},{"text":"until I proclaim Your power to the next generation,","poem":1},{"text":"Your might to all who are to come.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Even when I am old and gray, do not forsake me, O God, until I proclaim Your power to the next generation, Your might to all who are to come.

contentJson: [{"text":"Your righteousness reaches to the heavens, O God,","poem":1},{"text":"You who have done great things.","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"Who, O God, is like You?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Your righteousness reaches to the heavens, O God, You who have done great things. 
Who, O God, is like You?

contentJson: [{"text":"Though You have shown me many troubles and misfortunes,","poem":1},{"text":"You will revive me once again.","poem":2},{"text":"Even from the depths of the earth","poem":1},{"text":"You will bring me back up.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Though You have shown me many troubles and misfortunes, You will revive me once again. Even from the depths of the earth You will bring me back up.

contentJson: [{"text":"You will increase my honor","poem":1},{"text":"and comfort me once again.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You will increase my honor and comfort me once again.

contentJson: [{"text":"So I will praise You with the harp","poem":1},{"text":"for Your faithfulness, O my God;","poem":2},{"text":"I will sing praise to You with the lyre,","poem":1},{"text":"O Holy One of Israel.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: So I will praise You with the harp for Your faithfulness, O my God; I will sing praise to You with the lyre, O Holy One of Israel.

contentJson: [{"text":"When I sing praise to You","poem":1},{"text":"my lips will shout for joy,","poem":2},{"text":"along with my soul,","poem":1},{"text":"which You have redeemed.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: When I sing praise to You my lips will shout for joy, along with my soul, which You have redeemed.

contentJson: [{"text":"My tongue will indeed proclaim","poem":1},{"text":"Your righteousness all day long,","poem":2},{"text":"for those who seek my harm","poem":1},{"text":"are disgraced and confounded.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: My tongue will indeed proclaim Your righteousness all day long, for those who seek my harm are disgraced and confounded.

contentJson: [{"text":"Endow the king with Your justice, O God,","poem":1},{"text":"and the son of the king with Your righteousness.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Endow the king with Your justice, O God, and the son of the king with Your righteousness.

contentJson: [{"text":"May he judge Your people with righteousness","poem":1},{"text":"and Your afflicted with justice.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May he judge Your people with righteousness and Your afflicted with justice.

contentJson: [{"text":"May the mountains bring peace to the people,","poem":1},{"text":"and the hills bring righteousness.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May the mountains bring peace to the people, and the hills bring righteousness.

contentJson: [{"text":"May he vindicate the afflicted among the people;","poem":1},{"text":"may he save the children of the needy","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"and crush the oppressor.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
May he vindicate the afflicted among the people; may he save the children of the needy 
and crush the oppressor.

contentJson: [{"text":"May they fear him","poem":1},{"noteId":156},{"text":"as long as the sun shines,","poem":1},{"text":"as long as the moon remains,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"through all generations.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
May they fear him as long as the sun shines, as long as the moon remains, 
through all generations.

contentJson: [{"text":"May he be like rain that falls on freshly cut grass,","poem":1},{"text":"like spring showers that water the earth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May he be like rain that falls on freshly cut grass, like spring showers that water the earth.

contentJson: [{"text":"May the righteous flourish in his days","poem":1},{"text":"and prosperity abound,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"until the moon is no more.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
May the righteous flourish in his days and prosperity abound, 
until the moon is no more.

contentJson: [{"text":"May he rule from sea to sea,","poem":1},{"text":"and from the Euphrates","poem":2},{"noteId":157},{"text":"to the ends of the earth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May he rule from sea to sea, and from the Euphrates to the ends of the earth.

contentJson: [{"text":"May the nomads bow before him,","poem":1},{"text":"and his enemies lick the dust.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May the nomads bow before him, and his enemies lick the dust.

contentJson: [{"text":"May the kings of Tarshish and distant shores bring tribute;","poem":1},{"text":"may the kings of Sheba and Seba offer gifts.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May the kings of Tarshish and distant shores bring tribute; may the kings of Sheba and Seba offer gifts.

contentJson: [{"text":"May all kings bow down to him","poem":1},{"text":"and all nations serve him.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May all kings bow down to him and all nations serve him.

contentJson: [{"text":"For he will deliver the needy who cry out","poem":1},{"text":"and the afflicted who have no helper.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For he will deliver the needy who cry out and the afflicted who have no helper.

contentJson: [{"text":"He will take pity on the poor and needy","poem":1},{"text":"and save the lives of the oppressed.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He will take pity on the poor and needy and save the lives of the oppressed.

contentJson: [{"text":"He will redeem them from oppression and violence,","poem":1},{"text":"for their blood is precious in his sight.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He will redeem them from oppression and violence, for their blood is precious in his sight.

contentJson: [{"text":"Long may he live!","poem":1},{"text":"May gold from Sheba be given him.","poem":2},{"text":"May people ever pray for him;","poem":1},{"text":"may they bless him all day long.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Long may he live! May gold from Sheba be given him. May people ever pray for him; may they bless him all day long.

contentJson: [{"text":"May there be an abundance of grain in the land;","poem":1},{"text":"may it sway atop the hills.","poem":2},{"text":"May its fruit trees flourish like the forests of Lebanon,","poem":1},{"text":"and its people like the grass of the field.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May there be an abundance of grain in the land; may it sway atop the hills. May its fruit trees flourish like the forests of Lebanon, and its people like the grass of the field.

contentJson: [{"text":"May his name endure forever;","poem":1},{"text":"may his name continue","poem":2},{"noteId":158},{"text":"as long as the sun shines.","poem":2},{"text":"In him may all nations be blessed;","poem":1},{"text":"may they call him blessed.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May his name endure forever; may his name continue as long as the sun shines. In him may all nations be blessed; may they call him blessed.

contentJson: [{"text":"Blessed be the LORD God, the God of Israel,","poem":1},{"text":"who alone does marvelous deeds.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Blessed be the LORD God, the God of Israel, who alone does marvelous deeds.

contentJson: [{"text":"And blessed be His glorious name forever;","poem":1},{"text":"may all the earth be filled with His glory.","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"Amen and amen.","poem":1}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
And blessed be His glorious name forever; may all the earth be filled with His glory. 
Amen and amen.

contentJson: ["Thus conclude the prayers of David son of Jesse."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Thus conclude the prayers of David son of Jesse.

contentJson: [{"text":"Surely God is good to Israel,","poem":1},{"text":"to those who are pure in heart.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Surely God is good to Israel, to those who are pure in heart.

contentJson: [{"text":"But as for me, my feet had almost stumbled;","poem":1},{"text":"my steps had nearly slipped.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But as for me, my feet had almost stumbled; my steps had nearly slipped.

contentJson: [{"text":"For I envied the arrogant","poem":1},{"text":"when I saw the prosperity of the wicked.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For I envied the arrogant when I saw the prosperity of the wicked.

contentJson: [{"text":"They have no struggle in their death;","poem":1},{"text":"their bodies are well-fed.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They have no struggle in their death; their bodies are well-fed.

contentJson: [{"text":"They are free of the burdens others carry;","poem":1},{"text":"they are not afflicted like other men.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They are free of the burdens others carry; they are not afflicted like other men.

contentJson: [{"text":"Therefore pride is their necklace;","poem":1},{"text":"a garment of violence covers them.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Therefore pride is their necklace; a garment of violence covers them.

contentJson: [{"text":"From their prosperity proceeds iniquity;","poem":1},{"noteId":159},{"text":"the imaginations of their hearts run wild.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: From their prosperity proceeds iniquity; the imaginations of their hearts run wild.

contentJson: [{"text":"They mock and speak with malice;","poem":1},{"text":"with arrogance they threaten oppression.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They mock and speak with malice; with arrogance they threaten oppression.

contentJson: [{"text":"They set their mouths against the heavens,","poem":1},{"text":"and their tongues strut across the earth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They set their mouths against the heavens, and their tongues strut across the earth.

contentJson: [{"text":"So their people","poem":1},{"noteId":160},{"text":"return to this place","poem":1},{"text":"and drink up waters in abundance.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: So their people return to this place and drink up waters in abundance.

contentJson: [{"text":"The wicked say, “How can God know?","poem":1},{"text":"Does the Most High have knowledge?”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The wicked say, “How can God know? Does the Most High have knowledge?”

contentJson: [{"text":"Behold, these are the wicked—","poem":1},{"text":"always carefree as they increase their wealth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Behold, these are the wicked— always carefree as they increase their wealth.

contentJson: [{"text":"Surely in vain I have kept my heart pure;","poem":1},{"text":"in innocence I have washed my hands.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Surely in vain I have kept my heart pure; in innocence I have washed my hands.

contentJson: [{"text":"For I am afflicted all day long","poem":1},{"text":"and punished every morning.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For I am afflicted all day long and punished every morning.

contentJson: [{"text":"If I had said, “I will speak this way,”","poem":1},{"text":"then I would have betrayed Your children.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: If I had said, “I will speak this way,” then I would have betrayed Your children.

contentJson: [{"text":"When I tried to understand all this,","poem":1},{"text":"it was troublesome in my sight","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: When I tried to understand all this, it was troublesome in my sight

contentJson: [{"text":"until I entered God’s sanctuary;","poem":1},{"text":"then I discerned their end.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: until I entered God’s sanctuary; then I discerned their end.

contentJson: [{"text":"Surely You set them on slick ground;","poem":1},{"text":"You cast them down into ruin.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Surely You set them on slick ground; You cast them down into ruin.

contentJson: [{"text":"How suddenly they are laid waste,","poem":1},{"text":"completely swept away by terrors!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: How suddenly they are laid waste, completely swept away by terrors!

contentJson: [{"text":"Like one waking from a dream,","poem":1},{"text":"so You, O Lord, awaken and despise their form.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Like one waking from a dream, so You, O Lord, awaken and despise their form.

contentJson: [{"text":"When my heart was grieved","poem":1},{"text":"and I was pierced within,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: When my heart was grieved and I was pierced within,

contentJson: [{"text":"I was senseless and ignorant;","poem":1},{"text":"I was a brute beast before You.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I was senseless and ignorant; I was a brute beast before You.

contentJson: [{"text":"Yet I am always with You;","poem":1},{"text":"You hold my right hand.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Yet I am always with You; You hold my right hand.

contentJson: [{"text":"You guide me with Your counsel,","poem":1},{"text":"and later receive me in glory.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You guide me with Your counsel, and later receive me in glory.

contentJson: [{"text":"Whom have I in heaven but You?","poem":1},{"text":"And on earth I desire no one besides You.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Whom have I in heaven but You? And on earth I desire no one besides You.

contentJson: [{"text":"My flesh and my heart may fail,","poem":1},{"text":"but God is the strength","poem":2},{"noteId":161},{"text":"of my heart","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"and my portion forever.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
My flesh and my heart may fail, but God is the strength of my heart 
and my portion forever.

contentJson: [{"text":"Those far from You will surely perish;","poem":1},{"text":"You destroy all who are unfaithful to You.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Those far from You will surely perish; You destroy all who are unfaithful to You.

contentJson: [{"text":"But as for me, it is good to draw near to God.","poem":1},{"text":"I have made the Lord GOD my refuge,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"that I may proclaim all Your works.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
But as for me, it is good to draw near to God. I have made the Lord GOD my refuge, 
that I may proclaim all Your works.

contentJson: [{"text":"Why have You rejected us forever, O God?","poem":1},{"text":"Why does Your anger smolder","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"against the sheep of Your pasture?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Why have You rejected us forever, O God? Why does Your anger smolder 
against the sheep of Your pasture?

contentJson: [{"text":"Remember Your congregation,","poem":1},{"text":"which You purchased long ago","poem":2},{"text":"and redeemed as the tribe of Your inheritance—","poem":1},{"text":"Mount Zion where You dwell.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Remember Your congregation, which You purchased long ago and redeemed as the tribe of Your inheritance— Mount Zion where You dwell.

contentJson: [{"text":"Turn Your steps to the everlasting ruins,","poem":1},{"text":"to everything in the sanctuary the enemy has destroyed.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Turn Your steps to the everlasting ruins, to everything in the sanctuary the enemy has destroyed.

contentJson: [{"text":"Your foes have roared within Your meeting place;","poem":1},{"text":"they have unfurled their banners as signs,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Your foes have roared within Your meeting place; they have unfurled their banners as signs,

contentJson: [{"text":"like men wielding axes in a thicket of trees","poem":1}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: like men wielding axes in a thicket of trees

contentJson: [{"text":"and smashing all the carvings with hatchets and picks.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: and smashing all the carvings with hatchets and picks.

contentJson: [{"text":"They have burned Your sanctuary to the ground;","poem":1},{"text":"they have defiled the dwelling place of Your Name.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They have burned Your sanctuary to the ground; they have defiled the dwelling place of Your Name.

contentJson: [{"text":"They said in their hearts,","poem":1},{"text":"“We will crush them completely.”","poem":2},{"text":"They burned down every place","poem":1},{"text":"where God met us in the land.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They said in their hearts, “We will crush them completely.” They burned down every place where God met us in the land.

contentJson: [{"text":"There are no signs for us to see.","poem":1},{"text":"There is no longer any prophet.","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"And none of us knows how long this will last.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
There are no signs for us to see. There is no longer any prophet. 
And none of us knows how long this will last.

contentJson: [{"text":"How long, O God, will the enemy taunt You?","poem":1},{"text":"Will the foe revile Your name forever?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: How long, O God, will the enemy taunt You? Will the foe revile Your name forever?

contentJson: [{"text":"Why do You withdraw Your strong right hand?","poem":1},{"text":"Stretch it out to destroy them!","poem":2},{"noteId":163}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Why do You withdraw Your strong right hand? Stretch it out to destroy them!

contentJson: [{"text":"Yet God is my King from ancient times,","poem":1},{"text":"working salvation on the earth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Yet God is my King from ancient times, working salvation on the earth.

contentJson: [{"text":"You divided the sea by Your strength;","poem":1},{"text":"You smashed the heads of the dragons of the sea;","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You divided the sea by Your strength; You smashed the heads of the dragons of the sea;

contentJson: [{"text":"You crushed the heads of Leviathan;","poem":1},{"text":"You fed him to the creatures of the desert.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You crushed the heads of Leviathan; You fed him to the creatures of the desert.

contentJson: [{"text":"You broke open the fountain and the flood;","poem":1},{"text":"You dried up the ever-flowing rivers.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You broke open the fountain and the flood; You dried up the ever-flowing rivers.

contentJson: [{"text":"The day is Yours, and also the night;","poem":1},{"text":"You established the moon","poem":2},{"noteId":164},{"text":"and the sun.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The day is Yours, and also the night; You established the moon and the sun.

contentJson: [{"text":"You set all the boundaries of the earth;","poem":1},{"text":"You made the summer and winter.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You set all the boundaries of the earth; You made the summer and winter.

contentJson: [{"text":"Remember how the enemy has mocked You, O LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"how a foolish people has spurned Your name.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Remember how the enemy has mocked You, O LORD, how a foolish people has spurned Your name.

contentJson: [{"text":"Do not deliver the soul of Your dove to beasts;","poem":1},{"text":"do not forget the lives of Your afflicted forever.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Do not deliver the soul of Your dove to beasts; do not forget the lives of Your afflicted forever.

contentJson: [{"text":"Consider Your covenant,","poem":1},{"text":"for haunts of violence fill the dark places of the land.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Consider Your covenant, for haunts of violence fill the dark places of the land.

contentJson: [{"text":"Do not let the oppressed retreat in shame;","poem":1},{"text":"may the poor and needy praise Your name.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Do not let the oppressed retreat in shame; may the poor and needy praise Your name.
