contentJson: [{"text":"Rise up, O God; defend Your cause!","poem":1},{"text":"Remember how the fool mocks You all day long.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Rise up, O God; defend Your cause! Remember how the fool mocks You all day long.

contentJson: [{"text":"Do not disregard the clamor of Your adversaries,","poem":1},{"text":"the uproar of Your enemies that ascends continually.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Do not disregard the clamor of Your adversaries, the uproar of Your enemies that ascends continually.

contentJson: [{"text":"We give thanks to You, O God;","poem":1},{"text":"we give thanks, for Your Name is near.","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"The people declare Your wondrous works.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
We give thanks to You, O God; we give thanks, for Your Name is near. 
The people declare Your wondrous works.

contentJson: [{"text":"“When I choose a time,","poem":1},{"text":"I will judge fairly.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: “When I choose a time, I will judge fairly.

contentJson: [{"text":"When the earth and all its dwellers quake,","poem":1},{"text":"it is I who bear up its pillars.","poem":2},"Selah"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: When the earth and all its dwellers quake, it is I who bear up its pillars. Selah

contentJson: [{"text":"I say to the proud, ‘Do not boast,’","poem":1},{"text":"and to the wicked, ‘Do not lift up your horn.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I say to the proud, ‘Do not boast,’ and to the wicked, ‘Do not lift up your horn.

contentJson: [{"text":"Do not lift up your horn against heaven","poem":1},{"text":"or speak with an outstretched neck.’”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Do not lift up your horn against heaven or speak with an outstretched neck.’”

contentJson: [{"text":"For exaltation comes neither from east nor west,","poem":1},{"text":"nor out of the desert,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For exaltation comes neither from east nor west, nor out of the desert,

contentJson: [{"text":"but it is God who judges;","poem":1},{"text":"He brings down one and exalts another.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: but it is God who judges; He brings down one and exalts another.

contentJson: [{"text":"For a cup is in the hand of the LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"full of foaming wine mixed with spices.","poem":2},{"text":"He pours from His cup,","poem":1},{"text":"and all the wicked of the earth","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"drink it down to the dregs.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
For a cup is in the hand of the LORD, full of foaming wine mixed with spices. He pours from His cup, and all the wicked of the earth 
drink it down to the dregs.

contentJson: [{"text":"But I will proclaim Him","poem":1},{"noteId":165},{"text":"forever;","poem":1},{"text":"I will sing praise to the God of Jacob.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But I will proclaim Him forever; I will sing praise to the God of Jacob.

contentJson: [{"text":"“All the horns of the wicked I will cut off,","poem":1},{"text":"but the horns of the righteous will be exalted.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: “All the horns of the wicked I will cut off, but the horns of the righteous will be exalted.”

contentJson: [{"text":"God is known in Judah;","poem":1},{"text":"His name is great in Israel.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: God is known in Judah; His name is great in Israel.

contentJson: [{"text":"His tent is in Salem,","poem":1},{"noteId":166},{"text":"His dwelling place in Zion.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: His tent is in Salem, His dwelling place in Zion.

contentJson: [{"text":"There He shattered the flaming arrows,","poem":1},{"text":"the shield and sword and weapons of war.","poem":2},"Selah"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: There He shattered the flaming arrows, the shield and sword and weapons of war. Selah

contentJson: [{"text":"You are resplendent with light,","poem":1},{"text":"more majestic than mountains filled with game.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You are resplendent with light, more majestic than mountains filled with game.

contentJson: [{"text":"The valiant lie plundered; they sleep their last sleep.","poem":1},{"text":"No men of might could lift a hand.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The valiant lie plundered; they sleep their last sleep. No men of might could lift a hand.

contentJson: [{"text":"At Your rebuke, O God of Jacob,","poem":1},{"text":"both horse and rider lie stunned.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: At Your rebuke, O God of Jacob, both horse and rider lie stunned.

contentJson: [{"text":"You alone are to be feared.","poem":1},{"text":"When You are angry, who can stand before You?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You alone are to be feared. When You are angry, who can stand before You?

contentJson: [{"text":"From heaven You pronounced judgment,","poem":1},{"text":"and the earth feared and was still","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: From heaven You pronounced judgment, and the earth feared and was still

contentJson: [{"text":"when God rose up to judge,","poem":1},{"text":"to save all the lowly of the earth.","poem":2},"Selah"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: when God rose up to judge, to save all the lowly of the earth. Selah

contentJson: [{"text":"Even the wrath of man shall praise You;","poem":1},{"text":"with the survivors of wrath You will clothe Yourself.","poem":2},{"noteId":167}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Even the wrath of man shall praise You; with the survivors of wrath You will clothe Yourself.

contentJson: [{"text":"Make and fulfill your vows to the LORD your God;","poem":1},{"text":"let all the neighboring lands bring tribute","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"to Him who is to be feared.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Make and fulfill your vows to the LORD your God; let all the neighboring lands bring tribute 
to Him who is to be feared.

contentJson: [{"text":"He breaks the spirits of princes;","poem":1},{"text":"He is feared by the kings of the earth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He breaks the spirits of princes; He is feared by the kings of the earth.

contentJson: [{"text":"I cried out to God;","poem":1},{"text":"I cried aloud to God to hear me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I cried out to God; I cried aloud to God to hear me.

contentJson: [{"text":"In the day of trouble I sought the Lord;","poem":1},{"text":"through the night my outstretched hands did not grow weary;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"my soul refused to be comforted.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
In the day of trouble I sought the Lord; through the night my outstretched hands did not grow weary; 
my soul refused to be comforted.

contentJson: [{"text":"I remembered You, O God, and I groaned;","poem":1},{"text":"I mused and my spirit grew faint.","poem":2},"Selah"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I remembered You, O God, and I groaned; I mused and my spirit grew faint. Selah

contentJson: [{"text":"You have kept my eyes from closing;","poem":1},{"text":"I am too troubled to speak.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You have kept my eyes from closing; I am too troubled to speak.

contentJson: [{"text":"I considered the days of old,","poem":1},{"text":"the years long in the past.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I considered the days of old, the years long in the past.

contentJson: [{"text":"At night I remembered my song;","poem":1},{"text":"in my heart I mused, and my spirit pondered:","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: At night I remembered my song; in my heart I mused, and my spirit pondered:

contentJson: [{"text":"“Will the Lord spurn us forever","poem":1},{"text":"and never show His favor again?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: “Will the Lord spurn us forever and never show His favor again?

contentJson: [{"text":"Is His loving devotion gone forever?","poem":1},{"text":"Has His promise failed for all time?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Is His loving devotion gone forever? Has His promise failed for all time?

contentJson: [{"text":"Has God forgotten to be gracious?","poem":1},{"text":"Has His anger shut off His compassion?”","poem":2},"Selah"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Has God forgotten to be gracious? Has His anger shut off His compassion?” Selah

contentJson: [{"text":"So I said, “I am grieved","poem":1},{"text":"that the right hand of the Most High has changed.”","poem":2},{"noteId":168}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: So I said, “I am grieved that the right hand of the Most High has changed.”

contentJson: [{"text":"I will remember the works of the LORD;","poem":1},{"text":"yes, I will remember Your wonders of old.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I will remember the works of the LORD; yes, I will remember Your wonders of old.

contentJson: [{"text":"I will reflect on all You have done","poem":1},{"text":"and ponder Your mighty deeds.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I will reflect on all You have done and ponder Your mighty deeds.

contentJson: [{"text":"Your way, O God, is holy.","poem":1},{"text":"What god is so great as our God?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Your way, O God, is holy. What god is so great as our God?

contentJson: [{"text":"You are the God who works wonders;","poem":1},{"text":"You display Your strength among the peoples.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You are the God who works wonders; You display Your strength among the peoples.

contentJson: [{"text":"With power You redeemed Your people,","poem":1},{"text":"the sons of Jacob and Joseph.","poem":2},"Selah"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: With power You redeemed Your people, the sons of Jacob and Joseph. Selah

contentJson: [{"text":"The waters saw You, O God;","poem":1},{"text":"the waters saw You and swirled;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"even the depths were shaken.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
The waters saw You, O God; the waters saw You and swirled; 
even the depths were shaken.

contentJson: [{"text":"The clouds poured down water;","poem":1},{"text":"the skies resounded with thunder;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"Your arrows flashed back and forth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
The clouds poured down water; the skies resounded with thunder; 
Your arrows flashed back and forth.

contentJson: [{"text":"Your thunder resounded in the whirlwind;","poem":1},{"text":"the lightning lit up the world;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"the earth trembled and quaked.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Your thunder resounded in the whirlwind; the lightning lit up the world; 
the earth trembled and quaked.

contentJson: [{"text":"Your path led through the sea,","poem":1},{"text":"Your way through the mighty waters,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"but Your footprints were not to be found.","poem":2},{"noteId":169}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Your path led through the sea, Your way through the mighty waters, 
but Your footprints were not to be found.

contentJson: [{"text":"You led Your people like a flock","poem":1},{"text":"by the hand of Moses and Aaron.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You led Your people like a flock by the hand of Moses and Aaron.

contentJson: [{"text":"Give ear, O my people, to my instruction;","poem":1},{"text":"listen to the words of my mouth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Give ear, O my people, to my instruction; listen to the words of my mouth.

contentJson: [{"text":"I will open my mouth in parables;","poem":1},{"text":"I will utter things hidden from the beginning,","poem":2},{"noteId":171}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I will open my mouth in parables; I will utter things hidden from the beginning,

contentJson: [{"text":"that we have heard and known","poem":1},{"text":"and our fathers have relayed to us.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: that we have heard and known and our fathers have relayed to us.

contentJson: [{"text":"We will not hide them from their children,","poem":1},{"text":"but will declare to the next generation","poem":2},{"text":"the praises of the LORD and His might,","poem":1},{"text":"and the wonders He has performed.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: We will not hide them from their children, but will declare to the next generation the praises of the LORD and His might, and the wonders He has performed.

contentJson: [{"text":"For He established a testimony in Jacob","poem":1},{"text":"and appointed a law in Israel,","poem":2},{"text":"which He commanded our fathers","poem":1},{"text":"to teach to their children,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For He established a testimony in Jacob and appointed a law in Israel, which He commanded our fathers to teach to their children,

contentJson: [{"text":"that the coming generation would know them—","poem":1},{"text":"even children yet to be born—","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"to arise and tell their own children","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
that the coming generation would know them— even children yet to be born— 
to arise and tell their own children

contentJson: [{"text":"that they should put their confidence in God,","poem":1},{"text":"not forgetting His works,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"but keeping His commandments.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
that they should put their confidence in God, not forgetting His works, 
but keeping His commandments.

contentJson: [{"text":"Then they will not be like their fathers,","poem":1},{"text":"a stubborn and rebellious generation,","poem":2},{"text":"whose heart was not loyal,","poem":1},{"text":"whose spirit was not faithful to God.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Then they will not be like their fathers, a stubborn and rebellious generation, whose heart was not loyal, whose spirit was not faithful to God.

contentJson: [{"text":"The archers of Ephraim","poem":1},{"text":"turned back on the day of battle.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The archers of Ephraim turned back on the day of battle.

contentJson: [{"text":"They failed to keep God’s covenant","poem":1},{"text":"and refused to live by His law.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They failed to keep God’s covenant and refused to live by His law.

contentJson: [{"text":"They forgot what He had done,","poem":1},{"text":"the wonders He had shown them.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They forgot what He had done, the wonders He had shown them.

contentJson: [{"text":"He worked wonders before their fathers","poem":1},{"text":"in the land of Egypt, in the region of Zoan.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He worked wonders before their fathers in the land of Egypt, in the region of Zoan.

contentJson: [{"text":"He split the sea and brought them through;","poem":1},{"text":"He set the waters upright like a wall.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He split the sea and brought them through; He set the waters upright like a wall.

contentJson: [{"text":"He led them with a cloud by day","poem":1},{"text":"and with a light of fire all night.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He led them with a cloud by day and with a light of fire all night.

contentJson: [{"text":"He split the rocks in the wilderness","poem":1},{"text":"and gave them drink as abundant as the seas.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He split the rocks in the wilderness and gave them drink as abundant as the seas.

contentJson: [{"text":"He brought streams from the stone","poem":1},{"text":"and made water flow down like rivers.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He brought streams from the stone and made water flow down like rivers.

contentJson: [{"text":"But they continued to sin against Him,","poem":1},{"text":"rebelling in the desert against the Most High.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But they continued to sin against Him, rebelling in the desert against the Most High.

contentJson: [{"text":"They willfully tested God","poem":1},{"text":"by demanding the food they craved.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They willfully tested God by demanding the food they craved.

contentJson: [{"text":"They spoke against God, saying,","poem":1},{"text":"“Can God really prepare a table in the wilderness?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They spoke against God, saying, “Can God really prepare a table in the wilderness?

contentJson: [{"text":"When He struck the rock, water gushed out","poem":1},{"text":"and torrents raged.","poem":2},{"text":"But can He also give bread","poem":1},{"text":"or supply His people with meat?”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: When He struck the rock, water gushed out and torrents raged. But can He also give bread or supply His people with meat?”

contentJson: [{"text":"Therefore the LORD heard","poem":1},{"text":"and was filled with wrath;","poem":2},{"text":"so a fire was kindled against Jacob,","poem":1},{"text":"and His anger flared against Israel,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Therefore the LORD heard and was filled with wrath; so a fire was kindled against Jacob, and His anger flared against Israel,

contentJson: [{"text":"because they did not believe God","poem":1},{"text":"or rely on His salvation.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: because they did not believe God or rely on His salvation.

contentJson: [{"text":"Yet He commanded the clouds above","poem":1},{"text":"and opened the doors of the heavens.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Yet He commanded the clouds above and opened the doors of the heavens.

contentJson: [{"text":"He rained down manna for them to eat;","poem":1},{"text":"He gave them grain from heaven.","poem":2},{"noteId":172}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He rained down manna for them to eat; He gave them grain from heaven.

contentJson: [{"text":"Man ate the bread of angels;","poem":1},{"text":"He sent them food in abundance.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Man ate the bread of angels; He sent them food in abundance.

contentJson: [{"text":"He stirred the east wind from the heavens","poem":1},{"text":"and drove the south wind by His might.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He stirred the east wind from the heavens and drove the south wind by His might.

contentJson: [{"text":"He rained meat on them like dust,","poem":1},{"text":"and winged birds like the sand of the sea.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He rained meat on them like dust, and winged birds like the sand of the sea.

contentJson: [{"text":"He felled them in the midst of their camp,","poem":1},{"text":"all around their dwellings.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He felled them in the midst of their camp, all around their dwellings.

contentJson: [{"text":"So they ate and were well filled,","poem":1},{"text":"for He gave them what they craved.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: So they ate and were well filled, for He gave them what they craved.

contentJson: [{"text":"Yet before they had filled their desire,","poem":1},{"text":"with the food still in their mouths,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Yet before they had filled their desire, with the food still in their mouths,

contentJson: [{"text":"God’s anger flared against them,","poem":1},{"text":"and He put to death their strongest","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"and subdued the young men of Israel.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
God’s anger flared against them, and He put to death their strongest 
and subdued the young men of Israel.

contentJson: [{"text":"In spite of all this, they kept on sinning;","poem":1},{"text":"despite His wonderful works, they did not believe.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: In spite of all this, they kept on sinning; despite His wonderful works, they did not believe.

contentJson: [{"text":"So He ended their days in futility,","poem":1},{"noteId":173},{"text":"and their years in sudden terror.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: So He ended their days in futility, and their years in sudden terror.

contentJson: [{"text":"When He slew them, they would seek Him;","poem":1},{"text":"they repented and searched for God.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: When He slew them, they would seek Him; they repented and searched for God.

contentJson: [{"text":"And they remembered that God was their Rock,","poem":1},{"text":"that God Most High","poem":2},{"noteId":174},{"text":"was their Redeemer.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: And they remembered that God was their Rock, that God Most High was their Redeemer.

contentJson: [{"text":"But they deceived Him with their mouths,","poem":1},{"text":"and lied to Him with their tongues.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But they deceived Him with their mouths, and lied to Him with their tongues.

contentJson: [{"text":"Their hearts were disloyal to Him,","poem":1},{"text":"and they were unfaithful to His covenant.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Their hearts were disloyal to Him, and they were unfaithful to His covenant.

contentJson: [{"text":"And yet He was compassionate;","poem":1},{"text":"He forgave their iniquity and did not destroy them.","poem":2},{"text":"He often restrained His anger","poem":1},{"text":"and did not unleash His full wrath.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: And yet He was compassionate; He forgave their iniquity and did not destroy them. He often restrained His anger and did not unleash His full wrath.

contentJson: [{"text":"He remembered that they were but flesh,","poem":1},{"text":"a passing breeze that does not return.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He remembered that they were but flesh, a passing breeze that does not return.

contentJson: [{"text":"How often they disobeyed Him in the wilderness","poem":1},{"text":"and grieved Him in the desert!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: How often they disobeyed Him in the wilderness and grieved Him in the desert!

contentJson: [{"text":"Again and again they tested God","poem":1},{"text":"and provoked the Holy One of Israel.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Again and again they tested God and provoked the Holy One of Israel.

contentJson: [{"text":"They did not remember His power","poem":1},{"noteId":175},{"text":"—","poem":1},{"text":"the day He redeemed them from the adversary,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They did not remember His power — the day He redeemed them from the adversary,

contentJson: [{"text":"when He performed His signs in Egypt","poem":1},{"text":"and His wonders in the fields of Zoan.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: when He performed His signs in Egypt and His wonders in the fields of Zoan.

contentJson: [{"text":"He turned their rivers to blood,","poem":1},{"text":"and from their streams they could not drink.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He turned their rivers to blood, and from their streams they could not drink.

contentJson: [{"text":"He sent swarms of flies that devoured them,","poem":1},{"text":"and frogs that devastated them.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He sent swarms of flies that devoured them, and frogs that devastated them.

contentJson: [{"text":"He gave their crops to the grasshopper,","poem":1},{"text":"the fruit of their labor to the locust.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He gave their crops to the grasshopper, the fruit of their labor to the locust.

contentJson: [{"text":"He killed their vines with hailstones","poem":1},{"text":"and their sycamore-figs with sleet.","poem":2},{"noteId":176}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He killed their vines with hailstones and their sycamore-figs with sleet.

contentJson: [{"text":"He abandoned their cattle to the hail","poem":1},{"text":"and their livestock to bolts of lightning.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He abandoned their cattle to the hail and their livestock to bolts of lightning.

contentJson: [{"text":"He unleashed His fury against them,","poem":1},{"text":"wrath, indignation, and calamity—","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"a band of destroying angels.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
He unleashed His fury against them, wrath, indignation, and calamity— 
a band of destroying angels.

contentJson: [{"text":"He cleared a path for His anger;","poem":1},{"text":"He did not spare them from death","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"but delivered their lives to the plague.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
He cleared a path for His anger; He did not spare them from death 
but delivered their lives to the plague.

contentJson: [{"text":"He struck all the firstborn of Egypt,","poem":1},{"text":"the virility in the tents of Ham.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He struck all the firstborn of Egypt, the virility in the tents of Ham.

contentJson: [{"text":"He led out His people like sheep","poem":1},{"text":"and guided them like a flock in the wilderness.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He led out His people like sheep and guided them like a flock in the wilderness.

contentJson: [{"text":"He led them safely, so they did not fear,","poem":1},{"text":"but the sea engulfed their enemies.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He led them safely, so they did not fear, but the sea engulfed their enemies.

contentJson: [{"text":"He brought them to His holy land,","poem":1},{"text":"to the mountain His right hand had acquired.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He brought them to His holy land, to the mountain His right hand had acquired.

contentJson: [{"text":"He drove out nations before them","poem":1},{"text":"and apportioned their inheritance;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"He settled the tribes of Israel in their tents.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
He drove out nations before them and apportioned their inheritance; 
He settled the tribes of Israel in their tents.

contentJson: [{"text":"But they tested and disobeyed God Most High,","poem":1},{"text":"for they did not keep His decrees.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But they tested and disobeyed God Most High, for they did not keep His decrees.

contentJson: [{"text":"They turned back and were faithless like their fathers,","poem":1},{"text":"twisted like a faulty bow.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They turned back and were faithless like their fathers, twisted like a faulty bow.

contentJson: [{"text":"They enraged Him with their high places","poem":1},{"text":"and provoked His jealousy with their idols.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They enraged Him with their high places and provoked His jealousy with their idols.

contentJson: [{"text":"On hearing it, God was furious","poem":1},{"text":"and rejected Israel completely.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: On hearing it, God was furious and rejected Israel completely.

contentJson: [{"text":"He abandoned the tabernacle of Shiloh,","poem":1},{"text":"the tent He had pitched among men.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He abandoned the tabernacle of Shiloh, the tent He had pitched among men.

contentJson: [{"text":"He delivered His strength to captivity,","poem":1},{"text":"and His splendor to the hand of the adversary.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He delivered His strength to captivity, and His splendor to the hand of the adversary.

contentJson: [{"text":"He surrendered His people to the sword","poem":1},{"text":"because He was enraged by His heritage.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He surrendered His people to the sword because He was enraged by His heritage.

contentJson: [{"text":"Fire consumed His young men,","poem":1},{"text":"and their maidens were left without wedding songs.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Fire consumed His young men, and their maidens were left without wedding songs.

contentJson: [{"text":"His priests fell by the sword,","poem":1},{"text":"but their widows could not lament.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: His priests fell by the sword, but their widows could not lament.

contentJson: [{"text":"Then the Lord awoke as from sleep,","poem":1},{"text":"like a mighty warrior overcome by wine.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Then the Lord awoke as from sleep, like a mighty warrior overcome by wine.

contentJson: [{"text":"He beat back His foes;","poem":1},{"text":"He put them to everlasting shame.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He beat back His foes; He put them to everlasting shame.

contentJson: [{"text":"He rejected the tent of Joseph","poem":1},{"text":"and refused the tribe of Ephraim.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He rejected the tent of Joseph and refused the tribe of Ephraim.

contentJson: [{"text":"But He chose the tribe of Judah,","poem":1},{"text":"Mount Zion, which He loved.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But He chose the tribe of Judah, Mount Zion, which He loved.

contentJson: [{"text":"He built His sanctuary like the heights,","poem":1},{"text":"like the earth He has established forever.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He built His sanctuary like the heights, like the earth He has established forever.

contentJson: [{"text":"He chose David His servant","poem":1},{"text":"and took him from the sheepfolds;","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He chose David His servant and took him from the sheepfolds;

contentJson: [{"text":"from tending the ewes He brought him","poem":1},{"text":"to be shepherd of His people Jacob,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"of Israel His inheritance.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
from tending the ewes He brought him to be shepherd of His people Jacob, 
of Israel His inheritance.

contentJson: [{"text":"So David shepherded them with integrity of heart","poem":1},{"text":"and guided them with skillful hands.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: So David shepherded them with integrity of heart and guided them with skillful hands.

contentJson: [{"text":"The nations, O God, have invaded Your inheritance;","poem":1},{"text":"they have defiled Your holy temple","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"and reduced Jerusalem to rubble.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
The nations, O God, have invaded Your inheritance; they have defiled Your holy temple 
and reduced Jerusalem to rubble.

contentJson: [{"text":"They have given the corpses of Your servants","poem":1},{"text":"as food to the birds of the air,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"the flesh of Your saints to the beasts of the earth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
They have given the corpses of Your servants as food to the birds of the air, 
the flesh of Your saints to the beasts of the earth.

contentJson: [{"text":"They have poured out their blood like water","poem":1},{"text":"all around Jerusalem,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"and there is no one to bury the dead.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
They have poured out their blood like water all around Jerusalem, 
and there is no one to bury the dead.

contentJson: [{"text":"We have become a reproach to our neighbors,","poem":1},{"text":"a scorn and derision to those around us.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: We have become a reproach to our neighbors, a scorn and derision to those around us.

contentJson: [{"text":"How long, O LORD?","poem":1},{"text":"Will You be angry forever?","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"Will Your jealousy burn like fire?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
How long, O LORD? Will You be angry forever? 
Will Your jealousy burn like fire?

contentJson: [{"text":"Pour out Your wrath on the nations","poem":1},{"text":"that do not acknowledge You,","poem":2},{"text":"on the kingdoms","poem":1},{"text":"that refuse to call on Your name,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Pour out Your wrath on the nations that do not acknowledge You, on the kingdoms that refuse to call on Your name,

contentJson: [{"text":"for they have devoured Jacob","poem":1},{"text":"and devastated his homeland.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: for they have devoured Jacob and devastated his homeland.

contentJson: [{"text":"Do not hold past sins against us;","poem":1},{"text":"let Your compassion come quickly,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"for we are brought low.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Do not hold past sins against us; let Your compassion come quickly, 
for we are brought low.

contentJson: [{"text":"Help us, O God of our salvation,","poem":1},{"text":"for the glory of Your name;","poem":2},{"text":"deliver us and atone for our sins,","poem":1},{"text":"for the sake of Your name.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Help us, O God of our salvation, for the glory of Your name; deliver us and atone for our sins, for the sake of Your name.

contentJson: [{"text":"Why should the nations ask,","poem":1},{"text":"“Where is their God?”","poem":2},{"text":"Before our eyes, make known among the nations","poem":1},{"text":"Your vengeance for the bloodshed of Your servants.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Why should the nations ask, “Where is their God?” Before our eyes, make known among the nations Your vengeance for the bloodshed of Your servants.

contentJson: [{"text":"May the groans of the captives reach You;","poem":1},{"text":"by the strength of Your arm preserve those condemned to death.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May the groans of the captives reach You; by the strength of Your arm preserve those condemned to death.

contentJson: [{"text":"Pay back into the laps of our neighbors","poem":1},{"text":"sevenfold the reproach they hurled at You, O Lord.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Pay back into the laps of our neighbors sevenfold the reproach they hurled at You, O Lord.

contentJson: [{"text":"Then we Your people, the sheep of Your pasture,","poem":1},{"text":"will thank You forever;","poem":2},{"text":"from generation to generation","poem":1},{"text":"we will declare Your praise.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Then we Your people, the sheep of Your pasture, will thank You forever; from generation to generation we will declare Your praise.

contentJson: [{"text":"Hear us, O Shepherd of Israel,","poem":1},{"text":"who leads Joseph like a flock;","poem":2},{"text":"You who sit enthroned between the cherubim,","poem":1},{"text":"shine forth","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Hear us, O Shepherd of Israel, who leads Joseph like a flock; You who sit enthroned between the cherubim, shine forth

contentJson: [{"text":"before Ephraim, Benjamin, and Manasseh.","poem":2},{"text":"Rally Your mighty power","poem":1},{"text":"and come to save us.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: before Ephraim, Benjamin, and Manasseh. Rally Your mighty power and come to save us.

contentJson: [{"text":"Restore us, O God,","poem":1},{"text":"and cause Your face to shine upon us,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"that we may be saved.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Restore us, O God, and cause Your face to shine upon us, 
that we may be saved.

contentJson: [{"text":"O LORD God of Hosts,","poem":1},{"text":"how long will Your anger smolder","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"against the prayers of Your people?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
O LORD God of Hosts, how long will Your anger smolder 
against the prayers of Your people?

contentJson: [{"text":"You fed them with the bread of tears","poem":1},{"text":"and made them drink the full measure of their tears.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You fed them with the bread of tears and made them drink the full measure of their tears.

contentJson: [{"text":"You make us contend with our neighbors;","poem":1},{"text":"our enemies mock us.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You make us contend with our neighbors; our enemies mock us.

contentJson: [{"text":"Restore us, O God of Hosts,","poem":1},{"text":"and cause Your face to shine upon us,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"that we may be saved.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Restore us, O God of Hosts, and cause Your face to shine upon us, 
that we may be saved.

contentJson: [{"text":"You uprooted a vine from Egypt;","poem":1},{"text":"You drove out the nations and transplanted it.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You uprooted a vine from Egypt; You drove out the nations and transplanted it.

contentJson: [{"text":"You cleared the ground for it,","poem":1},{"text":"and it took root and filled the land.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You cleared the ground for it, and it took root and filled the land.

contentJson: [{"text":"The mountains were covered by its shade,","poem":1},{"text":"and the mighty cedars with its branches.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The mountains were covered by its shade, and the mighty cedars with its branches.

contentJson: [{"text":"It sent out its branches to the Sea,","poem":1},{"noteId":177},{"text":"and its shoots toward the River.","poem":2},{"noteId":178}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: It sent out its branches to the Sea, and its shoots toward the River.

contentJson: [{"text":"Why have You broken down its walls,","poem":1},{"text":"so that all who pass by pick its fruit?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Why have You broken down its walls, so that all who pass by pick its fruit?

contentJson: [{"text":"The boar from the forest ravages it,","poem":1},{"text":"and the creatures of the field feed upon it.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The boar from the forest ravages it, and the creatures of the field feed upon it.

contentJson: [{"text":"Return, O God of Hosts, we pray!","poem":1},{"text":"Look down from heaven and see!","poem":2},{"text":"Attend to this vine—","poem":1}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Return, O God of Hosts, we pray! Look down from heaven and see! Attend to this vine—

contentJson: [{"text":"the root Your right hand has planted,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"the son You have raised up for Yourself.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
the root Your right hand has planted, 
the son You have raised up for Yourself.

contentJson: [{"text":"Your vine has been cut down and burned;","poem":1},{"text":"they perish at the rebuke of Your countenance.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Your vine has been cut down and burned; they perish at the rebuke of Your countenance.

contentJson: [{"text":"Let Your hand be upon the man at Your right hand,","poem":1},{"text":"on the son of man You have raised up for Yourself.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Let Your hand be upon the man at Your right hand, on the son of man You have raised up for Yourself.

contentJson: [{"text":"Then we will not turn away from You;","poem":1},{"text":"revive us, and we will call on Your name.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Then we will not turn away from You; revive us, and we will call on Your name.

contentJson: [{"text":"Restore us, O LORD God of Hosts;","poem":1},{"text":"cause Your face to shine upon us,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"that we may be saved.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Restore us, O LORD God of Hosts; cause Your face to shine upon us, 
that we may be saved.

contentJson: [{"text":"Sing for joy to God our strength;","poem":1},{"text":"make a joyful noise to the God of Jacob.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Sing for joy to God our strength; make a joyful noise to the God of Jacob.

contentJson: [{"text":"Lift up a song, strike the tambourine,","poem":1},{"text":"play the sweet-sounding harp and lyre.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Lift up a song, strike the tambourine, play the sweet-sounding harp and lyre.

contentJson: [{"text":"Sound the ram’s horn at the New Moon,","poem":1},{"text":"and at the full moon on the day of our Feast.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Sound the ram’s horn at the New Moon, and at the full moon on the day of our Feast.

contentJson: [{"text":"For this is a statute for Israel,","poem":1},{"text":"an ordinance of the God of Jacob.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For this is a statute for Israel, an ordinance of the God of Jacob.

contentJson: [{"text":"He ordained it as a testimony for Joseph","poem":1},{"noteId":180},{"text":"when he went out over the land of Egypt,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"where I heard an unfamiliar language:","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
He ordained it as a testimony for Joseph when he went out over the land of Egypt, 
where I heard an unfamiliar language:

contentJson: [{"text":"“I relieved his shoulder of the burden;","poem":1},{"text":"his hands were freed from the basket.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: “I relieved his shoulder of the burden; his hands were freed from the basket.

contentJson: [{"text":"You called out in distress, and I rescued you;","poem":1},{"text":"I answered you from the cloud of thunder;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"I tested you at the waters of Meribah.","poem":2},{"noteId":181},"Selah"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
You called out in distress, and I rescued you; I answered you from the cloud of thunder; 
I tested you at the waters of Meribah. Selah

contentJson: [{"text":"Hear, O My people, and I will warn you:","poem":1},{"text":"O Israel, if only you would listen to Me!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Hear, O My people, and I will warn you: O Israel, if only you would listen to Me!

contentJson: [{"text":"There must be no strange god among you,","poem":1},{"text":"nor shall you bow to a foreign god.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: There must be no strange god among you, nor shall you bow to a foreign god.

contentJson: [{"text":"I am the LORD your God,","poem":1},{"text":"who brought you up out of Egypt.","poem":2},{"text":"Open wide your mouth,","poem":1},{"text":"and I will fill it.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I am the LORD your God, who brought you up out of Egypt. Open wide your mouth, and I will fill it.

contentJson: [{"text":"But My people would not listen to Me,","poem":1},{"text":"and Israel would not obey Me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But My people would not listen to Me, and Israel would not obey Me.

contentJson: [{"text":"So I gave them up to their stubborn hearts","poem":1},{"text":"to follow their own devices.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: So I gave them up to their stubborn hearts to follow their own devices.

contentJson: [{"text":"If only My people would listen to Me,","poem":1},{"text":"if Israel would follow My ways,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: If only My people would listen to Me, if Israel would follow My ways,

contentJson: [{"text":"how soon I would subdue their enemies","poem":1},{"text":"and turn My hand against their foes!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: how soon I would subdue their enemies and turn My hand against their foes!

contentJson: [{"text":"Those who hate the LORD would feign obedience,","poem":1},{"text":"and their doom would last forever.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Those who hate the LORD would feign obedience, and their doom would last forever.

contentJson: [{"text":"But I would feed you the finest wheat;","poem":1},{"text":"with honey from the rock I would satisfy you.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But I would feed you the finest wheat; with honey from the rock I would satisfy you.”

contentJson: [{"text":"God presides in the divine assembly;","poem":1},{"text":"He renders judgment among the gods:","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: God presides in the divine assembly; He renders judgment among the gods:

contentJson: [{"text":"“How long will you judge unjustly","poem":1},{"noteId":182},{"text":"and show partiality to the wicked?","poem":2},"Selah"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: “How long will you judge unjustly and show partiality to the wicked? Selah

contentJson: [{"text":"Defend the cause of the weak and fatherless;","poem":1},{"text":"uphold the rights of the afflicted and oppressed.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Defend the cause of the weak and fatherless; uphold the rights of the afflicted and oppressed.

contentJson: [{"text":"Rescue the weak and needy;","poem":1},{"text":"save them from the hand of the wicked.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Rescue the weak and needy; save them from the hand of the wicked.

contentJson: [{"text":"They do not know or understand;","poem":1},{"text":"they wander in the darkness;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"all the foundations of the earth are shaken.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
They do not know or understand; they wander in the darkness; 
all the foundations of the earth are shaken.

contentJson: [{"text":"I have said, ‘You are gods;","poem":1},{"text":"you are all sons of the Most High.’","poem":2},{"noteId":183}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I have said, ‘You are gods; you are all sons of the Most High.’

contentJson: [{"text":"But like mortals you will die,","poem":1},{"text":"and like rulers you will fall.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But like mortals you will die, and like rulers you will fall.”

contentJson: [{"text":"Arise, O God, judge the earth,","poem":1},{"text":"for all the nations are Your inheritance.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Arise, O God, judge the earth, for all the nations are Your inheritance.

contentJson: [{"text":"O God, be not silent; be not speechless;","poem":1},{"noteId":184},{"text":"be not still, O God.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: O God, be not silent; be not speechless; be not still, O God.

contentJson: [{"text":"See how Your enemies rage,","poem":1},{"text":"how Your foes have reared their heads.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: See how Your enemies rage, how Your foes have reared their heads.

contentJson: [{"text":"With cunning they scheme against Your people","poem":1},{"text":"and conspire against those You cherish,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: With cunning they scheme against Your people and conspire against those You cherish,

contentJson: [{"text":"saying, “Come, let us erase them as a nation;","poem":1},{"text":"may the name of Israel be remembered no more.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: saying, “Come, let us erase them as a nation; may the name of Israel be remembered no more.”

contentJson: [{"text":"For with one mind they plot together,","poem":1},{"text":"they form an alliance against You—","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For with one mind they plot together, they form an alliance against You—

contentJson: [{"text":"the tents of Edom and the Ishmaelites,","poem":1},{"text":"of Moab and the Hagrites,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: the tents of Edom and the Ishmaelites, of Moab and the Hagrites,

contentJson: [{"text":"of Gebal, Ammon, and Amalek,","poem":1},{"text":"of Philistia with the people of Tyre.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: of Gebal, Ammon, and Amalek, of Philistia with the people of Tyre.

contentJson: [{"text":"Even Assyria has joined them,","poem":1},{"text":"lending strength to the sons of Lot.","poem":2},"Selah"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Even Assyria has joined them, lending strength to the sons of Lot. Selah

contentJson: [{"text":"Do to them as You did to Midian,","poem":1},{"text":"as to Sisera and Jabin at the River Kishon,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Do to them as You did to Midian, as to Sisera and Jabin at the River Kishon,

contentJson: [{"text":"who perished at Endor","poem":1},{"text":"and became like dung on the ground.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: who perished at Endor and became like dung on the ground.

contentJson: [{"text":"Make their nobles like Oreb and Zeeb,","poem":1},{"text":"and all their princes like Zebah and Zalmunna,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Make their nobles like Oreb and Zeeb, and all their princes like Zebah and Zalmunna,

contentJson: [{"text":"who said, “Let us possess for ourselves","poem":1},{"text":"the pastures of God.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: who said, “Let us possess for ourselves the pastures of God.”

contentJson: [{"text":"Make them like tumbleweed, O my God,","poem":1},{"text":"like chaff before the wind.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Make them like tumbleweed, O my God, like chaff before the wind.

contentJson: [{"text":"As fire consumes a forest,","poem":1},{"text":"as a flame sets the mountains ablaze,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: As fire consumes a forest, as a flame sets the mountains ablaze,

contentJson: [{"text":"so pursue them with Your tempest,","poem":1},{"text":"and terrify them with Your storm.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: so pursue them with Your tempest, and terrify them with Your storm.

contentJson: [{"text":"Cover their faces with shame,","poem":1},{"text":"that they may seek Your name, O LORD.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Cover their faces with shame, that they may seek Your name, O LORD.

contentJson: [{"text":"May they be ever ashamed and terrified;","poem":1},{"text":"may they perish in disgrace.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May they be ever ashamed and terrified; may they perish in disgrace.

contentJson: [{"text":"May they know that You alone,","poem":1},{"text":"whose name is the LORD,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"are Most High over all the earth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
May they know that You alone, whose name is the LORD, 
are Most High over all the earth.

contentJson: [{"text":"How lovely is Your dwelling place,","poem":1},{"text":"O LORD of Hosts!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: How lovely is Your dwelling place, O LORD of Hosts!

contentJson: [{"text":"My soul longs, even faints,","poem":1},{"text":"for the courts of the LORD;","poem":2},{"text":"my heart and my flesh cry out","poem":1},{"text":"for the living God.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: My soul longs, even faints, for the courts of the LORD; my heart and my flesh cry out for the living God.

contentJson: [{"text":"Even the sparrow has found a home,","poem":1},{"text":"and the swallow a nest for herself,","poem":2},{"text":"where she places her young near Your altars,","poem":1},{"text":"O LORD of Hosts, my King and my God.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Even the sparrow has found a home, and the swallow a nest for herself, where she places her young near Your altars, O LORD of Hosts, my King and my God.

contentJson: [{"text":"How blessed are those who dwell in Your house!","poem":1},{"text":"They are ever praising You.","poem":2},"Selah"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: How blessed are those who dwell in Your house! They are ever praising You. Selah

contentJson: [{"text":"Blessed are those whose strength is in You,","poem":1},{"text":"whose hearts are set on pilgrimage.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Blessed are those whose strength is in You, whose hearts are set on pilgrimage.

contentJson: [{"text":"As they pass through the Valley of Baca,","poem":1},{"noteId":186},{"text":"they make it a place of springs;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"even the autumn rain covers it with pools.","poem":2},{"noteId":187}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
As they pass through the Valley of Baca, they make it a place of springs; 
even the autumn rain covers it with pools.

contentJson: [{"text":"They go from strength to strength,","poem":1},{"text":"until each appears before God in Zion.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They go from strength to strength, until each appears before God in Zion.

contentJson: [{"text":"O LORD God of Hosts, hear my prayer;","poem":1},{"text":"give ear, O God of Jacob.","poem":2},"Selah"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: O LORD God of Hosts, hear my prayer; give ear, O God of Jacob. Selah

contentJson: [{"text":"Take notice of our shield, O God,","poem":1},{"text":"and look with favor on the face of Your anointed.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Take notice of our shield, O God, and look with favor on the face of Your anointed.

contentJson: [{"text":"For better is one day in Your courts","poem":1},{"text":"than a thousand elsewhere.","poem":2},{"text":"I would rather be a doorkeeper in the house of my God","poem":1},{"text":"than dwell in the tents of the wicked.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For better is one day in Your courts than a thousand elsewhere. I would rather be a doorkeeper in the house of my God than dwell in the tents of the wicked.

contentJson: [{"text":"For the LORD God is a sun and a shield;","poem":1},{"text":"the LORD gives grace and glory;","poem":2},{"text":"He withholds no good thing","poem":1},{"text":"from those who walk with integrity.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For the LORD God is a sun and a shield; the LORD gives grace and glory; He withholds no good thing from those who walk with integrity.

contentJson: [{"text":"O LORD of Hosts,","poem":1},{"text":"how blessed is the man who trusts in You!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: O LORD of Hosts, how blessed is the man who trusts in You!

contentJson: [{"text":"You showed favor to Your land, O LORD;","poem":1},{"text":"You restored Jacob from captivity.","poem":2},{"noteId":188}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You showed favor to Your land, O LORD; You restored Jacob from captivity.

contentJson: [{"text":"You forgave the iniquity of Your people;","poem":1},{"text":"You covered all their sin.","poem":2},"Selah"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You forgave the iniquity of Your people; You covered all their sin. Selah

contentJson: [{"text":"You withheld all Your fury;","poem":1},{"text":"You turned from Your burning anger.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You withheld all Your fury; You turned from Your burning anger.

contentJson: [{"text":"Restore us, O God of our salvation,","poem":1},{"text":"and put away Your displeasure toward us.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Restore us, O God of our salvation, and put away Your displeasure toward us.

contentJson: [{"text":"Will You be angry with us forever?","poem":1},{"text":"Will You draw out Your anger to all generations?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Will You be angry with us forever? Will You draw out Your anger to all generations?

contentJson: [{"text":"Will You not revive us again,","poem":1},{"text":"that Your people may rejoice in You?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Will You not revive us again, that Your people may rejoice in You?

contentJson: [{"text":"Show us Your loving devotion, O LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"and grant us Your salvation.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Show us Your loving devotion, O LORD, and grant us Your salvation.

contentJson: [{"text":"I will listen to what God the LORD will say;","poem":1},{"text":"for He will surely speak peace to His people and His saints;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"He will not let them return to folly.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
I will listen to what God the LORD will say; for He will surely speak peace to His people and His saints; 
He will not let them return to folly.

contentJson: [{"text":"Surely His salvation is near to those who fear Him,","poem":1},{"text":"that His glory may dwell in our land.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Surely His salvation is near to those who fear Him, that His glory may dwell in our land.

contentJson: [{"text":"Loving devotion and faithfulness have joined together;","poem":1},{"text":"righteousness and peace have kissed.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Loving devotion and faithfulness have joined together; righteousness and peace have kissed.

contentJson: [{"text":"Faithfulness sprouts from the earth,","poem":1},{"text":"and righteousness looks down from heaven.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Faithfulness sprouts from the earth, and righteousness looks down from heaven.

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD will indeed provide what is good,","poem":1},{"text":"and our land will yield its increase.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The LORD will indeed provide what is good, and our land will yield its increase.

contentJson: [{"text":"Righteousness will go before Him","poem":1},{"text":"to prepare the way for His steps.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Righteousness will go before Him to prepare the way for His steps.

contentJson: [{"text":"Incline Your ear, O LORD, and answer me,","poem":1},{"text":"for I am poor and needy.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Incline Your ear, O LORD, and answer me, for I am poor and needy.

contentJson: [{"text":"Preserve my soul, for I am godly.","poem":1},{"text":"You are my God; save Your servant who trusts in You.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Preserve my soul, for I am godly. You are my God; save Your servant who trusts in You.

contentJson: [{"text":"Be merciful to me, O Lord,","poem":1},{"text":"for I call to You all day long.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Be merciful to me, O Lord, for I call to You all day long.

contentJson: [{"text":"Bring joy to Your servant,","poem":1},{"text":"for to You, O Lord, I lift up my soul.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Bring joy to Your servant, for to You, O Lord, I lift up my soul.

contentJson: [{"text":"For You, O Lord, are kind and forgiving,","poem":1},{"text":"rich in loving devotion to all who call on You.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For You, O Lord, are kind and forgiving, rich in loving devotion to all who call on You.

contentJson: [{"text":"Hear my prayer, O LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"and attend to my plea for mercy.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Hear my prayer, O LORD, and attend to my plea for mercy.

contentJson: [{"text":"In the day of my distress I call on You,","poem":1},{"text":"because You answer me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: In the day of my distress I call on You, because You answer me.

contentJson: [{"text":"O Lord, there is none like You among the gods,","poem":1},{"text":"nor any works like Yours.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: O Lord, there is none like You among the gods, nor any works like Yours.

contentJson: [{"text":"All the nations You have made","poem":1},{"text":"will come and bow before You, O Lord,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"and they will glorify Your name.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
All the nations You have made will come and bow before You, O Lord, 
and they will glorify Your name.

contentJson: [{"text":"For You are great and perform wonders;","poem":1},{"text":"You alone are God.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For You are great and perform wonders; You alone are God.

contentJson: [{"text":"Teach me Your way, O LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"that I may walk in Your truth.","poem":2},{"text":"Give me an undivided heart,","poem":1},{"text":"that I may fear Your name.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Teach me Your way, O LORD, that I may walk in Your truth. Give me an undivided heart, that I may fear Your name.

contentJson: [{"text":"I will praise You, O Lord my God, with all my heart;","poem":1},{"text":"I will glorify Your name forever.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I will praise You, O Lord my God, with all my heart; I will glorify Your name forever.

contentJson: [{"text":"For great is Your loving devotion to me;","poem":1},{"text":"You have delivered me from the depths of Sheol.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For great is Your loving devotion to me; You have delivered me from the depths of Sheol.

contentJson: [{"text":"The arrogant rise against me, O God;","poem":1},{"text":"a band of ruthless men seeks my life,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"with no regard for You.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
The arrogant rise against me, O God; a band of ruthless men seeks my life, 
with no regard for You.

contentJson: [{"text":"But You, O Lord, are a compassionate and gracious God,","poem":1},{"text":"slow to anger, abounding in loving devotion and faithfulness.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But You, O Lord, are a compassionate and gracious God, slow to anger, abounding in loving devotion and faithfulness.

contentJson: [{"text":"Turn to me and have mercy;","poem":1},{"text":"grant Your strength to Your servant;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"save the son of Your maidservant.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Turn to me and have mercy; grant Your strength to Your servant; 
save the son of Your maidservant.

contentJson: [{"text":"Show me a sign of Your goodness,","poem":1},{"text":"that my enemies may see and be ashamed;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"for You, O LORD, have helped me and comforted me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Show me a sign of Your goodness, that my enemies may see and be ashamed; 
for You, O LORD, have helped me and comforted me.

contentJson: [{"text":"He has founded His city","poem":1},{"text":"on the holy mountains.","poem":2},{"noteId":189}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He has founded His city on the holy mountains.

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD loves the gates of Zion","poem":1},{"text":"more than all the dwellings of Jacob.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The LORD loves the gates of Zion more than all the dwellings of Jacob.

contentJson: [{"text":"Glorious things are ascribed to you,","poem":1},{"text":"O city of God.","poem":2},"Selah"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Glorious things are ascribed to you, O city of God. Selah

contentJson: [{"text":"“I will mention Rahab","poem":1},{"noteId":190},{"text":"and Babylon","poem":1},{"text":"among those who know Me—","poem":2},{"text":"along with Philistia, Tyre, and Cush","poem":1},{"noteId":191},{"text":"—","poem":1},{"text":"when I say, ‘This one was born in Zion.’”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: “I will mention Rahab and Babylon among those who know Me— along with Philistia, Tyre, and Cush — when I say, ‘This one was born in Zion.’”

contentJson: [{"text":"And it will be said of Zion:","poem":1},{"text":"“This one and that one were born in her,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"and the Most High Himself will establish her.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
And it will be said of Zion: “This one and that one were born in her, 
and the Most High Himself will establish her.”

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD will record in the register of the peoples:","poem":1},{"text":"“This one was born in Zion.”","poem":2},"Selah"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The LORD will record in the register of the peoples: “This one was born in Zion.” Selah

contentJson: [{"text":"Singers and pipers will proclaim,","poem":1},{"text":"“All my springs of joy are in You.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Singers and pipers will proclaim, “All my springs of joy are in You.”

contentJson: [{"text":"O LORD, the God of my salvation,","poem":1},{"text":"day and night I cry out before You.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: O LORD, the God of my salvation, day and night I cry out before You.

contentJson: [{"text":"May my prayer come before You;","poem":1},{"text":"incline Your ear to my cry.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May my prayer come before You; incline Your ear to my cry.

contentJson: [{"text":"For my soul is full of troubles,","poem":1},{"text":"and my life draws near to Sheol.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For my soul is full of troubles, and my life draws near to Sheol.

contentJson: [{"text":"I am counted among those descending to the Pit.","poem":1},{"text":"I am like a man without strength.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I am counted among those descending to the Pit. I am like a man without strength.

contentJson: [{"text":"I am forsaken among the dead,","poem":1},{"text":"like the slain who lie in the grave,","poem":2},{"text":"whom You remember no more,","poem":1},{"text":"who are cut off from Your care.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I am forsaken among the dead, like the slain who lie in the grave, whom You remember no more, who are cut off from Your care.

contentJson: [{"text":"You have laid me in the lowest Pit,","poem":1},{"text":"in the darkest of the depths.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You have laid me in the lowest Pit, in the darkest of the depths.

contentJson: [{"text":"Your wrath weighs heavily upon me;","poem":1},{"text":"all Your waves have submerged me.","poem":2},"Selah"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Your wrath weighs heavily upon me; all Your waves have submerged me. Selah

contentJson: [{"text":"You have removed my friends from me;","poem":1},{"text":"You have made me repulsive to them;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"I am confined and cannot escape.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
You have removed my friends from me; You have made me repulsive to them; 
I am confined and cannot escape.

contentJson: [{"text":"My eyes grow dim with grief.","poem":1},{"text":"I call to You daily, O LORD;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"I spread out my hands to You.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
My eyes grow dim with grief. I call to You daily, O LORD; 
I spread out my hands to You.

contentJson: [{"text":"Do You work wonders for the dead?","poem":1},{"text":"Do departed spirits rise up to praise You?","poem":2},"Selah"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Do You work wonders for the dead? Do departed spirits rise up to praise You? Selah

contentJson: [{"text":"Can Your loving devotion be proclaimed in the grave,","poem":1},{"text":"Your faithfulness in Abaddon","poem":2},{"noteId":194},{"text":"?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Can Your loving devotion be proclaimed in the grave, Your faithfulness in Abaddon ?

contentJson: [{"text":"Will Your wonders be known in the darkness,","poem":1},{"text":"or Your righteousness in the land of oblivion?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Will Your wonders be known in the darkness, or Your righteousness in the land of oblivion?

contentJson: [{"text":"But to You, O LORD, I cry for help;","poem":1},{"text":"in the morning my prayer comes before You.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But to You, O LORD, I cry for help; in the morning my prayer comes before You.

contentJson: [{"text":"Why, O LORD, do You reject me?","poem":1},{"text":"Why do You hide Your face from me?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Why, O LORD, do You reject me? Why do You hide Your face from me?

contentJson: [{"text":"From my youth I was afflicted and near death.","poem":1},{"text":"I have borne Your terrors; I am in despair.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: From my youth I was afflicted and near death. I have borne Your terrors; I am in despair.

contentJson: [{"text":"Your wrath has swept over me;","poem":1},{"text":"Your terrors have destroyed me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Your wrath has swept over me; Your terrors have destroyed me.

contentJson: [{"text":"All day long they engulf me like water;","poem":1},{"text":"they enclose me on every side.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: All day long they engulf me like water; they enclose me on every side.

contentJson: [{"text":"You have removed my beloved and my friend;","poem":1},{"text":"darkness is my closest companion.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You have removed my beloved and my friend; darkness is my closest companion.

contentJson: [{"text":"I will sing of the loving devotion of the LORD forever;","poem":1},{"text":"with my mouth I will proclaim Your faithfulness to all generations.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I will sing of the loving devotion of the LORD forever; with my mouth I will proclaim Your faithfulness to all generations.

contentJson: [{"text":"For I have said, “Loving devotion is built up forever;","poem":1},{"text":"in the heavens You establish Your faithfulness.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For I have said, “Loving devotion is built up forever; in the heavens You establish Your faithfulness.”

contentJson: [{"text":"You said, “I have made a covenant with My chosen one,","poem":1},{"text":"I have sworn to David My servant:","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You said, “I have made a covenant with My chosen one, I have sworn to David My servant:

contentJson: [{"text":"‘I will establish your offspring forever","poem":1},{"text":"and build up your throne for all generations.’”","poem":2},"Selah"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: ‘I will establish your offspring forever and build up your throne for all generations.’” Selah

contentJson: [{"text":"The heavens praise Your wonders, O LORD—","poem":1},{"text":"Your faithfulness as well—","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"in the assembly of the holy ones.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
The heavens praise Your wonders, O LORD— Your faithfulness as well— 
in the assembly of the holy ones.

contentJson: [{"text":"For who in the skies can compare with the LORD?","poem":1},{"text":"Who among the heavenly beings","poem":2},{"noteId":196},{"text":"is like the LORD?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For who in the skies can compare with the LORD? Who among the heavenly beings is like the LORD?

contentJson: [{"text":"In the council of the holy ones, God is greatly feared,","poem":1},{"text":"and awesome above all who surround Him.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: In the council of the holy ones, God is greatly feared, and awesome above all who surround Him.

contentJson: [{"text":"O LORD God of Hosts, who is like You?","poem":1},{"text":"O mighty LORD, Your faithfulness surrounds You.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: O LORD God of Hosts, who is like You? O mighty LORD, Your faithfulness surrounds You.

contentJson: [{"text":"You rule the raging sea;","poem":1},{"text":"when its waves mount up, You still them.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You rule the raging sea; when its waves mount up, You still them.

contentJson: [{"text":"You crushed Rahab like a carcass;","poem":1},{"text":"You scattered Your enemies with Your mighty arm.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You crushed Rahab like a carcass; You scattered Your enemies with Your mighty arm.

contentJson: [{"text":"The heavens are Yours, and also the earth.","poem":1},{"text":"The earth and its fullness You founded.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The heavens are Yours, and also the earth. The earth and its fullness You founded.

contentJson: [{"text":"North and south You created;","poem":1},{"text":"Tabor and Hermon shout for joy at Your name.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: North and south You created; Tabor and Hermon shout for joy at Your name.

contentJson: [{"text":"Mighty is Your arm; strong is Your hand.","poem":1},{"text":"Your right hand is exalted.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Mighty is Your arm; strong is Your hand. Your right hand is exalted.

contentJson: [{"text":"Righteousness and justice are the foundation of Your throne;","poem":1},{"text":"loving devotion and faithfulness go before You.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Righteousness and justice are the foundation of Your throne; loving devotion and faithfulness go before You.

contentJson: [{"text":"Blessed are those who know the joyful sound,","poem":1},{"text":"who walk, O LORD, in the light of Your presence.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Blessed are those who know the joyful sound, who walk, O LORD, in the light of Your presence.

contentJson: [{"text":"They rejoice in Your name all day long,","poem":1},{"text":"and in Your righteousness they exult.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They rejoice in Your name all day long, and in Your righteousness they exult.

contentJson: [{"text":"For You are the glory of their strength,","poem":1},{"text":"and by Your favor our horn is exalted.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For You are the glory of their strength, and by Your favor our horn is exalted.

contentJson: [{"text":"Surely our shield belongs to the LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"and our king to the Holy One of Israel.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Surely our shield belongs to the LORD, and our king to the Holy One of Israel.

contentJson: [{"text":"You once spoke in a vision;","poem":1},{"text":"to Your godly ones You said,","poem":2},{"text":"“I have bestowed help on a warrior;","poem":1},{"text":"I have exalted one chosen from the people.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You once spoke in a vision; to Your godly ones You said, “I have bestowed help on a warrior; I have exalted one chosen from the people.

contentJson: [{"text":"I have found My servant David;","poem":1},{"text":"with My sacred oil I have anointed him.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I have found My servant David; with My sacred oil I have anointed him.

contentJson: [{"text":"My hand will sustain him;","poem":1},{"text":"surely My arm will strengthen him.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: My hand will sustain him; surely My arm will strengthen him.

contentJson: [{"text":"No enemy will exact tribute;","poem":1},{"text":"no wicked man will oppress him.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: No enemy will exact tribute; no wicked man will oppress him.

contentJson: [{"text":"I will crush his foes before him","poem":1},{"text":"and strike down those who hate him.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I will crush his foes before him and strike down those who hate him.

contentJson: [{"text":"My faithfulness and loving devotion will be with him,","poem":1},{"text":"and through My name his horn will be exalted.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: My faithfulness and loving devotion will be with him, and through My name his horn will be exalted.

contentJson: [{"text":"I will set his hand over the sea,","poem":1},{"text":"and his right hand upon the rivers.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I will set his hand over the sea, and his right hand upon the rivers.

contentJson: [{"text":"He will call to Me, ‘You are my Father,","poem":1},{"text":"my God, the Rock of my salvation.’","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He will call to Me, ‘You are my Father, my God, the Rock of my salvation.’

contentJson: [{"text":"I will indeed appoint him as My firstborn,","poem":1},{"text":"the highest of the kings of the earth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I will indeed appoint him as My firstborn, the highest of the kings of the earth.

contentJson: [{"text":"I will forever preserve My loving devotion for him,","poem":1},{"text":"and My covenant with him will stand fast.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I will forever preserve My loving devotion for him, and My covenant with him will stand fast.

contentJson: [{"text":"I will establish his line forever,","poem":1},{"text":"his throne as long as the heavens endure.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I will establish his line forever, his throne as long as the heavens endure.

contentJson: [{"text":"If his sons forsake My law","poem":1},{"text":"and do not walk in My judgments,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: If his sons forsake My law and do not walk in My judgments,

contentJson: [{"text":"if they violate My statutes","poem":1},{"text":"and fail to keep My commandments,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: if they violate My statutes and fail to keep My commandments,

contentJson: [{"text":"I will attend to their transgression with the rod,","poem":1},{"text":"and to their iniquity with stripes.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I will attend to their transgression with the rod, and to their iniquity with stripes.

contentJson: [{"text":"But I will not withdraw My loving devotion from him,","poem":1},{"text":"nor ever betray My faithfulness.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But I will not withdraw My loving devotion from him, nor ever betray My faithfulness.

contentJson: [{"text":"I will not violate My covenant","poem":1},{"text":"or alter the utterance of My lips.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I will not violate My covenant or alter the utterance of My lips.

contentJson: [{"text":"Once and for all I have sworn by My holiness—","poem":1},{"text":"I will not lie to David—","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Once and for all I have sworn by My holiness— I will not lie to David—

contentJson: [{"text":"his offspring shall endure forever,","poem":1},{"text":"and his throne before Me like the sun,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: his offspring shall endure forever, and his throne before Me like the sun,

contentJson: [{"text":"like the moon, established forever,","poem":1},{"text":"a faithful witness in the sky.”","poem":2},"Selah"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: like the moon, established forever, a faithful witness in the sky.” Selah

contentJson: [{"text":"Now, however, You have spurned and rejected him;","poem":1},{"text":"You are enraged by Your anointed one.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Now, however, You have spurned and rejected him; You are enraged by Your anointed one.

contentJson: [{"text":"You have renounced the covenant with Your servant","poem":1},{"text":"and sullied his crown in the dust.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You have renounced the covenant with Your servant and sullied his crown in the dust.

contentJson: [{"text":"You have broken down all his walls;","poem":1},{"text":"You have reduced his strongholds to rubble.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You have broken down all his walls; You have reduced his strongholds to rubble.

contentJson: [{"text":"All who pass by plunder him;","poem":1},{"text":"he has become a reproach to his neighbors.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: All who pass by plunder him; he has become a reproach to his neighbors.

contentJson: [{"text":"You have exalted the right hand of his foes;","poem":1},{"text":"You have made all his enemies rejoice.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You have exalted the right hand of his foes; You have made all his enemies rejoice.

contentJson: [{"text":"You have bent the edge of his sword","poem":1},{"text":"and have not sustained him in battle.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
