text: You have bent the edge of his sword and have not sustained him in battle.

contentJson: [{"text":"You have ended his splendor","poem":1},{"text":"and cast his throne to the ground.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You have ended his splendor and cast his throne to the ground.

contentJson: [{"text":"You have cut short the days of his youth;","poem":1},{"text":"You have covered him with shame.","poem":2},"Selah"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You have cut short the days of his youth; You have covered him with shame. Selah

contentJson: [{"text":"How long, O LORD?","poem":1},{"text":"Will You hide Yourself forever?","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"Will Your wrath keep burning like fire?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
How long, O LORD? Will You hide Yourself forever? 
Will Your wrath keep burning like fire?

contentJson: [{"text":"Remember the briefness of my lifespan!","poem":1},{"text":"For what futility You have created all men!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Remember the briefness of my lifespan! For what futility You have created all men!

contentJson: [{"text":"What man can live and never see death?","poem":1},{"text":"Can he deliver his soul from the power of Sheol?","poem":2},"Selah"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: What man can live and never see death? Can he deliver his soul from the power of Sheol? Selah

contentJson: [{"text":"Where, O Lord, is Your loving devotion of old,","poem":1},{"text":"which You faithfully swore to David?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Where, O Lord, is Your loving devotion of old, which You faithfully swore to David?

contentJson: [{"text":"Remember, O Lord, the reproach of Your servants,","poem":1},{"text":"which I bear in my heart from so many people—","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Remember, O Lord, the reproach of Your servants, which I bear in my heart from so many people—

contentJson: [{"text":"how Your enemies have taunted, O LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"and have mocked every step of Your anointed one!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: how Your enemies have taunted, O LORD, and have mocked every step of Your anointed one!

contentJson: [{"text":"Blessed be the LORD forever!","poem":1},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"Amen and amen.","poem":1}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Blessed be the LORD forever! 
Amen and amen.

contentJson: [{"text":"Lord, You have been our dwelling place","poem":1},{"text":"through all generations.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Lord, You have been our dwelling place through all generations.

contentJson: [{"text":"Before the mountains were born","poem":1},{"text":"or You brought forth the earth and the world,","poem":2},{"text":"from everlasting to everlasting","poem":1},{"text":"You are God.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Before the mountains were born or You brought forth the earth and the world, from everlasting to everlasting You are God.

contentJson: [{"text":"You return man to dust,","poem":1},{"text":"saying, “Return, O sons of mortals.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You return man to dust, saying, “Return, O sons of mortals.”

contentJson: [{"text":"For in Your sight a thousand years","poem":1},{"text":"are but a day that passes,","poem":2},{"noteId":197},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"or a watch of the night.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
For in Your sight a thousand years are but a day that passes, 
or a watch of the night.

contentJson: [{"text":"You whisk them away in their sleep;","poem":1},{"text":"they are like the new grass of the morning—","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You whisk them away in their sleep; they are like the new grass of the morning—

contentJson: [{"text":"in the morning it springs up new,","poem":1},{"text":"but by evening it fades and withers.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: in the morning it springs up new, but by evening it fades and withers.

contentJson: [{"text":"For we are consumed by Your anger","poem":1},{"text":"and terrified by Your wrath.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For we are consumed by Your anger and terrified by Your wrath.

contentJson: [{"text":"You have set our iniquities before You,","poem":1},{"text":"our secret sins in the light of Your presence.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You have set our iniquities before You, our secret sins in the light of Your presence.

contentJson: [{"text":"For all our days decline in Your fury;","poem":1},{"text":"we finish our years with a sigh.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For all our days decline in Your fury; we finish our years with a sigh.

contentJson: [{"text":"The length of our days is seventy years—","poem":1},{"text":"or eighty if we are strong—","poem":2},{"text":"yet their pride is but labor and sorrow,","poem":1},{"text":"for they quickly pass, and we fly away.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The length of our days is seventy years— or eighty if we are strong— yet their pride is but labor and sorrow, for they quickly pass, and we fly away.

contentJson: [{"text":"Who knows the power of Your anger?","poem":1},{"text":"Your wrath matches the fear You are due.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Who knows the power of Your anger? Your wrath matches the fear You are due.

contentJson: [{"text":"So teach us to number our days,","poem":1},{"text":"that we may present a heart of wisdom.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: So teach us to number our days, that we may present a heart of wisdom.

contentJson: [{"text":"Return, O LORD! How long will it be?","poem":1},{"text":"Have compassion on Your servants.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Return, O LORD! How long will it be? Have compassion on Your servants.

contentJson: [{"text":"Satisfy us in the morning with Your loving devotion,","poem":1},{"text":"that we may sing for joy and be glad all our days.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Satisfy us in the morning with Your loving devotion, that we may sing for joy and be glad all our days.

contentJson: [{"text":"Make us glad for as many days as You have afflicted us,","poem":1},{"text":"for as many years as we have seen evil.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Make us glad for as many days as You have afflicted us, for as many years as we have seen evil.

contentJson: [{"text":"May Your work be shown to Your servants,","poem":1},{"text":"and Your splendor to their children.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May Your work be shown to Your servants, and Your splendor to their children.

contentJson: [{"text":"May the favor","poem":1},{"noteId":198},{"text":"of the Lord our God rest upon us;","poem":1},{"text":"establish for us the work of our hands—","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"yes, establish the work of our hands!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
May the favor of the Lord our God rest upon us; establish for us the work of our hands— 
yes, establish the work of our hands!

contentJson: [{"text":"He who dwells in the shelter of the Most High","poem":1},{"text":"will abide in the shadow of the Almighty.","poem":2},{"noteId":199}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He who dwells in the shelter of the Most High will abide in the shadow of the Almighty.

contentJson: [{"text":"I will say to the LORD, “You are my refuge and my fortress,","poem":1},{"text":"my God, in whom I trust.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I will say to the LORD, “You are my refuge and my fortress, my God, in whom I trust.”

contentJson: [{"text":"Surely He will deliver you","poem":1},{"text":"from the snare of the fowler,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"and from the deadly plague.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Surely He will deliver you from the snare of the fowler, 
and from the deadly plague.

contentJson: [{"text":"He will cover you with His feathers;","poem":1},{"text":"under His wings you will find refuge;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"His faithfulness is a shield and rampart.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
He will cover you with His feathers; under His wings you will find refuge; 
His faithfulness is a shield and rampart.

contentJson: [{"text":"You will not fear the terror of the night,","poem":1},{"text":"nor the arrow that flies by day,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You will not fear the terror of the night, nor the arrow that flies by day,

contentJson: [{"text":"nor the pestilence that stalks in the darkness,","poem":1},{"text":"nor the calamity that destroys at noon.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: nor the pestilence that stalks in the darkness, nor the calamity that destroys at noon.

contentJson: [{"text":"Though a thousand may fall at your side,","poem":1},{"text":"and ten thousand at your right hand,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"no harm will come near you.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Though a thousand may fall at your side, and ten thousand at your right hand, 
no harm will come near you.

contentJson: [{"text":"You will only see it with your eyes","poem":1},{"text":"and witness the punishment of the wicked.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You will only see it with your eyes and witness the punishment of the wicked.

contentJson: [{"text":"Because you have made the LORD your dwelling—","poem":1},{"text":"my refuge, the Most High—","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Because you have made the LORD your dwelling— my refuge, the Most High—

contentJson: [{"text":"no evil will befall you,","poem":1},{"text":"no plague will approach your tent.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: no evil will befall you, no plague will approach your tent.

contentJson: [{"text":"For He will command His angels concerning you","poem":1},{"text":"to guard you in all your ways.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For He will command His angels concerning you to guard you in all your ways.

contentJson: [{"text":"They will lift you up in their hands,","poem":1},{"text":"so that you will not strike your foot against a stone.","poem":2},{"noteId":200}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They will lift you up in their hands, so that you will not strike your foot against a stone.

contentJson: [{"text":"You will tread on the lion and cobra;","poem":1},{"text":"you will trample the young lion and serpent.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You will tread on the lion and cobra; you will trample the young lion and serpent.

contentJson: [{"text":"“Because he loves Me, I will deliver him;","poem":1},{"text":"because he knows My name, I will protect him.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: “Because he loves Me, I will deliver him; because he knows My name, I will protect him.

contentJson: [{"text":"When he calls out to Me,","poem":1},{"text":"I will answer him;","poem":2},{"text":"I will be with him in trouble.","poem":1},{"text":"I will deliver him and honor him.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: When he calls out to Me, I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble. I will deliver him and honor him.

contentJson: [{"text":"With long life I will satisfy him","poem":1},{"text":"and show him My salvation.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: With long life I will satisfy him and show him My salvation.”

contentJson: [{"text":"It is good to praise the LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"and to sing praises to Your name, O Most High,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: It is good to praise the LORD, and to sing praises to Your name, O Most High,

contentJson: [{"text":"to proclaim Your loving devotion in the morning","poem":1},{"text":"and Your faithfulness at night","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: to proclaim Your loving devotion in the morning and Your faithfulness at night

contentJson: [{"text":"with the ten-stringed harp","poem":1},{"text":"and the melody of the lyre.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: with the ten-stringed harp and the melody of the lyre.

contentJson: [{"text":"For You, O LORD, have made me glad by Your deeds;","poem":1},{"text":"I sing for joy at the works of Your hands.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For You, O LORD, have made me glad by Your deeds; I sing for joy at the works of Your hands.

contentJson: [{"text":"How great are Your works, O LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"how deep are Your thoughts!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: How great are Your works, O LORD, how deep are Your thoughts!

contentJson: [{"text":"A senseless man does not know,","poem":1},{"text":"and a fool does not understand,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A senseless man does not know, and a fool does not understand,

contentJson: [{"text":"that though the wicked sprout like grass,","poem":1},{"text":"and all evildoers flourish,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"they will be forever destroyed.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
that though the wicked sprout like grass, and all evildoers flourish, 
they will be forever destroyed.

contentJson: [{"text":"But You, O LORD, are exalted forever!","poem":1}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But You, O LORD, are exalted forever!

contentJson: [{"text":"For surely Your enemies, O LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"surely Your enemies will perish;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"all evildoers will be scattered.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
For surely Your enemies, O LORD, surely Your enemies will perish; 
all evildoers will be scattered.

contentJson: [{"text":"But You have exalted my horn like that of a wild ox;","poem":1},{"text":"with fine oil I have been anointed.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But You have exalted my horn like that of a wild ox; with fine oil I have been anointed.

contentJson: [{"text":"My eyes see the downfall of my enemies;","poem":1},{"text":"my ears hear the wailing of my wicked foes.","poem":2},{"noteId":201}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: My eyes see the downfall of my enemies; my ears hear the wailing of my wicked foes.

contentJson: [{"text":"The righteous will flourish like a palm tree,","poem":1},{"text":"and grow like a cedar in Lebanon.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The righteous will flourish like a palm tree, and grow like a cedar in Lebanon.

contentJson: [{"text":"Planted in the house of the LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"they will flourish in the courts of our God.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Planted in the house of the LORD, they will flourish in the courts of our God.

contentJson: [{"text":"In old age they will still bear fruit;","poem":1},{"text":"healthy and green they will remain,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: In old age they will still bear fruit; healthy and green they will remain,

contentJson: [{"text":"to proclaim, “The LORD is upright; He is my Rock,","poem":1},{"text":"and in Him there is no unrighteousness.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: to proclaim, “The LORD is upright; He is my Rock, and in Him there is no unrighteousness.”

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD reigns! He is robed in majesty;","poem":1},{"text":"the LORD has clothed and armed Himself with strength.","poem":2},{"text":"The world indeed is firmly established;","poem":1},{"text":"it cannot be moved.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The LORD reigns! He is robed in majesty; the LORD has clothed and armed Himself with strength. The world indeed is firmly established; it cannot be moved.

contentJson: [{"text":"Your throne was established long ago;","poem":1},{"text":"You are from all eternity.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Your throne was established long ago; You are from all eternity.

contentJson: [{"text":"The floodwaters have risen, O LORD;","poem":1},{"text":"the rivers have raised their voice;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"the seas lift up their pounding waves.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
The floodwaters have risen, O LORD; the rivers have raised their voice; 
the seas lift up their pounding waves.

contentJson: [{"text":"Above the roar of many waters—","poem":1},{"text":"the mighty breakers of the sea—","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"the LORD on high is majestic.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Above the roar of many waters— the mighty breakers of the sea— 
the LORD on high is majestic.

contentJson: [{"text":"Your testimonies are fully confirmed;","poem":1},{"text":"holiness adorns Your house, O LORD,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"for all the days to come.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Your testimonies are fully confirmed; holiness adorns Your house, O LORD, 
for all the days to come.

contentJson: [{"text":"O LORD, God of vengeance,","poem":1},{"text":"O God of vengeance, shine forth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: O LORD, God of vengeance, O God of vengeance, shine forth.

contentJson: [{"text":"Rise up, O Judge of the earth;","poem":1},{"text":"render a reward to the proud.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Rise up, O Judge of the earth; render a reward to the proud.

contentJson: [{"text":"How long will the wicked, O LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"how long will the wicked exult?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: How long will the wicked, O LORD, how long will the wicked exult?

contentJson: [{"text":"They pour out arrogant words;","poem":1},{"text":"all workers of iniquity boast.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They pour out arrogant words; all workers of iniquity boast.

contentJson: [{"text":"They crush Your people, O LORD;","poem":1},{"text":"they oppress Your heritage.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They crush Your people, O LORD; they oppress Your heritage.

contentJson: [{"text":"They kill the widow and the foreigner;","poem":1},{"text":"they murder the fatherless.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They kill the widow and the foreigner; they murder the fatherless.

contentJson: [{"text":"They say, “The LORD does not see;","poem":1},{"text":"the God of Jacob pays no heed.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They say, “The LORD does not see; the God of Jacob pays no heed.”

contentJson: [{"text":"Take notice, O senseless among the people!","poem":1},{"text":"O fools, when will you be wise?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Take notice, O senseless among the people! O fools, when will you be wise?

contentJson: [{"text":"He who affixed the ear, can He not hear?","poem":1},{"text":"He who formed the eye, can He not see?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He who affixed the ear, can He not hear? He who formed the eye, can He not see?

contentJson: [{"text":"He who admonishes the nations, does He not discipline?","poem":1},{"text":"He who teaches man, does He lack knowledge?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He who admonishes the nations, does He not discipline? He who teaches man, does He lack knowledge?

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD knows the thoughts of man,","poem":1},{"text":"that they are futile.","poem":2},{"noteId":202}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The LORD knows the thoughts of man, that they are futile.

contentJson: [{"text":"Blessed is the man You discipline, O LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"and teach from Your law,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Blessed is the man You discipline, O LORD, and teach from Your law,

contentJson: [{"text":"to grant him relief from days of trouble,","poem":1},{"text":"until a pit is dug for the wicked.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: to grant him relief from days of trouble, until a pit is dug for the wicked.

contentJson: [{"text":"For the LORD will not forsake His people;","poem":1},{"text":"He will never abandon His heritage.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For the LORD will not forsake His people; He will never abandon His heritage.

contentJson: [{"text":"Surely judgment will again be righteous,","poem":1},{"text":"and all the upright in heart will follow it.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Surely judgment will again be righteous, and all the upright in heart will follow it.

contentJson: [{"text":"Who will rise up for me against the wicked?","poem":1},{"text":"Who will stand for me against the workers of iniquity?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Who will rise up for me against the wicked? Who will stand for me against the workers of iniquity?

contentJson: [{"text":"Unless the LORD had been my helper,","poem":1},{"text":"I would soon have dwelt in the abode of silence.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Unless the LORD had been my helper, I would soon have dwelt in the abode of silence.

contentJson: [{"text":"If I say, “My foot is slipping,”","poem":1},{"text":"Your loving devotion, O LORD, supports me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: If I say, “My foot is slipping,” Your loving devotion, O LORD, supports me.

contentJson: [{"text":"When anxiety overwhelms me,","poem":1},{"text":"Your consolation delights my soul.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: When anxiety overwhelms me, Your consolation delights my soul.

contentJson: [{"text":"Can a corrupt throne be Your ally—","poem":1},{"text":"one devising mischief by decree?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Can a corrupt throne be Your ally— one devising mischief by decree?

contentJson: [{"text":"They band together against the righteous","poem":1},{"text":"and condemn the innocent to death.","poem":2},{"noteId":203}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They band together against the righteous and condemn the innocent to death.

contentJson: [{"text":"But the LORD has been my stronghold,","poem":1},{"text":"and my God is my rock of refuge.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But the LORD has been my stronghold, and my God is my rock of refuge.

contentJson: [{"text":"He will bring upon them their own iniquity","poem":1},{"text":"and destroy them for their wickedness.","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"The LORD our God will destroy them.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
He will bring upon them their own iniquity and destroy them for their wickedness. 
The LORD our God will destroy them.

contentJson: [{"text":"Come, let us sing for joy to the LORD;","poem":1},{"text":"let us shout to the Rock of our salvation!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Come, let us sing for joy to the LORD; let us shout to the Rock of our salvation!

contentJson: [{"text":"Let us enter His presence with thanksgiving;","poem":1},{"text":"let us make a joyful noise to Him in song.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Let us enter His presence with thanksgiving; let us make a joyful noise to Him in song.

contentJson: [{"text":"For the LORD is a great God,","poem":1},{"text":"a great King above all gods.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For the LORD is a great God, a great King above all gods.

contentJson: [{"text":"In His hand are the depths of the earth,","poem":1},{"text":"and the mountain peaks belong to Him.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: In His hand are the depths of the earth, and the mountain peaks belong to Him.

contentJson: [{"text":"The sea is His, for He made it,","poem":1},{"text":"and His hands formed the dry land.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The sea is His, for He made it, and His hands formed the dry land.

contentJson: [{"text":"O come, let us worship and bow down;","poem":1},{"text":"let us kneel before the LORD our Maker.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: O come, let us worship and bow down; let us kneel before the LORD our Maker.

contentJson: [{"text":"For He is our God,","poem":1},{"text":"and we are the people of His pasture,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"the sheep under His care.","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"Today, if you hear His voice,","poem":1}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
For He is our God, and we are the people of His pasture, 
the sheep under His care. 
Today, if you hear His voice,

contentJson: [{"text":"do not harden your hearts","poem":2},{"text":"as you did at Meribah,","poem":1},{"noteId":204},{"text":"in the day at Massah in the wilderness,","poem":2},{"noteId":205}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: do not harden your hearts as you did at Meribah, in the day at Massah in the wilderness,

contentJson: [{"text":"where your fathers tested and tried Me,","poem":1},{"text":"though they had seen My work.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: where your fathers tested and tried Me, though they had seen My work.

contentJson: [{"text":"For forty years I was angry with that generation,","poem":1},{"text":"and I said, “They are a people whose hearts go astray,","poem":2},{"noteId":206},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"and they have not known My ways.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
For forty years I was angry with that generation, and I said, “They are a people whose hearts go astray, 
and they have not known My ways.”

contentJson: [{"text":"So I swore on oath in My anger,","poem":1},{"text":"“They shall never enter My rest.”","poem":2},{"noteId":207}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: So I swore on oath in My anger, “They shall never enter My rest.”

contentJson: [{"text":"Sing to the LORD a new song;","poem":1},{"text":"sing to the LORD, all the earth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Sing to the LORD a new song; sing to the LORD, all the earth.

contentJson: [{"text":"Sing to the LORD, bless His name;","poem":1},{"text":"proclaim His salvation day after day.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Sing to the LORD, bless His name; proclaim His salvation day after day.

contentJson: [{"text":"Declare His glory among the nations,","poem":1},{"text":"His wonderful deeds among all peoples.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Declare His glory among the nations, His wonderful deeds among all peoples.

contentJson: [{"text":"For great is the LORD, and greatly to be praised;","poem":1},{"text":"He is to be feared above all gods.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For great is the LORD, and greatly to be praised; He is to be feared above all gods.

contentJson: [{"text":"For all the gods of the nations are idols,","poem":1},{"text":"but it is the LORD who made the heavens.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For all the gods of the nations are idols, but it is the LORD who made the heavens.

contentJson: [{"text":"Splendor and majesty are before Him;","poem":1},{"text":"strength and beauty fill His sanctuary.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Splendor and majesty are before Him; strength and beauty fill His sanctuary.

contentJson: [{"text":"Ascribe to the LORD, O families of the nations,","poem":1},{"text":"ascribe to the LORD glory and strength.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Ascribe to the LORD, O families of the nations, ascribe to the LORD glory and strength.

contentJson: [{"text":"Ascribe to the LORD the glory due His name;","poem":1},{"text":"bring an offering and enter His courts.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Ascribe to the LORD the glory due His name; bring an offering and enter His courts.

contentJson: [{"text":"Worship the LORD in the splendor of His holiness;","poem":1},{"text":"tremble before Him, all the earth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Worship the LORD in the splendor of His holiness; tremble before Him, all the earth.

contentJson: [{"text":"Declare among the nations: “The LORD reigns!”","poem":1},{"text":"The world is firmly established; it cannot be moved;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"He will judge the peoples with equity.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Declare among the nations: “The LORD reigns!” The world is firmly established; it cannot be moved; 
He will judge the peoples with equity.

contentJson: [{"text":"Let the heavens be glad","poem":1},{"text":"and the earth rejoice;","poem":2},{"text":"let the sea resound,","poem":1},{"text":"and all that fills it.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Let the heavens be glad and the earth rejoice; let the sea resound, and all that fills it.

contentJson: [{"text":"Let the fields exult,","poem":1},{"text":"and all that is in them.","poem":2},{"text":"Then all the trees of the forest","poem":1},{"text":"will sing for joy","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Let the fields exult, and all that is in them. Then all the trees of the forest will sing for joy

contentJson: [{"text":"before the LORD,","poem":2},{"text":"for He is coming—","poem":1},{"text":"He is coming to judge the earth.","poem":2},{"text":"He will judge the world in righteousness","poem":1},{"text":"and the peoples in His faithfulness.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: before the LORD, for He is coming— He is coming to judge the earth. He will judge the world in righteousness and the peoples in His faithfulness.

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD reigns, let the earth rejoice;","poem":1},{"text":"let the distant shores be glad.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The LORD reigns, let the earth rejoice; let the distant shores be glad.

contentJson: [{"text":"Clouds and darkness surround Him;","poem":1},{"text":"righteousness and justice are His throne’s foundation.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Clouds and darkness surround Him; righteousness and justice are His throne’s foundation.

contentJson: [{"text":"Fire goes before Him","poem":1},{"text":"and consumes His foes on every side.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Fire goes before Him and consumes His foes on every side.

contentJson: [{"text":"His lightning illuminates the world;","poem":1},{"text":"the earth sees and trembles.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: His lightning illuminates the world; the earth sees and trembles.

contentJson: [{"text":"The mountains melt like wax","poem":1},{"text":"at the presence of the LORD,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"before the Lord of all the earth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
The mountains melt like wax at the presence of the LORD, 
before the Lord of all the earth.

contentJson: [{"text":"The heavens proclaim His righteousness;","poem":1},{"text":"all the peoples see His glory.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The heavens proclaim His righteousness; all the peoples see His glory.

contentJson: [{"text":"All worshipers of images are put to shame—","poem":1},{"text":"those who boast in idols.","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"Worship Him, all you gods!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
All worshipers of images are put to shame— those who boast in idols. 
Worship Him, all you gods!

contentJson: [{"text":"Zion hears and rejoices,","poem":1},{"text":"and the towns of Judah exult","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"because of Your judgments, O LORD.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Zion hears and rejoices, and the towns of Judah exult 
because of Your judgments, O LORD.

contentJson: [{"text":"For You, O LORD, are Most High over all the earth;","poem":1},{"text":"You are exalted far above all gods.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For You, O LORD, are Most High over all the earth; You are exalted far above all gods.

contentJson: [{"text":"Hate evil, O you who love the LORD!","poem":1},{"text":"He preserves the souls of His saints;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"He delivers them from the hand of the wicked.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Hate evil, O you who love the LORD! He preserves the souls of His saints; 
He delivers them from the hand of the wicked.

contentJson: [{"text":"Light shines","poem":1},{"noteId":208},{"text":"on the righteous,","poem":1},{"text":"gladness on the upright in heart.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Light shines on the righteous, gladness on the upright in heart.

contentJson: [{"text":"Rejoice in the LORD, you righteous ones,","poem":1},{"text":"and praise His holy name.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Rejoice in the LORD, you righteous ones, and praise His holy name.

contentJson: [{"text":"Sing to the LORD a new song,","poem":1},{"text":"for He has done wonders;","poem":2},{"text":"His right hand and holy arm","poem":1},{"text":"have gained Him the victory.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Sing to the LORD a new song, for He has done wonders; His right hand and holy arm have gained Him the victory.

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD has proclaimed His salvation","poem":1},{"text":"and revealed His righteousness to the nations.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The LORD has proclaimed His salvation and revealed His righteousness to the nations.

contentJson: [{"text":"He has remembered His love and faithfulness","poem":1},{"text":"to the house of Israel;","poem":2},{"text":"all the ends of the earth","poem":1},{"text":"have seen the salvation of our God.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He has remembered His love and faithfulness to the house of Israel; all the ends of the earth have seen the salvation of our God.

contentJson: [{"text":"Make a joyful noise to the LORD, all the earth;","poem":1},{"text":"break forth—let your cry ring out, and sing praises!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Make a joyful noise to the LORD, all the earth; break forth—let your cry ring out, and sing praises!

contentJson: [{"text":"Sing praises to the LORD with the lyre,","poem":1},{"text":"in melodious song with the harp.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Sing praises to the LORD with the lyre, in melodious song with the harp.

contentJson: [{"text":"With trumpets and the blast of the ram’s horn","poem":1},{"text":"shout for joy before the LORD, the King.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: With trumpets and the blast of the ram’s horn shout for joy before the LORD, the King.

contentJson: [{"text":"Let the sea resound, and all that fills it,","poem":1},{"text":"the world, and all who dwell in it.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Let the sea resound, and all that fills it, the world, and all who dwell in it.

contentJson: [{"text":"Let the rivers clap their hands,","poem":1},{"text":"let the mountains sing together for joy","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Let the rivers clap their hands, let the mountains sing together for joy

contentJson: [{"text":"before the LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"for He comes to judge the earth.","poem":2},{"text":"He will judge the world with righteousness","poem":1},{"text":"and the peoples with equity.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: before the LORD, for He comes to judge the earth. He will judge the world with righteousness and the peoples with equity.

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD reigns;","poem":1},{"text":"let the nations tremble!","poem":2},{"text":"He is enthroned above the cherubim;","poem":1},{"text":"let the earth quake!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The LORD reigns; let the nations tremble! He is enthroned above the cherubim; let the earth quake!

contentJson: [{"text":"Great is the LORD in Zion;","poem":1},{"text":"He is exalted above all the peoples.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Great is the LORD in Zion; He is exalted above all the peoples.

contentJson: [{"text":"Let them praise Your great and awesome name—","poem":1},{"text":"He is holy!","poem":2},{"noteId":209}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Let them praise Your great and awesome name— He is holy!

contentJson: [{"text":"The mighty King loves justice.","poem":1},{"noteId":210},{"text":"You have established equity;","poem":2},{"text":"You have exercised justice","poem":1},{"text":"and righteousness in Jacob.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The mighty King loves justice. You have established equity; You have exercised justice and righteousness in Jacob.

contentJson: [{"text":"Exalt the LORD our God,","poem":1},{"text":"and worship at His footstool;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"He is holy!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Exalt the LORD our God, and worship at His footstool; 
He is holy!

contentJson: [{"text":"Moses and Aaron were among His priests;","poem":1},{"text":"Samuel was among those who called on His name.","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"They called to the LORD and He answered.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Moses and Aaron were among His priests; Samuel was among those who called on His name. 
They called to the LORD and He answered.

contentJson: [{"text":"He spoke to them from the pillar of cloud;","poem":1},{"text":"they kept His decrees and the statutes He gave them.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He spoke to them from the pillar of cloud; they kept His decrees and the statutes He gave them.

contentJson: [{"text":"O LORD our God, You answered them.","poem":1},{"text":"You were a forgiving God to them,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"yet an avenger of their misdeeds.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
O LORD our God, You answered them. You were a forgiving God to them, 
yet an avenger of their misdeeds.

contentJson: [{"text":"Exalt the LORD our God","poem":1},{"text":"and worship at His holy mountain,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"for the LORD our God is holy.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Exalt the LORD our God and worship at His holy mountain, 
for the LORD our God is holy.

contentJson: [{"text":"Make a joyful noise to the LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"all the earth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Make a joyful noise to the LORD, all the earth.

contentJson: [{"text":"Serve the LORD with gladness;","poem":1},{"text":"come into His presence with joyful songs.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Serve the LORD with gladness; come into His presence with joyful songs.

contentJson: [{"text":"Know that the LORD is God.","poem":1},{"text":"It is He who made us, and we are His;","poem":2},{"noteId":211},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"we are His people, and the sheep of His pasture.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Know that the LORD is God. It is He who made us, and we are His; 
we are His people, and the sheep of His pasture.

contentJson: [{"text":"Enter His gates with thanksgiving","poem":1},{"text":"and His courts with praise;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"give thanks to Him and bless His name.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Enter His gates with thanksgiving and His courts with praise; 
give thanks to Him and bless His name.

contentJson: [{"text":"For the LORD is good,","poem":1},{"text":"and His loving devotion endures forever;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"His faithfulness continues to all generations.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
For the LORD is good, and His loving devotion endures forever; 
His faithfulness continues to all generations.

contentJson: [{"text":"I will sing of Your loving devotion and justice;","poem":1},{"text":"to You, O LORD, I will sing praises.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I will sing of Your loving devotion and justice; to You, O LORD, I will sing praises.

contentJson: [{"text":"I will ponder the way that is blameless—","poem":1},{"text":"when will You come to me?","poem":2},{"text":"I will walk in my house","poem":1},{"text":"with integrity of heart.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I will ponder the way that is blameless— when will You come to me? I will walk in my house with integrity of heart.

contentJson: [{"text":"I will set no worthless thing","poem":1},{"text":"before my eyes.","poem":2},{"text":"I hate the work of those who fall away;","poem":1},{"text":"it shall not cling to me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I will set no worthless thing before my eyes. I hate the work of those who fall away; it shall not cling to me.

contentJson: [{"text":"A perverse heart shall depart from me;","poem":1},{"text":"I will know nothing of evil.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A perverse heart shall depart from me; I will know nothing of evil.

contentJson: [{"text":"Whoever slanders his neighbor in secret,","poem":1},{"text":"I will put to silence;","poem":2},{"text":"the one with haughty eyes and a proud heart,","poem":1},{"text":"I will not endure.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Whoever slanders his neighbor in secret, I will put to silence; the one with haughty eyes and a proud heart, I will not endure.

contentJson: [{"text":"My eyes favor the faithful of the land,","poem":1},{"text":"that they may dwell with me;","poem":2},{"text":"he who walks in the way of integrity","poem":1},{"text":"shall minister to me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: My eyes favor the faithful of the land, that they may dwell with me; he who walks in the way of integrity shall minister to me.

contentJson: [{"text":"No one who practices deceit","poem":1},{"text":"shall dwell in my house;","poem":2},{"text":"no one who tells lies","poem":1},{"text":"shall stand in my presence.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: No one who practices deceit shall dwell in my house; no one who tells lies shall stand in my presence.

contentJson: [{"text":"Every morning I will remove all the wicked of the land,","poem":1},{"text":"that I may cut off every evildoer from the city of the LORD.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Every morning I will remove all the wicked of the land, that I may cut off every evildoer from the city of the LORD.

contentJson: [{"text":"Hear my prayer, O LORD;","poem":1},{"text":"let my cry for help come before You.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Hear my prayer, O LORD; let my cry for help come before You.

contentJson: [{"text":"Do not hide Your face from me","poem":1},{"text":"in my day of distress.","poem":2},{"text":"Incline Your ear to me;","poem":1},{"text":"answer me quickly when I call.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Do not hide Your face from me in my day of distress. Incline Your ear to me; answer me quickly when I call.

contentJson: [{"text":"For my days vanish like smoke,","poem":1},{"text":"and my bones burn like glowing embers.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For my days vanish like smoke, and my bones burn like glowing embers.

contentJson: [{"text":"My heart is afflicted, and withered like grass;","poem":1},{"text":"I even forget to eat my bread.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: My heart is afflicted, and withered like grass; I even forget to eat my bread.

contentJson: [{"text":"Through my loud groaning","poem":1},{"text":"my flesh clings to my bones.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Through my loud groaning my flesh clings to my bones.

contentJson: [{"text":"I am like a desert owl,","poem":1},{"text":"like an owl among the ruins.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I am like a desert owl, like an owl among the ruins.

contentJson: [{"text":"I lie awake;","poem":1},{"text":"I am like a lone bird on a housetop.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I lie awake; I am like a lone bird on a housetop.

contentJson: [{"text":"All day long my enemies taunt me;","poem":1},{"text":"they ridicule me and curse me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: All day long my enemies taunt me; they ridicule me and curse me.

contentJson: [{"text":"For I have eaten ashes like bread","poem":1},{"text":"and mixed my drink with tears","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For I have eaten ashes like bread and mixed my drink with tears

contentJson: [{"text":"because of Your indignation and wrath,","poem":1},{"text":"for You have picked me up and cast me aside.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: because of Your indignation and wrath, for You have picked me up and cast me aside.

contentJson: [{"text":"My days are like lengthening shadows,","poem":1},{"text":"and I wither away like grass.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: My days are like lengthening shadows, and I wither away like grass.

contentJson: [{"text":"But You, O LORD, sit enthroned forever;","poem":1},{"text":"Your renown endures to all generations.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But You, O LORD, sit enthroned forever; Your renown endures to all generations.

contentJson: [{"text":"You will rise up and have compassion on Zion,","poem":1},{"text":"for it is time to show her favor—","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"the appointed time has come.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
You will rise up and have compassion on Zion, for it is time to show her favor— 
the appointed time has come.

contentJson: [{"text":"For Your servants delight in her stones","poem":1},{"text":"and take pity on her dust.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For Your servants delight in her stones and take pity on her dust.

contentJson: [{"text":"So the nations will fear the name of the LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"and all the kings of the earth will fear Your glory.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: So the nations will fear the name of the LORD, and all the kings of the earth will fear Your glory.

contentJson: [{"text":"For the LORD will rebuild Zion;","poem":1},{"text":"He has appeared in His glory.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For the LORD will rebuild Zion; He has appeared in His glory.

contentJson: [{"text":"He will turn toward the prayer of the destitute;","poem":1},{"text":"He will not despise their prayer.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He will turn toward the prayer of the destitute; He will not despise their prayer.

contentJson: [{"text":"Let this be written for the generation to come,","poem":1},{"text":"so that a people not yet created may praise the LORD.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Let this be written for the generation to come, so that a people not yet created may praise the LORD.

contentJson: [{"text":"For He looked down from the heights of His sanctuary;","poem":1},{"text":"the LORD gazed out from heaven to earth","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For He looked down from the heights of His sanctuary; the LORD gazed out from heaven to earth

contentJson: [{"text":"to hear a prisoner’s groaning,","poem":1},{"text":"to release those condemned to death,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: to hear a prisoner’s groaning, to release those condemned to death,

contentJson: [{"text":"that they may proclaim the name of the LORD in Zion","poem":1},{"text":"and praise Him in Jerusalem,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: that they may proclaim the name of the LORD in Zion and praise Him in Jerusalem,

contentJson: [{"text":"when peoples and kingdoms assemble","poem":1},{"text":"to serve the LORD.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: when peoples and kingdoms assemble to serve the LORD.

contentJson: [{"text":"He has broken my strength on the way;","poem":1},{"text":"He has cut short my days.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He has broken my strength on the way; He has cut short my days.

contentJson: [{"text":"I say: “O my God, do not take me in the midst of my days!","poem":1},{"text":"Your years go on through all generations.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I say: “O my God, do not take me in the midst of my days! Your years go on through all generations.

contentJson: [{"text":"In the beginning You laid the foundations of the earth,","poem":1},{"text":"and the heavens are the work of Your hands.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: In the beginning You laid the foundations of the earth, and the heavens are the work of Your hands.

contentJson: [{"text":"They will perish, but You remain;","poem":1},{"text":"they will all wear out like a garment.","poem":2},{"text":"Like clothing You will change them,","poem":1},{"text":"and they will be passed on.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They will perish, but You remain; they will all wear out like a garment. Like clothing You will change them, and they will be passed on.

contentJson: [{"text":"But You remain the same,","poem":1},{"text":"and Your years will never end.","poem":2},{"noteId":212}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But You remain the same, and Your years will never end.

contentJson: [{"text":"The children of Your servants will dwell securely,","poem":1},{"text":"and their descendants will be established before You.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The children of Your servants will dwell securely, and their descendants will be established before You.”

contentJson: [{"text":"Bless the LORD, O my soul;","poem":1},{"text":"all that is within me, bless His holy name.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Bless the LORD, O my soul; all that is within me, bless His holy name.

contentJson: [{"text":"Bless the LORD, O my soul,","poem":1},{"text":"and do not forget all His kind deeds—","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Bless the LORD, O my soul, and do not forget all His kind deeds—

contentJson: [{"text":"He who forgives all your iniquities","poem":1},{"text":"and heals all your diseases,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He who forgives all your iniquities and heals all your diseases,

contentJson: [{"text":"who redeems your life from the Pit","poem":1},{"text":"and crowns you with loving devotion and compassion,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: who redeems your life from the Pit and crowns you with loving devotion and compassion,

contentJson: [{"text":"who satisfies you with good things,","poem":1},{"text":"so that your youth is renewed like the eagle’s.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: who satisfies you with good things, so that your youth is renewed like the eagle’s.

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD executes righteousness","poem":1},{"text":"and justice for all the oppressed.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The LORD executes righteousness and justice for all the oppressed.

contentJson: [{"text":"He made known His ways to Moses,","poem":1},{"text":"His deeds to the people of Israel.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He made known His ways to Moses, His deeds to the people of Israel.

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD is compassionate and gracious,","poem":1},{"text":"slow to anger, abounding in loving devotion.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The LORD is compassionate and gracious, slow to anger, abounding in loving devotion.

contentJson: [{"text":"He will not always accuse us,","poem":1},{"text":"nor harbor His anger forever.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He will not always accuse us, nor harbor His anger forever.

contentJson: [{"text":"He has not dealt with us according to our sins","poem":1},{"text":"or repaid us according to our iniquities.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He has not dealt with us according to our sins or repaid us according to our iniquities.

contentJson: [{"text":"For as high as the heavens are above the earth,","poem":1},{"text":"so great is His loving devotion for those who fear Him.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For as high as the heavens are above the earth, so great is His loving devotion for those who fear Him.

contentJson: [{"text":"As far as the east is from the west,","poem":1},{"text":"so far has He removed our transgressions from us.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: As far as the east is from the west, so far has He removed our transgressions from us.

contentJson: [{"text":"As a father has compassion on his children,","poem":1},{"text":"so the LORD has compassion on those who fear Him.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: As a father has compassion on his children, so the LORD has compassion on those who fear Him.

contentJson: [{"text":"For He knows our frame;","poem":1},{"text":"He is mindful that we are dust.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For He knows our frame; He is mindful that we are dust.

contentJson: [{"text":"As for man, his days are like grass—","poem":1},{"text":"he blooms like a flower of the field;","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: As for man, his days are like grass— he blooms like a flower of the field;

contentJson: [{"text":"when the wind passes over, it vanishes,","poem":1},{"text":"and its place remembers it no more.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: when the wind passes over, it vanishes, and its place remembers it no more.

contentJson: [{"text":"But from everlasting to everlasting","poem":1},{"text":"the loving devotion of the LORD","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"extends to those who fear Him,","poem":2},{"text":"and His righteousness to their children’s children—","poem":1}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
But from everlasting to everlasting the loving devotion of the LORD 
extends to those who fear Him, and His righteousness to their children’s children—

contentJson: [{"text":"to those who keep His covenant","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"and remember to obey His precepts.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
to those who keep His covenant 
and remember to obey His precepts.

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD has established His throne in heaven,","poem":1},{"text":"and His kingdom rules over all.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The LORD has established His throne in heaven, and His kingdom rules over all.

contentJson: [{"text":"Bless the LORD, all His angels mighty in strength","poem":1},{"text":"who carry out His word,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"who hearken to the voice of His command.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Bless the LORD, all His angels mighty in strength who carry out His word, 
who hearken to the voice of His command.

contentJson: [{"text":"Bless the LORD, all His hosts,","poem":1},{"text":"you servants who do His will.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Bless the LORD, all His hosts, you servants who do His will.

contentJson: [{"text":"Bless the LORD, all His works","poem":1},{"text":"in all places of His dominion.","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"Bless the LORD, O my soul!","poem":1}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Bless the LORD, all His works in all places of His dominion. 
Bless the LORD, O my soul!

contentJson: [{"text":"Bless the LORD, O my soul!","poem":1},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"O LORD my God, You are very great;","poem":1},{"text":"You are clothed with splendor and majesty.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Bless the LORD, O my soul! 
O LORD my God, You are very great; You are clothed with splendor and majesty.

contentJson: [{"text":"He wraps Himself in light as with a garment;","poem":1},{"text":"He stretches out the heavens like a tent,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He wraps Himself in light as with a garment; He stretches out the heavens like a tent,

contentJson: [{"text":"laying the beams of His chambers","poem":1},{"text":"in the waters above,","poem":2},{"text":"making the clouds His chariot,","poem":1},{"text":"walking on the wings of the wind.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: laying the beams of His chambers in the waters above, making the clouds His chariot, walking on the wings of the wind.

contentJson: [{"text":"He makes the winds His messengers,","poem":1},{"text":"flames of fire His servants.","poem":2},{"noteId":213}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He makes the winds His messengers, flames of fire His servants.

contentJson: [{"text":"He set the earth on its foundations,","poem":1},{"text":"never to be moved.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He set the earth on its foundations, never to be moved.

contentJson: [{"text":"You covered it with the deep like a garment;","poem":1},{"text":"the waters stood above the mountains.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You covered it with the deep like a garment; the waters stood above the mountains.

contentJson: [{"text":"At Your rebuke the waters fled;","poem":1},{"text":"at the sound of Your thunder they hurried away—","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: At Your rebuke the waters fled; at the sound of Your thunder they hurried away—

contentJson: [{"text":"the mountains rose and the valleys sank","poem":1},{"text":"to the place You assigned for them—","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: the mountains rose and the valleys sank to the place You assigned for them—

contentJson: [{"text":"You set a boundary they cannot cross,","poem":1},{"text":"that they may never again cover the earth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You set a boundary they cannot cross, that they may never again cover the earth.

contentJson: [{"text":"He sends forth springs in the valleys;","poem":1},{"text":"they flow between the mountains.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He sends forth springs in the valleys; they flow between the mountains.

contentJson: [{"text":"They give drink to every beast of the field;","poem":1},{"text":"the wild donkeys quench their thirst.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They give drink to every beast of the field; the wild donkeys quench their thirst.

contentJson: [{"text":"The birds of the air nest beside the springs;","poem":1},{"text":"they sing among the branches.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The birds of the air nest beside the springs; they sing among the branches.

contentJson: [{"text":"He waters the mountains from His chambers;","poem":1},{"text":"the earth is satisfied by the fruit of His works.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He waters the mountains from His chambers; the earth is satisfied by the fruit of His works.

contentJson: [{"text":"He makes the grass grow for the livestock","poem":1},{"text":"and provides crops for man to cultivate,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"bringing forth food from the earth:","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
He makes the grass grow for the livestock and provides crops for man to cultivate, 
bringing forth food from the earth:

contentJson: [{"text":"wine that gladdens the heart of man,","poem":1},{"text":"oil that makes his face to shine,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"and bread that sustains his heart.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
wine that gladdens the heart of man, oil that makes his face to shine, 
and bread that sustains his heart.

contentJson: [{"text":"The trees of the LORD have their fill,","poem":1},{"text":"the cedars of Lebanon that He planted,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The trees of the LORD have their fill, the cedars of Lebanon that He planted,

contentJson: [{"text":"where the birds build their nests;","poem":1},{"text":"the stork makes her home in the cypresses.","poem":2},{"noteId":214}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: where the birds build their nests; the stork makes her home in the cypresses.

contentJson: [{"text":"The high mountains are for the wild goats,","poem":1},{"text":"the cliffs a refuge for the rock badgers.","poem":2},{"noteId":215}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The high mountains are for the wild goats, the cliffs a refuge for the rock badgers.

contentJson: [{"text":"He made the moon to mark the seasons;","poem":1},{"text":"the sun knows when to set.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He made the moon to mark the seasons; the sun knows when to set.

contentJson: [{"text":"You bring darkness, and it becomes night,","poem":1},{"text":"when all the beasts of the forest prowl.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You bring darkness, and it becomes night, when all the beasts of the forest prowl.

contentJson: [{"text":"The young lions roar for their prey","poem":1},{"text":"and seek their food from God.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The young lions roar for their prey and seek their food from God.

contentJson: [{"text":"The sun rises, and they withdraw;","poem":1},{"text":"they lie down in their dens.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The sun rises, and they withdraw; they lie down in their dens.

contentJson: [{"text":"Man goes forth to his work","poem":1},{"text":"and to his labor until evening.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Man goes forth to his work and to his labor until evening.

contentJson: [{"text":"How many are Your works, O LORD!","poem":1},{"text":"In wisdom You have made them all;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"the earth is full of Your creatures.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
How many are Your works, O LORD! In wisdom You have made them all; 
the earth is full of Your creatures.

contentJson: [{"text":"Here is the sea, vast and wide,","poem":1},{"text":"teeming with creatures beyond number,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"living things both great and small.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Here is the sea, vast and wide, teeming with creatures beyond number, 
living things both great and small.

contentJson: [{"text":"There the ships pass,","poem":1},{"text":"and Leviathan, which You formed to frolic there.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: There the ships pass, and Leviathan, which You formed to frolic there.

contentJson: [{"text":"All creatures look to You","poem":1},{"text":"to give them their food in due season.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: All creatures look to You to give them their food in due season.

contentJson: [{"text":"When You give it to them,","poem":1},{"text":"they gather it up;","poem":2},{"text":"when You open Your hand,","poem":1},{"text":"they are satisfied with good things.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: When You give it to them, they gather it up; when You open Your hand, they are satisfied with good things.

contentJson: [{"text":"When You hide Your face,","poem":1},{"text":"they are terrified;","poem":2},{"text":"when You take away their breath,","poem":1},{"text":"they die and return to dust.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: When You hide Your face, they are terrified; when You take away their breath, they die and return to dust.

contentJson: [{"text":"When You send Your Spirit,","poem":1},{"noteId":216},{"text":"they are created,","poem":2},{"text":"and You renew","poem":1},{"text":"the face of the earth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: When You send Your Spirit, they are created, and You renew the face of the earth.

contentJson: [{"text":"May the glory of the LORD endure forever;","poem":1},{"text":"may the LORD rejoice in His works.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May the glory of the LORD endure forever; may the LORD rejoice in His works.

contentJson: [{"text":"He looks on the earth,","poem":1},{"text":"and it trembles;","poem":2},{"text":"He touches the mountains,","poem":1},{"text":"and they smolder.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He looks on the earth, and it trembles; He touches the mountains, and they smolder.

contentJson: [{"text":"I will sing to the LORD all my life;","poem":1},{"text":"I will sing praise to my God while I have my being.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I will sing to the LORD all my life; I will sing praise to my God while I have my being.

contentJson: [{"text":"May my meditation be pleasing to Him,","poem":1},{"text":"for I rejoice in the LORD.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May my meditation be pleasing to Him, for I rejoice in the LORD.

contentJson: [{"text":"May sinners vanish from the earth","poem":1},{"text":"and the wicked be no more.","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"Bless the LORD, O my soul.","poem":1},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"Hallelujah!","poem":1},{"noteId":217}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
May sinners vanish from the earth and the wicked be no more. 
Bless the LORD, O my soul. 
Hallelujah!

contentJson: [{"text":"Give thanks to the LORD, call upon His name;","poem":1},{"text":"make known His deeds among the nations.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Give thanks to the LORD, call upon His name; make known His deeds among the nations.

contentJson: [{"text":"Sing to Him, sing praises to Him;","poem":1},{"text":"tell of all His wonders.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Sing to Him, sing praises to Him; tell of all His wonders.

contentJson: [{"text":"Glory in His holy name;","poem":1},{"text":"let the hearts of those who seek the LORD rejoice.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Glory in His holy name; let the hearts of those who seek the LORD rejoice.

contentJson: [{"text":"Seek out the LORD and His strength;","poem":1},{"text":"seek His face always.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Seek out the LORD and His strength; seek His face always.

contentJson: [{"text":"Remember the wonders He has done,","poem":1},{"text":"His marvels, and the judgments He has pronounced,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Remember the wonders He has done, His marvels, and the judgments He has pronounced,

contentJson: [{"text":"O offspring of His servant Abraham,","poem":1},{"text":"O sons of Jacob, His chosen ones.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: O offspring of His servant Abraham, O sons of Jacob, His chosen ones.

contentJson: [{"text":"He is the LORD our God;","poem":1},{"text":"His judgments carry throughout the earth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He is the LORD our God; His judgments carry throughout the earth.

contentJson: [{"text":"He remembers His covenant forever,","poem":1},{"text":"the word He ordained for a thousand generations—","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He remembers His covenant forever, the word He ordained for a thousand generations—

contentJson: [{"text":"the covenant He made with Abraham,","poem":1},{"text":"and the oath He swore to Isaac.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: the covenant He made with Abraham, and the oath He swore to Isaac.

contentJson: [{"text":"He confirmed it to Jacob as a decree,","poem":1},{"text":"to Israel as an everlasting covenant:","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He confirmed it to Jacob as a decree, to Israel as an everlasting covenant:

contentJson: [{"text":"“I will give you the land of Canaan","poem":1},{"text":"as the portion of your inheritance.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: “I will give you the land of Canaan as the portion of your inheritance.”

contentJson: [{"text":"When they were few in number,","poem":1},{"text":"few indeed, and strangers in the land,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: When they were few in number, few indeed, and strangers in the land,

contentJson: [{"text":"they wandered from nation to nation,","poem":1},{"text":"from one kingdom to another.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: they wandered from nation to nation, from one kingdom to another.

contentJson: [{"text":"He let no man oppress them;","poem":1},{"text":"He rebuked kings on their behalf:","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He let no man oppress them; He rebuked kings on their behalf:

contentJson: [{"text":"“Do not touch My anointed ones!","poem":1},{"text":"Do no harm to My prophets!”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: “Do not touch My anointed ones! Do no harm to My prophets!”

contentJson: [{"text":"He called down famine on the land","poem":1},{"text":"and cut off all their supplies","poem":2},{"noteId":218},{"text":"of food.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He called down famine on the land and cut off all their supplies of food.

contentJson: [{"text":"He sent a man before them—","poem":1},{"text":"Joseph, sold as a slave.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He sent a man before them— Joseph, sold as a slave.

contentJson: [{"text":"They bruised his feet with shackles","poem":1},{"text":"and placed his neck in irons,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They bruised his feet with shackles and placed his neck in irons,

contentJson: [{"text":"until his prediction came true","poem":1},{"text":"and the word of the LORD proved him right.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: until his prediction came true and the word of the LORD proved him right.

contentJson: [{"text":"The king sent and released him;","poem":1},{"text":"the ruler of peoples set him free.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The king sent and released him; the ruler of peoples set him free.

contentJson: [{"text":"He made him master of his household,","poem":1},{"text":"ruler over all his substance,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He made him master of his household, ruler over all his substance,

contentJson: [{"text":"to instruct","poem":1},{"noteId":219},{"text":"his princes as he pleased","poem":1},{"text":"and teach his elders wisdom.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: to instruct his princes as he pleased and teach his elders wisdom.

contentJson: [{"text":"Then Israel entered Egypt;","poem":1},{"text":"Jacob dwelt in the land of Ham.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Then Israel entered Egypt; Jacob dwelt in the land of Ham.

contentJson: [{"text":"And the LORD made His people very fruitful,","poem":1},{"text":"more numerous than their foes,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: And the LORD made His people very fruitful, more numerous than their foes,

contentJson: [{"text":"whose hearts He turned to hate His people,","poem":1},{"text":"to conspire against His servants.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: whose hearts He turned to hate His people, to conspire against His servants.

contentJson: [{"text":"He sent Moses His servant,","poem":1},{"text":"and Aaron, whom He had chosen.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He sent Moses His servant, and Aaron, whom He had chosen.

contentJson: [{"text":"They performed His miraculous signs among them,","poem":1},{"text":"and wonders in the land of Ham.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They performed His miraculous signs among them, and wonders in the land of Ham.

contentJson: [{"text":"He sent darkness, and it became dark—","poem":1},{"text":"yet they defied His words.","poem":2},{"noteId":220}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He sent darkness, and it became dark— yet they defied His words.

contentJson: [{"text":"He turned their waters to blood","poem":1},{"text":"and caused their fish to die.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He turned their waters to blood and caused their fish to die.

contentJson: [{"text":"Their land teemed with frogs,","poem":1},{"text":"even in their royal chambers.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Their land teemed with frogs, even in their royal chambers.

contentJson: [{"text":"He spoke, and insects swarmed—","poem":1},{"text":"gnats throughout their country.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He spoke, and insects swarmed— gnats throughout their country.

contentJson: [{"text":"He gave them hail for rain,","poem":1},{"text":"with lightning throughout their land.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He gave them hail for rain, with lightning throughout their land.

contentJson: [{"text":"He struck their vines and fig trees","poem":1},{"text":"and shattered the trees of their country.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He struck their vines and fig trees and shattered the trees of their country.

contentJson: [{"text":"He spoke, and the locusts came—","poem":1},{"text":"young locusts without number.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He spoke, and the locusts came— young locusts without number.

contentJson: [{"text":"They devoured every plant in their land","poem":1},{"text":"and consumed the produce of their soil.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They devoured every plant in their land and consumed the produce of their soil.

contentJson: [{"text":"Then He struck all the firstborn in their land,","poem":1},{"text":"the firstfruits of all their vigor.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Then He struck all the firstborn in their land, the firstfruits of all their vigor.

contentJson: [{"text":"He brought Israel out with silver and gold,","poem":1},{"text":"and none among His tribes stumbled.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He brought Israel out with silver and gold, and none among His tribes stumbled.

contentJson: [{"text":"Egypt was glad when they departed,","poem":1},{"text":"for the dread of Israel had fallen on them.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Egypt was glad when they departed, for the dread of Israel had fallen on them.

contentJson: [{"text":"He spread a cloud as a covering","poem":1},{"text":"and a fire to light up the night.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He spread a cloud as a covering and a fire to light up the night.

contentJson: [{"text":"They asked, and He brought quail","poem":1},{"text":"and satisfied them with the bread of heaven.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They asked, and He brought quail and satisfied them with the bread of heaven.

contentJson: [{"text":"He opened a rock, and water gushed out;","poem":1},{"text":"it flowed like a river in the desert.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He opened a rock, and water gushed out; it flowed like a river in the desert.

contentJson: [{"text":"For He remembered His holy promise","poem":1},{"text":"to Abraham His servant.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For He remembered His holy promise to Abraham His servant.

contentJson: [{"text":"He brought forth His people with rejoicing,","poem":1},{"text":"His chosen with shouts of joy.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He brought forth His people with rejoicing, His chosen with shouts of joy.

contentJson: [{"text":"He gave them the lands of the nations,","poem":1},{"text":"that they might inherit the fruit of others’ labor,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He gave them the lands of the nations, that they might inherit the fruit of others’ labor,

contentJson: [{"text":"that they might keep His statutes","poem":1},{"text":"and obey His laws.","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"Hallelujah!","poem":1},{"noteId":221}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
that they might keep His statutes and obey His laws. 
Hallelujah!

contentJson: [{"text":"Hallelujah!","poem":1},{"noteId":222},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"Give thanks to the LORD, for He is good;","poem":1},{"text":"His loving devotion endures forever.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Hallelujah! 
Give thanks to the LORD, for He is good; His loving devotion endures forever.

contentJson: [{"text":"Who can describe the mighty acts of the LORD","poem":1},{"text":"or fully proclaim His praise?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Who can describe the mighty acts of the LORD or fully proclaim His praise?

contentJson: [{"text":"Blessed are those who uphold justice,","poem":1},{"text":"who practice righteousness at all times.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Blessed are those who uphold justice, who practice righteousness at all times.

contentJson: [{"text":"Remember me, O LORD, in Your favor to Your people;","poem":1},{"text":"visit me with Your salvation,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Remember me, O LORD, in Your favor to Your people; visit me with Your salvation,

contentJson: [{"text":"that I may see the prosperity of Your chosen ones,","poem":1},{"text":"and rejoice in the gladness of Your nation,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"and give glory with Your inheritance.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
that I may see the prosperity of Your chosen ones, and rejoice in the gladness of Your nation, 
and give glory with Your inheritance.

contentJson: [{"text":"We have sinned like our fathers;","poem":1},{"text":"we have done wrong and acted wickedly.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: We have sinned like our fathers; we have done wrong and acted wickedly.

contentJson: [{"text":"Our fathers in Egypt did not grasp Your wonders","poem":1},{"text":"or remember Your abundant kindness;","poem":2},{"text":"but they rebelled by the sea,","poem":1},{"text":"there at the Red Sea.","poem":2},{"noteId":223}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Our fathers in Egypt did not grasp Your wonders or remember Your abundant kindness; but they rebelled by the sea, there at the Red Sea.

contentJson: [{"text":"Yet He saved them for the sake of His name,","poem":1},{"text":"to make His power known.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Yet He saved them for the sake of His name, to make His power known.

contentJson: [{"text":"He rebuked the Red Sea, and it dried up;","poem":1},{"text":"He led them through the depths as through a desert.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He rebuked the Red Sea, and it dried up; He led them through the depths as through a desert.

contentJson: [{"text":"He saved them from the hand that hated them;","poem":1},{"text":"He redeemed them from the hand of the enemy.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He saved them from the hand that hated them; He redeemed them from the hand of the enemy.

contentJson: [{"text":"The waters covered their foes;","poem":1},{"text":"not one of them remained.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The waters covered their foes; not one of them remained.

contentJson: [{"text":"Then they believed His promises","poem":1},{"text":"and sang His praise.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Then they believed His promises and sang His praise.

contentJson: [{"text":"Yet they soon forgot His works","poem":1},{"text":"and failed to wait for His counsel.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Yet they soon forgot His works and failed to wait for His counsel.

contentJson: [{"text":"They craved intensely in the wilderness","poem":1},{"text":"and tested God in the desert.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They craved intensely in the wilderness and tested God in the desert.

contentJson: [{"text":"So He granted their request,","poem":1},{"text":"but sent a wasting disease upon them.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: So He granted their request, but sent a wasting disease upon them.

contentJson: [{"text":"In the camp they envied Moses,","poem":1},{"text":"as well as Aaron, the holy one of the LORD.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: In the camp they envied Moses, as well as Aaron, the holy one of the LORD.

contentJson: [{"text":"The earth opened up and swallowed Dathan;","poem":1},{"text":"it covered the assembly of Abiram.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The earth opened up and swallowed Dathan; it covered the assembly of Abiram.

contentJson: [{"text":"Then fire blazed through their company;","poem":1},{"text":"flames consumed the wicked.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Then fire blazed through their company; flames consumed the wicked.

contentJson: [{"text":"At Horeb","poem":1},{"noteId":224},{"text":"they made a calf","poem":1},{"text":"and worshiped a molten image.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: At Horeb they made a calf and worshiped a molten image.

contentJson: [{"text":"They exchanged their Glory","poem":1},{"noteId":225},{"text":"for the image of a grass-eating ox.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They exchanged their Glory for the image of a grass-eating ox.
