contentJson: [{"text":"They forgot God their Savior,","poem":1},{"text":"who did great things in Egypt,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They forgot God their Savior, who did great things in Egypt,

contentJson: [{"text":"wondrous works in the land of Ham,","poem":1},{"text":"and awesome deeds by the Red Sea.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: wondrous works in the land of Ham, and awesome deeds by the Red Sea.

contentJson: [{"text":"So He said He would destroy them—","poem":1},{"text":"had not Moses His chosen one","poem":2},{"text":"stood before Him in the breach","poem":1},{"text":"to divert His wrath from destroying them.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: So He said He would destroy them— had not Moses His chosen one stood before Him in the breach to divert His wrath from destroying them.

contentJson: [{"text":"They despised the pleasant land;","poem":1},{"text":"they did not believe His promise.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They despised the pleasant land; they did not believe His promise.

contentJson: [{"text":"They grumbled in their tents","poem":1},{"text":"and did not listen to the voice of the LORD.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They grumbled in their tents and did not listen to the voice of the LORD.

contentJson: [{"text":"So He raised His hand and swore","poem":1},{"text":"to cast them down in the wilderness,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: So He raised His hand and swore to cast them down in the wilderness,

contentJson: [{"text":"to disperse","poem":1},{"noteId":226},{"text":"their offspring among the nations","poem":1},{"text":"and scatter them throughout the lands.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: to disperse their offspring among the nations and scatter them throughout the lands.

contentJson: [{"text":"They yoked themselves to Baal of Peor","poem":1},{"text":"and ate sacrifices offered to lifeless gods.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They yoked themselves to Baal of Peor and ate sacrifices offered to lifeless gods.

contentJson: [{"text":"So they provoked the LORD to anger with their deeds,","poem":1},{"text":"and a plague broke out among them.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: So they provoked the LORD to anger with their deeds, and a plague broke out among them.

contentJson: [{"text":"But Phinehas stood and intervened,","poem":1},{"text":"and the plague was restrained.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But Phinehas stood and intervened, and the plague was restrained.

contentJson: [{"text":"It was credited to him as righteousness","poem":1},{"text":"for endless generations to come.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: It was credited to him as righteousness for endless generations to come.

contentJson: [{"text":"At the waters of Meribah","poem":1},{"noteId":227},{"text":"they angered the LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"and trouble came to Moses because of them.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: At the waters of Meribah they angered the LORD, and trouble came to Moses because of them.

contentJson: [{"text":"For they rebelled against His Spirit,","poem":1},{"noteId":228},{"text":"and Moses spoke rashly with his lips.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For they rebelled against His Spirit, and Moses spoke rashly with his lips.

contentJson: [{"text":"They did not destroy the peoples","poem":1},{"text":"as the LORD had commanded them,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They did not destroy the peoples as the LORD had commanded them,

contentJson: [{"text":"but they mingled with the nations","poem":1},{"text":"and adopted their customs.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: but they mingled with the nations and adopted their customs.

contentJson: [{"text":"They worshiped their idols,","poem":1},{"text":"which became a snare to them.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They worshiped their idols, which became a snare to them.

contentJson: [{"text":"They sacrificed their sons","poem":1},{"text":"and their daughters to demons.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They sacrificed their sons and their daughters to demons.

contentJson: [{"text":"They shed innocent blood—","poem":1},{"text":"the blood of their sons and daughters,","poem":2},{"text":"whom they sacrificed to the idols of Canaan,","poem":1},{"text":"and the land was polluted with blood.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They shed innocent blood— the blood of their sons and daughters, whom they sacrificed to the idols of Canaan, and the land was polluted with blood.

contentJson: [{"text":"They defiled themselves by their actions","poem":1},{"text":"and prostituted themselves by their deeds.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They defiled themselves by their actions and prostituted themselves by their deeds.

contentJson: [{"text":"So the anger of the LORD burned against His people,","poem":1},{"text":"and He abhorred His own inheritance.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: So the anger of the LORD burned against His people, and He abhorred His own inheritance.

contentJson: [{"text":"He delivered them into the hand of the nations,","poem":1},{"text":"and those who hated them ruled over them.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He delivered them into the hand of the nations, and those who hated them ruled over them.

contentJson: [{"text":"Their enemies oppressed them,","poem":1},{"text":"and subdued them under their hand.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Their enemies oppressed them, and subdued them under their hand.

contentJson: [{"text":"Many times He rescued them,","poem":1},{"text":"but they were bent on rebellion","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"and sank down in their iniquity.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Many times He rescued them, but they were bent on rebellion 
and sank down in their iniquity.

contentJson: [{"text":"Nevertheless He heard their cry;","poem":1},{"text":"He took note of their distress.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Nevertheless He heard their cry; He took note of their distress.

contentJson: [{"text":"And He remembered His covenant with them,","poem":1},{"text":"and relented by the abundance of His loving devotion.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: And He remembered His covenant with them, and relented by the abundance of His loving devotion.

contentJson: [{"text":"He made them objects of compassion","poem":1},{"text":"to all who held them captive.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He made them objects of compassion to all who held them captive.

contentJson: [{"text":"Save us, O LORD our God,","poem":1},{"text":"and gather us from the nations,","poem":2},{"text":"that we may give thanks to Your holy name,","poem":1},{"text":"that we may glory in Your praise.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Save us, O LORD our God, and gather us from the nations, that we may give thanks to Your holy name, that we may glory in Your praise.

contentJson: [{"text":"Blessed be the LORD, the God of Israel,","poem":1},{"text":"from everlasting to everlasting.","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"Let all the people say, “Amen!”","poem":1},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"Hallelujah!","poem":1}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Blessed be the LORD, the God of Israel, from everlasting to everlasting. 
Let all the people say, “Amen!” 
Hallelujah!

contentJson: [{"text":"Give thanks to the LORD, for He is good;","poem":1},{"text":"His loving devotion endures forever.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Give thanks to the LORD, for He is good; His loving devotion endures forever.

contentJson: [{"text":"Let the redeemed of the LORD say so,","poem":1},{"text":"whom He has redeemed from the hand of the enemy","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Let the redeemed of the LORD say so, whom He has redeemed from the hand of the enemy

contentJson: [{"text":"and gathered from the lands,","poem":1},{"text":"from east and west, from north and south.","poem":2},{"noteId":229}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: and gathered from the lands, from east and west, from north and south.

contentJson: [{"text":"Some wandered in desert wastelands,","poem":1},{"text":"finding no path to a city in which to dwell.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Some wandered in desert wastelands, finding no path to a city in which to dwell.

contentJson: [{"text":"They were hungry and thirsty;","poem":1},{"text":"their soul fainted within them.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They were hungry and thirsty; their soul fainted within them.

contentJson: [{"text":"Then they cried out to the LORD in their trouble,","poem":1},{"text":"and He delivered them from their distress.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Then they cried out to the LORD in their trouble, and He delivered them from their distress.

contentJson: [{"text":"He led them on a straight path","poem":1},{"text":"to reach a city where they could live.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He led them on a straight path to reach a city where they could live.

contentJson: [{"text":"Let them give thanks to the LORD for His loving devotion","poem":1},{"text":"and His wonders to the sons of men.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Let them give thanks to the LORD for His loving devotion and His wonders to the sons of men.

contentJson: [{"text":"For He satisfies the thirsty","poem":1},{"text":"and fills the hungry with good things.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For He satisfies the thirsty and fills the hungry with good things.

contentJson: [{"text":"Some sat in darkness and in the shadow of death,","poem":1},{"text":"prisoners in affliction and chains,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Some sat in darkness and in the shadow of death, prisoners in affliction and chains,

contentJson: [{"text":"because they rebelled against the words of God","poem":1},{"text":"and despised the counsel of the Most High.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: because they rebelled against the words of God and despised the counsel of the Most High.

contentJson: [{"text":"He humbled their hearts with hard labor;","poem":1},{"text":"they stumbled, and there was no one to help.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He humbled their hearts with hard labor; they stumbled, and there was no one to help.

contentJson: [{"text":"Then they cried out to the LORD in their trouble,","poem":1},{"text":"and He saved them from their distress.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Then they cried out to the LORD in their trouble, and He saved them from their distress.

contentJson: [{"text":"He brought them out of darkness and the shadow of death","poem":1},{"text":"and broke away their chains.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He brought them out of darkness and the shadow of death and broke away their chains.

contentJson: [{"text":"Let them give thanks to the LORD for His loving devotion","poem":1},{"text":"and His wonders to the sons of men.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Let them give thanks to the LORD for His loving devotion and His wonders to the sons of men.

contentJson: [{"text":"For He has broken down the gates of bronze","poem":1},{"text":"and cut through the bars of iron.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For He has broken down the gates of bronze and cut through the bars of iron.

contentJson: [{"text":"Fools, in their rebellious ways,","poem":1},{"text":"and through their iniquities, suffered affliction.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Fools, in their rebellious ways, and through their iniquities, suffered affliction.

contentJson: [{"text":"They loathed all food","poem":1},{"text":"and drew near to the gates of death.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They loathed all food and drew near to the gates of death.

contentJson: [{"text":"Then they cried out to the LORD in their trouble,","poem":1},{"text":"and He saved them from their distress.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Then they cried out to the LORD in their trouble, and He saved them from their distress.

contentJson: [{"text":"He sent forth His word and healed them;","poem":1},{"text":"He rescued them from the Pit.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He sent forth His word and healed them; He rescued them from the Pit.

contentJson: [{"text":"Let them give thanks to the LORD for His loving devotion","poem":1},{"text":"and His wonders to the sons of men.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Let them give thanks to the LORD for His loving devotion and His wonders to the sons of men.

contentJson: [{"text":"Let them offer sacrifices of thanksgiving","poem":1},{"text":"and declare His works with rejoicing.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Let them offer sacrifices of thanksgiving and declare His works with rejoicing.

contentJson: [{"text":"Others went out to sea in ships,","poem":1},{"text":"conducting trade on the mighty waters.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Others went out to sea in ships, conducting trade on the mighty waters.

contentJson: [{"text":"They saw the works of the LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"and His wonders in the deep.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They saw the works of the LORD, and His wonders in the deep.

contentJson: [{"text":"For He spoke and raised a tempest","poem":1},{"text":"that lifted the waves of the sea.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For He spoke and raised a tempest that lifted the waves of the sea.

contentJson: [{"text":"They mounted up to the heavens, then sunk to the depths;","poem":1},{"text":"their courage melted in their anguish.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They mounted up to the heavens, then sunk to the depths; their courage melted in their anguish.

contentJson: [{"text":"They reeled and staggered like drunkards,","poem":1},{"text":"and all their skill was useless.","poem":2},{"noteId":230}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They reeled and staggered like drunkards, and all their skill was useless.

contentJson: [{"text":"Then they cried out to the LORD in their trouble,","poem":1},{"text":"and He brought them out of their distress.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Then they cried out to the LORD in their trouble, and He brought them out of their distress.

contentJson: [{"text":"He calmed the storm to a whisper,","poem":1},{"text":"and the waves of the sea","poem":2},{"noteId":231},{"text":"were hushed.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He calmed the storm to a whisper, and the waves of the sea were hushed.

contentJson: [{"text":"They rejoiced in the silence,","poem":1},{"text":"and He guided them to the harbor they desired.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They rejoiced in the silence, and He guided them to the harbor they desired.

contentJson: [{"text":"Let them give thanks to the LORD for His loving devotion","poem":1},{"text":"and His wonders to the sons of men.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Let them give thanks to the LORD for His loving devotion and His wonders to the sons of men.

contentJson: [{"text":"Let them exalt Him in the assembly of the people","poem":1},{"text":"and praise Him in the council of the elders.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Let them exalt Him in the assembly of the people and praise Him in the council of the elders.

contentJson: [{"text":"He turns rivers into deserts,","poem":1},{"text":"springs of water into thirsty ground,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He turns rivers into deserts, springs of water into thirsty ground,

contentJson: [{"text":"and fruitful land into fields of salt,","poem":1},{"text":"because of the wickedness of its dwellers.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: and fruitful land into fields of salt, because of the wickedness of its dwellers.

contentJson: [{"text":"He turns a desert into pools of water","poem":1},{"text":"and a dry land into flowing springs.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He turns a desert into pools of water and a dry land into flowing springs.

contentJson: [{"text":"He causes the hungry to settle there,","poem":1},{"text":"that they may establish a city in which to dwell.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He causes the hungry to settle there, that they may establish a city in which to dwell.

contentJson: [{"text":"They sow fields and plant vineyards","poem":1},{"text":"that yield a fruitful harvest.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They sow fields and plant vineyards that yield a fruitful harvest.

contentJson: [{"text":"He blesses them, and they multiply greatly;","poem":1},{"text":"He does not let their herds diminish.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He blesses them, and they multiply greatly; He does not let their herds diminish.

contentJson: [{"text":"When they are decreased and humbled","poem":1},{"text":"by oppression, evil, and sorrow,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: When they are decreased and humbled by oppression, evil, and sorrow,

contentJson: [{"text":"He pours out contempt on the nobles","poem":1},{"text":"and makes them wander in a trackless wasteland.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He pours out contempt on the nobles and makes them wander in a trackless wasteland.

contentJson: [{"text":"But He lifts the needy from affliction","poem":1},{"text":"and increases their families like flocks.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But He lifts the needy from affliction and increases their families like flocks.

contentJson: [{"text":"The upright see and rejoice,","poem":1},{"text":"and all iniquity shuts its mouth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The upright see and rejoice, and all iniquity shuts its mouth.

contentJson: [{"text":"Let him who is wise pay heed to these things","poem":1},{"text":"and consider the loving devotion of the LORD.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Let him who is wise pay heed to these things and consider the loving devotion of the LORD.

contentJson: [{"text":"My heart is steadfast, O God;","poem":1},{"text":"I will sing and make music with all my being.","poem":2},{"noteId":232}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: My heart is steadfast, O God; I will sing and make music with all my being.

contentJson: [{"text":"Awake, O harp and lyre!","poem":1},{"text":"I will awaken the dawn.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Awake, O harp and lyre! I will awaken the dawn.

contentJson: [{"text":"I will praise You, O LORD, among the nations;","poem":1},{"text":"I will sing Your praises among the peoples.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I will praise You, O LORD, among the nations; I will sing Your praises among the peoples.

contentJson: [{"text":"For Your loving devotion extends beyond the heavens,","poem":1},{"text":"and Your faithfulness reaches to the clouds.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For Your loving devotion extends beyond the heavens, and Your faithfulness reaches to the clouds.

contentJson: [{"text":"Be exalted, O God, above the heavens;","poem":1},{"text":"may Your glory cover all the earth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Be exalted, O God, above the heavens; may Your glory cover all the earth.

contentJson: [{"text":"Respond and save us with Your right hand,","poem":1},{"text":"that Your beloved may be delivered.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Respond and save us with Your right hand, that Your beloved may be delivered.

contentJson: [{"text":"God has spoken from His sanctuary:","poem":1},{"noteId":233},{"text":"“I will triumph!","poem":2},{"text":"I will parcel out Shechem","poem":1},{"text":"and apportion the Valley of Succoth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: God has spoken from His sanctuary: “I will triumph! I will parcel out Shechem and apportion the Valley of Succoth.

contentJson: [{"text":"Gilead is Mine, and Manasseh is Mine;","poem":1},{"text":"Ephraim is My helmet, Judah is My scepter.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Gilead is Mine, and Manasseh is Mine; Ephraim is My helmet, Judah is My scepter.

contentJson: [{"text":"Moab is My washbasin;","poem":1},{"text":"upon Edom I toss My sandal;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"over Philistia I shout in triumph.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Moab is My washbasin; upon Edom I toss My sandal; 
over Philistia I shout in triumph.”

contentJson: [{"text":"Who will bring me to the fortified city?","poem":1},{"text":"Who will lead me to Edom?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Who will bring me to the fortified city? Who will lead me to Edom?

contentJson: [{"text":"Have You not rejected us, O God?","poem":1},{"text":"Will You no longer march out, O God, with our armies?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Have You not rejected us, O God? Will You no longer march out, O God, with our armies?

contentJson: [{"text":"Give us aid against the enemy,","poem":1},{"text":"for the help of man is worthless.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Give us aid against the enemy, for the help of man is worthless.

contentJson: [{"text":"With God we will perform with valor,","poem":1},{"text":"and He will trample our enemies.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: With God we will perform with valor, and He will trample our enemies.

contentJson: [{"text":"O God of my praise,","poem":1},{"text":"be not silent.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: O God of my praise, be not silent.

contentJson: [{"text":"For wicked and deceitful mouths open against me;","poem":1},{"text":"they speak against me with lying tongues.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For wicked and deceitful mouths open against me; they speak against me with lying tongues.

contentJson: [{"text":"They surround me with hateful words","poem":1},{"text":"and attack me without cause.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They surround me with hateful words and attack me without cause.

contentJson: [{"text":"In return for my love they accuse me,","poem":1},{"text":"but I am a man of prayer.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: In return for my love they accuse me, but I am a man of prayer.

contentJson: [{"text":"They repay me evil for good,","poem":1},{"text":"and hatred for my love.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They repay me evil for good, and hatred for my love.

contentJson: [{"text":"Set over him a wicked man;","poem":1},{"text":"let an accuser stand at his right hand.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Set over him a wicked man; let an accuser stand at his right hand.

contentJson: [{"text":"When he is tried, let him be found guilty,","poem":1},{"text":"and may his prayer be regarded as sin.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: When he is tried, let him be found guilty, and may his prayer be regarded as sin.

contentJson: [{"text":"May his days be few;","poem":1},{"text":"may another take his position.","poem":2},{"noteId":234}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May his days be few; may another take his position.

contentJson: [{"text":"May his children be fatherless","poem":1},{"text":"and his wife a widow.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May his children be fatherless and his wife a widow.

contentJson: [{"text":"May his children wander as beggars,","poem":1},{"text":"seeking sustenance","poem":2},{"noteId":235},{"text":"far from their ruined homes.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May his children wander as beggars, seeking sustenance far from their ruined homes.

contentJson: [{"text":"May the creditor seize all he owns,","poem":1},{"text":"and strangers plunder the fruits of his labor.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May the creditor seize all he owns, and strangers plunder the fruits of his labor.

contentJson: [{"text":"May there be no one to extend kindness to him,","poem":1},{"text":"and no one to favor his fatherless children.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May there be no one to extend kindness to him, and no one to favor his fatherless children.

contentJson: [{"text":"May his descendants be cut off;","poem":1},{"text":"may their name be blotted out from the next generation.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May his descendants be cut off; may their name be blotted out from the next generation.

contentJson: [{"text":"May the iniquity of his fathers be remembered before the LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"and the sin of his mother never be blotted out.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May the iniquity of his fathers be remembered before the LORD, and the sin of his mother never be blotted out.

contentJson: [{"text":"May their sins always remain before the LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"that He may cut off their memory from the earth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May their sins always remain before the LORD, that He may cut off their memory from the earth.

contentJson: [{"text":"For he never thought to show kindness,","poem":1},{"text":"but pursued the poor and needy and brokenhearted,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"even to their death.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
For he never thought to show kindness, but pursued the poor and needy and brokenhearted, 
even to their death.

contentJson: [{"text":"The cursing that he loved,","poem":1},{"text":"may it fall on him;","poem":2},{"text":"the blessing in which he refused to delight,","poem":1},{"text":"may it be far from him.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The cursing that he loved, may it fall on him; the blessing in which he refused to delight, may it be far from him.

contentJson: [{"text":"The cursing that he wore like a coat,","poem":1},{"text":"may it soak into his body like water,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"and into his bones like oil.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
The cursing that he wore like a coat, may it soak into his body like water, 
and into his bones like oil.

contentJson: [{"text":"May it be like a robe wrapped about him,","poem":1},{"text":"like a belt tied forever around him.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May it be like a robe wrapped about him, like a belt tied forever around him.

contentJson: [{"text":"May this be the LORD’s reward to my accusers,","poem":1},{"text":"to those who speak evil against me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May this be the LORD’s reward to my accusers, to those who speak evil against me.

contentJson: [{"text":"But You, O GOD, the Lord,","poem":1},{"text":"deal kindly with me for the sake of Your name;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"deliver me by the goodness of Your loving devotion.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
But You, O GOD, the Lord, deal kindly with me for the sake of Your name; 
deliver me by the goodness of Your loving devotion.

contentJson: [{"text":"For I am poor and needy;","poem":1},{"text":"my heart is wounded within me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For I am poor and needy; my heart is wounded within me.

contentJson: [{"text":"I am fading away like a lengthening shadow;","poem":1},{"text":"I am shaken off like a locust.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I am fading away like a lengthening shadow; I am shaken off like a locust.

contentJson: [{"text":"My knees are weak from fasting,","poem":1},{"text":"and my body grows lean and gaunt.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: My knees are weak from fasting, and my body grows lean and gaunt.

contentJson: [{"text":"I am an object of scorn to my accusers;","poem":1},{"text":"when they see me, they shake their heads.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I am an object of scorn to my accusers; when they see me, they shake their heads.

contentJson: [{"text":"Help me, O LORD my God;","poem":1},{"text":"save me according to Your loving devotion.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Help me, O LORD my God; save me according to Your loving devotion.

contentJson: [{"text":"Let them know that this is Your hand,","poem":1},{"text":"that You, O LORD, have done it.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Let them know that this is Your hand, that You, O LORD, have done it.

contentJson: [{"text":"Though they curse, You will bless.","poem":1},{"text":"When they rise up, they will be put to shame,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"but Your servant will rejoice.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Though they curse, You will bless. When they rise up, they will be put to shame, 
but Your servant will rejoice.

contentJson: [{"text":"May my accusers be clothed with disgrace;","poem":1},{"text":"may they wear their shame like a robe.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May my accusers be clothed with disgrace; may they wear their shame like a robe.

contentJson: [{"text":"With my mouth I will thank the LORD profusely;","poem":1},{"text":"I will praise Him in the presence of many.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: With my mouth I will thank the LORD profusely; I will praise Him in the presence of many.

contentJson: [{"text":"For He stands at the right hand of the needy one,","poem":1},{"text":"to save him from the condemners of his soul.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For He stands at the right hand of the needy one, to save him from the condemners of his soul.

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD said to my Lord:","poem":1},{"text":"“Sit at My right hand","poem":2},{"text":"until I make Your enemies","poem":1},{"text":"a footstool for Your feet.”","poem":2},{"noteId":236}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The LORD said to my Lord: “Sit at My right hand until I make Your enemies a footstool for Your feet.”

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD extends Your mighty scepter from Zion:","poem":1},{"text":"“Rule in the midst of Your enemies.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The LORD extends Your mighty scepter from Zion: “Rule in the midst of Your enemies.”

contentJson: [{"text":"Your people shall be willing","poem":1},{"text":"on Your day of battle.","poem":2},{"text":"Arrayed in holy splendor, from the womb of the dawn,","poem":1},{"text":"to You belongs the dew of Your youth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Your people shall be willing on Your day of battle. Arrayed in holy splendor, from the womb of the dawn, to You belongs the dew of Your youth.

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD has sworn","poem":1},{"text":"and will not change His mind:","poem":2},{"text":"“You are a priest forever","poem":1},{"text":"in the order of Melchizedek.”","poem":2},{"noteId":237}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The LORD has sworn and will not change His mind: “You are a priest forever in the order of Melchizedek.”

contentJson: [{"text":"The Lord is at Your right hand;","poem":1},{"text":"He will crush kings in the day of His wrath.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The Lord is at Your right hand; He will crush kings in the day of His wrath.

contentJson: [{"text":"He will judge the nations, heaping up the dead;","poem":1},{"text":"He will crush the leaders far and wide.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He will judge the nations, heaping up the dead; He will crush the leaders far and wide.

contentJson: [{"text":"He will drink from the brook by the road;","poem":1},{"text":"therefore He will lift up His head.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He will drink from the brook by the road; therefore He will lift up His head.

contentJson: [{"text":"Hallelujah!","poem":1},{"noteId":238},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"I will give thanks to the LORD with all my heart","poem":1},{"text":"in the council of the upright and in the assembly.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Hallelujah! 
I will give thanks to the LORD with all my heart in the council of the upright and in the assembly.

contentJson: [{"text":"Great are the works of the LORD;","poem":1},{"text":"they are pondered by all who delight in them.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Great are the works of the LORD; they are pondered by all who delight in them.

contentJson: [{"text":"Splendid and majestic is His work;","poem":1},{"text":"His righteousness endures forever.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Splendid and majestic is His work; His righteousness endures forever.

contentJson: [{"text":"He has caused His wonders to be remembered;","poem":1},{"text":"the LORD is gracious and compassionate.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He has caused His wonders to be remembered; the LORD is gracious and compassionate.

contentJson: [{"text":"He provides food for those who fear Him;","poem":1},{"text":"He remembers His covenant forever.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He provides food for those who fear Him; He remembers His covenant forever.

contentJson: [{"text":"He has shown His people the power of His works","poem":1},{"text":"by giving them the inheritance of the nations.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He has shown His people the power of His works by giving them the inheritance of the nations.

contentJson: [{"text":"The works of His hands are truth and justice;","poem":1},{"text":"all His precepts are trustworthy.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The works of His hands are truth and justice; all His precepts are trustworthy.

contentJson: [{"text":"They are upheld forever and ever,","poem":1},{"text":"enacted in truth and uprightness.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They are upheld forever and ever, enacted in truth and uprightness.

contentJson: [{"text":"He has sent redemption to His people;","poem":1},{"text":"He has ordained His covenant forever;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"holy and awesome is His name.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
He has sent redemption to His people; He has ordained His covenant forever; 
holy and awesome is His name.

contentJson: [{"text":"The fear of the LORD is the beginning of wisdom;","poem":1},{"text":"all who follow His precepts gain rich understanding.","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"His praise endures forever!","poem":1}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
The fear of the LORD is the beginning of wisdom; all who follow His precepts gain rich understanding. 
His praise endures forever!

contentJson: [{"text":"Hallelujah!","poem":1},{"noteId":239},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"Blessed is the man who fears the LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"who greatly delights in His commandments.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Hallelujah! 
Blessed is the man who fears the LORD, who greatly delights in His commandments.

contentJson: [{"text":"His descendants will be mighty in the land;","poem":1},{"text":"the generation of the upright will be blessed.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: His descendants will be mighty in the land; the generation of the upright will be blessed.

contentJson: [{"text":"Wealth and riches are in his house,","poem":1},{"text":"and his righteousness endures forever.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Wealth and riches are in his house, and his righteousness endures forever.

contentJson: [{"text":"Light dawns in the darkness for the upright—","poem":1},{"text":"for the gracious, compassionate, and righteous.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Light dawns in the darkness for the upright— for the gracious, compassionate, and righteous.

contentJson: [{"text":"It is well with the man who is generous and lends freely,","poem":1},{"text":"whose affairs are guided by justice.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: It is well with the man who is generous and lends freely, whose affairs are guided by justice.

contentJson: [{"text":"Surely he will never be shaken;","poem":1},{"text":"the righteous man will be remembered forever.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Surely he will never be shaken; the righteous man will be remembered forever.

contentJson: [{"text":"He does not fear bad news;","poem":1},{"text":"his heart is steadfast, trusting in the LORD.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He does not fear bad news; his heart is steadfast, trusting in the LORD.

contentJson: [{"text":"His heart is assured; he does not fear,","poem":1},{"text":"until he looks in triumph on his foes.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: His heart is assured; he does not fear, until he looks in triumph on his foes.

contentJson: [{"text":"He has scattered abroad his gifts to the poor;","poem":1},{"text":"his righteousness endures forever;","poem":2},{"noteId":240},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"his horn will be lifted high in honor.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
He has scattered abroad his gifts to the poor; his righteousness endures forever; 
his horn will be lifted high in honor.

contentJson: [{"text":"The wicked man will see and be grieved;","poem":1},{"text":"he will gnash his teeth and waste away;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"the desires of the wicked will perish.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
The wicked man will see and be grieved; he will gnash his teeth and waste away; 
the desires of the wicked will perish.

contentJson: [{"text":"Hallelujah!","poem":1},{"noteId":241},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"Give praise, O servants of the LORD;","poem":1},{"text":"praise the name of the LORD.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Hallelujah! 
Give praise, O servants of the LORD; praise the name of the LORD.

contentJson: [{"text":"Blessed be the name of the LORD","poem":1},{"text":"both now and forevermore.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Blessed be the name of the LORD both now and forevermore.

contentJson: [{"text":"From where the sun rises to where it sets,","poem":1},{"text":"the name of the LORD is praised.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: From where the sun rises to where it sets, the name of the LORD is praised.

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD is exalted over all the nations,","poem":1},{"text":"His glory above the heavens.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The LORD is exalted over all the nations, His glory above the heavens.

contentJson: [{"text":"Who is like the LORD our God,","poem":1},{"text":"the One enthroned on high?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Who is like the LORD our God, the One enthroned on high?

contentJson: [{"text":"He humbles Himself to behold","poem":1},{"text":"the heavens and the earth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He humbles Himself to behold the heavens and the earth.

contentJson: [{"text":"He raises the poor from the dust","poem":1},{"text":"and lifts the needy from the dump","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He raises the poor from the dust and lifts the needy from the dump

contentJson: [{"text":"to seat them with nobles,","poem":1},{"text":"with the princes of His people.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: to seat them with nobles, with the princes of His people.

contentJson: [{"text":"He settles the barren woman in her home","poem":1},{"text":"as a joyful mother to her children.","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"Hallelujah!","poem":1}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
He settles the barren woman in her home as a joyful mother to her children. 
Hallelujah!

contentJson: [{"text":"When Israel departed from Egypt,","poem":1},{"text":"the house of Jacob from a people of foreign tongue,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: When Israel departed from Egypt, the house of Jacob from a people of foreign tongue,

contentJson: [{"text":"Judah became God’s sanctuary,","poem":1},{"text":"and Israel His dominion.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Judah became God’s sanctuary, and Israel His dominion.

contentJson: [{"text":"The sea observed and fled;","poem":1},{"text":"the Jordan turned back;","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The sea observed and fled; the Jordan turned back;

contentJson: [{"text":"the mountains skipped like rams,","poem":1},{"text":"the hills like lambs.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: the mountains skipped like rams, the hills like lambs.

contentJson: [{"text":"Why was it, O sea, that you fled,","poem":1},{"text":"O Jordan, that you turned back,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Why was it, O sea, that you fled, O Jordan, that you turned back,

contentJson: [{"text":"O mountains, that you skipped like rams,","poem":1},{"text":"O hills, like lambs?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: O mountains, that you skipped like rams, O hills, like lambs?

contentJson: [{"text":"Tremble, O earth, at the presence of the Lord,","poem":1},{"text":"at the presence of the God of Jacob,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Tremble, O earth, at the presence of the Lord, at the presence of the God of Jacob,

contentJson: [{"text":"who turned the rock into a pool,","poem":1},{"text":"the flint into a fountain of water!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: who turned the rock into a pool, the flint into a fountain of water!

contentJson: [{"text":"Not to us, O LORD, not to us,","poem":1},{"text":"but to Your name be the glory,","poem":2},{"text":"because of Your loving devotion,","poem":1},{"text":"because of Your faithfulness.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Not to us, O LORD, not to us, but to Your name be the glory, because of Your loving devotion, because of Your faithfulness.

contentJson: [{"text":"Why should the nations say,","poem":1},{"text":"“Where is their God?”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Why should the nations say, “Where is their God?”

contentJson: [{"text":"Our God is in heaven;","poem":1},{"text":"He does as He pleases.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Our God is in heaven; He does as He pleases.

contentJson: [{"text":"Their idols are silver and gold,","poem":1},{"text":"made by the hands of men.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Their idols are silver and gold, made by the hands of men.

contentJson: [{"text":"They have mouths, but cannot speak;","poem":1},{"text":"they have eyes, but cannot see;","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They have mouths, but cannot speak; they have eyes, but cannot see;

contentJson: [{"text":"they have ears, but cannot hear;","poem":1},{"text":"they have noses, but cannot smell;","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: they have ears, but cannot hear; they have noses, but cannot smell;

contentJson: [{"text":"they have hands, but cannot feel;","poem":1},{"text":"they have feet, but cannot walk;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"they cannot even clear their throats.","poem":2},{"noteId":242}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
they have hands, but cannot feel; they have feet, but cannot walk; 
they cannot even clear their throats.

contentJson: [{"text":"Those who make them become like them,","poem":1},{"text":"as do all who trust in them.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Those who make them become like them, as do all who trust in them.

contentJson: [{"text":"O Israel,","poem":1},{"noteId":243},{"text":"trust in the LORD!","poem":1},{"text":"He is their help and shield.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: O Israel, trust in the LORD! He is their help and shield.

contentJson: [{"text":"O house of Aaron, trust in the LORD!","poem":1},{"text":"He is their help and shield.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: O house of Aaron, trust in the LORD! He is their help and shield.

contentJson: [{"text":"You who fear the LORD, trust in the LORD!","poem":1},{"text":"He is their help and shield.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You who fear the LORD, trust in the LORD! He is their help and shield.

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD is mindful of us;","poem":1},{"text":"He will bless us.","poem":2},{"text":"He will bless the house of Israel;","poem":1},{"text":"He will bless the house of Aaron;","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The LORD is mindful of us; He will bless us. He will bless the house of Israel; He will bless the house of Aaron;

contentJson: [{"text":"He will bless those who fear the LORD—","poem":1},{"text":"small and great alike.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He will bless those who fear the LORD— small and great alike.

contentJson: [{"text":"May the LORD give you increase,","poem":1},{"text":"both you and your children.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May the LORD give you increase, both you and your children.

contentJson: [{"text":"May you be blessed by the LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"the Maker of heaven and earth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May you be blessed by the LORD, the Maker of heaven and earth.

contentJson: [{"text":"The highest heavens belong to the LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"but the earth He has given to mankind.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The highest heavens belong to the LORD, but the earth He has given to mankind.

contentJson: [{"text":"It is not the dead who praise the LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"nor any who descend into silence.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: It is not the dead who praise the LORD, nor any who descend into silence.

contentJson: [{"text":"But it is we who will bless the LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"both now and forevermore.","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"Hallelujah!","poem":1},{"noteId":244}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
But it is we who will bless the LORD, both now and forevermore. 
Hallelujah!

contentJson: [{"text":"I love the LORD, for He has heard my voice—","poem":1},{"text":"my appeal for mercy.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I love the LORD, for He has heard my voice— my appeal for mercy.

contentJson: [{"text":"Because He has inclined His ear to me,","poem":1},{"text":"I will call on Him as long as I live.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Because He has inclined His ear to me, I will call on Him as long as I live.

contentJson: [{"text":"The ropes of death entangled me;","poem":1},{"text":"the anguish of Sheol overcame me;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"I was confronted by trouble and sorrow.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
The ropes of death entangled me; the anguish of Sheol overcame me; 
I was confronted by trouble and sorrow.

contentJson: [{"text":"Then I called on the name of the LORD:","poem":1},{"text":"“O LORD, deliver my soul!”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Then I called on the name of the LORD: “O LORD, deliver my soul!”

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD is gracious and righteous;","poem":1},{"text":"our God is full of compassion.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The LORD is gracious and righteous; our God is full of compassion.

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD preserves the simplehearted;","poem":1},{"text":"I was helpless, and He saved me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The LORD preserves the simplehearted; I was helpless, and He saved me.

contentJson: [{"text":"Return to your rest, O my soul,","poem":1},{"text":"for the LORD has been good to you.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Return to your rest, O my soul, for the LORD has been good to you.

contentJson: [{"text":"For You have delivered my soul from death,","poem":1},{"text":"my eyes from tears, my feet from stumbling.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For You have delivered my soul from death, my eyes from tears, my feet from stumbling.

contentJson: [{"text":"I will walk before the LORD","poem":1},{"text":"in the land of the living.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I will walk before the LORD in the land of the living.

contentJson: [{"text":"I believed, therefore I said,","poem":1},{"noteId":245},{"text":"“I am greatly afflicted.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I believed, therefore I said, “I am greatly afflicted.”

contentJson: [{"text":"In my alarm I said,","poem":1},{"text":"“All men are liars!”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: In my alarm I said, “All men are liars!”

contentJson: [{"text":"How can I repay the LORD","poem":1},{"text":"for all His goodness to me?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: How can I repay the LORD for all His goodness to me?

contentJson: [{"text":"I will lift the cup of salvation","poem":1},{"text":"and call on the name of the LORD.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I will lift the cup of salvation and call on the name of the LORD.

contentJson: [{"text":"I will fulfill my vows to the LORD","poem":1},{"text":"in the presence of all His people.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I will fulfill my vows to the LORD in the presence of all His people.

contentJson: [{"text":"Precious in the sight of the LORD","poem":1},{"text":"is the death of His saints.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Precious in the sight of the LORD is the death of His saints.

contentJson: [{"text":"Truly, O LORD, I am Your servant;","poem":1},{"text":"I am Your servant, the son of Your maidservant;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"You have broken my bonds.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Truly, O LORD, I am Your servant; I am Your servant, the son of Your maidservant; 
You have broken my bonds.

contentJson: [{"text":"I will offer to You a sacrifice of thanksgiving","poem":1},{"text":"and call on the name of the LORD.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I will offer to You a sacrifice of thanksgiving and call on the name of the LORD.

contentJson: [{"text":"I will fulfill my vows to the LORD","poem":1},{"text":"in the presence of all His people,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I will fulfill my vows to the LORD in the presence of all His people,

contentJson: [{"text":"in the courts of the LORD’s house,","poem":1},{"text":"in your midst, O Jerusalem.","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"Hallelujah!","poem":1},{"noteId":246}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
in the courts of the LORD’s house, in your midst, O Jerusalem. 
Hallelujah!

contentJson: [{"text":"Praise the LORD, all you nations!","poem":1},{"text":"Extol Him, all you peoples!","poem":2},{"noteId":247}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Praise the LORD, all you nations! Extol Him, all you peoples!

contentJson: [{"text":"For great is His loving devotion toward us,","poem":1},{"text":"and the faithfulness of the LORD endures forever.","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"Hallelujah!","poem":1},{"noteId":248}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
For great is His loving devotion toward us, and the faithfulness of the LORD endures forever. 
Hallelujah!

contentJson: [{"text":"Give thanks to the LORD, for He is good;","poem":1},{"text":"His loving devotion endures forever.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Give thanks to the LORD, for He is good; His loving devotion endures forever.

contentJson: [{"text":"Let Israel","poem":1},{"noteId":249},{"text":"say,","poem":1},{"text":"“His loving devotion endures forever.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Let Israel say, “His loving devotion endures forever.”

contentJson: [{"text":"Let the house of Aaron say,","poem":1},{"text":"“His loving devotion endures forever.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Let the house of Aaron say, “His loving devotion endures forever.”

contentJson: [{"text":"Let those who fear the LORD say,","poem":1},{"text":"“His loving devotion endures forever.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Let those who fear the LORD say, “His loving devotion endures forever.”

contentJson: [{"text":"In my distress I called to the LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"and He answered and set me free.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: In my distress I called to the LORD, and He answered and set me free.

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD is on my side;","poem":1},{"noteId":250},{"text":"I will not be afraid.","poem":1},{"text":"What can man do to me?","poem":2},{"noteId":251}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The LORD is on my side; I will not be afraid. What can man do to me?

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD is on my side; He is my helper.","poem":1},{"text":"Therefore I will look in triumph on those who hate me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The LORD is on my side; He is my helper. Therefore I will look in triumph on those who hate me.

contentJson: [{"text":"It is better to take refuge in the LORD","poem":1},{"text":"than to trust in man.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: It is better to take refuge in the LORD than to trust in man.

contentJson: [{"text":"It is better to take refuge in the LORD","poem":1},{"text":"than to trust in princes.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: It is better to take refuge in the LORD than to trust in princes.

contentJson: [{"text":"All the nations surrounded me,","poem":1},{"text":"but in the name of the LORD I cut them off.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: All the nations surrounded me, but in the name of the LORD I cut them off.

contentJson: [{"text":"They surrounded me on every side,","poem":1},{"text":"but in the name of the LORD I cut them off.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They surrounded me on every side, but in the name of the LORD I cut them off.

contentJson: [{"text":"They swarmed around me like bees,","poem":1},{"text":"but they were extinguished like burning thorns;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"in the name of the LORD I cut them off.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
They swarmed around me like bees, but they were extinguished like burning thorns; 
in the name of the LORD I cut them off.

contentJson: [{"text":"I was pushed so hard I was falling,","poem":1},{"text":"but the LORD helped me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I was pushed so hard I was falling, but the LORD helped me.

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD is my strength and my song,","poem":1},{"text":"and He has become my salvation.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The LORD is my strength and my song, and He has become my salvation.

contentJson: [{"text":"Shouts of joy and salvation resound in the tents of the righteous:","poem":1},{"text":"“The right hand of the LORD performs with valor!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Shouts of joy and salvation resound in the tents of the righteous: “The right hand of the LORD performs with valor!

contentJson: [{"text":"The right hand of the LORD is exalted!","poem":1},{"text":"The right hand of the LORD performs with valor!”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The right hand of the LORD is exalted! The right hand of the LORD performs with valor!”

contentJson: [{"text":"I will not die, but I will live","poem":1},{"text":"and proclaim what the LORD has done.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I will not die, but I will live and proclaim what the LORD has done.

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD disciplined me severely,","poem":1},{"text":"but He has not given me over to death.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The LORD disciplined me severely, but He has not given me over to death.

contentJson: [{"text":"Open to me the gates of righteousness,","poem":1},{"text":"that I may enter and give thanks to the LORD.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Open to me the gates of righteousness, that I may enter and give thanks to the LORD.

contentJson: [{"text":"This is the gate of the LORD;","poem":1},{"text":"the righteous shall enter through it.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: This is the gate of the LORD; the righteous shall enter through it.

contentJson: [{"text":"I will give You thanks, for You have answered me,","poem":1},{"text":"and You have become my salvation.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I will give You thanks, for You have answered me, and You have become my salvation.

contentJson: [{"text":"The stone the builders rejected","poem":1},{"text":"has become the cornerstone.","poem":2},{"noteId":252}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The stone the builders rejected has become the cornerstone.

contentJson: [{"text":"This is from the LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"and it is marvelous in our eyes.","poem":2},{"noteId":253}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: This is from the LORD, and it is marvelous in our eyes.

contentJson: [{"text":"This is the day that the LORD has made;","poem":1},{"text":"we will rejoice and be glad in it.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: This is the day that the LORD has made; we will rejoice and be glad in it.

contentJson: [{"text":"O LORD, save us, we pray.","poem":1},{"noteId":254},{"text":"We beseech You, O LORD, cause us to prosper!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: O LORD, save us, we pray. We beseech You, O LORD, cause us to prosper!

contentJson: [{"text":"Blessed is he who comes in the name of the LORD.","poem":1},{"noteId":255},{"text":"From the house of the LORD we bless you.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Blessed is he who comes in the name of the LORD. From the house of the LORD we bless you.

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD is God;","poem":1},{"text":"He has made His light to shine upon us.","poem":2},{"text":"Bind the festal sacrifice with cords","poem":1},{"text":"to the horns of the altar.","poem":2},{"noteId":256}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The LORD is God; He has made His light to shine upon us. Bind the festal sacrifice with cords to the horns of the altar.

contentJson: [{"text":"You are my God, and I will give You thanks.","poem":1},{"text":"You are my God, and I will exalt You.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You are my God, and I will give You thanks. You are my God, and I will exalt You.

contentJson: [{"text":"Give thanks to the LORD, for He is good;","poem":1},{"text":"His loving devotion endures forever.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Give thanks to the LORD, for He is good; His loving devotion endures forever.

contentJson: [{"text":"Blessed","poem":1},{"noteId":257},{"text":"are those whose way is blameless,","poem":1},{"text":"who walk in the Law of the LORD.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Blessed are those whose way is blameless, who walk in the Law of the LORD.

contentJson: [{"text":"Blessed are those who keep His testimonies","poem":1},{"text":"and seek Him with all their heart.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Blessed are those who keep His testimonies and seek Him with all their heart.

contentJson: [{"text":"They do no iniquity;","poem":1},{"text":"they walk in His ways.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They do no iniquity; they walk in His ways.

contentJson: [{"text":"You have ordained Your precepts,","poem":1},{"text":"that we should keep them diligently.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You have ordained Your precepts, that we should keep them diligently.

contentJson: [{"text":"Oh, that my ways were committed","poem":1},{"text":"to keeping Your statutes!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Oh, that my ways were committed to keeping Your statutes!

contentJson: [{"text":"Then I would not be ashamed","poem":1},{"text":"when I consider all Your commandments.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Then I would not be ashamed when I consider all Your commandments.

contentJson: [{"text":"I will praise You with an upright heart","poem":1},{"text":"when I learn Your righteous judgments.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I will praise You with an upright heart when I learn Your righteous judgments.

contentJson: [{"text":"I will keep Your statutes;","poem":1},{"text":"do not utterly forsake me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I will keep Your statutes; do not utterly forsake me.

contentJson: [{"text":"How can a young man keep his way pure?","poem":1},{"text":"By guarding it according to Your word.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: How can a young man keep his way pure? By guarding it according to Your word.

contentJson: [{"text":"With all my heart I have sought You;","poem":1},{"text":"do not let me stray from Your commandments.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: With all my heart I have sought You; do not let me stray from Your commandments.

contentJson: [{"text":"I have hidden Your word in my heart","poem":1},{"text":"that I might not sin against You.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I have hidden Your word in my heart that I might not sin against You.

contentJson: [{"text":"Blessed are You, O LORD;","poem":1},{"text":"teach me Your statutes.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Blessed are You, O LORD; teach me Your statutes.

contentJson: [{"text":"With my lips I proclaim","poem":1},{"text":"all the judgments of Your mouth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: With my lips I proclaim all the judgments of Your mouth.

contentJson: [{"text":"I rejoice in the way of Your testimonies","poem":1},{"text":"as much as in all riches.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I rejoice in the way of Your testimonies as much as in all riches.

contentJson: [{"text":"I will meditate on Your precepts","poem":1},{"text":"and regard Your ways.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I will meditate on Your precepts and regard Your ways.

contentJson: [{"text":"I will delight in Your statutes;","poem":1},{"text":"I will not forget Your word.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I will delight in Your statutes; I will not forget Your word.

contentJson: [{"text":"Deal bountifully with Your servant,","poem":1},{"text":"that I may live and keep Your word.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Deal bountifully with Your servant, that I may live and keep Your word.

contentJson: [{"text":"Open my eyes that I may see","poem":1},{"text":"wondrous things from Your law.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Open my eyes that I may see wondrous things from Your law.

contentJson: [{"text":"I am a stranger on the earth;","poem":1},{"text":"do not hide Your commandments from me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I am a stranger on the earth; do not hide Your commandments from me.

contentJson: [{"text":"My soul is consumed with longing","poem":1},{"text":"for Your judgments at all times.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: My soul is consumed with longing for Your judgments at all times.

contentJson: [{"text":"You rebuke the arrogant—","poem":1},{"text":"the cursed who stray from Your commandments.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You rebuke the arrogant— the cursed who stray from Your commandments.

contentJson: [{"text":"Remove my scorn and contempt,","poem":1},{"text":"for I have kept Your testimonies.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Remove my scorn and contempt, for I have kept Your testimonies.

contentJson: [{"text":"Though rulers sit and slander me,","poem":1},{"text":"Your servant meditates on Your statutes.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Though rulers sit and slander me, Your servant meditates on Your statutes.

contentJson: [{"text":"Your testimonies are indeed my delight;","poem":1},{"text":"they are my counselors.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Your testimonies are indeed my delight; they are my counselors.

contentJson: [{"text":"My soul cleaves to the dust;","poem":1},{"text":"revive me according to Your word.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: My soul cleaves to the dust; revive me according to Your word.

contentJson: [{"text":"I recounted my ways, and You answered me;","poem":1},{"text":"teach me Your statutes.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I recounted my ways, and You answered me; teach me Your statutes.

contentJson: [{"text":"Make clear to me the way of Your precepts;","poem":1},{"text":"then I will meditate on Your wonders.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Make clear to me the way of Your precepts; then I will meditate on Your wonders.

contentJson: [{"text":"My soul melts with sorrow;","poem":1},{"text":"strengthen me according to Your word.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: My soul melts with sorrow; strengthen me according to Your word.

contentJson: [{"text":"Remove me from the path of deceit","poem":1},{"text":"and graciously grant me Your law.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Remove me from the path of deceit and graciously grant me Your law.

contentJson: [{"text":"I have chosen the way of truth;","poem":1},{"text":"I have set Your ordinances before me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I have chosen the way of truth; I have set Your ordinances before me.

contentJson: [{"text":"I cling to Your testimonies, O LORD;","poem":1},{"text":"let me not be put to shame.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I cling to Your testimonies, O LORD; let me not be put to shame.

contentJson: [{"text":"I run in the path of Your commandments,","poem":1},{"text":"for You will enlarge my heart.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I run in the path of Your commandments, for You will enlarge my heart.

contentJson: [{"text":"Teach me, O LORD, the way of Your statutes,","poem":1},{"text":"and I will keep them to the end.","poem":2},{"noteId":258}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Teach me, O LORD, the way of Your statutes, and I will keep them to the end.

contentJson: [{"text":"Give me understanding that I may obey Your law,","poem":1},{"text":"and follow it with all my heart.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Give me understanding that I may obey Your law, and follow it with all my heart.

contentJson: [{"text":"Direct me in the path of Your commandments,","poem":1},{"text":"for there I find delight.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Direct me in the path of Your commandments, for there I find delight.

contentJson: [{"text":"Turn my heart to Your testimonies","poem":1},{"text":"and not to covetous gain.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Turn my heart to Your testimonies and not to covetous gain.

contentJson: [{"text":"Turn my eyes away from worthless things;","poem":1},{"text":"revive me with Your word.","poem":2},{"noteId":259}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Turn my eyes away from worthless things; revive me with Your word.

contentJson: [{"text":"Establish Your word to Your servant,","poem":1},{"text":"to produce reverence for You.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Establish Your word to Your servant, to produce reverence for You.

contentJson: [{"text":"Turn away the disgrace I dread,","poem":1},{"text":"for Your judgments are good.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Turn away the disgrace I dread, for Your judgments are good.

contentJson: [{"text":"How I long for Your precepts!","poem":1},{"text":"Revive me in Your righteousness.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: How I long for Your precepts! Revive me in Your righteousness.

contentJson: [{"text":"May Your loving devotion come to me, O LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"Your salvation, according to Your promise.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May Your loving devotion come to me, O LORD, Your salvation, according to Your promise.

contentJson: [{"text":"Then I can answer him who taunts,","poem":1},{"text":"for I trust in Your word.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Then I can answer him who taunts, for I trust in Your word.

contentJson: [{"text":"Never take Your word of truth from my mouth,","poem":1},{"text":"for I hope in Your judgments.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Never take Your word of truth from my mouth, for I hope in Your judgments.

contentJson: [{"text":"I will always obey Your law,","poem":1},{"text":"forever and ever.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I will always obey Your law, forever and ever.

contentJson: [{"text":"And I will walk in freedom,","poem":1},{"text":"for I have sought Your precepts.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: And I will walk in freedom, for I have sought Your precepts.

contentJson: [{"text":"I will speak of Your testimonies before kings,","poem":1},{"text":"and I will not be ashamed.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I will speak of Your testimonies before kings, and I will not be ashamed.

contentJson: [{"text":"I delight in Your commandments","poem":1},{"text":"because I love them.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I delight in Your commandments because I love them.

contentJson: [{"text":"I lift up my hands to Your commandments, which I love,","poem":1},{"text":"and I meditate on Your statutes.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I lift up my hands to Your commandments, which I love, and I meditate on Your statutes.

contentJson: [{"text":"Remember Your word to Your servant,","poem":1},{"text":"upon which You have given me hope.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Remember Your word to Your servant, upon which You have given me hope.

contentJson: [{"text":"This is my comfort in affliction,","poem":1},{"text":"that Your promise has given me life.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: This is my comfort in affliction, that Your promise has given me life.

contentJson: [{"text":"The arrogant utterly deride me,","poem":1},{"text":"but I do not turn from Your law.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The arrogant utterly deride me, but I do not turn from Your law.

contentJson: [{"text":"I remember Your judgments of old, O LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"and in them I find comfort.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I remember Your judgments of old, O LORD, and in them I find comfort.

contentJson: [{"text":"Rage has taken hold of me","poem":1},{"text":"because of the wicked who reject Your law.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Rage has taken hold of me because of the wicked who reject Your law.

contentJson: [{"text":"Your statutes are songs to me","poem":1},{"text":"in the house of my pilgrimage.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Your statutes are songs to me in the house of my pilgrimage.

contentJson: [{"text":"In the night, O LORD, I remember Your name,","poem":1},{"text":"that I may keep Your law.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: In the night, O LORD, I remember Your name, that I may keep Your law.

contentJson: [{"text":"This is my practice,","poem":1},{"text":"for I obey Your precepts.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: This is my practice, for I obey Your precepts.

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD is my portion;","poem":1},{"text":"I have promised to keep Your words.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The LORD is my portion; I have promised to keep Your words.

contentJson: [{"text":"I have sought Your face with all my heart;","poem":1},{"text":"be gracious to me according to Your promise.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I have sought Your face with all my heart; be gracious to me according to Your promise.

contentJson: [{"text":"I considered my ways","poem":1},{"text":"and turned my steps to Your testimonies.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I considered my ways and turned my steps to Your testimonies.

contentJson: [{"text":"I hurried without hesitating","poem":1},{"text":"to keep Your commandments.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I hurried without hesitating to keep Your commandments.

contentJson: [{"text":"Though the ropes of the wicked bind me,","poem":1},{"text":"I do not forget Your law.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Though the ropes of the wicked bind me, I do not forget Your law.

contentJson: [{"text":"At midnight I rise to give You thanks","poem":1},{"text":"for Your righteous judgments.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: At midnight I rise to give You thanks for Your righteous judgments.

contentJson: [{"text":"I am a friend to all who fear You,","poem":1},{"text":"and to those who keep Your precepts.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I am a friend to all who fear You, and to those who keep Your precepts.

contentJson: [{"text":"The earth is filled with Your loving devotion, O LORD;","poem":1},{"text":"teach me Your statutes.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The earth is filled with Your loving devotion, O LORD; teach me Your statutes.

contentJson: [{"text":"You are good to Your servant, O LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"according to Your word.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You are good to Your servant, O LORD, according to Your word.

contentJson: [{"text":"Teach me good judgment and knowledge,","poem":1},{"text":"for I believe in Your commandments.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Teach me good judgment and knowledge, for I believe in Your commandments.

contentJson: [{"text":"Before I was afflicted, I went astray;","poem":1},{"text":"but now I keep Your word.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Before I was afflicted, I went astray; but now I keep Your word.

contentJson: [{"text":"You are good, and You do what is good;","poem":1},{"text":"teach me Your statutes.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You are good, and You do what is good; teach me Your statutes.

contentJson: [{"text":"Though the arrogant have smeared me with lies,","poem":1},{"text":"I keep Your precepts with all my heart.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Though the arrogant have smeared me with lies, I keep Your precepts with all my heart.

contentJson: [{"text":"Their hearts are hard","poem":1},{"noteId":260},{"text":"and callous,","poem":1},{"text":"but I delight in Your law.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Their hearts are hard and callous, but I delight in Your law.

contentJson: [{"text":"It was good for me to be afflicted,","poem":1},{"text":"that I might learn Your statutes.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: It was good for me to be afflicted, that I might learn Your statutes.

contentJson: [{"text":"The law from Your mouth is more precious to me","poem":1},{"text":"than thousands of pieces of gold and silver.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The law from Your mouth is more precious to me than thousands of pieces of gold and silver.

contentJson: [{"text":"Your hands have made me and fashioned me;","poem":1},{"text":"give me understanding to learn Your commandments.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Your hands have made me and fashioned me; give me understanding to learn Your commandments.

contentJson: [{"text":"May those who fear You see me and rejoice,","poem":1},{"text":"for I have hoped in Your word.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May those who fear You see me and rejoice, for I have hoped in Your word.

contentJson: [{"text":"I know, O LORD, that Your judgments are righteous,","poem":1},{"text":"and that in faithfulness You have afflicted me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I know, O LORD, that Your judgments are righteous, and that in faithfulness You have afflicted me.

contentJson: [{"text":"May Your loving devotion comfort me, I pray,","poem":1},{"text":"according to Your promise to Your servant.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May Your loving devotion comfort me, I pray, according to Your promise to Your servant.

contentJson: [{"text":"May Your compassion come to me, that I may live,","poem":1},{"text":"for Your law is my delight.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May Your compassion come to me, that I may live, for Your law is my delight.

contentJson: [{"text":"May the arrogant be put to shame for subverting me with a lie;","poem":1},{"text":"I will meditate on Your precepts.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May the arrogant be put to shame for subverting me with a lie; I will meditate on Your precepts.

contentJson: [{"text":"May those who fear You turn to me,","poem":1},{"text":"those who know Your testimonies.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May those who fear You turn to me, those who know Your testimonies.

contentJson: [{"text":"May my heart be blameless in Your statutes,","poem":1},{"text":"that I may not be put to shame.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May my heart be blameless in Your statutes, that I may not be put to shame.

contentJson: [{"text":"My soul faints for Your salvation;","poem":1},{"text":"I wait for Your word.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: My soul faints for Your salvation; I wait for Your word.

contentJson: [{"text":"My eyes fail, looking for Your promise;","poem":1},{"text":"I ask, “When will You comfort me?”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: My eyes fail, looking for Your promise; I ask, “When will You comfort me?”

contentJson: [{"text":"Though I am like a wineskin dried up by smoke,","poem":1},{"text":"I do not forget Your statutes.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Though I am like a wineskin dried up by smoke, I do not forget Your statutes.

contentJson: [{"text":"How many days must Your servant wait?","poem":1},{"noteId":261},{"text":"When will You execute judgment on my persecutors?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: How many days must Your servant wait? When will You execute judgment on my persecutors?

contentJson: [{"text":"The arrogant have dug pits for me","poem":1},{"text":"in violation of Your law.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The arrogant have dug pits for me in violation of Your law.

contentJson: [{"text":"All Your commandments are faithful;","poem":1},{"text":"I am persecuted without cause—help me!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: All Your commandments are faithful; I am persecuted without cause—help me!

contentJson: [{"text":"They almost wiped me from the earth,","poem":1},{"text":"but I have not forsaken Your precepts.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They almost wiped me from the earth, but I have not forsaken Your precepts.

contentJson: [{"text":"Revive me according to Your loving devotion,","poem":1},{"text":"that I may obey the testimony of Your mouth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Revive me according to Your loving devotion, that I may obey the testimony of Your mouth.

contentJson: [{"text":"Your word, O LORD, is everlasting;","poem":1},{"text":"it is firmly fixed in the heavens.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Your word, O LORD, is everlasting; it is firmly fixed in the heavens.

contentJson: [{"text":"Your faithfulness continues through all generations;","poem":1},{"text":"You established the earth, and it endures.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Your faithfulness continues through all generations; You established the earth, and it endures.

contentJson: [{"text":"Your ordinances stand to this day,","poem":1},{"noteId":262},{"text":"for all things are servants to You.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Your ordinances stand to this day, for all things are servants to You.

contentJson: [{"text":"If Your law had not been my delight,","poem":1},{"text":"then I would have perished in my affliction.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: If Your law had not been my delight, then I would have perished in my affliction.

contentJson: [{"text":"I will never forget Your precepts,","poem":1},{"text":"for by them You have revived me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
