text: I will never forget Your precepts, for by them You have revived me.

contentJson: [{"text":"I am Yours; save me,","poem":1},{"text":"for I have sought Your precepts.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I am Yours; save me, for I have sought Your precepts.

contentJson: [{"text":"The wicked wait to destroy me,","poem":1},{"text":"but I will ponder Your testimonies.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The wicked wait to destroy me, but I will ponder Your testimonies.

contentJson: [{"text":"I have seen a limit to all perfection,","poem":1},{"text":"but Your commandment is without limit.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I have seen a limit to all perfection, but Your commandment is without limit.

contentJson: [{"text":"Oh, how I love Your law!","poem":1},{"text":"All day long it is my meditation.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Oh, how I love Your law! All day long it is my meditation.

contentJson: [{"text":"Your commandments make me wiser than my enemies,","poem":1},{"text":"for they are always with me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Your commandments make me wiser than my enemies, for they are always with me.

contentJson: [{"text":"I have more insight than all my teachers,","poem":1},{"text":"for Your testimonies are my meditation.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I have more insight than all my teachers, for Your testimonies are my meditation.

contentJson: [{"text":"I discern more than the elders,","poem":1},{"text":"for I obey Your precepts.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I discern more than the elders, for I obey Your precepts.

contentJson: [{"text":"I have kept my feet from every evil path,","poem":1},{"text":"that I may keep Your word.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I have kept my feet from every evil path, that I may keep Your word.

contentJson: [{"text":"I have not departed from Your ordinances,","poem":1},{"text":"for You Yourself have taught me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I have not departed from Your ordinances, for You Yourself have taught me.

contentJson: [{"text":"How sweet are Your words to my taste—","poem":1},{"text":"sweeter than honey in my mouth!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: How sweet are Your words to my taste— sweeter than honey in my mouth!

contentJson: [{"text":"I gain understanding from Your precepts;","poem":1},{"text":"therefore I hate every false way.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I gain understanding from Your precepts; therefore I hate every false way.

contentJson: [{"text":"Your word is a lamp to my feet","poem":1},{"text":"and a light to my path.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Your word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.

contentJson: [{"text":"I have sworn and confirmed","poem":1},{"text":"that I will keep Your righteous judgments.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I have sworn and confirmed that I will keep Your righteous judgments.

contentJson: [{"text":"I am severely afflicted, O LORD;","poem":1},{"text":"revive me through Your word.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I am severely afflicted, O LORD; revive me through Your word.

contentJson: [{"text":"Accept the freewill offerings of my mouth, O LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"and teach me Your judgments.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Accept the freewill offerings of my mouth, O LORD, and teach me Your judgments.

contentJson: [{"text":"I constantly take my life in my hands,","poem":1},{"text":"yet I do not forget Your law.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I constantly take my life in my hands, yet I do not forget Your law.

contentJson: [{"text":"The wicked have set a snare for me,","poem":1},{"text":"but I have not strayed from Your precepts.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The wicked have set a snare for me, but I have not strayed from Your precepts.

contentJson: [{"text":"Your testimonies are my heritage forever,","poem":1},{"text":"for they are the joy of my heart.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Your testimonies are my heritage forever, for they are the joy of my heart.

contentJson: [{"text":"I have inclined my heart to perform Your statutes,","poem":1},{"text":"even to the very end.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I have inclined my heart to perform Your statutes, even to the very end.

contentJson: [{"text":"The double-minded I despise,","poem":1},{"text":"but Your law I love.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The double-minded I despise, but Your law I love.

contentJson: [{"text":"You are my hiding place and my shield;","poem":1},{"text":"I put my hope in Your word.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You are my hiding place and my shield; I put my hope in Your word.

contentJson: [{"text":"Depart from me, you evildoers,","poem":1},{"text":"that I may obey the commandments of my God.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Depart from me, you evildoers, that I may obey the commandments of my God.

contentJson: [{"text":"Sustain me as You promised, that I may live;","poem":1},{"text":"let me not be ashamed of my hope.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Sustain me as You promised, that I may live; let me not be ashamed of my hope.

contentJson: [{"text":"Uphold me, and I will be saved,","poem":1},{"text":"that I may always regard Your statutes.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Uphold me, and I will be saved, that I may always regard Your statutes.

contentJson: [{"text":"You reject all who stray from Your statutes,","poem":1},{"text":"for their deceitfulness is in vain.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You reject all who stray from Your statutes, for their deceitfulness is in vain.

contentJson: [{"text":"All the wicked on earth You discard like dross;","poem":1},{"text":"therefore I love Your testimonies.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: All the wicked on earth You discard like dross; therefore I love Your testimonies.

contentJson: [{"text":"My flesh trembles in awe of You;","poem":1},{"text":"I stand in fear of Your judgments.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: My flesh trembles in awe of You; I stand in fear of Your judgments.

contentJson: [{"text":"I have done what is just and right;","poem":1},{"text":"do not leave me to my oppressors.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I have done what is just and right; do not leave me to my oppressors.

contentJson: [{"text":"Ensure Your servant’s well-being;","poem":1},{"text":"do not let the arrogant oppress me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Ensure Your servant’s well-being; do not let the arrogant oppress me.

contentJson: [{"text":"My eyes fail, looking for Your salvation,","poem":1},{"text":"and for Your righteous promise.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: My eyes fail, looking for Your salvation, and for Your righteous promise.

contentJson: [{"text":"Deal with Your servant according to Your loving devotion,","poem":1},{"text":"and teach me Your statutes.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Deal with Your servant according to Your loving devotion, and teach me Your statutes.

contentJson: [{"text":"I am Your servant; give me understanding,","poem":1},{"text":"that I may know Your testimonies.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I am Your servant; give me understanding, that I may know Your testimonies.

contentJson: [{"text":"It is time for the LORD to act,","poem":1},{"text":"for they have broken Your law.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: It is time for the LORD to act, for they have broken Your law.

contentJson: [{"text":"Therefore I love Your commandments more than gold,","poem":1},{"text":"even the purest gold.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Therefore I love Your commandments more than gold, even the purest gold.

contentJson: [{"text":"Therefore I admire all Your precepts","poem":1},{"text":"and hate every false way.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Therefore I admire all Your precepts and hate every false way.

contentJson: [{"text":"Wonderful are Your testimonies;","poem":1},{"text":"therefore I obey them.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Wonderful are Your testimonies; therefore I obey them.

contentJson: [{"text":"The unfolding of Your words gives light;","poem":1},{"text":"it informs the simple.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The unfolding of Your words gives light; it informs the simple.

contentJson: [{"text":"I open my mouth and pant,","poem":1},{"text":"longing for Your commandments.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I open my mouth and pant, longing for Your commandments.

contentJson: [{"text":"Turn to me and show me mercy,","poem":1},{"text":"as You do to those who love Your name.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Turn to me and show me mercy, as You do to those who love Your name.

contentJson: [{"text":"Order my steps in Your word;","poem":1},{"text":"let no sin rule over me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Order my steps in Your word; let no sin rule over me.

contentJson: [{"text":"Redeem me from the oppression of man,","poem":1},{"text":"that I may keep Your precepts.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Redeem me from the oppression of man, that I may keep Your precepts.

contentJson: [{"text":"Make Your face shine upon Your servant,","poem":1},{"text":"and teach me Your statutes.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Make Your face shine upon Your servant, and teach me Your statutes.

contentJson: [{"text":"My eyes shed streams of tears","poem":1},{"text":"because Your law is not obeyed.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: My eyes shed streams of tears because Your law is not obeyed.

contentJson: [{"text":"Righteous are You, O LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"and upright are Your judgments.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Righteous are You, O LORD, and upright are Your judgments.

contentJson: [{"text":"The testimonies You have laid down are righteous","poem":1},{"text":"and altogether faithful.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The testimonies You have laid down are righteous and altogether faithful.

contentJson: [{"text":"My zeal has consumed me","poem":1},{"text":"because my foes forget Your words.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: My zeal has consumed me because my foes forget Your words.

contentJson: [{"text":"Your promise is completely pure;","poem":1},{"text":"therefore Your servant loves it.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Your promise is completely pure; therefore Your servant loves it.

contentJson: [{"text":"I am lowly and despised,","poem":1},{"text":"but I do not forget Your precepts.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I am lowly and despised, but I do not forget Your precepts.

contentJson: [{"text":"Your righteousness is everlasting","poem":1},{"text":"and Your law is true.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Your righteousness is everlasting and Your law is true.

contentJson: [{"text":"Trouble and distress have found me,","poem":1},{"text":"but Your commandments are my delight.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Trouble and distress have found me, but Your commandments are my delight.

contentJson: [{"text":"Your testimonies are righteous forever.","poem":1},{"text":"Give me understanding, that I may live.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Your testimonies are righteous forever. Give me understanding, that I may live.

contentJson: [{"text":"I call with all my heart; answer me, O LORD!","poem":1},{"text":"I will obey Your statutes.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I call with all my heart; answer me, O LORD! I will obey Your statutes.

contentJson: [{"text":"I call to You; save me,","poem":1},{"text":"that I may keep Your testimonies.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I call to You; save me, that I may keep Your testimonies.

contentJson: [{"text":"I rise before dawn and cry for help;","poem":1},{"text":"in Your word I have put my hope.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I rise before dawn and cry for help; in Your word I have put my hope.

contentJson: [{"text":"My eyes anticipate the watches of night,","poem":1},{"text":"that I may meditate on Your word.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: My eyes anticipate the watches of night, that I may meditate on Your word.

contentJson: [{"text":"Hear my voice, O LORD, according to Your loving devotion;","poem":1},{"text":"give me life according to Your justice.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Hear my voice, O LORD, according to Your loving devotion; give me life according to Your justice.

contentJson: [{"text":"Those who follow after wickedness draw near;","poem":1},{"text":"they are far from Your law.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Those who follow after wickedness draw near; they are far from Your law.

contentJson: [{"text":"You are near, O LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"and all Your commandments are true.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You are near, O LORD, and all Your commandments are true.

contentJson: [{"text":"Long ago I learned from Your testimonies","poem":1},{"text":"that You have established them forever.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Long ago I learned from Your testimonies that You have established them forever.

contentJson: [{"text":"Look upon my affliction and rescue me,","poem":1},{"text":"for I have not forgotten Your law.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Look upon my affliction and rescue me, for I have not forgotten Your law.

contentJson: [{"text":"Defend my cause and redeem me;","poem":1},{"text":"revive me according to Your word.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Defend my cause and redeem me; revive me according to Your word.

contentJson: [{"text":"Salvation is far from the wicked","poem":1},{"text":"because they do not seek Your statutes.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Salvation is far from the wicked because they do not seek Your statutes.

contentJson: [{"text":"Great are Your mercies, O LORD;","poem":1},{"text":"revive me according to Your ordinances.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Great are Your mercies, O LORD; revive me according to Your ordinances.

contentJson: [{"text":"Though my persecutors and foes are many,","poem":1},{"text":"I have not turned from Your testimonies.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Though my persecutors and foes are many, I have not turned from Your testimonies.

contentJson: [{"text":"I look on the faithless with loathing","poem":1},{"text":"because they do not keep Your word.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I look on the faithless with loathing because they do not keep Your word.

contentJson: [{"text":"Consider how I love Your precepts, O LORD;","poem":1},{"text":"give me life according to Your loving devotion.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Consider how I love Your precepts, O LORD; give me life according to Your loving devotion.

contentJson: [{"text":"The entirety of Your word is truth,","poem":1},{"text":"and all Your righteous judgments endure forever.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The entirety of Your word is truth, and all Your righteous judgments endure forever.

contentJson: [{"text":"Rulers persecute me without cause,","poem":1},{"text":"but my heart fears only Your word.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Rulers persecute me without cause, but my heart fears only Your word.

contentJson: [{"text":"I rejoice in Your promise","poem":1},{"text":"like one who finds great spoil.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I rejoice in Your promise like one who finds great spoil.

contentJson: [{"text":"I hate and abhor falsehood,","poem":1},{"text":"but Your law I love.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I hate and abhor falsehood, but Your law I love.

contentJson: [{"text":"Seven times a day I praise You","poem":1},{"text":"for Your righteous judgments.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Seven times a day I praise You for Your righteous judgments.

contentJson: [{"text":"Abundant peace belongs to those who love Your instruction;","poem":1},{"text":"nothing can make them stumble.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Abundant peace belongs to those who love Your instruction; nothing can make them stumble.

contentJson: [{"text":"I wait for Your salvation, O LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"and I carry out Your commandments.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I wait for Your salvation, O LORD, and I carry out Your commandments.

contentJson: [{"text":"I obey Your testimonies","poem":1},{"text":"and love them greatly.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I obey Your testimonies and love them greatly.

contentJson: [{"text":"I obey Your precepts and Your testimonies,","poem":1},{"text":"for all my ways are before You.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I obey Your precepts and Your testimonies, for all my ways are before You.

contentJson: [{"text":"May my cry come before You, O LORD;","poem":1},{"text":"give me understanding according to Your word.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May my cry come before You, O LORD; give me understanding according to Your word.

contentJson: [{"text":"May my plea come before You;","poem":1},{"text":"rescue me according to Your promise.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May my plea come before You; rescue me according to Your promise.

contentJson: [{"text":"My lips pour forth praise,","poem":1},{"text":"for You teach me Your statutes.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: My lips pour forth praise, for You teach me Your statutes.

contentJson: [{"text":"My tongue sings of Your word,","poem":1},{"text":"for all Your commandments are righteous.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: My tongue sings of Your word, for all Your commandments are righteous.

contentJson: [{"text":"May Your hand be ready to help me,","poem":1},{"text":"for I have chosen Your precepts.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May Your hand be ready to help me, for I have chosen Your precepts.

contentJson: [{"text":"I long for Your salvation, O LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"and Your law is my delight.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I long for Your salvation, O LORD, and Your law is my delight.

contentJson: [{"text":"Let me live to praise You;","poem":1},{"text":"may Your judgments sustain me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Let me live to praise You; may Your judgments sustain me.

contentJson: [{"text":"I have strayed like a lost sheep;","poem":1},{"text":"seek Your servant, for I have not forgotten Your commandments.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I have strayed like a lost sheep; seek Your servant, for I have not forgotten Your commandments.

contentJson: [{"text":"In my distress I cried to the LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"and He answered me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: In my distress I cried to the LORD, and He answered me.

contentJson: [{"text":"Deliver my soul, O LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"from lying lips and a deceitful tongue.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Deliver my soul, O LORD, from lying lips and a deceitful tongue.

contentJson: [{"text":"What will He do to you,","poem":1},{"text":"and what will be added to you,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"O deceitful tongue?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
What will He do to you, and what will be added to you, 
O deceitful tongue?

contentJson: [{"text":"Sharp arrows will come from the warrior,","poem":1},{"text":"with burning coals of the broom tree!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Sharp arrows will come from the warrior, with burning coals of the broom tree!

contentJson: [{"text":"Woe to me that I dwell in Meshech,","poem":1},{"text":"that I live among the tents of Kedar!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Woe to me that I dwell in Meshech, that I live among the tents of Kedar!

contentJson: [{"text":"Too long have I dwelt","poem":1},{"text":"among those who hate peace.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Too long have I dwelt among those who hate peace.

contentJson: [{"text":"I am in favor of peace;","poem":1},{"text":"but when I speak, they want war.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I am in favor of peace; but when I speak, they want war.

contentJson: [{"text":"I lift up my eyes to the hills.","poem":1},{"text":"From where does my help come?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I lift up my eyes to the hills. From where does my help come?

contentJson: [{"text":"My help comes from the LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"the Maker of heaven and earth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: My help comes from the LORD, the Maker of heaven and earth.

contentJson: [{"text":"He will not allow your foot to slip;","poem":1},{"text":"your Protector will not slumber.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He will not allow your foot to slip; your Protector will not slumber.

contentJson: [{"text":"Behold, the Protector of Israel","poem":1},{"text":"will neither slumber nor sleep.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Behold, the Protector of Israel will neither slumber nor sleep.

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD is your keeper;","poem":1},{"text":"the LORD is the shade on your right hand.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The LORD is your keeper; the LORD is the shade on your right hand.

contentJson: [{"text":"The sun will not strike you by day,","poem":1},{"text":"nor the moon by night.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The sun will not strike you by day, nor the moon by night.

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD will guard you from all evil;","poem":1},{"text":"He will preserve your soul.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The LORD will guard you from all evil; He will preserve your soul.

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD will watch over your coming and going,","poem":1},{"text":"both now and forevermore.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The LORD will watch over your coming and going, both now and forevermore.

contentJson: [{"text":"I was glad when they said to me,","poem":1},{"text":"“Let us go to the house of the LORD.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I was glad when they said to me, “Let us go to the house of the LORD.”

contentJson: [{"text":"Our feet are standing in your gates,","poem":1},{"text":"O Jerusalem.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Our feet are standing in your gates, O Jerusalem.

contentJson: [{"text":"Jerusalem is built up","poem":1},{"text":"as a city united together,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Jerusalem is built up as a city united together,

contentJson: [{"text":"where the tribes go up,","poem":1},{"text":"the tribes of the LORD,","poem":2},{"text":"as a testimony for Israel,","poem":1},{"text":"to give thanks to the name of the LORD.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: where the tribes go up, the tribes of the LORD, as a testimony for Israel, to give thanks to the name of the LORD.

contentJson: [{"text":"For there the thrones of judgment stand,","poem":1},{"text":"the thrones of the house of David.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For there the thrones of judgment stand, the thrones of the house of David.

contentJson: [{"text":"Pray for the peace of Jerusalem:","poem":1},{"text":"“May those who love you prosper.","poem":2},{"noteId":263}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Pray for the peace of Jerusalem: “May those who love you prosper.

contentJson: [{"text":"May there be peace within your walls,","poem":1},{"text":"and prosperity","poem":2},{"noteId":264},{"text":"inside your fortresses.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May there be peace within your walls, and prosperity inside your fortresses.”

contentJson: [{"text":"For the sake of my brothers and friends,","poem":1},{"text":"I will say, “Peace be within you.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For the sake of my brothers and friends, I will say, “Peace be within you.”

contentJson: [{"text":"For the sake of the house of the LORD our God,","poem":1},{"text":"I will seek your prosperity.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For the sake of the house of the LORD our God, I will seek your prosperity.

contentJson: [{"text":"I lift up my eyes to You,","poem":1},{"text":"the One enthroned in heaven.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I lift up my eyes to You, the One enthroned in heaven.

contentJson: [{"text":"As the eyes of servants","poem":1},{"text":"look to the hand of their master,","poem":2},{"text":"as the eyes of a maidservant","poem":1},{"text":"look to the hand of her mistress,","poem":2},{"text":"so our eyes are on the LORD our God","poem":1},{"text":"until He shows us mercy.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: As the eyes of servants look to the hand of their master, as the eyes of a maidservant look to the hand of her mistress, so our eyes are on the LORD our God until He shows us mercy.

contentJson: [{"text":"Have mercy on us, O LORD, have mercy,","poem":1},{"text":"for we have endured much contempt.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Have mercy on us, O LORD, have mercy, for we have endured much contempt.

contentJson: [{"text":"We have endured much scorn from the arrogant,","poem":1},{"text":"much contempt from the proud.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: We have endured much scorn from the arrogant, much contempt from the proud.

contentJson: [{"text":"If the LORD had not been on our side—","poem":1},{"text":"let Israel now declare—","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: If the LORD had not been on our side— let Israel now declare—

contentJson: [{"text":"if the LORD had not been on our side","poem":1},{"text":"when men attacked us,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: if the LORD had not been on our side when men attacked us,

contentJson: [{"text":"when their anger flared against us,","poem":1},{"text":"then they would have swallowed us alive,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: when their anger flared against us, then they would have swallowed us alive,

contentJson: [{"text":"then the floods would have engulfed us,","poem":1},{"text":"then the torrent would have overwhelmed us,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: then the floods would have engulfed us, then the torrent would have overwhelmed us,

contentJson: [{"text":"then the raging waters","poem":1},{"text":"would have swept us away.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: then the raging waters would have swept us away.

contentJson: [{"text":"Blessed be the LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"who has not given us as prey to their teeth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Blessed be the LORD, who has not given us as prey to their teeth.

contentJson: [{"text":"We have escaped like a bird from the snare of the fowler;","poem":1},{"text":"the net is torn, and we have slipped away.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: We have escaped like a bird from the snare of the fowler; the net is torn, and we have slipped away.

contentJson: [{"text":"Our help is in the name of the LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"the Maker of heaven and earth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Our help is in the name of the LORD, the Maker of heaven and earth.

contentJson: [{"text":"Those who trust in the LORD are like Mount Zion.","poem":1},{"text":"It cannot be moved; it abides forever.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Those who trust in the LORD are like Mount Zion. It cannot be moved; it abides forever.

contentJson: [{"text":"As the mountains surround Jerusalem,","poem":1},{"text":"so the LORD surrounds His people,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"both now and forevermore.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
As the mountains surround Jerusalem, so the LORD surrounds His people, 
both now and forevermore.

contentJson: [{"text":"For the scepter of the wicked will not rest","poem":1},{"text":"upon the land allotted to the righteous,","poem":2},{"text":"so that the righteous will not put forth","poem":1},{"text":"their hands to injustice.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For the scepter of the wicked will not rest upon the land allotted to the righteous, so that the righteous will not put forth their hands to injustice.

contentJson: [{"text":"Do good, O LORD, to those who are good,","poem":1},{"text":"and to the upright in heart.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Do good, O LORD, to those who are good, and to the upright in heart.

contentJson: [{"text":"But those who turn to crooked ways","poem":1},{"text":"the LORD will banish with the evildoers.","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"Peace be upon Israel.","poem":1}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
But those who turn to crooked ways the LORD will banish with the evildoers. 
Peace be upon Israel.

contentJson: [{"text":"When the LORD restored the captives of Zion,","poem":1},{"noteId":265},{"text":"we were like dreamers.","poem":2},{"noteId":266}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: When the LORD restored the captives of Zion, we were like dreamers.

contentJson: [{"text":"Then our mouths were filled with laughter,","poem":1},{"text":"our tongues with shouts of joy.","poem":2},{"text":"Then it was said among the nations,","poem":1},{"text":"“The LORD has done great things for them.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Then our mouths were filled with laughter, our tongues with shouts of joy. Then it was said among the nations, “The LORD has done great things for them.”

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD has done great things for us;","poem":1},{"text":"we are filled with joy.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The LORD has done great things for us; we are filled with joy.

contentJson: [{"text":"Restore our captives,","poem":1},{"noteId":267},{"text":"O LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"like streams in the Negev.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Restore our captives, O LORD, like streams in the Negev.

contentJson: [{"text":"Those who sow in tears","poem":1},{"text":"will reap with shouts of joy.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Those who sow in tears will reap with shouts of joy.

contentJson: [{"text":"He who goes out weeping,","poem":1},{"text":"bearing a trail of seed,","poem":2},{"text":"will surely return with shouts of joy,","poem":1},{"text":"carrying sheaves of grain.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He who goes out weeping, bearing a trail of seed, will surely return with shouts of joy, carrying sheaves of grain.

contentJson: [{"text":"Unless the LORD builds the house,","poem":1},{"text":"its builders labor in vain;","poem":2},{"text":"unless the LORD protects the city,","poem":1},{"text":"its watchmen stand guard in vain.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Unless the LORD builds the house, its builders labor in vain; unless the LORD protects the city, its watchmen stand guard in vain.

contentJson: [{"text":"In vain you rise early","poem":1},{"text":"and stay up late,","poem":2},{"text":"toiling for bread to eat—","poem":1},{"text":"for He gives sleep to His beloved.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: In vain you rise early and stay up late, toiling for bread to eat— for He gives sleep to His beloved.

contentJson: [{"text":"Children are indeed a heritage from the LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"and the fruit of the womb is His reward.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Children are indeed a heritage from the LORD, and the fruit of the womb is His reward.

contentJson: [{"text":"Like arrows in the hand of a warrior,","poem":1},{"text":"so are children born in one’s youth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Like arrows in the hand of a warrior, so are children born in one’s youth.

contentJson: [{"text":"Blessed is the man","poem":1},{"text":"whose quiver is full of them.","poem":2},{"text":"He will not be put to shame","poem":1},{"text":"when he confronts the enemies at the gate.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Blessed is the man whose quiver is full of them. He will not be put to shame when he confronts the enemies at the gate.

contentJson: [{"text":"Blessed are all who fear the LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"who walk in His ways!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Blessed are all who fear the LORD, who walk in His ways!

contentJson: [{"text":"For when you eat the fruit of your labor,","poem":1},{"text":"blessings and prosperity will be yours.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For when you eat the fruit of your labor, blessings and prosperity will be yours.

contentJson: [{"text":"Your wife will be like a fruitful vine","poem":1},{"text":"flourishing within your house,","poem":2},{"text":"your sons like olive shoots","poem":1},{"text":"sitting around your table.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Your wife will be like a fruitful vine flourishing within your house, your sons like olive shoots sitting around your table.

contentJson: [{"text":"In this way indeed shall blessing come","poem":1},{"text":"to the man who fears the LORD.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: In this way indeed shall blessing come to the man who fears the LORD.

contentJson: [{"text":"May the LORD bless you from Zion,","poem":1},{"text":"that you may see the prosperity of Jerusalem","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"all the days of your life,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
May the LORD bless you from Zion, that you may see the prosperity of Jerusalem 
all the days of your life,

contentJson: [{"text":"that you may see","poem":1},{"text":"your children’s children.","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"Peace be upon Israel!","poem":1}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
that you may see your children’s children. 
Peace be upon Israel!

contentJson: [{"text":"Many a time they have persecuted me from my youth—","poem":1},{"text":"let Israel now declare—","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Many a time they have persecuted me from my youth— let Israel now declare—

contentJson: [{"text":"many a time they have persecuted me from my youth,","poem":1},{"text":"but they have not prevailed against me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: many a time they have persecuted me from my youth, but they have not prevailed against me.

contentJson: [{"text":"The plowmen plowed over my back;","poem":1},{"text":"they made their furrows long.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The plowmen plowed over my back; they made their furrows long.

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD is righteous;","poem":1},{"text":"He has cut me from the cords of the wicked.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The LORD is righteous; He has cut me from the cords of the wicked.

contentJson: [{"text":"May all who hate Zion","poem":1},{"text":"be turned back in shame.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May all who hate Zion be turned back in shame.

contentJson: [{"text":"May they be like grass on the rooftops,","poem":1},{"text":"which withers before it can grow,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May they be like grass on the rooftops, which withers before it can grow,

contentJson: [{"text":"unable to fill the hands of the reaper,","poem":1},{"text":"or the arms of the binder of sheaves.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: unable to fill the hands of the reaper, or the arms of the binder of sheaves.

contentJson: [{"text":"May none who pass by say to them,","poem":1},{"text":"“The blessing of the LORD be on you;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"we bless you in the name of the LORD.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
May none who pass by say to them, “The blessing of the LORD be on you; 
we bless you in the name of the LORD.”

contentJson: [{"text":"Out of the depths","poem":1},{"text":"I cry to You, O LORD!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Out of the depths I cry to You, O LORD!

contentJson: [{"text":"O Lord, hear my voice;","poem":1},{"text":"let Your ears be attentive to my plea for mercy.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: O Lord, hear my voice; let Your ears be attentive to my plea for mercy.

contentJson: [{"text":"If You, O LORD, kept track of iniquities,","poem":1},{"text":"then who, O Lord, could stand?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: If You, O LORD, kept track of iniquities, then who, O Lord, could stand?

contentJson: [{"text":"But with You there is forgiveness,","poem":1},{"text":"so that You may be feared.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But with You there is forgiveness, so that You may be feared.

contentJson: [{"text":"I wait for the LORD; my soul does wait,","poem":1},{"text":"and in His word I put my hope.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I wait for the LORD; my soul does wait, and in His word I put my hope.

contentJson: [{"text":"My soul waits for the Lord","poem":1},{"text":"more than watchmen wait for the morning—","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"more than watchmen wait for the morning.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
My soul waits for the Lord more than watchmen wait for the morning— 
more than watchmen wait for the morning.

contentJson: [{"text":"O Israel, put your hope in the LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"for with the LORD is loving devotion,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"and with Him is redemption in abundance.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
O Israel, put your hope in the LORD, for with the LORD is loving devotion, 
and with Him is redemption in abundance.

contentJson: [{"text":"And He will redeem Israel","poem":1},{"text":"from all iniquity.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: And He will redeem Israel from all iniquity.

contentJson: [{"text":"My heart is not proud, O LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"my eyes are not haughty.","poem":2},{"text":"I do not aspire to great things","poem":1},{"text":"or matters too lofty for me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: My heart is not proud, O LORD, my eyes are not haughty. I do not aspire to great things or matters too lofty for me.

contentJson: [{"text":"Surely I have stilled and quieted my soul;","poem":1},{"text":"like a weaned child with his mother,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"like a weaned child is my soul within me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Surely I have stilled and quieted my soul; like a weaned child with his mother, 
like a weaned child is my soul within me.

contentJson: [{"text":"O Israel, put your hope in the LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"both now and forevermore.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: O Israel, put your hope in the LORD, both now and forevermore.

contentJson: [{"text":"O LORD, remember on behalf of David","poem":1},{"text":"all the hardships he endured,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: O LORD, remember on behalf of David all the hardships he endured,

contentJson: [{"text":"how he swore an oath to the LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"and vowed to the Mighty One of Jacob:","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: how he swore an oath to the LORD, and vowed to the Mighty One of Jacob:

contentJson: [{"text":"“I will not enter my house","poem":1},{"text":"or get into my bed,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: “I will not enter my house or get into my bed,

contentJson: [{"text":"I will not give sleep to my eyes","poem":1},{"text":"or slumber to my eyelids,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I will not give sleep to my eyes or slumber to my eyelids,

contentJson: [{"text":"until I find a place for the LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"a dwelling for the Mighty One of Jacob.","poem":2},{"noteId":268},{"text":"”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: until I find a place for the LORD, a dwelling for the Mighty One of Jacob. ”

contentJson: [{"text":"We heard that the ark was in Ephrathah;","poem":1},{"noteId":269},{"text":"we found it in the fields of Jaar.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: We heard that the ark was in Ephrathah; we found it in the fields of Jaar.

contentJson: [{"text":"Let us go to His dwelling place;","poem":1},{"text":"let us worship at His footstool.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Let us go to His dwelling place; let us worship at His footstool.

contentJson: [{"text":"Arise, O LORD, to Your resting place,","poem":1},{"text":"You and the ark of Your strength.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Arise, O LORD, to Your resting place, You and the ark of Your strength.

contentJson: [{"text":"May Your priests be clothed with righteousness,","poem":1},{"text":"and Your saints shout for joy.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May Your priests be clothed with righteousness, and Your saints shout for joy.

contentJson: [{"text":"For the sake of Your servant David,","poem":1},{"text":"do not reject Your anointed one.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For the sake of Your servant David, do not reject Your anointed one.

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD swore an oath to David,","poem":1},{"text":"a promise He will not revoke:","poem":2},{"text":"“One of your descendants","poem":1},{"text":"I will place on your throne.","poem":2},{"noteId":270}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The LORD swore an oath to David, a promise He will not revoke: “One of your descendants I will place on your throne.

contentJson: [{"text":"If your sons keep My covenant","poem":1},{"text":"and the testimony I will teach them,","poem":2},{"text":"then their sons will also sit on your throne","poem":1},{"text":"forever and ever.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: If your sons keep My covenant and the testimony I will teach them, then their sons will also sit on your throne forever and ever.”

contentJson: [{"text":"For the LORD has chosen Zion;","poem":1},{"text":"He has desired it for His home:","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For the LORD has chosen Zion; He has desired it for His home:

contentJson: [{"text":"“This is My resting place forever and ever;","poem":1},{"text":"here I will dwell, for I have desired this home.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: “This is My resting place forever and ever; here I will dwell, for I have desired this home.

contentJson: [{"text":"I will bless her with abundant provisions;","poem":1},{"text":"I will satisfy her poor with bread.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I will bless her with abundant provisions; I will satisfy her poor with bread.

contentJson: [{"text":"I will clothe her priests with salvation,","poem":1},{"text":"and her saints will sing out in joy.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I will clothe her priests with salvation, and her saints will sing out in joy.

contentJson: [{"text":"There I will make a horn grow for David;","poem":1},{"text":"I have prepared a lamp for My anointed one.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: There I will make a horn grow for David; I have prepared a lamp for My anointed one.

contentJson: [{"text":"I will clothe his enemies with shame,","poem":1},{"text":"but the crown upon him will gleam.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I will clothe his enemies with shame, but the crown upon him will gleam.”

contentJson: [{"text":"Behold, how good and pleasant it is","poem":1},{"text":"when brothers live together in harmony!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Behold, how good and pleasant it is when brothers live together in harmony!

contentJson: [{"text":"It is like fine oil on the head,","poem":1},{"text":"running down on the beard,","poem":2},{"text":"running down Aaron’s beard","poem":1},{"text":"over the collar of his robes.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: It is like fine oil on the head, running down on the beard, running down Aaron’s beard over the collar of his robes.

contentJson: [{"text":"It is like the dew of Hermon","poem":1},{"text":"falling on the mountains of Zion.","poem":2},{"text":"For there the LORD has bestowed the blessing","poem":1},{"text":"of life forevermore.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: It is like the dew of Hermon falling on the mountains of Zion. For there the LORD has bestowed the blessing of life forevermore.

contentJson: [{"text":"Come, bless the LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"all you servants of the LORD","poem":2},{"text":"who serve by night","poem":1},{"text":"in the house of the LORD!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Come, bless the LORD, all you servants of the LORD who serve by night in the house of the LORD!

contentJson: [{"text":"Lift up your hands to the sanctuary","poem":1},{"text":"and bless the LORD!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Lift up your hands to the sanctuary and bless the LORD!

contentJson: [{"text":"May the LORD, the Maker of heaven and earth,","poem":1},{"text":"bless you from Zion.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May the LORD, the Maker of heaven and earth, bless you from Zion.

contentJson: [{"text":"Hallelujah!","poem":1},{"noteId":271},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"Praise the name of the LORD.","poem":1},{"text":"Give praise, O servants of the LORD,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Hallelujah! 
Praise the name of the LORD. Give praise, O servants of the LORD,

contentJson: [{"text":"who stand in the house of the LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"in the courts of the house of our God.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: who stand in the house of the LORD, in the courts of the house of our God.

contentJson: [{"text":"Hallelujah, for the LORD is good;","poem":1},{"text":"sing praises to His name, for it is lovely.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Hallelujah, for the LORD is good; sing praises to His name, for it is lovely.

contentJson: [{"text":"For the LORD has chosen Jacob as His own,","poem":1},{"text":"Israel as His treasured possession.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For the LORD has chosen Jacob as His own, Israel as His treasured possession.

contentJson: [{"text":"For I know that the LORD is great;","poem":1},{"text":"our Lord is above all gods.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For I know that the LORD is great; our Lord is above all gods.

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD does all that pleases Him","poem":1},{"text":"in the heavens and on the earth,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"in the seas and in all their depths.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
The LORD does all that pleases Him in the heavens and on the earth, 
in the seas and in all their depths.

contentJson: [{"text":"He causes the clouds to rise","poem":1},{"text":"from the ends of the earth.","poem":2},{"text":"He generates the lightning with the rain","poem":1},{"text":"and brings forth the wind from His storehouses.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He causes the clouds to rise from the ends of the earth. He generates the lightning with the rain and brings forth the wind from His storehouses.

contentJson: [{"text":"He struck down the firstborn of Egypt,","poem":1},{"text":"of both man and beast.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He struck down the firstborn of Egypt, of both man and beast.

contentJson: [{"text":"He sent signs and wonders into your midst, O Egypt,","poem":1},{"text":"against Pharaoh and all his servants.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He sent signs and wonders into your midst, O Egypt, against Pharaoh and all his servants.

contentJson: [{"text":"He struck down many nations","poem":1},{"text":"and slaughtered mighty kings:","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He struck down many nations and slaughtered mighty kings:

contentJson: [{"text":"Sihon king of the Amorites,","poem":1},{"text":"Og king of Bashan,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"and all the kings of Canaan.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Sihon king of the Amorites, Og king of Bashan, 
and all the kings of Canaan.

contentJson: [{"text":"He gave their land as an inheritance,","poem":1},{"text":"as a heritage to His people Israel.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He gave their land as an inheritance, as a heritage to His people Israel.

contentJson: [{"text":"Your name, O LORD, endures forever,","poem":1},{"text":"Your renown, O LORD, through all generations.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Your name, O LORD, endures forever, Your renown, O LORD, through all generations.

contentJson: [{"text":"For the LORD will vindicate His people","poem":1},{"noteId":272},{"text":"and will have compassion on His servants.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For the LORD will vindicate His people and will have compassion on His servants.

contentJson: [{"text":"The idols of the nations are silver and gold,","poem":1},{"text":"made by the hands of men.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The idols of the nations are silver and gold, made by the hands of men.

contentJson: [{"text":"They have mouths, but cannot speak;","poem":1},{"text":"they have eyes, but cannot see;","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They have mouths, but cannot speak; they have eyes, but cannot see;

contentJson: [{"text":"they have ears, but cannot hear;","poem":1},{"text":"nor is there breath in their mouths.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: they have ears, but cannot hear; nor is there breath in their mouths.

contentJson: [{"text":"Those who make them become like them,","poem":1},{"text":"as do all who trust in them.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Those who make them become like them, as do all who trust in them.

contentJson: [{"text":"O house of Israel, bless the LORD;","poem":1},{"text":"O house of Aaron, bless the LORD;","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: O house of Israel, bless the LORD; O house of Aaron, bless the LORD;

contentJson: [{"text":"O house of Levi, bless the LORD;","poem":1},{"text":"you who fear the LORD, bless the LORD!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: O house of Levi, bless the LORD; you who fear the LORD, bless the LORD!

contentJson: [{"text":"Blessed be the LORD from Zion—","poem":1},{"text":"He who dwells in Jerusalem.","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"Hallelujah!","poem":1}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Blessed be the LORD from Zion— He who dwells in Jerusalem. 
Hallelujah!

contentJson: [{"text":"Give thanks to the LORD, for He is good.","poem":1},"His loving devotion endures forever."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Give thanks to the LORD, for He is good. His loving devotion endures forever.

contentJson: [{"text":"Give thanks to the God of gods.","poem":1},"His loving devotion endures forever."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Give thanks to the God of gods. His loving devotion endures forever.

contentJson: [{"text":"Give thanks to the Lord of lords.","poem":1},"His loving devotion endures forever."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Give thanks to the Lord of lords. His loving devotion endures forever.

contentJson: [{"text":"He alone does great wonders.","poem":1},"His loving devotion endures forever."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He alone does great wonders. His loving devotion endures forever.

contentJson: [{"text":"By His insight He made the heavens.","poem":1},"His loving devotion endures forever."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: By His insight He made the heavens. His loving devotion endures forever.

contentJson: [{"text":"He spread out the earth upon the waters.","poem":1},"His loving devotion endures forever."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He spread out the earth upon the waters. His loving devotion endures forever.

contentJson: [{"text":"He made the great lights—","poem":1},"His loving devotion endures forever."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He made the great lights— His loving devotion endures forever.

contentJson: [{"text":"the sun to rule the day,","poem":1},"His loving devotion endures forever."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: the sun to rule the day, His loving devotion endures forever.

contentJson: [{"text":"the moon and stars to govern the night.","poem":1},"His loving devotion endures forever."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: the moon and stars to govern the night. His loving devotion endures forever.

contentJson: [{"text":"He struck down the firstborn of Egypt","poem":1},"His loving devotion endures forever."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He struck down the firstborn of Egypt His loving devotion endures forever.

contentJson: [{"text":"and brought Israel out from among them","poem":1},"His loving devotion endures forever."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: and brought Israel out from among them His loving devotion endures forever.

contentJson: [{"text":"with a mighty hand and an outstretched arm.","poem":1},"His loving devotion endures forever."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: with a mighty hand and an outstretched arm. His loving devotion endures forever.

contentJson: [{"text":"He divided the Red Sea","poem":1},{"noteId":273},{"text":"in two","poem":1},"His loving devotion endures forever."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He divided the Red Sea in two His loving devotion endures forever.

contentJson: [{"text":"and led Israel through the midst,","poem":1},"His loving devotion endures forever."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: and led Israel through the midst, His loving devotion endures forever.

contentJson: [{"text":"but swept","poem":1},{"noteId":274},{"text":"Pharaoh and his army into the Red Sea.","poem":1},"His loving devotion endures forever."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: but swept Pharaoh and his army into the Red Sea. His loving devotion endures forever.

contentJson: [{"text":"He led His people through the wilderness.","poem":1},"His loving devotion endures forever."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He led His people through the wilderness. His loving devotion endures forever.

contentJson: [{"text":"He struck down great kings","poem":1},"His loving devotion endures forever."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He struck down great kings His loving devotion endures forever.

contentJson: [{"text":"and slaughtered mighty kings—","poem":1},"His loving devotion endures forever."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: and slaughtered mighty kings— His loving devotion endures forever.

contentJson: [{"text":"Sihon king of the Amorites","poem":1},"His loving devotion endures forever."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Sihon king of the Amorites His loving devotion endures forever.

contentJson: [{"text":"and Og king of Bashan—","poem":1},"His loving devotion endures forever."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: and Og king of Bashan— His loving devotion endures forever.

contentJson: [{"text":"and He gave their land as an inheritance,","poem":1},"His loving devotion endures forever."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: and He gave their land as an inheritance, His loving devotion endures forever.

contentJson: [{"text":"a heritage to His servant Israel.","poem":1},"His loving devotion endures forever."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: a heritage to His servant Israel. His loving devotion endures forever.

contentJson: [{"text":"He remembered us in our low estate","poem":1},"His loving devotion endures forever."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He remembered us in our low estate His loving devotion endures forever.

contentJson: [{"text":"and freed us from our enemies.","poem":1},"His loving devotion endures forever."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: and freed us from our enemies. His loving devotion endures forever.

contentJson: [{"text":"He gives food to every creature.","poem":1},"His loving devotion endures forever."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He gives food to every creature. His loving devotion endures forever.

contentJson: [{"text":"Give thanks to the God of heaven!","poem":1},"His loving devotion endures forever."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Give thanks to the God of heaven! His loving devotion endures forever.

contentJson: [{"text":"By the rivers of Babylon we sat and wept","poem":1},{"text":"when we remembered Zion.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: By the rivers of Babylon we sat and wept when we remembered Zion.

contentJson: [{"text":"There on the willows","poem":1},{"noteId":275},{"text":"we hung our harps,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: There on the willows we hung our harps,

contentJson: [{"text":"for there our captors requested a song;","poem":1},{"text":"our tormentors demanded songs of joy:","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"“Sing us a song of Zion.”","poem":1}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
for there our captors requested a song; our tormentors demanded songs of joy: 
“Sing us a song of Zion.”

contentJson: [{"text":"How can we sing a song of the LORD","poem":1},{"text":"in a foreign land?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: How can we sing a song of the LORD in a foreign land?

contentJson: [{"text":"If I forget you, O Jerusalem,","poem":1},{"text":"may my right hand cease to function.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: If I forget you, O Jerusalem, may my right hand cease to function.

contentJson: [{"text":"May my tongue cling to the roof of my mouth","poem":1},{"text":"if I do not remember you,","poem":2},{"text":"if I do not exalt Jerusalem","poem":1},{"text":"as my greatest joy!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May my tongue cling to the roof of my mouth if I do not remember you, if I do not exalt Jerusalem as my greatest joy!

contentJson: [{"text":"Remember, O LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"the sons of Edom on the day Jerusalem fell:","poem":2},{"text":"“Destroy it,” they said,","poem":1},{"text":"“tear it down to its foundations!”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Remember, O LORD, the sons of Edom on the day Jerusalem fell: “Destroy it,” they said, “tear it down to its foundations!”

contentJson: [{"text":"O Daughter of Babylon,","poem":1},{"text":"doomed to destruction,","poem":2},{"text":"blessed is he who repays you","poem":1},{"text":"as you have done to us.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: O Daughter of Babylon, doomed to destruction, blessed is he who repays you as you have done to us.

contentJson: [{"text":"Blessed is he who seizes your infants","poem":1},{"text":"and dashes them against the rocks.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Blessed is he who seizes your infants and dashes them against the rocks.

contentJson: [{"text":"I give You thanks with all my heart;","poem":1},{"text":"before the gods I sing Your praises.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I give You thanks with all my heart; before the gods I sing Your praises.

contentJson: [{"text":"I bow down toward Your holy temple","poem":1},{"text":"and give thanks to Your name","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"for Your loving devotion and Your faithfulness;","poem":2},{"text":"You have exalted Your name","poem":1},{"text":"and Your word above all else.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
I bow down toward Your holy temple and give thanks to Your name 
for Your loving devotion and Your faithfulness; You have exalted Your name and Your word above all else.

contentJson: [{"text":"On the day I called, You answered me;","poem":1},{"text":"You emboldened me and strengthened my soul.","poem":2},{"noteId":276}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: On the day I called, You answered me; You emboldened me and strengthened my soul.

contentJson: [{"text":"All the kings of the earth will give You thanks, O LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"when they hear the words of Your mouth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: All the kings of the earth will give You thanks, O LORD, when they hear the words of Your mouth.

contentJson: [{"text":"They will sing of the ways of the LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"for the glory of the LORD is great.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They will sing of the ways of the LORD, for the glory of the LORD is great.

contentJson: [{"text":"Though the LORD is on high,","poem":1},{"text":"He attends to the lowly;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"but the proud He knows from afar.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Though the LORD is on high, He attends to the lowly; 
but the proud He knows from afar.

contentJson: [{"text":"If I walk in the midst of trouble,","poem":1},{"text":"You preserve me from the anger of my foes;","poem":2},{"text":"You extend Your hand,","poem":1},{"text":"and Your right hand saves me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: If I walk in the midst of trouble, You preserve me from the anger of my foes; You extend Your hand, and Your right hand saves me.

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD will fulfill","poem":1},{"text":"His purpose for me.","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"O LORD, Your loving devotion endures forever—","poem":1},{"text":"do not abandon the works of Your hands.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
The LORD will fulfill His purpose for me. 
O LORD, Your loving devotion endures forever— do not abandon the works of Your hands.

contentJson: [{"text":"O LORD, You have searched me","poem":1},{"text":"and known me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: O LORD, You have searched me and known me.

contentJson: [{"text":"You know when I sit and when I rise;","poem":1},{"text":"You understand my thoughts from afar.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You know when I sit and when I rise; You understand my thoughts from afar.

contentJson: [{"text":"You search out my path and my lying down;","poem":1},{"text":"You are aware of all my ways.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You search out my path and my lying down; You are aware of all my ways.

contentJson: [{"text":"Even before a word is on my tongue,","poem":1},{"text":"You know all about it, O LORD.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Even before a word is on my tongue, You know all about it, O LORD.

contentJson: [{"text":"You hem me in behind and before;","poem":1},{"text":"You have laid Your hand upon me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You hem me in behind and before; You have laid Your hand upon me.

contentJson: [{"text":"Such knowledge is too wonderful for me,","poem":1},{"text":"too lofty for me to attain.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Such knowledge is too wonderful for me, too lofty for me to attain.

contentJson: [{"text":"Where can I go to escape Your Spirit?","poem":1},{"text":"Where can I flee from Your presence?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Where can I go to escape Your Spirit? Where can I flee from Your presence?

contentJson: [{"text":"If I ascend to the heavens, You are there;","poem":1},{"text":"if I make my bed in Sheol, You are there.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: If I ascend to the heavens, You are there; if I make my bed in Sheol, You are there.

contentJson: [{"text":"If I rise on the wings of the dawn,","poem":1},{"text":"if I settle by the farthest sea,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: If I rise on the wings of the dawn, if I settle by the farthest sea,

contentJson: [{"text":"even there Your hand will guide me;","poem":1},{"text":"Your right hand will hold me fast.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: even there Your hand will guide me; Your right hand will hold me fast.

contentJson: [{"text":"If I say, “Surely the darkness will hide me,","poem":1},{"text":"and the light become night around me”—","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: If I say, “Surely the darkness will hide me, and the light become night around me”—

contentJson: [{"text":"even the darkness is not dark to You,","poem":1},{"text":"but the night shines like the day,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"for darkness is as light to You.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
even the darkness is not dark to You, but the night shines like the day, 
for darkness is as light to You.

contentJson: [{"text":"For You formed my inmost being;","poem":1},{"noteId":277},{"text":"You knit me together in my mother’s womb.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For You formed my inmost being; You knit me together in my mother’s womb.

contentJson: [{"text":"I praise You,","poem":1},{"text":"for I am fearfully and wonderfully made.","poem":2},{"text":"Marvelous are Your works,","poem":1},{"text":"and I know this very well.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I praise You, for I am fearfully and wonderfully made. Marvelous are Your works, and I know this very well.

contentJson: [{"text":"My frame was not hidden from You","poem":1},{"text":"when I was made in secret,","poem":2},{"text":"when I was woven together","poem":1},{"text":"in the depths of the earth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: My frame was not hidden from You when I was made in secret, when I was woven together in the depths of the earth.

contentJson: [{"text":"Your eyes saw my unformed body;","poem":1},{"text":"all my days were written in Your book","poem":2},{"text":"and ordained for me","poem":1},{"text":"before one of them came to be.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Your eyes saw my unformed body; all my days were written in Your book and ordained for me before one of them came to be.

contentJson: [{"text":"How precious to me are Your thoughts,","poem":1},{"noteId":278},{"text":"O God,","poem":1},{"text":"how vast is their sum!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: How precious to me are Your thoughts, O God, how vast is their sum!

contentJson: [{"text":"If I were to count them,","poem":1},{"text":"they would outnumber the grains of sand;","poem":2},{"text":"and when I awake,","poem":1},{"text":"I am still with You.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: If I were to count them, they would outnumber the grains of sand; and when I awake, I am still with You.

contentJson: [{"text":"O God, that You would slay the wicked—","poem":1},{"text":"away from me, you bloodthirsty men—","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: O God, that You would slay the wicked— away from me, you bloodthirsty men—

contentJson: [{"text":"who speak of You deceitfully;","poem":1},{"text":"Your enemies take Your name in vain.","poem":2},{"noteId":279}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: who speak of You deceitfully; Your enemies take Your name in vain.

contentJson: [{"text":"Do I not hate those who hate You, O LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"and detest those who rise against You?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Do I not hate those who hate You, O LORD, and detest those who rise against You?

contentJson: [{"text":"I hate them with perfect hatred;","poem":1},{"text":"I count them as my enemies.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I hate them with perfect hatred; I count them as my enemies.

contentJson: [{"text":"Search me, O God, and know my heart;","poem":1},{"text":"test me and know my concerns.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Search me, O God, and know my heart; test me and know my concerns.

contentJson: [{"text":"See if there is any offensive way in me;","poem":1},{"text":"lead me in the way everlasting.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: See if there is any offensive way in me; lead me in the way everlasting.

contentJson: [{"text":"Rescue me, O LORD, from evil men.","poem":1},{"text":"Protect me from men of violence,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Rescue me, O LORD, from evil men. Protect me from men of violence,

contentJson: [{"text":"who devise evil in their hearts","poem":1},{"text":"and stir up war all day long.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: who devise evil in their hearts and stir up war all day long.

contentJson: [{"text":"They sharpen their tongues like snakes;","poem":1},{"text":"the venom of vipers is on their lips.","poem":2},{"noteId":280},"Selah"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They sharpen their tongues like snakes; the venom of vipers is on their lips. Selah

contentJson: [{"text":"Guard me, O LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"from the hands of the wicked.","poem":2},{"text":"Keep me safe from men of violence","poem":1},{"text":"who scheme to make me stumble.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Guard me, O LORD, from the hands of the wicked. Keep me safe from men of violence who scheme to make me stumble.

contentJson: [{"text":"The proud hide a snare for me;","poem":1},{"text":"the cords of their net are spread along the path,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"and lures are set out for me.","poem":2},"Selah"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
The proud hide a snare for me; the cords of their net are spread along the path, 
and lures are set out for me. Selah

contentJson: [{"text":"I say to the LORD, “You are my God.”","poem":1},{"text":"Hear, O LORD, my cry for help.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I say to the LORD, “You are my God.” Hear, O LORD, my cry for help.

contentJson: [{"text":"O GOD the Lord, the strength of my salvation,","poem":1},{"text":"You shield my head in the day of battle.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: O GOD the Lord, the strength of my salvation, You shield my head in the day of battle.

contentJson: [{"text":"Grant not, O LORD, the desires of the wicked;","poem":1},{"text":"do not promote their evil plans,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"lest they be exalted.","poem":2},"Selah"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Grant not, O LORD, the desires of the wicked; do not promote their evil plans, 
lest they be exalted. Selah

contentJson: [{"text":"May the heads of those who surround me","poem":1},{"text":"be covered in the trouble their lips have caused.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May the heads of those who surround me be covered in the trouble their lips have caused.

contentJson: [{"text":"May burning coals fall on them;","poem":1},{"text":"may they be thrown into the fire,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"into the miry pits, never to rise again.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
May burning coals fall on them; may they be thrown into the fire, 
into the miry pits, never to rise again.

contentJson: [{"text":"May no slanderer be established in the land;","poem":1},{"text":"may calamity hunt down the man of violence.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May no slanderer be established in the land; may calamity hunt down the man of violence.

contentJson: [{"text":"I know that the LORD upholds justice for the poor","poem":1},{"text":"and defends the cause of the needy.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I know that the LORD upholds justice for the poor and defends the cause of the needy.

contentJson: [{"text":"Surely the righteous will praise Your name;","poem":1},{"text":"the upright will dwell in Your presence.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Surely the righteous will praise Your name; the upright will dwell in Your presence.

contentJson: [{"text":"I call upon You, O LORD; come quickly to me.","poem":1},{"text":"Hear my voice when I call to You.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I call upon You, O LORD; come quickly to me. Hear my voice when I call to You.

contentJson: [{"text":"May my prayer be set before You like incense,","poem":1},{"text":"my uplifted hands like the evening offering.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May my prayer be set before You like incense, my uplifted hands like the evening offering.

contentJson: [{"text":"Set a guard, O LORD, over my mouth;","poem":1},{"text":"keep watch at the door of my lips.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Set a guard, O LORD, over my mouth; keep watch at the door of my lips.

contentJson: [{"text":"Do not let my heart be drawn to any evil thing","poem":1},{"text":"or take part in works of wickedness","poem":2},{"text":"with men who do iniquity;","poem":1},{"text":"let me not feast on their delicacies.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Do not let my heart be drawn to any evil thing or take part in works of wickedness with men who do iniquity; let me not feast on their delicacies.

contentJson: [{"text":"Let the righteous man strike me;","poem":1},{"text":"let his rebuke be an act of loving devotion.","poem":2},{"text":"It is oil for my head; let me not refuse it.","poem":1},{"text":"For my prayer is ever against the deeds of the wicked.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Let the righteous man strike me; let his rebuke be an act of loving devotion. It is oil for my head; let me not refuse it. For my prayer is ever against the deeds of the wicked.

contentJson: [{"text":"When their rulers are thrown down from the cliffs,","poem":1},{"text":"the people will listen to my words,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"for they are pleasant.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
When their rulers are thrown down from the cliffs, the people will listen to my words, 
for they are pleasant.

contentJson: [{"text":"As when one plows and breaks up the soil,","poem":1},{"text":"so our bones have been scattered at the mouth of Sheol.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: As when one plows and breaks up the soil, so our bones have been scattered at the mouth of Sheol.

contentJson: [{"text":"But my eyes are fixed on You,","poem":1},{"text":"O GOD the Lord.","poem":2},{"text":"In You I seek refuge;","poem":1},{"text":"do not leave my soul defenseless.","poem":2},{"noteId":281}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But my eyes are fixed on You, O GOD the Lord. In You I seek refuge; do not leave my soul defenseless.

contentJson: [{"text":"Keep me from the snares they have laid for me,","poem":1},{"text":"and from the lures of evildoers.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Keep me from the snares they have laid for me, and from the lures of evildoers.

contentJson: [{"text":"Let the wicked fall into their own nets,","poem":1},{"text":"while I pass by in safety.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Let the wicked fall into their own nets, while I pass by in safety.

contentJson: [{"text":"I cry aloud to the LORD;","poem":1},{"text":"I lift my voice to the LORD for mercy.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I cry aloud to the LORD; I lift my voice to the LORD for mercy.

contentJson: [{"text":"I pour out my complaint before Him;","poem":1},{"text":"I reveal my trouble to Him.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I pour out my complaint before Him; I reveal my trouble to Him.

contentJson: [{"text":"Although my spirit grows faint within me,","poem":1},{"text":"You know my way.","poem":2},{"text":"Along the path I travel","poem":1},{"text":"they have hidden a snare for me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Although my spirit grows faint within me, You know my way. Along the path I travel they have hidden a snare for me.

contentJson: [{"text":"Look to my right and see;","poem":1},{"text":"no one attends to me.","poem":2},{"text":"There is no refuge for me;","poem":1},{"text":"no one cares for my soul.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Look to my right and see; no one attends to me. There is no refuge for me; no one cares for my soul.

contentJson: [{"text":"I cry to You, O LORD: “You are my refuge,","poem":1},{"text":"my portion in the land of the living.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I cry to You, O LORD: “You are my refuge, my portion in the land of the living.”

contentJson: [{"text":"Listen to my cry,","poem":1},{"text":"for I am brought quite low.","poem":2},{"text":"Rescue me from my pursuers,","poem":1},{"text":"for they are too strong for me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Listen to my cry, for I am brought quite low. Rescue me from my pursuers, for they are too strong for me.

contentJson: [{"text":"Free my soul from prison,","poem":1},{"text":"that I may praise Your name.","poem":2},{"text":"The righteous will gather around me","poem":1},{"text":"because of Your goodness to me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Free my soul from prison, that I may praise Your name. The righteous will gather around me because of Your goodness to me.

contentJson: [{"text":"O LORD, hear my prayer.","poem":1},{"text":"In Your faithfulness, give ear to my plea;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"in Your righteousness, answer me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
O LORD, hear my prayer. In Your faithfulness, give ear to my plea; 
in Your righteousness, answer me.

contentJson: [{"text":"Do not bring Your servant into judgment,","poem":1},{"text":"for no one alive is righteous before You.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Do not bring Your servant into judgment, for no one alive is righteous before You.

contentJson: [{"text":"For the enemy has pursued my soul,","poem":1},{"text":"crushing my life to the ground,","poem":2},{"text":"making me dwell in darkness","poem":1},{"text":"like those long since dead.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For the enemy has pursued my soul, crushing my life to the ground, making me dwell in darkness like those long since dead.

contentJson: [{"text":"My spirit grows faint within me;","poem":1},{"text":"my heart is dismayed inside me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: My spirit grows faint within me; my heart is dismayed inside me.

contentJson: [{"text":"I remember the days of old;","poem":1},{"text":"I meditate on all Your works;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"I consider the work of Your hands.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
I remember the days of old; I meditate on all Your works; 
I consider the work of Your hands.

contentJson: [{"text":"I stretch out my hands to You;","poem":1},{"text":"my soul thirsts for You like a parched land.","poem":2},"Selah"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I stretch out my hands to You; my soul thirsts for You like a parched land. Selah

contentJson: [{"text":"Answer me quickly, O LORD;","poem":1},{"text":"my spirit fails.","poem":2},{"text":"Do not hide Your face from me,","poem":1},{"text":"or I will be like those who descend to the Pit.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Answer me quickly, O LORD; my spirit fails. Do not hide Your face from me, or I will be like those who descend to the Pit.

contentJson: [{"text":"Let me hear Your loving devotion in the morning,","poem":1},{"text":"for I have put my trust in You.","poem":2},{"text":"Teach me the way I should walk,","poem":1},{"text":"for to You I lift up my soul.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Let me hear Your loving devotion in the morning, for I have put my trust in You. Teach me the way I should walk, for to You I lift up my soul.

contentJson: [{"text":"Deliver me from my enemies, O LORD;","poem":1},{"text":"I flee to You for refuge.","poem":2},{"noteId":283}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Deliver me from my enemies, O LORD; I flee to You for refuge.

contentJson: [{"text":"Teach me to do Your will,","poem":1},{"text":"for You are my God.","poem":2},{"text":"May Your good Spirit lead me","poem":1},{"text":"on level ground.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Teach me to do Your will, for You are my God. May Your good Spirit lead me on level ground.
