contentJson: [{"text":"For the sake of Your name, O LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"revive me.","poem":2},{"text":"In Your righteousness,","poem":1},{"text":"bring my soul out of trouble.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For the sake of Your name, O LORD, revive me. In Your righteousness, bring my soul out of trouble.

contentJson: [{"text":"And in Your loving devotion,","poem":1},{"text":"cut off my enemies.","poem":2},{"text":"Destroy all who afflict me,","poem":1},{"text":"for I am Your servant.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: And in Your loving devotion, cut off my enemies. Destroy all who afflict me, for I am Your servant.

contentJson: [{"text":"Blessed be the LORD, my Rock,","poem":1},{"text":"who trains my hands for war,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"my fingers for battle.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Blessed be the LORD, my Rock, who trains my hands for war, 
my fingers for battle.

contentJson: [{"text":"He is my steadfast love and my fortress,","poem":1},{"text":"my stronghold and my deliverer.","poem":2},{"text":"He is my shield, in whom I take refuge,","poem":1},{"text":"who subdues peoples","poem":2},{"noteId":284},{"text":"under me.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He is my steadfast love and my fortress, my stronghold and my deliverer. He is my shield, in whom I take refuge, who subdues peoples under me.

contentJson: [{"text":"O LORD, what is man, that You regard him,","poem":1},{"text":"the son of man that You think of him?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: O LORD, what is man, that You regard him, the son of man that You think of him?

contentJson: [{"text":"Man is like a breath;","poem":1},{"text":"his days are like a passing shadow.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Man is like a breath; his days are like a passing shadow.

contentJson: [{"text":"Part Your heavens, O LORD, and come down;","poem":1},{"text":"touch the mountains, that they may smoke.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Part Your heavens, O LORD, and come down; touch the mountains, that they may smoke.

contentJson: [{"text":"Flash forth Your lightning and scatter them;","poem":1},{"text":"shoot Your arrows and rout them.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Flash forth Your lightning and scatter them; shoot Your arrows and rout them.

contentJson: [{"text":"Reach down from on high;","poem":1},{"text":"set me free and rescue me","poem":2},{"text":"from the deep waters,","poem":1},{"text":"from the grasp of foreigners,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Reach down from on high; set me free and rescue me from the deep waters, from the grasp of foreigners,

contentJson: [{"text":"whose mouths speak falsehood,","poem":1},{"text":"whose right hands are deceitful.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: whose mouths speak falsehood, whose right hands are deceitful.

contentJson: [{"text":"I will sing to You a new song, O God;","poem":1},{"text":"on a harp of ten strings I will make music to You—","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I will sing to You a new song, O God; on a harp of ten strings I will make music to You—

contentJson: [{"text":"to Him who gives victory to kings,","poem":1},{"text":"who frees His servant David from the deadly sword.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: to Him who gives victory to kings, who frees His servant David from the deadly sword.

contentJson: [{"text":"Set me free and rescue me","poem":1},{"text":"from the grasp of foreigners,","poem":2},{"text":"whose mouths speak falsehood,","poem":1},{"text":"whose right hands are deceitful.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Set me free and rescue me from the grasp of foreigners, whose mouths speak falsehood, whose right hands are deceitful.

contentJson: [{"text":"Then our sons will be like plants","poem":1},{"text":"nurtured in their youth,","poem":2},{"text":"our daughters like corner pillars","poem":1},{"text":"carved to adorn a palace.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Then our sons will be like plants nurtured in their youth, our daughters like corner pillars carved to adorn a palace.

contentJson: [{"text":"Our storehouses will be full,","poem":1},{"text":"supplying all manner of produce;","poem":2},{"text":"our flocks will bring forth thousands,","poem":1},{"text":"tens of thousands in our fields.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Our storehouses will be full, supplying all manner of produce; our flocks will bring forth thousands, tens of thousands in our fields.

contentJson: [{"text":"Our oxen will bear great loads.","poem":1},{"noteId":285},{"text":"There will be no breach in the walls,","poem":2},{"text":"no going into captivity,","poem":1},{"text":"and no cry of lament in our streets.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Our oxen will bear great loads. There will be no breach in the walls, no going into captivity, and no cry of lament in our streets.

contentJson: [{"text":"Blessed are the people of whom this is so;","poem":1},{"text":"blessed are the people whose God is the LORD.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Blessed are the people of whom this is so; blessed are the people whose God is the LORD.

contentJson: [{"text":"I will exalt You, my God and King;","poem":1},{"text":"I will bless Your name forever and ever.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I will exalt You, my God and King; I will bless Your name forever and ever.

contentJson: [{"text":"Every day I will bless You,","poem":1},{"text":"and I will praise Your name forever and ever.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Every day I will bless You, and I will praise Your name forever and ever.

contentJson: [{"text":"Great is the LORD and greatly to be praised;","poem":1},{"text":"His greatness is unsearchable.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Great is the LORD and greatly to be praised; His greatness is unsearchable.

contentJson: [{"text":"One generation will commend Your works to the next,","poem":1},{"text":"and will proclaim Your mighty acts—","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: One generation will commend Your works to the next, and will proclaim Your mighty acts—

contentJson: [{"text":"the glorious splendor of Your majesty.","poem":1},{"text":"And I will meditate on Your wondrous works.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: the glorious splendor of Your majesty. And I will meditate on Your wondrous works.

contentJson: [{"text":"They will proclaim the power of Your awesome deeds,","poem":1},{"text":"and I will declare Your greatness.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They will proclaim the power of Your awesome deeds, and I will declare Your greatness.

contentJson: [{"text":"They will extol the fame of Your abundant goodness","poem":1},{"text":"and sing joyfully of Your righteousness.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They will extol the fame of Your abundant goodness and sing joyfully of Your righteousness.

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD is gracious and compassionate,","poem":1},{"text":"slow to anger and abounding in loving devotion.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The LORD is gracious and compassionate, slow to anger and abounding in loving devotion.

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD is good to all;","poem":1},{"text":"His compassion rests on all He has made.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The LORD is good to all; His compassion rests on all He has made.

contentJson: [{"text":"All You have made will give You thanks, O LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"and Your saints will bless You.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: All You have made will give You thanks, O LORD, and Your saints will bless You.

contentJson: [{"text":"They will tell of the glory of Your kingdom","poem":1},{"text":"and speak of Your might,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They will tell of the glory of Your kingdom and speak of Your might,

contentJson: [{"text":"to make known to men Your mighty acts","poem":1},{"text":"and the glorious splendor of Your kingdom.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: to make known to men Your mighty acts and the glorious splendor of Your kingdom.

contentJson: [{"text":"Your kingdom is an everlasting kingdom,","poem":1},{"text":"and Your dominion endures through all generations.","poem":2},{"text":"The LORD is faithful in all His words","poem":1},{"text":"and kind in all His actions.","poem":2},{"noteId":287}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Your kingdom is an everlasting kingdom, and Your dominion endures through all generations. The LORD is faithful in all His words and kind in all His actions.

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD upholds all who fall","poem":1},{"text":"and lifts up all who are bowed down.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The LORD upholds all who fall and lifts up all who are bowed down.

contentJson: [{"text":"The eyes of all look to You,","poem":1},{"text":"and You give them their food in season.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The eyes of all look to You, and You give them their food in season.

contentJson: [{"text":"You open Your hand","poem":1},{"text":"and satisfy the desire of every living thing.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You open Your hand and satisfy the desire of every living thing.

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD is righteous in all His ways","poem":1},{"text":"and kind in all His deeds.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The LORD is righteous in all His ways and kind in all His deeds.

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD is near to all who call on Him,","poem":1},{"text":"to all who call out to Him in truth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The LORD is near to all who call on Him, to all who call out to Him in truth.

contentJson: [{"text":"He fulfills the desires of those who fear Him;","poem":1},{"text":"He hears their cry and saves them.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He fulfills the desires of those who fear Him; He hears their cry and saves them.

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD preserves all who love Him,","poem":1},{"text":"but all the wicked He will destroy.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The LORD preserves all who love Him, but all the wicked He will destroy.

contentJson: [{"text":"My mouth will declare the praise of the LORD;","poem":1},{"text":"let every creature bless His holy name","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"forever and ever.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
My mouth will declare the praise of the LORD; let every creature bless His holy name 
forever and ever.

contentJson: [{"text":"Hallelujah!","poem":1},{"noteId":288},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"Praise the LORD, O my soul.","poem":1}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Hallelujah! 
Praise the LORD, O my soul.

contentJson: [{"text":"I will praise the LORD all my life;","poem":1},{"text":"I will sing praises to my God while I have my being.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I will praise the LORD all my life; I will sing praises to my God while I have my being.

contentJson: [{"text":"Put not your trust in princes,","poem":1},{"text":"in mortal man, who cannot save.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Put not your trust in princes, in mortal man, who cannot save.

contentJson: [{"text":"When his spirit departs, he returns to the ground;","poem":1},{"text":"on that very day his plans perish.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: When his spirit departs, he returns to the ground; on that very day his plans perish.

contentJson: [{"text":"Blessed is he whose help is the God of Jacob,","poem":1},{"text":"whose hope is in the LORD his God,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Blessed is he whose help is the God of Jacob, whose hope is in the LORD his God,

contentJson: [{"text":"the Maker of heaven and earth,","poem":1},{"text":"the sea, and everything in them.","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"He remains faithful forever.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
the Maker of heaven and earth, the sea, and everything in them. 
He remains faithful forever.

contentJson: [{"text":"He executes justice for the oppressed","poem":1},{"text":"and gives food to the hungry.","poem":2},{"text":"The LORD sets the prisoners free,","poem":1}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He executes justice for the oppressed and gives food to the hungry. The LORD sets the prisoners free,

contentJson: [{"text":"the LORD opens the eyes of the blind,","poem":2},{"text":"the LORD lifts those who are weighed down,","poem":1},{"text":"the LORD loves the righteous.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: the LORD opens the eyes of the blind, the LORD lifts those who are weighed down, the LORD loves the righteous.

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD protects foreigners;","poem":1},{"text":"He sustains the fatherless and the widow,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"but the ways of the wicked He frustrates.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
The LORD protects foreigners; He sustains the fatherless and the widow, 
but the ways of the wicked He frustrates.

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD reigns forever,","poem":1},{"text":"your God, O Zion, for all generations.","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"Hallelujah!","poem":1}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
The LORD reigns forever, your God, O Zion, for all generations. 
Hallelujah!

contentJson: [{"text":"Hallelujah!","poem":1},{"noteId":289},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"How good it is to sing praises to our God,","poem":1},{"text":"how pleasant and lovely to praise Him!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Hallelujah! 
How good it is to sing praises to our God, how pleasant and lovely to praise Him!

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD builds up Jerusalem;","poem":1},{"text":"He gathers the exiles of Israel.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The LORD builds up Jerusalem; He gathers the exiles of Israel.

contentJson: [{"text":"He heals the brokenhearted","poem":1},{"text":"and binds up their wounds.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

contentJson: [{"text":"He determines the number of the stars;","poem":1},{"text":"He calls them each by name.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He determines the number of the stars; He calls them each by name.

contentJson: [{"text":"Great is our Lord, and mighty in power;","poem":1},{"text":"His understanding has no limit.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Great is our Lord, and mighty in power; His understanding has no limit.

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD sustains the humble,","poem":1},{"text":"but casts the wicked to the ground.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The LORD sustains the humble, but casts the wicked to the ground.

contentJson: [{"text":"Sing to the LORD with thanksgiving;","poem":1},{"text":"make music on the harp to our God,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Sing to the LORD with thanksgiving; make music on the harp to our God,

contentJson: [{"text":"who covers the sky with clouds,","poem":1},{"text":"who prepares rain for the earth,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"who makes grass to grow on the hills.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
who covers the sky with clouds, who prepares rain for the earth, 
who makes grass to grow on the hills.

contentJson: [{"text":"He provides food for the animals,","poem":1},{"text":"and for the young ravens when they call.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He provides food for the animals, and for the young ravens when they call.

contentJson: [{"text":"He does not delight in the strength of the horse;","poem":1},{"text":"He takes no pleasure in the legpower of the man.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He does not delight in the strength of the horse; He takes no pleasure in the legpower of the man.

contentJson: [{"text":"The LORD is pleased with those who fear Him,","poem":1},{"text":"who hope in His loving devotion.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The LORD is pleased with those who fear Him, who hope in His loving devotion.

contentJson: [{"text":"Exalt the LORD, O Jerusalem;","poem":1},{"text":"praise your God, O Zion!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Exalt the LORD, O Jerusalem; praise your God, O Zion!

contentJson: [{"text":"For He strengthens the bars of your gates","poem":1},{"text":"and blesses the children within you.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For He strengthens the bars of your gates and blesses the children within you.

contentJson: [{"text":"He makes peace at your borders;","poem":1},{"text":"He fills you with the finest wheat.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He makes peace at your borders; He fills you with the finest wheat.

contentJson: [{"text":"He sends forth His command to the earth;","poem":1},{"text":"His word runs swiftly.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He sends forth His command to the earth; His word runs swiftly.

contentJson: [{"text":"He spreads the snow like wool;","poem":1},{"text":"He scatters the frost like ashes;","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He spreads the snow like wool; He scatters the frost like ashes;

contentJson: [{"text":"He casts forth His hail like pebbles.","poem":1},{"noteId":290},{"text":"Who can withstand His icy blast?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He casts forth His hail like pebbles. Who can withstand His icy blast?

contentJson: [{"text":"He sends forth His word and melts them;","poem":1},{"text":"He unleashes His winds, and the waters flow.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He sends forth His word and melts them; He unleashes His winds, and the waters flow.

contentJson: [{"text":"He declares His word to Jacob,","poem":1},{"text":"His statutes and judgments to Israel.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He declares His word to Jacob, His statutes and judgments to Israel.

contentJson: [{"text":"He has done this for no other nation;","poem":1},{"text":"they do not know His judgments.","poem":2},{"noteId":291},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"Hallelujah!","poem":1}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
He has done this for no other nation; they do not know His judgments. 
Hallelujah!

contentJson: [{"text":"Hallelujah!","poem":1},{"noteId":292},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"Praise the LORD from the heavens;","poem":1},{"text":"praise Him in the highest places.","poem":2},{"noteId":293}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Hallelujah! 
Praise the LORD from the heavens; praise Him in the highest places.

contentJson: [{"text":"Praise Him, all His angels;","poem":1},{"text":"praise Him, all His heavenly hosts.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Praise Him, all His angels; praise Him, all His heavenly hosts.

contentJson: [{"text":"Praise Him, O sun and moon;","poem":1},{"text":"praise Him, all you shining stars.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Praise Him, O sun and moon; praise Him, all you shining stars.

contentJson: [{"text":"Praise Him, O highest heavens,","poem":1},{"text":"and you waters above the skies.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Praise Him, O highest heavens, and you waters above the skies.

contentJson: [{"text":"Let them praise the name of the LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"for He gave the command and they were created.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Let them praise the name of the LORD, for He gave the command and they were created.

contentJson: [{"text":"He established them forever and ever;","poem":1},{"text":"He issued a decree that will never pass away.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He established them forever and ever; He issued a decree that will never pass away.

contentJson: [{"text":"Praise the LORD from the earth,","poem":1},{"text":"all great sea creatures and ocean depths,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Praise the LORD from the earth, all great sea creatures and ocean depths,

contentJson: [{"text":"lightning and hail, snow and clouds,","poem":1},{"text":"powerful wind fulfilling His word,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: lightning and hail, snow and clouds, powerful wind fulfilling His word,

contentJson: [{"text":"mountains and all hills,","poem":1},{"text":"fruit trees and all cedars,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: mountains and all hills, fruit trees and all cedars,

contentJson: [{"text":"wild animals and all cattle,","poem":1},{"text":"crawling creatures and flying birds,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: wild animals and all cattle, crawling creatures and flying birds,

contentJson: [{"text":"kings of the earth and all peoples,","poem":1},{"text":"princes and all rulers of the earth,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: kings of the earth and all peoples, princes and all rulers of the earth,

contentJson: [{"text":"young men and maidens,","poem":1},{"text":"old and young together.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: young men and maidens, old and young together.

contentJson: [{"text":"Let them praise the name of the LORD,","poem":1},{"text":"for His name alone is exalted;","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"His splendor is above the earth and the heavens.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Let them praise the name of the LORD, for His name alone is exalted; 
His splendor is above the earth and the heavens.

contentJson: [{"text":"He has raised up a horn for His people,","poem":1},{"text":"the praise of all His saints,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"of Israel, a people near to Him.","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"Hallelujah!","poem":1}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
He has raised up a horn for His people, the praise of all His saints, 
of Israel, a people near to Him. 
Hallelujah!

contentJson: [{"text":"Hallelujah!","poem":1},{"noteId":294},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"Sing to the LORD a new song—","poem":1},{"text":"His praise in the assembly of the godly.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Hallelujah! 
Sing to the LORD a new song— His praise in the assembly of the godly.

contentJson: [{"text":"Let Israel rejoice in their Maker;","poem":1},{"text":"let the children of Zion rejoice in their King.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Let Israel rejoice in their Maker; let the children of Zion rejoice in their King.

contentJson: [{"text":"Let them praise His name with dancing,","poem":1},{"text":"and make music to Him with tambourine and harp.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Let them praise His name with dancing, and make music to Him with tambourine and harp.

contentJson: [{"text":"For the LORD takes pleasure in His people;","poem":1},{"text":"He adorns the afflicted with salvation.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For the LORD takes pleasure in His people; He adorns the afflicted with salvation.

contentJson: [{"text":"Let the saints exult in glory;","poem":1},{"text":"let them shout for joy upon their beds.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Let the saints exult in glory; let them shout for joy upon their beds.

contentJson: [{"text":"May the high praises of God be in their mouths,","poem":1},{"text":"and a double-edged sword in their hands,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: May the high praises of God be in their mouths, and a double-edged sword in their hands,

contentJson: [{"text":"to inflict vengeance on the nations","poem":1},{"text":"and punishment on the peoples,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: to inflict vengeance on the nations and punishment on the peoples,

contentJson: [{"text":"to bind their kings with chains","poem":1},{"text":"and their nobles with shackles of iron,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: to bind their kings with chains and their nobles with shackles of iron,

contentJson: [{"text":"to execute the judgment written against them.","poem":1},{"text":"This honor is for all His saints.","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"Hallelujah!","poem":1}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
to execute the judgment written against them. This honor is for all His saints. 
Hallelujah!

contentJson: [{"text":"Hallelujah!","poem":1},{"noteId":295},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"Praise God in His sanctuary.","poem":1},{"text":"Praise Him in His mighty heavens.","poem":2},{"noteId":296}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Hallelujah! 
Praise God in His sanctuary. Praise Him in His mighty heavens.

contentJson: [{"text":"Praise Him for His mighty acts;","poem":1},{"text":"praise Him for His excellent greatness.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Praise Him for His mighty acts; praise Him for His excellent greatness.

contentJson: [{"text":"Praise Him with the sound of the horn;","poem":1},{"text":"praise Him with the harp and lyre.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Praise Him with the sound of the horn; praise Him with the harp and lyre.

contentJson: [{"text":"Praise Him with tambourine and dancing;","poem":1},{"text":"praise Him with strings and flute.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Praise Him with tambourine and dancing; praise Him with strings and flute.

contentJson: [{"text":"Praise Him with clashing cymbals;","poem":1},{"text":"praise Him with resounding cymbals.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Praise Him with clashing cymbals; praise Him with resounding cymbals.

contentJson: [{"text":"Let everything that has breath praise the LORD!","poem":1},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"Hallelujah!","poem":1}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Let everything that has breath praise the LORD! 
Hallelujah!
